name: The Night Agent
description: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

episodes.name: The Call
episodes.description: While working the night action desk, FBI agent Peter receives a distress call and is soon put in charge protecting cybersecurity expert Rose.

episodes.name: Redial
episodes.description: After looking for a link between the Campbells and the FBI, Peter is forced to go on the run with Rose in search of a hard drive - and more answers.

episodes.name: The Zookeeper
episodes.description: Peter teams up with Rose for a risky mission at the White House. Elsewhere, a notable agent joins the security detail for the Vice President's daughter.

episodes.name: Eyes Only
episodes.description: Rose and Peter seek out one of the Campbells' recent contacts and uncover new intel. Monks opens up to Chelsea. Paulo makes a move on Maddie.

episodes.name: The Marionette
episodes.description: Peter visits someone close to Hawkins. Rose makes a key connection. Maddie's night out takes a dangerous turn, spurring the Secret Service into action.

episodes.name: Fathoms
episodes.description: With assassins hot on their trail, Peter and Rose split up en route to the White House. A shocking discovery quickly puts their lives in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Best Served Cold
episodes.description: Now in hiding, Peter and Rose grow closer and investigate a potential bombing suspect. At the White House, the conspirators obtain a disturbing tape.

episodes.name: Redux
episodes.description: More truths emerge about the bombing suspect's identity. Chelsea and Peter race to find Maddie after she sends a video with a coded message.

episodes.name: The Devil We Know
episodes.description: After new revelations surface, Peter and Rose scramble to find more evidence with help from Chelsea and Maddie. A bigger threat looms at Camp David.

episodes.name: Fathers
episodes.description: With lives at stake, the group tries to stop a nefarious plot before it's too late. In the aftermath, Peter confronts the past and begins a new chapter.

episodes.name: Call Tracking
episodes.description: After a disastrous mission in Bangkok, Peter goes AWOL to track an American agent accused of leaking secrets. Meanwhile, Rose receives a disturbing call.

episodes.name: Disconnected
episodes.description: Reunited at last, Peter and Rose race to intercept Warren. Noor weighs using her access to classified Iranian intelligence for her own gain.

episodes.name: Government Property
episodes.description: Catherine aids Peter's off-the-books investigation into Foxglove while Noor stumbles upon an unexpected encounter. A hijacking spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Desperate Measures
episodes.description: Peter and Rose infiltrate a party at the Iranian ambassador's home, arousing Javad's suspicion. Tomás and Markus lock horns over the Foxglove plan.

episodes.name: A Family Matter
episodes.description: Eager for intel about Night Action, Jacob makes Solomon a lucrative offer. Javad senses a traitor in his midst. Sami undertakes a covert mission in Iran.

episodes.name: A Good Agent
episodes.description: Rose grapples with a crisis of conscience. Viktor reveals his true goal to Tomás, and the hunter becomes the hunted when Solomon's team stalks Peter.

episodes.name: Tilt
episodes.description: Peter plays hardball to force Solomon to talk. Following a lead, Rose seeks answers from a Foxglove scientist - but finds herself in a lethal situation.

episodes.name: Divergence
episodes.description: Desperate to locate Rose, Peter makes a game-changing deal with Jacob. Tomás discovers just how far Markus is willing to go in service to his father.

episodes.name: Cultural Exchange
episodes.description: Breaching one of the most high-security locations in New York puts Peter's skills to the test. Rose and Dr. Cole enact a daring plan to stop Markus.

episodes.name: Buyer's Remorse
episodes.description: With time running out, Peter and Rose scramble to prevent a mass casualty event. Catherine floats an intriguing proposal.

name: Severance
description: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

episodes.name: Good News About Hell
episodes.description: Mark is promoted to lead a team who've had their memories surgically divided between their work and personal lives.

episodes.name: Half Loop
episodes.description: The team train new hire Helly on macrodata refinement. Mark takes a day off to meet with a mysterious former colleague.

episodes.name: In Perpetuity
episodes.description: Mark takes the team on a field trip, but Helly continues to rebel. A deteriorating Petey struggles to tell Mark about Lumon's misdeeds.

episodes.name: The You You Are
episodes.description: Irving finds an intriguing book at work. Helly aggressively pursues a meeting with her Outie. Mark attends a funeral with Ms. Selvig.

episodes.name: The Grim Barbarity of Optics and Design
episodes.description: Irving and Dylan confront Burt about his lies. Mark and Helly discover a strange new department.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.description: The team angers Cobel by forming an alliance.

episodes.name: Defiant Jazz
episodes.description: Mark and the team encounter new security measures from Cobel.

episodes.name: What's for Dinner?
episodes.description: The team prepares a plan. Mark attends Devon and Ricken's party.

episodes.name: The We We Are
episodes.description: The team discovers troubling revelations.

episodes.name: Hello, Ms. Cobel
episodes.description: Mark returns to work under different circumstances. Secrets from the Outie world come to light.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Mrs. Selvig
episodes.description: Outie Mark contemplates the meaning of a message. Lumon grapples with the fallout of the Overtime Contingency.

episodes.name: Who Is Alive?
episodes.description: Mark, Helly, Irving, and Dylan search for answers.

episodes.name: Woe's Hollow
episodes.description: The team participates in a group activity.

episodes.name: Trojan's Horse
episodes.description: Tensions emerge after the team suffers a loss.

name: Paradise
description: A Secret Service agent investigates the murder of a former president in a seemingly peaceful community.

episodes.name: Wildcat Is Down
episodes.description: It's just another day in Paradise until Xavier Collins discovers one of the world's most powerful individuals has been viciously murdered. Xavier analyzes the crime scene while recalling his complex relationship with the victim.

episodes.name: Sinatra
episodes.description: Agent Xavier Collins is interrogated. Samantha Redmond (codenamed Sinatra) begins to reassure the community as she reflects on how she got to Paradise.

episodes.name: The Architect of Social Well-Being
episodes.description: Isolated, Xavier seeks answers on his own and cautiously turns to Dr. Gabriela Torabi. Meanwhile, Billy and Jane feel the pressure from Robinson's investigation.

episodes.name: Agent Billy Pace
episodes.description: The citizens of Paradise celebrate at the annual carnival. Xavier and Billy delve deeper into their investigation.

episodes.name: In the Palaces of Crowned Kings
episodes.description: Xavier faces the consequences of his investigation, forcing him to consider how to proceed. Meanwhile, Cal's family history and his last days are examined.

episodes.name: You Asked for Miracles
episodes.description: Xavier and Robinson execute their plans as Sinatra strives to maintain Paradise's current state.

episodes.name: The Day
episodes.description: Sinatra and Xavier confront the past, returning to the harrowing day that brought them to Paradise.

episodes.name: The Man Who Kept the Secrets

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes: a survival game that has a whopping 45.6 billion-won prize at stake.

episodes.name: Mugunghwa Kkochi Pideon Nal
episodes.description: Hoping to win easy money, a broke and desperate Gi-hun agrees to take part in an enigmatic game. Not long into the first round, unforeseen horrors unfold.

episodes.name: Jiok
episodes.description: Split on whether to continue or quit, the group holds a vote. But their realities in the outside world may prove to be just as unforgiving as the game.

episodes.name: Usan-eul Sseun Namja
episodes.description: A few players enter the next round - which promises equal doses of sweet and deadly - with hidden advantages. Meanwhile, Jun-ho sneaks his way inside.

episodes.name: Jollyeodo Pyeonmeokgi
episodes.description: As alliances form among the players, no one is safe in the dorm after lights-out. The third game challenges Gi-hun's team to think strategically.

episodes.name: Pyeongdeung-han Sesang
episodes.description: Gi-hun and his team take turns keeping guard through the night. The masked men encounter trouble with their co-conspirators.

episodes.name: Kkanbu
episodes.description: Players pair off for the fourth game. Gi-hun grapples with a moral dilemma, Sang-woo chooses self-preservation and Sae-byeok shares her untold story.

episodes.name: VIPS
episodes.description: The Masked Leader welcomes VIP guests to the facility for a front-row viewing of the show. In the fifth game, some players crack under pressure.

episodes.name: Peuronteumaen
episodes.description: Ahead of the last round, distrust and disgust run deep among the finalists. Jun-ho makes a getaway, determined to expose the game's dirty secrets.

episodes.name: Unsu Joeun Nal
episodes.description: The final round presents another cruel test but this time, how it ends depends on just one player. The game's creator steps out of the shadows.

episodes.name: Ppang-gwa Bokgwon
episodes.description: A vengeful Gi-hun makes a U-turn at the airport. Later, in his hideout, he intensifies his search for the elusive recruiter who is seeking new players.

episodes.name: Hallowin Pati
episodes.description: Gi-hun finally gets hold of an invitation, marked for Halloween day. In a tense moment facing Jun-ho, they reveal their truths to each other.
New players gather for a chance to win 45.6 billion won. After an intense first round, the survivors' fates hang in the balance - down to one final vote.

episodes.name: Yeoseot Gaeui Dari
episodes.description: The players prepare for the next game: a six-legged pentathlon, where each team member must clear a mini-game to survive -- or face collective elimination.

episodes.name: Han Pan Deo
episodes.description: Kang No-eul earns enemies for her unruly actions. Nerves fray to the breaking point as the remaining players vote on whether to move to the next round.

episodes.name: O X
episodes.description: Jun-ho and his team prepare to infiltrate a suspicious island. As monetary stakes and tensions rise, players split into two opposing factions.

episodes.name: Chinguwa Jeok
episodes.description: The remaining players strategize on how to survive the night. Gi-hun proposes a risky plan--but he will need trustworthy allies to carry it out.

name: The White Lotus
description: The exploits of various guests and employees of a luxury resort over the span of a week.

episodes.name: Arrivals
episodes.description: As the White Lotus welcomes their newest guests, tensions quickly arise between the hotel staff and the volatile vacationers.

episodes.name: New Day
episodes.description: A cautiously optimistic Belinda walks a fine line with Tanya; Armond brainstorms ways to deal with Shane; Rachel approaches Nicole for advice; Paula and Olivia lose track of their stash; a revived Mark attempts to connect with Quinn.

episodes.name: Mysterious Monkeys
episodes.description: Mark processes revelations about his dad. Armond has a surprise in store for Shane. Tanya leans on Belinda. Paula has a secret.

episodes.name: Recentering
episodes.description: After Shane shoots down her latest career plans, Rachel is blindsided by an unexpected arrival; Tanya's attention turns to an intriguing hotel guest; Armond's renewed commitment to sobriety is put to the test.

episodes.name: The Lotus-Eaters
episodes.description: As Armond attempts to do damage control, Belinda tries to redirect Tanya's focus to her business proposal; a sidelined Rachel begins to question her future; Nicole rebuffs Mark for airing their dirty laundry to Quinn.

episodes.name: Departures
episodes.description: Rachel reveals stark truths. The Mossbachers turn the page on a traumatic event. Belinda gets bad news, and Armond exacts revenge.

episodes.name: Ciao
episodes.description: Two couples navigate awkwardness, an Italian American family deals with a conspicuous absence, and Tanya arrives with her new assistant.

episodes.name: Italian Dream
episodes.description: Tanya enlists Greg to help her live out her perfect Sicilian day. Harper questions Cameron and Daphne's claims about their marriage. Portia joins the Di Grassos on their day out.

episodes.name: Bull Elephants
episodes.description: While Daphne loops Harper into an off-resort excursion, Ethan and Cameron get in some bro time. Tanya seeks advice from a tarot reader. Albie and Portia explore their connection.

episodes.name: In the Sandbox
episodes.description: Tanya and Portia spend a day with charming expats Quentin and Jack. Harper is blindsided by shocking evidence from Ethan's night out. Mia makes a decision for her singing career. Valentina finds a new love interest.

episodes.name: That's Amore
episodes.description: Tanya and Portia embark on a whirlwind excursion with Quentin and Jack. Unsure what to believe, Harper gets real with Cam and Daphne. - HBO Max

episodes.name: Abductions
episodes.description: Tanya gives Portia an opaque warning about Jack. Lucia helps the Di Grassos search for long-lost relatives which doesn't end well. Ethan grows suspicious of Cam. Jack and Portia have a night out while Tanya and Quentin have a wild party. Valentina explores her sexuality.

episodes.name: Arrivederci
episodes.description: Albie decides to help Lucia. Tanya discovers Quentin's true motives. Portia gets wary of Jack. Ethan and Cam have a face-off. Valentina gives Mia a chance.

name: Silo
description: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

episodes.name: Freedom Day
episodes.description: Sheriff Becker's plans for the future are thrown off course after his wife meets a hacker with information about the silo.

episodes.name: Holston's Pick
episodes.description: Juliette, an engineer, pieces together what might have led to a co-worker's mysterious death.

episodes.name: Machines
episodes.description: In her hunt for a new sheriff, Mayor Jahns clashes with Bernard. Juliette strikes a deal to keep the generator running.

episodes.name: Truth
episodes.description: Juliette tries gaining the trust of Deputy Marnes as they work to uncover the truth about recent tragedies.

episodes.name: The Janitor's Boy
episodes.description: Sims appoints Billings as chief deputy to keep tabs on Juliette, whose efforts to solve two murders lead to a showdown.

episodes.name: The Relic
episodes.description: During her investigation, Juliette uncovers disturbing secrets about someone she thought she knew.

episodes.name: The Flamekeepers
episodes.description: Bernard seeks Juliette's cooperation as he grows increasingly concerned about the silo's security. Juliette asks her father for a favor.

episodes.name: Hanna
episodes.description: New information causes Juliette to see her family's past differently--and she finally gains access to the silo's biggest secrets.

episodes.name: The Getaway
episodes.description: Wracked with guilt, Billings sets off on a personal mission, only to discover a mind-blowing clue from Juliette.

episodes.name: Outside
episodes.description: Juliette's fate seems sealed when certain truths finally come to light.

episodes.name: The Engineer
episodes.description: Juliette seeks refuge in an abandoned silo after a catastrophic war, believing herself to be the sole survivor, until unsettling discoveries challenge her solitude.

episodes.name: Order
episodes.description: In the underground silo 18, chaos erupts after Juliette defies long-standing rules, leaving the residents grappling with the unthinkable.

episodes.name: Solo
episodes.description: Bernard turns to Judge Meadows for help. Billings begins to wonder if he's being lied to. Juliette finally meets the man in the vault.

episodes.name: The Harmonium
episodes.description: Juliette sets out on a dangerous quest to retrieve a suit so she can return home and save her silo. Mechanical plans a meeting with Judge Meadows.

episodes.name: Descent
episodes.description: Sims finds himself with a new position. Juliette learns Solo isn't being honest. Bernard and Lukas make an important discovery.

episodes.name: Barricades
episodes.description: Bernard enacts a plan to root out Knox, Shirley, and Walker. Billings takes a stand. Solo saves Juliette's life and wants something in return.

episodes.name: The Dive
episodes.description: Lukas is assigned a mission. Mechanical sends a powerful message. Juliette embarks on a perilous descent-and confronts a new danger.

episodes.name: The Book of Quinn
episodes.description: Juliette discovers something's happened to Solo. Bernard makes an offer to Walker. Lukas meets with Salvador Quinn's descendants.

episodes.name: The Safeguard
episodes.description: Billings' faith is shaken. Lukas heads to the down deep. Knox identifies the traitor. Juliette uncovers the truth about Solo's past.

episodes.name: Into the Fire
episodes.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a community lives deep underground in a giant silo, following strict rules they believe will protect them.

name: Landman
description: A modern-day tale of fortune seeking in the world of West Texas oil rigs.

episodes.name: Landman
episodes.description: In the heart of Texas, roughnecks and billionaires try to get rich quick in the oil industry; Tommy Norris, a struggling executive, tries to take his company to the top during the fuel boom.

episodes.name: Dreamers and Losers
episodes.description: Tommy deals with the aftermath of a tragedy at the oil patch; dynamics are disrupted when Ainsley moves into the oil house.

episodes.name: Hell Has a Front Yard
episodes.description: Cooper makes an impression at the oil patch; things get complicated for Tommy when his ex-wife, Angela, comes to town.

episodes.name: The Sting of Second Chances
episodes.description: After a rocky first impression, Rebecca comes to Tommy's defense; Cooper gets an unexpected call.

episodes.name: Where Is Home
episodes.description: Tommy and his crew receive an unwelcome visit at the patch; Angela hosts family dinner at the oil house.

episodes.name: Beware the Second Beating
episodes.description: Angela gets caught off-guard when visiting Victor; the Norris family rallies around Cooper during his time of need.

episodes.name: All Roads Lead to a Hole
episodes.description: Tommy's cartel problem continues to escalate; Angela and Ainsley get to know their community.

episodes.name: Clumsy, This Life
episodes.description: Tommy gets connected to the National Guard; Rebecca becomes increasingly suspicious of Cooper.

episodes.name: WolfCamp
episodes.description: After a health scare, Monty puts Tommy in a tough position. Cooper comes up with a plan.

episodes.name: The Crumbs of Hope
episodes.description: Tommy and Cami discuss whether to gamble or play it safe. The cartel makes a move.

name: High Potential
description: Thanks to her exceptional mind, single-mom-of-three Morgan is able to help solve a crime as she rearranges evidence during her shift as a cleaner for the police department.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.description: A single mom with an exceptional mind is recruited to the LAPD Major Crimes unit.

episodes.name: Dancers in the Dark
episodes.description: As Morgan and the detectives adjust to her new role as a consultant, they investigate the attempted murder of a tap dancer and discover things are not quite as they seem; Ava learns more about her father.

episodes.name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrel
episodes.description: Morgan's intellect and cleaning experience prove useful when the detectives are called to a hotel room murder scene; Morgan navigates Ava's dating; Soto reveals details about Roman's disappearance.

episodes.name: Survival Mode
episodes.description: Morgan is excited to get her official LAPD badge, despite Karadec's reluctance; the detectives work tirelessly on an emotional missing children case, which hits close to home for Morgan and sends her mind into overdrive.

episodes.name: Croaked
episodes.description: The team investigates the death of an exotic animal veterinarian; work interferes with Karadec's dating life; Morgan follows a parental hunch about her teenage daughter.

episodes.name: Hangover
episodes.description: A wild office party at a high-profile medical technology startup leads to the shocking murder of the founder and CEO; a new co-worker at the precinct catches Morgan's eye.

episodes.name: One of Us
episodes.description: Morgan agrees to show Ava around the LAPD, but things quickly take a dangerous turn when the precinct is held hostage by the friends of a recently convicted man.

episodes.name: Obsessed
episodes.description: The team investigates a mysterious young girl who was found attacked on a beach; Morgan begins to let her guard down on her date with Tom; Soto comes one step closer to finding out what happened to Roman.

episodes.name: The RAMs
episodes.description: A famous baseball newscaster is murdered, and the team is on the case. Meanwhile, Soto and Morgan meet with a potential lead to discuss Roman's disappearance, and Tom has some personal news to share with Morgan.

episodes.name: Chutes and Murders
episodes.description: A nanny is found bludgeoned to death in the park; Morgan interferes when Elliot admits to not being invited to his classmate's party.

episodes.name: The Sauna at the End of the Stairs
episodes.description: Soto reopens an old murder case in the famous Donovan family, determined to uncover the true killer in classic "whodunit" style.

episodes.name: Partners
episodes.description: The FBI joins the investigation into the murder of a controversial tech magnate, forcing Karadec to reunite with his former partner. Meanwhile, Ludo becomes overwhelmed with his increasing childcare duties.

episodes.name: Let's Play
episodes.description: An anonymous tip to the LAPD sparks an unusual multiple-victim kidnapping investigation, forcing the team to rely on board games and puzzles to track down their suspect.

name: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

episodes.name: Winter Is Coming
episodes.description: Lord Eddard Stark is concerned by news of a deserter from the Night's Watch; King Robert I Baratheon and the Lannisters arrive at Winterfell; the exiled Prince Viserys Targaryen forges a powerful new alliance.

episodes.name: The Kingsroad
episodes.description: While Bran recovers from his fall, Ned takes only his daughters to King's Landing. Jon Snow goes with his uncle Benjen to the Wall. Tyrion joins them.

episodes.name: Lord Snow
episodes.description: Jon begins his training with the Night's Watch; Ned confronts his past and future at King's Landing; Daenerys finds herself at odds with Viserys.

episodes.name: Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things
episodes.description: Eddard investigates Jon Arryn's murder. Jon befriends Samwell Tarly, a coward who has come to join the Night's Watch.

episodes.name: The Wolf and the Lion
episodes.description: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at the Vale, to be tried for his supposed crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

episodes.name: A Golden Crown
episodes.description: While recovering from his battle with Jaime, Eddard is forced to run the kingdom while Robert goes hunting. Tyrion demands a trial by combat for his freedom. Viserys is losing his patience with Drogo.

episodes.name: You Win or You Die
episodes.description: Robert has been injured while hunting and is dying. Jon and the others finally take their vows to the Night's Watch. A man, sent by Robert, is captured for trying to poison Daenerys. Furious, Drogo vows to attack the Seven Kingdoms.

episodes.name: The Pointy End
episodes.description: The Lannisters press their advantage over the Starks; Robb rallies his father's northern allies and heads south to war; The White Walkers attack the Wall; Tyrion returns to his father with some new friends.

episodes.name: Baelor
episodes.description: Robb goes to war against the Lannisters. Jon finds himself struggling on deciding if his place is with Robb or the Night's Watch. Drogo has fallen ill from a fresh battle wound. Daenerys is desperate to save him.

episodes.name: Fire and Blood
episodes.description: Robb vows to get revenge on the Lannisters. Jon must officially decide if his place is with Robb or the Night's Watch. Daenerys says her final goodbye to Drogo.

episodes.name: The North Remembers
episodes.description: Tyrion arrives at King's Landing to take his father's place as Hand of the King. Stannis Baratheon plans to take the Iron Throne for his own. Robb tries to decide his next move in the war. The Night's Watch arrive at the house of Craster.

episodes.name: The Night Lands
episodes.description: Arya makes friends with Gendry. Tyrion tries to take control of the Small Council. Theon arrives at his home, Pyke, in order to persuade his father into helping Robb with the war. Jon tries to investigate Craster's secret.

episodes.name: What Is Dead May Never Die
episodes.description: Tyrion tries to see who he can trust in the Small Council. Catelyn visits Renly to try and persuade him to join Robb in the war. Theon must decide if his loyalties lie with his own family or with Robb.

episodes.name: Garden of Bones
episodes.description: Lord Baelish arrives at Renly's camp just before he faces off against Stannis. Daenerys and her company are welcomed into the city of Qarth. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie find themselves imprisoned at Harrenhal.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Harrenhal
episodes.description: Tyrion investigates a secret weapon that King Joffrey plans to use against Stannis. Meanwhile, as a token for saving his life, Jaqen H'ghar offers to kill three people that Arya chooses.

episodes.name: The Old Gods and the New
episodes.description: Theon seizes control of Winterfell. Jon captures a wildling named Ygritte. The people of King's Landing begin to turn against King Joffrey. Daenerys looks to buy ships to sail for the Seven Kingdoms.

episodes.name: A Man Without Honor
episodes.description: Bran and Rickon have escaped Winterfell. Theon tries to hunt them down. Daenerys' dragons have been stolen. Jon travels through the wilderness with Ygritte as his prisoner. Sansa has bled and is now ready to have Joffrey's children.

episodes.name: The Prince of Winterfell
episodes.description: Stannis is just days from King's Landing. Tyrion prepares for his arrival. Jon and Qhorin are taken prisoner by the wildlings. Catelyn is arrested for releasing Jaime. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie plan to escape from Harrenhal.

episodes.name: Blackwater
episodes.description: Stannis Baratheon's fleet and army arrive at King's Landing and the battle for the city begins. Cersei plans for her and her children's future.

episodes.name: Valar Morghulis
episodes.description: Joffrey puts Sansa aside for Margaery Tyrell. Robb marries Talisa Maegyr. Jon prepares to meet Mance Rayder. Arya says farewell to Jaqen H'ghar. Daenerys tries to rescue her dragons.

episodes.name: Valar Dohaeris
episodes.description: Jon is brought before Mance Rayder, the King Beyond the Wall, while the Night's Watch survivors retreat south. In King's Landing, Tyrion asks for his reward. Littlefinger offers Sansa a way out.

episodes.name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
episodes.description: Bran and company meet Jojen and Meera Reed. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie meet the Brotherhood. Jaime travels through the wilderness with Brienne. Sansa confesses her true feelings about Joffery to Margaery.

episodes.name: Walk of Punishment
episodes.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brienne and Jaime are taken prisoner.

episodes.name: And Now His Watch Is Ended
episodes.description: Jaime mopes over his lost hand. Cersei is growing uncomfortable with the Tyrells. The Night's Watch is growing impatient with Craster. Daenerys buys the Unsullied.

episodes.name: Kissed by Fire
episodes.description: Robb's army is falling apart. Jaime reveals a story to Brienne that he has never told anyone. Jon breaks his vows. The Hound is granted his freedom. The Lannisters hatch a new plan.

episodes.name: The Climb
episodes.description: Jon and the wildlings scale the Wall. The Brotherhood sells Gendry to Melisandre. Robb does what he can to win back the Freys. Tyrion tells Sansa about their engagement.

episodes.name: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
episodes.description: Jon and the wildlings travel south of the Wall. Talisa tells Robb that she's pregnant. Arya runs away from the Brotherhood. Daenerys arrives at Yunkai. Jaime leaves Brienne behind at Harrenhal.

episodes.name: Second Sons
episodes.description: Daenerys tries to persuade the Second Sons to join her against Yunkai. Stannis releases Davos from the dungeons. Sam and Gilly are attacked by a White Walker. Sansa and Tyrion wed.

episodes.name: The Rains of Castamere
episodes.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at the Twins for the wedding. Jon is put to the test to see where his loyalties truly lie. Bran's group decides to split up. Daenerys plans an invasion of Yunkai.

episodes.name: Mhysa
episodes.description: Bran and company travel beyond the Wall. Sam returns to Castle Black. Jon says goodbye to Ygritte. Jaime returns to King's Landing. The Night's Watch asks for help from Stannis.

episodes.name: Two Swords
episodes.description: Tyrion welcomes a guest to King's Landing. At Castle Black, Jon stands trial. Daenerys is pointed to Meereen, the mother of all slave cities. Arya runs into an old enemy.

episodes.name: The Lion and the Rose
episodes.description: Joffrey and Margaery's wedding has come. Tyrion breaks up with Shae. Ramsay tries to prove his worth to his father. Bran and company find a Weirwood tree.

episodes.name: Breaker of Chains
episodes.description: Tyrion is arrested for murder and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town as the Night's Watch finds itself in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

episodes.name: Oathkeeper
episodes.description: Jaime entrusts a task to Brienne. Daenerys frees Meereen. Jon is given permission to lead a group of Night's Watchmen to Craster's Keep. Bran and company are taken hostage.

episodes.name: First of His Name
episodes.description: Tommen is crowned King of the Seven Kingdoms. Cersei builds her case against Tyrion. Sansa and Lord Baelish arrive at the Eyrie. The Night's Watch attacks Craster's Keep.

episodes.name: The Laws of Gods and Men
episodes.description: Tyrion's trial has come. Yara and her troops storm the Dreadfort to free Theon. Daenerys meets Hizdar zo Loraq. Stannis makes a deal with the Iron Bank of Braavos.

episodes.name: Mockingbird
episodes.description: Tyrion tries to find a champion. Daenerys sleeps with Daario. The Hound becomes wounded. Jon's advice is ignored at Castle Black. Brienne and Podrick receive a tip on Arya's whereabouts.

episodes.name: The Mountain and the Viper
episodes.description: Theon helps Ramsay seize Moat Cailin. The wildlings attack Mole's Town. Sansa comes up with a story to protect Lord Baelish. Daenerys finds out a secret about Jorah Mormont. Oberyn Martell faces Gregor Clegane, the Mountain.

episodes.name: The Watchers on the Wall
episodes.description: The battle between the Night's Watch and the wildlings has come.

episodes.name: The Children
episodes.description: Jon makes an important decision. Daenerys experiences new consequences. Brienne and Podrick have an unexpected encounter. Bran achieves a goal, while Tyrion makes an important discovery.

episodes.name: The Wars to Come
episodes.description: Cersei and Jaime adjust to a world without Tywin. Tyrion and Varys arrive at Pentos. In Meereen, a new enemy emerges. Jon is caught between two kings.

episodes.name: The House of Black and White
episodes.description: Arya arrives in Braavos. Jaime takes on a secret mission. Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyn's death. Stannis makes Jon a generous offer as the Night's Watch elects a new Lord Commander. Daenerys is faced with a difficult decision.

episodes.name: High Sparrow
episodes.description: Tommen and Margaery wed. Arya has trouble adapting to her new life. Littlefinger reveals his plans to Sansa. Jon gives his first orders as Lord Commander. Tyrion and Varys arrive in Volantis.

episodes.name: Sons of the Harpy
episodes.description: Jorah Mormont sets sail alongside his prisoner, Tyrion. Cersei makes a move against the Tyrells. Jaime and Bronn sneak into Dorne. Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their plans. Melisandre tempts Jon. The Harpies attack.

episodes.name: Kill the Boy
episodes.description: Daenerys arrests the heads of Meereen's great families. Jon makes a difficult decision. Theon is forced to face Sansa. Stannis rides south. Tyrion and Jorah enter the ruins of Old Valyria.

episodes.name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
episodes.description: Arya is put to the test. Tyrion and Jorah are captured by slavers. Loras Tyrell is judged by the Sparrows. Jaime and Bronn face the Sand Snakes. Sansa marries Ramsay Bolton.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.description: Jon heads east as trouble begins to stir for Sam and Gilly at Castle Black. Sansa asks Theon for help. Tyrion and Jorah are sold as slaves. Cersei savors her triumph over the Tyrells as new plots are developed in the shadows.

episodes.name: Hardhome
episodes.description: Tyrion advises Daenerys. Sansa forces Theon to tell her a secret. Cersei remains stubborn. Arya meets her first target. Jon and Tormund meet with the wildling elders.

episodes.name: The Dance of Dragons
episodes.description: Jon and the wildlings return to Castle Black. Jaime meets with Doran Martell. Stannis makes a hard choice. Arya runs into Meryn Trant. Daenerys attends the grand reopening of the fighting pits.

episodes.name: Mother's Mercy
episodes.description: Stannis arrives at Winterfell. Tyrion runs Meereen as Daario and Jorah go after Daenerys. Jaime and Myrcella leave Dorne. Jon sends Sam and Gilly to Oldtown. Arya challenges the Many-Faced God. Cersei confesses her sins.

episodes.name: The Red Woman
episodes.description: The fate of Jon Snow is revealed. Daenerys is brought before Khal Moro. Tyrion gets used to living in Meereen. Ramsay sends his dogs after Theon and Sansa. Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their move. Cersei mourns for Myrcella.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.description: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven. Tommen meets with Cersei. Tyrion makes a bold move. Theon leaves while at Pyke new issues arise. Ramsay's brother is born. Davos asks Melisandre for a miracle.

episodes.name: Oathbreaker
episodes.description: Daenerys arrives at Vaes Dothrak. Sam and Gilly sail for Horn Hill. Arya trains as No One. Varys finds information on the Sons of the Harpy. Ramsay receives a gift. Tommen meets with the High Sparrow. At Castle Black, a miracle occurs.

episodes.name: Book of the Stranger
episodes.description: Sansa arrives at Castle Black. Tyrion makes a deal with the slave masters. Jorah and Daario sneak into Vaes Dothrak. Ramsay sends a letter to Jon. Theon arrives at Pyke. Cersei and Olenna Tyrell plot against the High Sparrow.

episodes.name: The Door
episodes.description: Sansa and Jon make plans. Arya is given another chance to prove herself. Jorah confesses a secret to Daenerys. Tyrion meets with a red priestess. Yara finds her rule tested. Bran discovers the origin of the White Walkers.

episodes.name: Blood of My Blood
episodes.description: Bran and Meera find a new ally. Gilly meets Sam's family. Arya makes a difficult choice. The Lannisters and Tyrells march against the High Sparrow.

episodes.name: The Broken Man
episodes.description: Jon and Sansa gather troops. Jaime arrives at Riverrun. Olenna Tyrell plans to leave King's Landing. Theon and Yara plan a destination. Arya makes plans to leave.

episodes.name: No One
episodes.description: Brienne arrives at Riverrun. Arya seeks shelter. Jaime meets with Edmure Tully. Cersei challenges the Faith. Sandor Clegane hunts for revenge. Tyrion faces the consequences of earlier decisions.

episodes.name: Battle of the Bastards
episodes.description: Jon and Sansa face Ramsay Bolton on the fields of Winterfell. Daenerys strikes back at her enemies. Theon and Yara arrive in Meereen.

episodes.name: The Winds of Winter
episodes.description: Cersei and Loras Tyrell stand trial by the gods. Daenerys prepares to set sail for Westeros. Davos confronts Melisandre. Sam and Gilly arrive in the Citadel. Bran discovers a long-kept secret. Lord Frey has an uninvited guest.

episodes.name: Dragonstone
episodes.description: Jon organizes the North's defenses. Cersei tries to even the odds. Daenerys comes home. Arya reminds the Freys "the North remembers." Sam adapts to life in Oldtown. The Night King makes his way south.

episodes.name: Stormborn
episodes.description: Daenerys receives an unexpected visitor. Jon faces resistance. Tyrion plans the conquest of Westeros. Cersei gathers her allies. Arya has a reunion with old friends. Sam risks his career and life.

episodes.name: The Queen's Justice
episodes.description: Jon and Daenerys finally meet. Cersei gains a new ally. Sansa receives an unexpected visitor. Sam is confronted for his actions.

episodes.name: The Spoils of War
episodes.description: Daenerys takes matters into her own hands. Arya reaches her destination. Jaime and Bronn collect the spoils from the war with the Tyrells.

episodes.name: Eastwatch
episodes.description: Daenerys demands loyalty from the surviving Lannister soldiers; Jon heeds Bran's warning about White Walkers on the move; Cersei vows to vanquish anyone or anything that stands in her way.

episodes.name: Beyond the Wall
episodes.description: Jon and his team go beyond the wall to capture a wight. Daenerys has to make a tough decision.

episodes.name: The Dragon and the Wolf
episodes.description: Everyone meets in King's Landing to discuss the fate of the realm. In Winterfell, Sansa confronts Arya. Sam reaches Winterfell, where he learns from Bran a shocking secret about Jon Snow.

episodes.name: Winterfell
episodes.description: Jon and Daenerys arrive in Winterfell and are met with skepticism. Sam learns about the fate of his family. Cersei gives Euron the reward he aims for. Theon follows his heart.

episodes.name: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
episodes.description: Jaime faces judgment and Winterfell prepares for the battle to come.

episodes.name: The Long Night
episodes.description: The Night King and his army have arrived at Winterfell and the great battle begins.

episodes.name: The Last of the Starks
episodes.description: The Battle of Winterfell is over and a new chapter for Westeros begins.

episodes.name: The Bells
episodes.description: Forces have arrived at King's Landing for the final battle.

episodes.name: The Iron Throne
episodes.description: In the aftermath of the devastating attack on King's Landing, Daenerys must face the survivors.

name: Yellowstone
description: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

episodes.name: Daybreak
episodes.description: John Dutton tries to protect his ranch from land developers, an Indian reservation and America's first national park.

episodes.name: Kill the Messenger
episodes.description: As the dust settles from the shootout, the Duttons deal with the potential repercussions.

episodes.name: No Good Horses
episodes.description: The Duttons deal with a painful family anniversary. Kayce saves a young girl from danger. Jamie and Beth plan their respective political careers. Rainwater makes an ominous threat to the Dutton legacy.

episodes.name: The Long Black Train
episodes.description: A secret about John comes to the surface; Beth shows Jenkins a rough night out; Quality time with Tate leads to a close call.

episodes.name: Coming Home
episodes.description: As Kayce feels the heat from tribal police, Jamie works his legal magic; Rip recruits a new cowboy; John makes a play to keep Kayce and Monica close to home.

episodes.name: The Remembering
episodes.description: A new partnership threatens John and the Yellowstone; Jamie ramps up his political campaign.

episodes.name: A Monster Is Among Us
episodes.description: Rip stumbles upon a dangerous and dire situation; A plan is set in motion designed to squeeze John and threaten his way of life; Monica begins a tough recovery.

episodes.name: The Unravelling: Part 1
episodes.description: Rip faces a sheriff's investigation after his accident with the tourists, Jamie's political future comes into question, and Beth goes after Dan's finances.

episodes.name: The Unravelling: Part 2
episodes.description: John discovers his true alliances, Rip searches for answers, Jamie's political career is threatened, Beth takes on a new role, and Kayce returns home.

episodes.name: A Thundering
episodes.description: Kayce settles into his new role at the ranch; A damaging article threatens to expose John; Rainwater pitches his new plan to the tribal council.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.description: Kayce and Rip come to blows; Beth starts buying up land to protect the ranch; Monica begins a new chapter at the university.

episodes.name: The Reek of Desperation
episodes.description: New powerful enemies look to block Rainwater and Jenkins' plans for a big business deal; John and Beth groom a new political candidate.

episodes.name: Only Devils Left
episodes.description: John's enemies strike a direct hit on the Yellowstone. John forms an unlikely alliance. Kayce has his first day as a livestock officer.

episodes.name: Touching Your Enemy
episodes.description: Jamie tries desperately to confront a previous mistake; Kayce tracks down evidence; Jimmy tries to make some extra cash on the side.

episodes.name: Blood the Boy
episodes.description: Jamie makes a drastic move in order to protect his family; Jimmy takes a shot at a rodeo competition.

episodes.name: Resurrection Day
episodes.description: Tensions escalate as the Beck brothers become frustrated by the Duttons' unwillingness to play ball; Jamie looks for a fresh start at the ranch.

episodes.name: Behind Us Only Grey
episodes.description: John and Rip seek revenge; Monica ponders the consequences of her living situation on the ranch; Jimmy clears old debts.

episodes.name: Enemies by Monday
episodes.description: The Duttons gear up for a final fight with the Becks; Beth helps Monica out of an uncomfortable situation.

episodes.name: Sins of the Father
episodes.description: The feud with the Becks comes to a head as the Duttons scramble to save one of their own.

episodes.name: You're the Indian Now
episodes.description: In the wake of the Beck Brothers, John reshuffles the political decks; Beth finds a trespasser on the ranch and learns that he may have big ambitions for the surrounding land; John helps Tate deal with his nightmares.

episodes.name: Freight Trains and Monsters
episodes.description: Jamie starts a new job; Beth comes to a realization about Market Equities and visits Roarke; Rip searches for another ranch hand: A livestock agent goes too far.

episodes.name: An Acceptable Surrender
episodes.description: Jamie plays cover-up and damage control with Hendon; Governor Perry hears a $6 billion pitch for a development right on the Yellowstone, and later makes some political maneuvers; Jimmy competes in a rodeo competition.

episodes.name: Going Back to Cali
episodes.description: Beth shares a personal secret with Rip; John and the boys deal with some hostile trespassers from out of state; Rainwater reaches out to a powerful woman to help secure the future of Broken Rock.

episodes.name: Cowboys and Dreamers
episodes.description: The reason for Beth and Jamie's toxic relationship is revealed. Kayce bends the rules to help a family in need. Rip and the boys get into a confrontation with two men from John's past.

episodes.name: All for Nothing
episodes.description: Beth reveals a secret to her father; John confronts two cowboys about old feuds; a search gets underway on the reservation.

episodes.name: The Beating
episodes.description: Kayce searches for answers following a theft on the ranch, Jamie learns a shocking family secret, John issues a warning, and Beth takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: I Killed a Man Today
episodes.description: Beth continues her battle with Willa Hayes, and brings John a lucrative offer. Monica has a harrowing ordeal.

episodes.name: Meaner Than Evil
episodes.description: Jamie confronts his past. Rip approaches Kayce about an old problem. The bunkhouse looks to defend two of their own.

episodes.name: The World Is Purple
episodes.description: John sits down at the negotiating table with former friends and foes. As the battle for the future of the Yellowstone heats up, nothing will ever be the same.

episodes.name: Half the Money
episodes.description: The coordinated attack on the Duttons continues as everyone searches for answers on who is responsible; Rip delivers on a promise.

episodes.name: Phantom Pain
episodes.description: John and Kayce discuss the attack. Jamie finds his new home. Beth and Rip have unexpected company.

episodes.name: All I See Is You
episodes.description: John seeks revenge with help from some unexpected allies. Kayce solves a problem with an unconventional method. Beth gives Carter his options. Jimmy prepares for a change.

episodes.name: Winning or Learning
episodes.description: Jamie receives some surprising news; Beth receives an offer; Jimmy settles in on the road; tensions boil over in the bunkhouse.

episodes.name: Under a Blanket of Red
episodes.description: John and Kayce are forced to deal with some newcomers in town; Lloyd is in the doghouse with Rip, and finds purpose in teaching Carter; Jamie seeks information about his father.

episodes.name: I Want to Be Him
episodes.description: Beth confronts her father's houseguest; Kayce and his family search for a new home; Jamie seeks answers from Garrett; Lloyd loses his cool.

episodes.name: Keep the Wolves Close
episodes.description: John is put in an awkward position by Gov. Perry; Carter works to earn back Beth's trust; Jamie is in for a big surprise.

episodes.name: No Kindness for the Coward
episodes.description: Tensions escalate with the protestors, but Beth has a plan; Jimmy and Emily get closer; Monica and Kayce share a special moment.

episodes.name: No Such Thing as Fair
episodes.description: John and Beth squabble; Jimmy has an important decision to make; Kayce begins a new quest; Jamie realizes Garrett's past might affect his own future.

episodes.name: Grass on the Streets and Weeds on the Rooftops
episodes.description: To the Duttons, family is everything; however, newfound truths threaten that bond. Jimmy comes home and has important decisions to make. Beth takes family matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: One Hundred Years Is Nothing
episodes.description: John Dutton is sworn in as Governor of Montana; as he settles into the powers of his new office, he makes bold moves to protect Yellowstone from his opponents

episodes.name: The Sting of Wisdom
episodes.description: As John makes a passionate speech to the state of Montana, a new formidable opponent from Market Equities arrives in Montana on a private jet. The cowboys on the Yellowstone deal with a new problem.

episodes.name: Tall Drink of Water
episodes.description: Beth heads to Salt Lake City to take care of unfinished business; a trap is set for Jamie; Kayce makes an important decision for his family.

episodes.name: Horses in Heaven
episodes.description: John makes swift changes at the Capitol; later, he receives some advice from Senator Perry; the venom between Jamie and Beth reaches a boiling point.

episodes.name: Watch 'Em Ride Away
episodes.description: John tells Clara to cancel his Capitol meetings to brand cattle with the Yellowstone cowboys; Beth's disdain for a perceived rival reaches a boiling point.

episodes.name: Cigarettes, Whiskey, a Meadow and You
episodes.description: The Duttons and the Yellowstone enjoy an almost perfect day branding cattle; Montana gets an unexpected visitor from outside; Sarah continues to sink her teeth into Jamie; Rainwater deals with a challenger from within.

episodes.name: The Dream Is Not Me
episodes.description: John deals with a problem with his herd; Senator Perry delivers news to Rainwater; Jamie and Sarah plan their next move; the entire ranch enjoys a rare evening of fun together; Beth discusses a new business plan with the ranch in mind.

episodes.name: A Knife and No Coin
episodes.description: Jamie goes through with his plan; John has a request for Monica and lends support to an unexpected friend; the Yellowstone cowboys embark on a big change; a flashback reveals a source of Rip's loyalty.

episodes.name: Desire Is All You Need
episodes.description: After an event rattles the state of Montana, nothing will ever be the same.

episodes.name: The Apocalypse of Change
episodes.description: Beth comes to a realization; Kayce reaches out to an old friend in search of information; Jamie meets with Market Equities.

episodes.name: Three Fifty-Three
episodes.description: Beth discusses the fate of the ranch with an unlikely ally; Kayce takes the investigation into his own hands; Jamie looks to advance his political agenda.

episodes.name: Counting Coup
episodes.description: Kayce makes a bold move. Rip asks for help from a friend in Texas, while the bunkhouse contemplates their future. Jamie attempts to cover his tracks.

episodes.name: Give the World Away
episodes.description: Jamie begins to spiral and later seeks advice. Beth and Travis make a deal. Kayce has an idea about the future of the ranch.

episodes.name: Life Is a Promise
episodes.description: As the Duttons and the Yellowstone cowboys lay John to rest, the fate of the ranch is revealed.

name: The Pitt
description: The daily lives of healthcare professionals in a Pittsburgh hospital as they juggle personal crises, workplace politics, and the emotional toll of treating critically ill patients, revealing the resilience required in their noble calling.

episodes.name: 7:00 A.M.
episodes.description: While attempting to distract himself from the anniversary of his mentor's death, Dr. Robby introduces a fresh batch of interns to life in the ER.

episodes.name: 8:00 A.M.
episodes.description: Robby helps siblings navigate their elderly father's end of life care. Later, Samira fends off cops targeting a woman with a misunderstood condition.

episodes.name: 9:00 A.M.
episodes.description: Samira does her best to keep Whitaker on the right track. A teen overdose sparks conflict in the ER.

episodes.name: 10:00 A.M.
episodes.description: Bets are taken on the whereabouts of a stolen ambulance, while Santos takes a hard lesson, and Whitaker helps to tame "The Kraken".

episodes.name: 11:00 A.M.
episodes.description: Santos and Collins deal with their own moral and legal quandaries. Samira earns praise from patients and reproach from Robby. Javadi upends McKay's attempts to help an unhoused patient.

episodes.name: 12:00 P.M.
episodes.description: While Robby handles an ultimatum from the hospital, Mel, Javadi, and Collins each handle unique mother-daughter dynamics.

name: The Recruit
description: Owen Hendricks, a CIA lawyer becomes involved in massive international conflicts with dangerous parties after an asset tries to expose her relationship to the agency.

episodes.name: I.N.A.S.I.A.L.
episodes.description: Thrown into the deep end during his first week at the CIA, rookie lawyer Owen Hendricks quickly gets in over his head when uncovers a possible threat.

episodes.name: N.L.T.S.Y.P.
episodes.description: While scrambling to learn how to navigate the high-stakes world of international espionage, Owen attempts to track down classified information on Max.

episodes.name: Y.D.E.K.W.Y.D.
episodes.description: Owen's crash course in CIA protocols continues as he negotiates with Max, goes on a date with a co-worker and contends with a hostile agency employee.

episodes.name: I.Y.D.I.A.A.C.
episodes.description: When a major snag jeopardizes Max's, case, Owen races to find a legal loophole-- and urges her not to take matters into her own ruthless hands.

episodes.name: T.S.L.A.Y.P.
episodes.description: Owen's plan to move on from Max suffers a setback when he's ordered back to Phoenix, where credit cards and prying eyes causes problems at work and home.

episodes.name: I.C.I.N.C.
episodes.description: On the heels of his risky negotiations on Max's behalf, Owen face's uncomfortable questions from his colleagues -- and friends -- about their connection.

episodes.name: I.M.F.T.B.S.
episodes.description: A mission to Geneva to retrieve assets spirals into chaos for Owen and Max. Hannah's mom pressures her for information.

episodes.name: W.T.F.I.O.H.
episodes.description: The mission with Max takes a dangerous turn as complications arise, bullets fly -- and Owen's personal and professional lives collide.

episodes.name: Y.N.A.H.Y.A.L.
episodes.description: After the chaos in Prague, Owen gets benched. But it's not long before he stumbles on a new case - and into a new den of spies in South Korea.

episodes.name: Y.A.R.A.C.O.T.D.O.P.
episodes.description: Owen becomes a human target while digging deeper into the graymail case. Nichka has major intel on a kidnapping - but it won't come for free.

episodes.name: H.H.I.I.T.K.A.L.
episodes.description: An impromptu trip to the Middle East leads to danger. Jang Kyun takes extreme measures to get the answers he seeks.

episodes.name: A.T.N.W.H.Y.P.A.B.H.
episodes.description: With no one else to trust, Owen and Jang Kyun reluctantly team up. Hannah's new romance proves risky. Oliver arranges a meeting with the yakuza.

episodes.name: W.S.T.W.T.P.
episodes.description: Owen and his cohorts race to evade capture when the NIS orders their arrest. To save her own skin, Dawn agrees to lead a perilous mission.

episodes.name: I.D.N.W.T.B.D.I.
episodes.description: Forced to pivot when an operation goes sideways, Owen must rely on new allies, old friends and his own resourcefulness to even the odds.

name: Dexter: Original Sin
description: Miami, 1991. When his bloodthirsty urges can't be ignored any longer, young Dexter Morgan must learn to channel his inner darkness as he transitions from student to avenging serial killer with the guidance of his father, Harry.

episodes.name: And in the Beginning...
episodes.description: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny.

episodes.name: Kid in a Candy Store
episodes.description: Dexter adjusts to his new job as a forensics intern at Miami Metro; Deb lashes out at her dad by engaging in petty criminal behavior.

episodes.name: Miami Vice
episodes.description: Dexter targets a loan shark connected to Batista. Meanwhile, Deb hosts a party hoping to gain favor with her volleyball teammates.

episodes.name: Fender Bender
episodes.description: Dexter targets a retired mob hitman (who may still be killing), as Harry works the gruesome murder case of a ten-year-old boy; Deb sneaks into a nightclub with Sofia and meets an exciting new friend.

episodes.name: F Is for Fuck-Up
episodes.description: After a kill goes wrong, Dexter is grounded by Harry; Deb deepens her relationship with Gio, and bonds with her brother on the anniversary of their mother's death.

episodes.name: The Joy of Killing
episodes.description: Miami Metro is shaken by a kidnapping that hits close to home, as Dexter sets his sights on a killer that slipped through the cracks of the justice system. But first, Dexter must survive a double date with Deb and her new boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Big Bad Body Problem
episodes.description: Dexter needs to find a new hiding place after his most recent dumping ground is blown. Harry and LaGuerta pitch a controversial theory to Spencer, as the hunt for a missing child continues.

episodes.name: Business and Pleasure
episodes.description: Deb sneaks away for a trip with her mysterious boyfriend; Dexter is tasked with finding her; Harry and LaGuerta travel to Tampa to look into a potential serial killer on the loose; Miami Metro closes in on suspects in the child kidnapping.

episodes.name: Blood Drive
episodes.description: After a failed SWAT operation, Dexter pursues a child abductor. Deb shadows her father at work, gaining new perspective on Miami Metro. Harry investigates a serial killer but withholds his suspicions from LaGuerta.

episodes.name: Code Blues
episodes.description: Dexter races to find the missing kidnapped child before it's too late. Deb visits her godfather in the hospital and rethinks her future. Harry comes face-to-face with a serial killer... leading to a shocking result. Season finale.

name: The Rookie
description: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.description: Small town guy John Nolan pursues his dream of being a police officer after a life-altering incident. As the force's oldest rookie he's met with skepticism from some higher-ups who see him as a walking mid-life crisis.

episodes.name: Crash Course
episodes.description: Talia forces Nolan to confront his personal moral inclinations after he encounters a kidnapping victim; Lucy is temporarily placed with a new training officer who tests her patience; and Jackson confronts his short-comings.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
episodes.description: After Nolan and Talia lose control of a crime scene, they begin to debate whether people are fundamentally good or bad and what that means for a police officer. Meanwhile, Lucy is concerned Tim is enabling his wife's destructive behavior and not taking care of himself.

episodes.name: The Switch
episodes.description: The rookies are temporarily paired with new training officers and Officer Nolan is paired with Officer Lopez. When Nolan and Lopez track down an escaped criminal, they discover a little kindness goes a long way. Meanwhile, Jackson is forced to face his fears when he is partnered ... Read all

episodes.name: The Roundup
episodes.description: Nolan, the rookies and their training officers get involved in a competition that pits them against each other, while Officer Lucy Chen notices Officer Tim Bradford is obsessed with winning at all costs.

episodes.name: The Hawke
episodes.description: The team must help capture a cop and his former mentor from the academy after he becomes a fugitive following an assault; Officer Tim Bradford needs Officer Lucy Chen to learn to predict the moves of criminals in order to capture them.

episodes.name: The Ride Along
episodes.description: Sergeant Grey informs Officer Nolan and Officer Bishop that they are going to have a movie director as a ride-along; Officer Bradford learns that his wife has been arrested for drug possession.

episodes.name: Time of Death
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and Officer Bishop respond to a silent alarm call at a local convenience store where two men are attempting to rob the place. Officer Nolan pursues one of the suspects on foot and is forced to make a split-second decision that will affect both of their lives. Meanwh... Read all

episodes.name: Standoff
episodes.description: Officer Bradford's wife, Isabel, is found shot but alive and he vows to track down the man responsible. Meanwhile, Officer Nolan must protect his home and the truth after a home invasion attack.

episodes.name: Flesh and Blood
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and Sgt. Grey are paired up for the day on patrol. Nolan's son Henry and Grey's Daughter visit the station.

episodes.name: Redwood
episodes.description: An unscheduled visit by the Vice President of the United States puts the station on high alert. The secret service tasks Officer Nolan and Officer Bishop with checking out a possible threat to the vice president while the rest of the team try to keep the streets clear and safe fo... Read all

episodes.name: Heartbreak
episodes.description: The most dangerous day of the year, Valentine's Day, has the team on high alert, and Officer Nolan invites everyone over for a party now that he is single,

episodes.name: Caught Stealing
episodes.description: The rookies become the prime suspects after it is discovered a large sum of money used in a drug bust has gone missing.

episodes.name: Plain Clothes Day
episodes.description: The rookies undergo a field training day where their training officers wear plain clothing while riding with them.

episodes.name: Manhunt
episodes.description: When a prison bus crashes, some inmates face severe injuries while others seek an opportunity to flee; in the wake of the accident, officer Nolan tries to impress an FBI hostage negotiator while tracking down an escaped convict.

episodes.name: Greenlight
episodes.description: Officer Nolan gets a lesson in respect after his arrest of a gang member leads to a free-for-all on his life; officer Chen and Bradford pull over Mario Lopez, who thinks he can talk his way out of a traffic violation.

episodes.name: The Shake Up
episodes.description: A massive earthquake rocks the city and throws everything into chaos; Russo recommends Officer Nolan for a protective detail of Brad Hayes, a man whose dealings have put a target on his head.

episodes.name: Homefront
episodes.description: When one of their colleagues is arrested by Internal Affairs for lying on the witness stand, it leads to the release of three felons whose cases he worked on and the team being asked to check in on them now that they are free.

episodes.name: The Checklist
episodes.description: Sergeant Gray informs the rookies that they must track down a specific set of crimes in a 48-hour period in order to qualify for their final exam. Meanwhile, Officer Nolan and Officer Bishop answer a silent alarm call at will.i.am's house.

episodes.name: Free Fall
episodes.description: As the rookies prepare for a big exam to see who moves on to the next stage of training, Nolan and Bishop are called to the scene of a murder and learn that the victim may be tied to a potential terrorist attack on the city of Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Impact
episodes.description: The officers grapple with the aftermath of a plotted attack on the city of Los Angeles, leaving Bradford fighting for his life.

episodes.name: The Night General
episodes.description: Nolan teams up with new night detective Nick Armstrong for a murder investigation case that results in an unexpected reunion with a former love interest.

episodes.name: The Bet
episodes.description: Officer Nolan navigates his relationship with Jessica and a developing rapport with Grace while working a high-stakes criminal case involving an undercover homeland security agent; Officer Chen meddles with Officer Bradford's love life.

episodes.name: Warriors and Guardians
episodes.description: Officer Nolan's first day with his new training officer gets off to a rocky start. Officer Bradford struggles to find a birthday gift for a new girlfriend. Officer Lopez has a case that triggers difficult memories.

episodes.name: Tough Love
episodes.description: The rookies are asked to develop their first confidential informants; Officer Chen's mother complicates her home life when she comes to stay with her.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.description: An emergency alert of an impending missile attack sends Los Angeles into chaos and uncertainty, while the officers each try to keep the peace and deal with their own disasters.

episodes.name: Safety
episodes.description: John and Jessica's relationship gets a lot more complicated after she delivers some surprising news; Officer Bradford and Officer West are assigned a community policing project helping out the Watts Rams as volunteer coaches.

episodes.name: Clean Cut
episodes.description: Nolan spends his birthday guarding a crime scene in a law office. Bradford and West receive special commendation. Harper requests an early annual review.

episodes.name: Breaking Point
episodes.description: Officer Nolan's trust is tested. Meanwhile, Officer Harper has finally earned an overnight visit with her daughter that is put into jeopardy when her past undercover life resurfaces again.

episodes.name: The Dark Side
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and team are charged with escorting a notorious female serial killer. Meanwhile, Officer Chen meets a seemingly perfect man who sparks her interest, and Officer Lopez worries about Wesley as his PTSD continues to increase.

episodes.name: Day of Death
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and the entire team are in a desperate search to rescue Officer Chen after her abduction and must attempt to get Rosalind to help them in their search.

episodes.name: Now and Then
episodes.description: Nolan takes his son's fiancée, Abigail, on a ride-along after she shows interest in becoming a police officer. Meanwhile, Jackson's relationship is becoming complicated at work.

episodes.name: Follow-Up Day
episodes.description: Nolan is given some life-changing news and invites Grace over for a homecooked meal in his newly remodeled kitchen. Meanwhile, each unit is tasked with following up on dormant cases in the hopes they can uncover new leads.

episodes.name: Casualties
episodes.description: Officers Nolan and Harper investigate a murder which may have national security implications, while Officer Bradford must confront his past when he crosses paths with a homeless veteran.

episodes.name: Hand-Off
episodes.description: Officer Nolan is having a particularly bad day after learning his identity has been stolen. Meanwhile, Sgt. Grey must confront his past and testify at the parole hearing of the man who murdered his partner.

episodes.name: The Overnight
episodes.description: Officers Chen and Bradford respond to a call at the Los Angeles auditions of "American Idol" and Officer Chen ends up facing Ryan Seacrest and the judges; Chen befriends a reporter whose motives are not clear

episodes.name: Control
episodes.description: Officer Nolan's relationship with his first confidential informant is tested when he discovers her back on the street dealing drugs.

episodes.name: Under the Gun
episodes.description: Officers Nolan and Harper are tasked with escorting four juvenile offenders to a Scared Straight program at a correctional facility that quickly becomes a riotous situation.

episodes.name: The Q Word
episodes.description: Their rookie year is coming to an end and officers Nolan, Chen and West are about to be squeezed harder than ever before as their training officers evaluate whether they are truly ready for the job. Meanwhile, after one of their rookie classmates is involved in a shooting, the te... Read all

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.description: In part two of the season finale, Nolan's discovery goes much deeper than he expected and could put his life and career in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Consequences
episodes.description: Nearing the end of the training, Nolan faces his biggest challenge as a police officer yet when he must come to terms with the choices he made in search of the truth.

episodes.name: In Justice
episodes.description: Nolan and Harper are assigned to a community policing center in an attempt to rebuild the station's reputation.

episodes.name: La Fiera
episodes.description: Nolan's mother makes an unexpected visit after a broken engagement. Sgt. Grey wants to retire.

episodes.name: Sabotage
episodes.description: Officer Jackson West's relationship with his new training officer, Stanton, has escalated and he begins to work with Sargent Grey to find a solution.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.description: Officer Nolan is taken hostage by a man with nothing to lose; Officer Jackson and his training officer, Officer Doug Stanton, reach a tipping point in their relationship that could end Jackson's career.

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.description: Officer Nolan's decision to return to school in order to become a training officer proves to be much harder than he expected; Officer Chen considers going into undercover work after getting a taste of the job.

episodes.name: True Crime
episodes.description: The team gets the true crime docuseries treatment when they analyse a recent case featuring a former child actor whose adult life has garnered him a cult following.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.description: Officer Nolan, Officer Harper and Detective Lopez are assigned to the kidnapping of the son of a criminal court judge who has a long list of enemies who could possibly be involved.

episodes.name: Amber
episodes.description: An Amber Alert sends the team on a race against time to find a newborn infant who was stolen from a local hospital. Meanwhile, Officers West and Chen work their last shift as rookies as Officer Nolan continues on for 30 more days.

episodes.name: Man of Honor
episodes.description: Harper and Nolan respond to a bank robbery in progress and realize the motives of the thief run much deeper than just needing money. West and Chen's first day riding without training officers isn't what they thought it would be.

episodes.name: New Blood
episodes.description: Two new Boots start at the mid-Wilshire station - Lucy gets jealous of how her FTO Tim treats his new charge. John's professor comes to the Sergeant with an annoying issue that goes from minor to terrifying overnight.

episodes.name: Brave Heart
episodes.description: After rushing his son, Henry, to the hospital following his collapse, Nolan is reunited with his ex-wife, Sarah, and they must come together to help their son. Meanwhile, Detective Lopez discovers "La Fiera" is in the same hospital and wants to find out exactly why.

episodes.name: Triple Duty
episodes.description: Officers Nolan and Bradford hope they can de-escalate a drug war before any innocent lives are lost. Meanwhile, Officer Harper hopes she can get Officer Chen ready to go undercover.

episodes.name: Threshold
episodes.description: Officer Nolan mildly injures himself while chasing down a shoplifter and the local DA wants to charge the suspect with assault despite Nolan's wishes. Meanwhile, Lucy goes undercover, Lopez' wedding venue is seized by the FBI and Nolan meets his new neighbor.

episodes.name: Life and Death
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and the entire team race against the clock to locate Lopez after she is kidnapped on her wedding day, not only to save her life but her unborn child's.

episodes.name: Five Minutes
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and Officer Chen's run-in with an infamous thief tips them off to a potentially big heist surrounding the Getty's big gala event. Meanwhile, Nolan works up the courage to ask Bailey out on date.

episodes.name: In the Line of Fire
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and Chen report to a structure fire and suspect that there is more to the situation than meets the eye. Meanwhile, after witnessing a sniper shooting, the team searches for the shooter.

episodes.name: Red Hot
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and Officer Chen search for a missing person who may have international ties that puts everyone's lives in danger; Harper continues the search for a serial arsonist; Wesley must overcome an impossible task.

episodes.name: A.C.H.
episodes.description: When a new designer drug hits LA streets, it turns users into "zombies," and Officer Nolan and the team have a Halloween they won't soon forget. Back at home, Lucy questions whether her apartment building might be haunted.

episodes.name: Poetic Justice
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and team are on a hunt to retrieve a buried stash of gold before any treasure seekers get hurt. Meanwhile, Bradford is tasked with encouraging the oldest cop at the station to retire and invites him to ride with him.

episodes.name: Fire Fight
episodes.description: Officer Chen and Officer Bradford demand a treasure hunt rematch and enlist Officer Grey to help set the terms to a new bet, all while they arrest a series of wealthy female criminals.

episodes.name: Hit and Run
episodes.description: The squad encounters a sovereign citizen and deals with a domestic terrorist plot. Angela and Wesley argue about their predicament.

episodes.name: Breakdown
episodes.description: Wesley finally manages to break free of his dirty contract. Nolan deals with an increasingly serious relationship and underhanded election techniques. Bradford learns some unpleasant things about his parents.

episodes.name: Heart Beat
episodes.description: Now that John Nolan knows about Bailey's past, he must decide if they still have a future; when a plane crashes in the middle of the city, the team races to find out why.

episodes.name: End Game
episodes.description: The team must rely on a criminal for his expertise to take down a bigger threat. Officers Chen and Bradford investigate a murder of a homeless teenager.

episodes.name: The Knock
episodes.description: The team responds to the report of a severed hand that has washed up on the beach. Tim attempts to prove his isn't a control freak to Lucy and invites her on a double date.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.description: John Nolan and Lucy Chen must fulfill three quests if they want to get a stolen police helicopter back safely from a teenage thief; Nyla Harper and Aaron Thorson must guard a convicted cop killer in the hospital following a prison riot.

episodes.name: Long Shot
episodes.description: Nolan and Harper help Skip Tracer Randy complete his first bounty. Officer Chen and Sergeant Bradford hunt for a perpetrator on a citywide crime spree.

episodes.name: Hit List
episodes.description: Harper puts Thorsen through "Plain Clothes Day," but the exercise is interrupted by an unexpected visitor. Meanwhile, two witnesses for an upcoming grand jury case are murdered, and Sgt. Grey might be next on the list.

episodes.name: Real Crime
episodes.description: Thorsen's documentary crew does another update with the squad.

episodes.name: Coding
episodes.description: Officer John Nolan and the team feel they must negotiate with a distraught man who is holding a hospital hostage to ensure his wife receives a lifesaving surgery.

episodes.name: Backstabbers
episodes.description: Robbery of a train filled with valuable auction items turns deadly, the team is called to investigate.

episodes.name: Simone
episodes.description: Officer Nolan and the LA division of the FBI enlist the help of FBI trainee Simone Clark when one of her former students is suspected of terrorism following an explosion at a local power station.

episodes.name: Enervo
episodes.description: The team, alongside the LA division of the FBI, is in a race to stop truck bombs. The joint task force is suspicious of the CIA's involvement.

episodes.name: Mother's Day
episodes.description: Sgt. Grey supports Officer's Nolan to become a training officer and rides with him to help him prepare for the exam. Tim and Lucy decide on their plans for Mother's day and a romantic vacation.

episodes.name: Day in the Hole
episodes.description: Officer Nolan is forced to spend a week in solitary confinement in a quiet border town with a young local officer who is in need of some training; Sgt. Bradford and Officer Chen go under cover together in a possible drug trafficking case.

episodes.name: Double Down
episodes.description: Officer John Nolan is once again face-to-face with serial killer Rosalind Dyer. Officers Bradford and Chen work undercover with Detective Lopez and the Las Vegas Police Department to arrest leaders of a major criminal enterprise.

episodes.name: Labor Day
episodes.description: Officer John Nolan is moving closer to his new role as a training officer. Meanwhile, Lucy's successful undercover assignment earns her an invitation for specialized training in Sacramento.

episodes.name: Dye Hard
episodes.description: Officer John Nolan is assigned his first rookie, Officer Celina Juarez, whose unconventional approach to police work poses a unique challenge for him.

episodes.name: The Choice
episodes.description: Rosalind returns with a vengeance and Bailey's life is left hanging in the balance. With a ticking clock, the LAPD and the FBI join forces.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.description: John and Celina are on the hunt for a fugitive after a car incident goes awry. Lucy helps Tim in his time of need.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.description: Nolan and Celina investigate a cash deposit linked to an old DEA case; Wesley grows increasingly concerned about his deposition and is shocked when he realizes Elijah's attorney is a familiar face.

episodes.name: Crossfire
episodes.description: Nolan and Celina witness a shooting and realize the victim was already dead; Bailey has been feeling off-center since the proposal, leaving Nolan to wonder what he can do to make her feel more comfortable.

episodes.name: The Collar
episodes.description: Officers John Nolan and Celina Juarez are in a race against time to stop the source of an explosive rampage.

episodes.name: Take Back
episodes.description: Nolan and the team investigate the death of a suspect in police custody; Grey and his wife go to New York to visit their daughter, only to realize she never made it home from the night before.

episodes.name: The List
episodes.description: Detective Nyla Harper and James find themselves in the middle of a bank robbery which leads the entire team on a citywide manhunt. Meanwhile, Tim and Lucy finally go on their first date, but it does have a few complications.

episodes.name: The Naked and the Dead
episodes.description: The team ends up in a gang war while Lucy investigates a domestic abuse case.

episodes.name: Death Notice
episodes.description: Nolan and Celina must stand guard at a hospital after a dangerous prisoner needs surgery; Aaron, Lopez and Harper look into a string of robberies.

episodes.name: Daddy Cop
