episodes.description: A couple find the body of a Navy petty officer in an abandoned restaurant in Georgetown; the Metro PD calls and helps the NCIS; Gibbs and company investigate. Messages leave clues leading to an exclusive nightclub. The gang figure it out.

episodes.name: Dead Man Walking
episodes.description: A Navy lieutenant, a member of an international nuclear-inspection agency, asks Gibbs to solve the officer's own murder because he knows that someone has exposed him to radiation poisoning.

episodes.name: Skeletons
episodes.description: A family crypt in a mausoleum explodes when unsealed; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky says that parts of at least three skeletons occupied the vault. The team identify and check out a suspect, and Gibbs and Hollis get a major surprise.

episodes.name: Iceman
episodes.description: Someone attacks a Marine corporal and leaves him to die, facedown in a snowbank in a park; Gibbs and company investigate. Mike Franks shows up and takes part; he and Gibbs sort it out and work it out. Tony and Jeanne encounter a problem.

episodes.name: Grace Period
episodes.description: An explosion kills two NCIS agents from another team; Gibbs and company investigate; feelings and emotions run high. Ducky and Abby find evidence suggesting opposite answers, but the gang resolve the problem, and they solve the case.

episodes.name: Cover Story
episodes.description: Gibbs and company investigate a crime scene; while doing so McGee recognizes that key details duplicate details in his second novel, still unfinished and in progress. The gang find two bodies; they eventually find the delusional bad guy.

episodes.name: Brothers in Arms
episodes.description: Jen meets with an informant about the Frog, but someone kills the witness; Gibbs and company investigate. Jen obsesses about catching the Frog. Abby produces many answers; although the gang persist, they find a surprise but no Frog.

episodes.name: In the Dark
episodes.description: A blind photographer takes a picture; his assistant sees the body of a sailor in the background, and she calls the NCIS; Gibbs and company pursue. The gang find a second body, which leads to another crime, three solutions, and the bad guy.

episodes.name: Trojan Horse
episodes.description: While Jen attends a conference in Paris, Gibbs serves as the acting director. When a taxicab delivers a fare to the NCIS headquarters, the passenger, a Yemeni, is DoA; the gang investigate. Jen diverts to Moscow, and many answers emerge.

episodes.name: Angel of Death
episodes.description: Jen returns from Paris; at home she finds a curious sight. All NCIS agents in Washington must take polygraph tests; Gibbs and the gang look into that. Tony and Jeanne deal with an injured pedestrian; Jeanne introduces Tony to her father.

episodes.name: Bury Your Dead
episodes.description: Tony meets Jeanne's father; Tony excuses himself to move his Mustang, which explodes while the gang watch; Ducky says that the victim is not Tony. The Frog meets Jen, but she lets him leave; Gibbs and others pursue him but arrive too late.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.description: The NCIS gang investigate the death of a sailor in a hit-and-run wreck, which turns into a shoot-and-scoot; Ducky finds nearby the body of a young woman who gave birth and died before the wreck. The team figure out the lies and the case.

episodes.name: Ex-File
episodes.description: A Captain is killed at home with a spear. His wife is having an affair with his Major, whose prints are found at the scene. Jethro's ex-wife, Stephanie, is seeing the Major too. Lt. Col. Mann, Jethro's girlfriend, leads the investigation.

episodes.name: Identity Crisis
episodes.description: While demonstrating an autopsy, Ducky announces murder; Gibbs and company investigate. The victim worked for the FBI, which tried to catch a person who erased old identities and created new ones. The NCIS and the FBI catch the bad guys.

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.description: A Navy lieutenant threatens to jump from an 11th-floor ledge in Washington; the Metro PD calls the NCIS; Gibbs and company respond and investigate; Gibbs talks the man out of jumping, then someone shoots him. With help the gang find a mole.

episodes.name: Chimera
episodes.description: A sailor dies on ship, but by the time the team arrive to investigate he is the only person left onboard.

episodes.name: Requiem
episodes.description: A special friend of Gibbs's daughter asks for help with a Marine sergeant, who has begun stalking her. Gibbs gives him the word, but soon someone abducts the friend and tortures and kills the Marine. Gibbs and Tony solve it and work it out.

episodes.name: Designated Target
episodes.description: While a Navy rear admiral rides in a taxi, two motorcyclists, using silenced pistols, execute both men; Gibbs and company investigate. Ducky says that the target was the driver, who was a political refugee from Burundi. The gang solve it.

episodes.name: Lost & Found
episodes.description: While McGee gives his den of Youth Rangers a tour of the NCIS headquarters, one of his boys pops up in a missing-persons database; Gibbs and company investigate. The team find lies, deception, a fugitive, a new murder, and the real killer.

episodes.name: Corporal Punishment
episodes.description: A to-be-decorated Marine, Corporal Damon Werth, becomes violent during his PTSD treatment. He has fistfights with NCIS agents. It is found that he is on steroids, and a Navy contractor is suspected of experiments on him.

episodes.name: Tribes
episodes.description: A Marine lance corporal, of Arabic lineage and the Islamic faith, dies two blocks from a mosque in Washington, DC; Gibbs and company investigate. Ducky uses an alternate method; Abby finds a deadly neurotoxin. A tip helps; justice prevails.

episodes.name: Stakeout
episodes.description: Someone has stolen new top-secret radar gear; the NCIS gets a tip about its location. During a stakeout of the site, McGee watches while a man dies; the radar disappears again. The gang and the Metro PD figure it out and catch the bad guy.

episodes.name: Dog Tags
episodes.description: While seeking to serve a warrant, the Gibbs gang find cocaine, cash, and the dead body of the subject person; a dog bites McGee, who shoots the dog. Abby goes to bat for the dog, who helps to solve the case. The team nab the bad person.

episodes.name: Internal Affairs
episodes.description: Fornell and his Hoovers arrive in the squad bay; he tells that the Gibbs team is under investigation for the murder of the Frog. However, the Gibbs gang investigates the FBI, and they put the pieces together and explain them to the suits.

episodes.name: In the Zone
episodes.description: A Marine captain dies in a mortar explosion in Baghdad; the SecNav sends the body to Ducky, who finds that a bullet, not shrapnel, caused the death. Tony and Jardine investigate on site; they and the rest of the team together figure it out.

episodes.name: Recoil
episodes.description: Ziva, undercover, goes on a date with a suspected serial killer (a Marine); Tony finds the fifth victim; the suspect threatens Ziva, who resists and shoots him with his piece. Gibbs and the team investigate, solve, and find a second killer.

episodes.name: About Face
episodes.description: While at a crime scene Jimmy sees a key piece of evidence, which is stolen and is shot at by a suspect, but cannot remember their face.

episodes.name: Judgment Day (Part I)
episodes.description: In Los Angeles, Jenny, with Tony and Ziva as a protective detail, attends the funeral for a retired long-time special agent, who supposedly died of a heart attack; Jenny hears a name, sees a man, makes pictures, and summons Mike Franks from Mexico; she tells him that she's the ne... Read all

episodes.name: Judgment Day (Part II)
episodes.description: In the aftermath of Jenny's death, Assistant Director Vance searches for Franks, who escaped the diner after killing the fourth gunman. Meanwhile, Tony and Ziva try to locate the one responsible, while dealing with the fallout of failing in their assignment to protect the Directo... Read all

episodes.name: Last Man Standing
episodes.description: In Washington DC, a petty officer's body is found four and a half months after he had died; another officer dies in Morocco and Ziva sustains an injury. Gibbs and company find a link and reach a solution. Ziva gladly returns to the NCIS.

episodes.name: Agent Afloat
episodes.description: A lieutenant appears to jump from an aircraft carrier at sea; Tony investigates aboard the ship and in Cartagena, Colombia, where the missing man supposedly joined the ship. Gibbs and Ziva join Tony; they find the answers and the bad guy.

episodes.name: Capitol Offense
episodes.description: Two cyclists find the body of a woman lieutenant commander assigned to the Navy Office of Legislative Affairs; Gibbs and company investigate. A senator, an old buddy of Gibbs, calls him. Another body turns up. The gang solve and arrest.

episodes.name: Heartland
episodes.description: An ambush in an alley behind a bar leaves one Marine dead and one very ill; the gang investigate. The survivor is from Gibbs's hometown, and the team goes there; flashbacks abound. The bunch put the pieces together and nail the bad guys.

episodes.name: Nine Lives
episodes.description: A neighbor finds the body of a tortured Marine; Gibbs and company investigate, and they encounter Fornell, who says that a person of interest is also a key witness in a major murder case. Another Marine dies, and the gang connect the dots.

episodes.name: Murder 2.0
episodes.description: Bloody water emits from a shower head in base housing at Quantico; Gibbs and company investigate; something has disappeared; a second man dies. The killer leaves clues, which suggest more deaths. They solve the game and nab the bad guy.

episodes.name: Collateral Damage
episodes.description: Gunmen rob the credit union at Quantico and kill a guard; Gibbs and company investigate; they question whether getting cash was the objective of the robbers. The team make several connections, then they round up the bad guys at a burial.

episodes.name: Cloak
episodes.description: After an elaborate setup Tony and Ziva break into a classified Navy facility; however, that test is itself a ruse by which to identify a mole within the NCIS. Gibbs and Lee meet in the chat room, and Gibbs says that now they work together.

episodes.name: Dagger
episodes.description: Tony and McGee unsuccessfully try to follow Lee's pickup man; a satellite leads the gang to a house with a secret room and a dead body; a second stakeout produces a different result, which takes the team to a solution, a catch, and more.

episodes.name: Road Kill
episodes.description: A boatswain's mate dies after a single-car crash; Gibbs and company find evidence of gunfire plus beatings of the victim, who was a member of a fight club and, they learn, the operator of an illicit business. The gang figure out all of it.

episodes.name: Silent Night
episodes.description: A Metro detective investigates a burglary and double homicide at Christmas in Washington; the suspect is a former Navy petty officer who supposedly died 17 years ago; the Gibbs gang take an interest, find the pieces, and put them together.

episodes.name: Caged
episodes.description: An old skeleton comes to light; Gibbs sends McGee to question a prisoner convicted of murder in two identical cases; while he does so, other inmates kill a guard, seize McGee, and take over. McGee successfully negotiates and investigates.

episodes.name: Broken Bird
episodes.description: Ducky is attacked at a crime scene, leading to the revelation of a painful past.

episodes.name: Love & War
episodes.description: Two kids find the disemboweled body of a missing Navy captain; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky finds a pentagram impressed into the victim's back. Another man dies. The team put the pieces together, and Gibbs and Tony nab the bad guy.

episodes.name: Deliverance
episodes.description: The Metro PD finds the body of an 18-year-old Marine who had grown up in the same hood where he died; the Gibbs team investigate with the help of Franks. They slowly assemble the picture, then a gentle social worker offers the last piece.

episodes.name: Bounce
episodes.description: A man, impersonating Tony, dumps the body of a witness against him in a trial during which the impostor became convicted and imprisoned as a result of one of Tony's investigations; Tony and the gang sort out some of it but not all of it.

episodes.name: South by Southwest
episodes.description: An agent of the NCIS dies in an execution-style shooting; Gibbs and company investigate. A radioactive painting provides clues, and an impostor federal agent causes trouble, but Gibbs and Tony, on horseback, and the others break the case.

episodes.name: Knockout
episodes.description: Vance, using members of the Gibbs team, in Chicago works the case of the murder of a man who, Vance insists, was once a member of the Marine Corps. Gibbs wonders whether Vance has exceeded his authority. Later Vance hears what happened.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.description: In Navy base housing in Norfolk, Virginia, a mother finds a pistol among the personal stuff of her 12-year-old son; Gibbs and company find a trail of old crimes and two recent deaths. The gang put the pieces together and find the shooters.

episodes.name: Dead Reckoning
episodes.description: Kort asks Gibbs and the team for help in hunting one of NCIS Most Wanted, but it's more complicated when his accountant enters the picture.

episodes.name: Toxic
episodes.description: Local cops find the body of an enlisted Marine on UA; Gibbs and company investigate. The FBI haul Abby to a classified lab to replace a missing man, who was a target of the dead Marine. The gang figure it out and tie up the loose ends.

episodes.name: Legend (Part I)
episodes.description: Gibbs and company start looking into the murder of a Marine. Gibbs and McGee go to Los Angeles for a joint gig with the NCIS Office of Special Projects in LA due to a suspected link. The investigation continues on both coasts. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Legend (Part II)
episodes.description: Gibbs and McGee continue with the OSP in LA. Rifkin shows up and interferes with the NCIS investigation. Two sleepers in a terrorist cell die, but OSP agents swarm a shop and grab others. Gibbs intercepts Rifkin and tells him to go home.

episodes.name: Semper Fidelis
episodes.description: During a poker game at the home of the SecNav, an ICE agent dies while on the protection detail; Gibbs and company investigate with support from the FBI and ICE. An invisible man becomes visible and dead. Tony arrests Michael, who resists.

episodes.name: Aliyah
episodes.description: Ziva finds Tony and Michael on a floor; Michael dies soon afterward; the next morning her pad explodes. McGee and Abby find answers. Vance, Gibbs, Tony, and Ziva go to Tel Aviv; Ziva remains, and the others return; Ziva runs into trouble.

episodes.name: Truth or Consequences
episodes.description: Having not heard anything from Ziva, Gibbs, Tony, McGee, and Abby wonder; each starts sniffing and digging; they trace her to Somalia. Gibbs, Tony, and McGee go there; Tony and McGee become caught.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.description: Three men die during what they called a bachelor party; one was a Marine staff sergeant; Gibbs and company investigate. The clues lead to a cop, who later dies. The gang find the pieces and put them together; Ziva rejoins the team.

episodes.name: The Inside Man
episodes.description: A critic of the NCIS has severely complained about an alleged cover-up of the death of a Naval officer; the griper falls to his death; both the NCIS and the Metro PD investigate; the Gibbs team figure it out. Ziva seeks Gibbs's signature.

episodes.name: Good Cop, Bad Cop
episodes.description: The body of a UA Marine, last aboard a ship with Ziva, turns up in a shrimping net in the Indian Ocean. Vance flags Ziva's application while he questions her. Mossad and more bodies appear. Ziva and Abby tell all. Gibbs puts Ziva to work.

episodes.name: Code of Conduct
episodes.description: A Marine, a practical joker, dies, apparently by suicide by carbon monoxide; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky rules out suicide, and Abby confirms. Tony starts to arrest the widow, but Gibbs stops him. The gang put the pieces together.

episodes.name: Outlaws and In-Laws
episodes.description: Gibbs's boat, which he gave to Franks, drifts into the Naval Station at San Diego with two bodies aboard. Vance and the team investigate. Franks, and two relatives, show up at Gibbs's house. The gang solve the case and make an arrest.

episodes.name: Endgame
episodes.description: Two runners at the US Naval Academy find an unattended car and the body of a civilian physician; Gibbs and company investigate; Vance recognizes the MO of a North Korean woman assassin. The gang find the pieces, and everything works out.

episodes.name: Power Down
episodes.description: A woman Naval officer dies during a break-in at an ISP facility in or near Washington, DC, then electric power goes down throughout the entire metro area; Gibbs and company investigate in the dark; they solve the case and grab the bad guy.

episodes.name: Child's Play
episodes.description: A dead Marine's day job at a government think tank leads Gibbs and the team into the life of a 12-year-old prodigy who may be the killer's next target.

episodes.name: Faith
episodes.description: Jackson visits Leroy for a special reason. Meanwhile, a couple, out in a park in freezing weather, finds the body of a Marine first lieutenant, barefoot and thinly clothed. Gibbs and company figure it out and elicit a confession.

episodes.name: Ignition
episodes.description: Two park rangers find the burned body of a Navy test pilot on leave in a forest in the Appalachian Mountains; Gibbs and company investigate; McGee sees evidence that the pilot tried to fly a jetpack. The gang figure out what truly happened.

episodes.name: Flesh and Blood
episodes.description: A Saudi Arabian limo driver dies in an explosion of a car aboard NAS Patuxent River; Gibbs and company investigate; the apparent target is a Saudi prince present there for advanced training. The gang figure it out. Tony's father visits.

episodes.name: Jet Lag
episodes.description: Tony and Ziva escort a whistle-blower from Paris to Washington, DC; during the flight they meet a federal air marshal, and they all encounter various problems. Gibbs, McGee, Ducky, and Abby help in Washington, and everything works out.

episodes.name: Masquerade
episodes.description: A Marine lance corporal's car explodes; while Gibbs and company investigate, McGee finds radioactivity. Ducky says that the dead driver is not the owner. The people around DC panic about dirty bombs. The gang figure it out and wind it up.

episodes.name: Jack-Knife
episodes.description: The death of a Marine veteran gets the attention of Gibbs, Fornell, and the gang. Damon reappears, then he and Ziva pose as truckers. McGee and others figure out everything, then Gibbs, Fornell, Damon, and Ziva round up the bad guys.

episodes.name: Mother's Day
episodes.description: A Navy captain dies of gunfire while with his fiancée, who is Gibbs's first mother-in-law. While Gibbs and company investigate, they find several discrepancies and inconsistencies. Gibbs figures it out, and he and "MAllison" work it out.

episodes.name: Double Identity
episodes.description: A shooting takes place in Rock Creek Park in Washington; the victim is a Marine officer who became MiA six years before; Gibbs and company investigate. A second life, name, and wife all come to light. The gang solve it and nab the shooter.

episodes.name: Jurisdiction
episodes.description: While investigating the deaths of a diver and a captain, Gibbs and company meet two special agents of the Coast Guard Investigative Service, who present similarities to the gang. They all cooperate, find the truth, and nab the bad guys.

episodes.name: Guilty Pleasure
episodes.description: In Norfolk a Navy lieutenant and base-newspaper reporter dies of stab wounds to the back, as have three other men, and as does one more; Gibbs and company investigate, with the help of a former madam in Washington; Gibbs finds the killer.

episodes.name: Moonlighting
episodes.description: The body of a Navy petty officer, shot and drowned, washes up on a beach; while Gibbs and company investigate, another body, wrapped in chain, turns up. The FBI becomes involved, the gang find clues, and Fornell and Gibbs find a leak.

episodes.name: Obsession
episodes.description: A Navy lieutenant, otherwise in perfect health, dies under mysterious circumstances; Gibbs and company investigate; the vic's sister disappears; a long-time friend of the siblings recently died. The gang figure it out and bust the killer.

episodes.name: Borderland
episodes.description: The body of a Marine corporal, minus his feet, shows up in the trunk of a junked car. Meanwhile, Abby teaches a class on cold cases in Mexico.

episodes.name: Patriot Down
episodes.description: The body of an NCIS agent turns up in a bonfire on a beach near the US Naval Academy after celebrations just before graduation; Gibbs and company learn also about a rape of a sailor, and Gibbs goes to see Franks in Mexico. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Rule Fifty-One
episodes.description: Gibbs meets Paloma, the head of the Reynosa drug cartel in Mexico; he gets a ride to Washington, where he talks with Vance in code. Tony and Ziva arrest a bad guy, who then dies. Ziva attends a ceremony. Paloma meets Jackson. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Spider and the Fly
episodes.description: Gibbs must take desperate measures to protect his loved ones with Paloma Reynosa still on the loose.

episodes.name: Worst Nightmare
episodes.description: At the high school at Quantico, students and teachers fall asleep while in class; Gibbs and company investigate; one girl disappears. A grandfather both helps and interferes. Temp interns join. The gang solve the case and find the girl.

episodes.name: Short Fuse
episodes.description: A woman Marine sergeant, who's a bomb-disposal tech, shoots to death an intruder in her pad; Gibbs and company investigate; Fornell and another FBI member become involved. The gang find everyone and figure out everything; it all works out.

episodes.name: Royals & Loyals
episodes.description: The body of a petty officer shows up in a hot tub; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky sees an unusual clue; Abby finds a link to the Royal Navy. A Royal Marine major and a CIA agent prove to be something else. The gang catch the bad guy.

episodes.name: Dead Air
episodes.description: A shooter kills three people, including a Navy commander, on live talk radio; Gibbs and company investigate; they believe that the host was the main target. The gang pursue clues to a bomb at a baseball diamond, where they nab the bad guy.

episodes.name: Cracked
episodes.description: A Naval Reserve lieutenant, who's a chemical engineer, dies when a city bus accidentally hits her on a street in Washington, DC; Gibbs and company investigate. Abby deciphers mysterious writings; the gang figures it out and nab the perp.

episodes.name: Broken Arrow
episodes.description: An admiral finds the body of a long-time friend; Gibbs and company investigate. Tony and Ziva pick up Tony's father, who appears to have become connected with the victim. Sr. does a favor, and Ziva accompanies him. The gang figure it out.

episodes.name: Enemies Foreign
episodes.description: Vance hosts a conference of high-level members of the NCIS; he invites Eli, who accepts. Eli's presence raises security concerns; Gibbs and company take part in the protective arrangements. Threats arise, and the gang respond. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Enemies Domestic
episodes.description: An attack has killed one and left Vance with serious injuries; Gibbs takes charge by Vance's order. Eli reveals details about an operation 22 years old. Gibbs and the gang put the pieces together. The bad guy emerges, and justice prevails.

episodes.name: False Witness
episodes.description: A Navy petty officer, who's the only witness in a civilian capital-murder trial, disappears; Gibbs and company investigate in response to a request by a commonwealth attorney. The gang puts all the pieces together, and justice prevails.

episodes.name: Ships in the Night
episodes.description: A Marine first lieutenant dies of gunfire during a dinner cruise; Abigail Borin, of the CGIS, also is a guest during the same event; she, Gibbs, and the gang investigate together. They find and fit the pieces, and they nab the bad people.

episodes.name: Recruited
episodes.description: A Navy recruiter dies after becoming shoved down a staircase at a high school in Fairfax, Virginia; Gibbs and company investigate. Dr. Magnus, Ducky's predecessor, visits. Gibbs and the gang eventually figure it out and finger the bad guy.

episodes.name: Freedom
episodes.description: Two teenagers find the battered body of a Marine Corps Reserve sergeant in his own backyard; Gibbs and company investigate. The team find evidence of sad stories. Gibbs pursues a bruise and figures it out, then the gang bust the bad guy.

episodes.name: A Man Walks Into a Bar...
episodes.description: Someone shoots and kills the executive officer (XO) of a Naval vessel, a commander, in his own stateroom; Gibbs and company investigate. However, a shrink (a persistent and presumptuous one) arrives to conduct mandatory psychologic evaluations for all members of the gang, and she... Read all

episodes.name: Defiance
episodes.description: A US Marine dies in an explosion at a US embassy; he saves a foreign official and others; the NCIS provides security to the official's daughter in Washington, DC; kidnappers abduct her, and another man dies. The Gibbs gang figure it out.

episodes.name: Kill Screen
episodes.description: A Metro cop in Washington, DC, finds a set of severed fingertips which prove to be those of a Marine corporal; Gibbs and company investigate; McGee finds the corresponding body in the local morgue; Ducky concludes that the corporal was a victim of stretching to death on a rack. M... Read all

episodes.name: One Last Score
episodes.description: Two teenagers find the body of a former NCIS employee; Gibbs and company investigate; in the trunk of the victim's car Gibbs and McGee find stolen property from a current case. The gang find the details and the people responsible.

episodes.name: Out of the Frying Pan
episodes.description: A "meter maid" sees a body inside a home in Washington, DC; the victim, a retired Marine colonel, received seven blows of an ax; Gibbs and company question a prime suspect, who denies involvement and helps Gibbs to arrest the real killer.

episodes.name: Tell-All
episodes.description: In a national forest near Washington, DC, a young couple find the body of a Navy lieutenant commander in his dress-blue uniform; Gibbs and company investigate; on a rock nearby Tony finds a single word written in the victim's blood. The Metro PD finds the victim's abandoned car i... Read all

episodes.name: Two-Faced
episodes.description: Gibbs and company investigate the murder of a member of the US Navy; EJ has investigated three previous similar deaths, so Vance gives her the lead. A suspect turns out to be another victim. Ziva's boyfriend is something else. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Dead Reflection
episodes.description: EJ and her team take over the P2P case; Gibbs and company investigate the death of a Navy woman officer. The solution, first believed to be simple, proves to be complicated. The killer jumps Ziva, and the gang pounce on him. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Baltimore
episodes.description: Gibbs and company investigate a body wearing a dress-blue uniform of a three-star admiral; Tony recognizes the victim; they first suspect another P2P killing; however, Ducky suggests otherwise. The gang find both the killer and the motive.

episodes.name: Swan Song
episodes.description: EJ and her team investigate yet another P2P murder; the victim is an NCIS agent from Norfolk; Gibbs and company pitch in, as does Franks. Kort, a CIA agent, spills in a briefing. Both Franks and EJ encounter the prime suspect.

episodes.name: Pyramid
episodes.description: Gibbs and Tony follow EJ and her team to a nearly vacant building; they find that the P2P murderer has killed Levin, seriously injured Cade, and kidnapped EJ; Gibbs pursues the suspect and EJ; he finds her, left to suffocate. McGeek traces a phone number to CI-Ray (Ziva's boyfrie... Read all

episodes.name: Nature of the Beast
episodes.description: Tony, during his task for the SecNav, took fire and sustained a concussion, and he acquired the bloody badge of some other NCIS agent; however, he has no memory of his activities. Gibbs and a shrink help Tony to begin to regain his memory.

episodes.name: Restless
episodes.description: A Marine private first-class returns from Afghanistan to his hometown in time for a welcoming party for him during homecoming week; however, when he arrives, he staggers in, mortally wounded, then collapses and dies; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky says that death resulted f... Read all

episodes.name: The Penelope Papers
episodes.description: A Naval Reserve lieutenant dies of a gunshot in Washington, DC; Gibbs and company investigate; the victim has one of McGee's cards; McGee learns that his paternal grandmother is involved. The gang assemble the pieces and catch the bad guy.

episodes.name: Enemy on the Hill
episodes.description: In Washington, DC, near the Capitol a van accidentally hits and critically injures a pedestrian, who proves to be The Cooler, a wanted contract assassin, whose next target appears to be a Navy lieutenant commander; Gibbs and company investigate the target, LCdr. Geoffrey Brett, a... Read all

episodes.name: Safe Harbor
episodes.description: A boarding party from a Coast Guard cutter visits a foreign-flag cargo ship; no crewmember is visible, but a gunman kills a petty officer. The NCIS and the CGCIS investigate. Gibbs, Borin, and the gang sort it out and serve justice.

episodes.name: Thirst
episodes.description: At 04:19 in northern Virginia an 18-wheel truck accidentally and fatally hits a Naval Reserve lieutenant who had swerved and woven on a freeway, parked on the left side, and walked toward an emergency call box on the right side; Gibbs and company investigate. Ducky sees telling e... Read all

episodes.name: Devil's Triangle
episodes.description: Diane, the mutual ex-wife of Gibbs and Fornell, gets help from them; Victor, her current husband, has disappeared; they and the gang find the pieces, put them together, find the bad guys, and deal with them. Diane gives Gibbs a watch.

episodes.name: Engaged (Part I)
episodes.description: An aircraft crashes short of Dover AFB, Delaware, while carrying the remains of six Marines from Afghanistan; Abby does not find the DNA of one of the six; Gibbs and others consider the possibility that the one is still alive. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Engaged (Part II)
episodes.description: Gibbs and Ziva fly to Afghanistan to seek 1Lt. Flores or her body; Abby learns where she might be; an extraction team finds and saves her. Back in the USA Gibbs and the gang anticipate what's next, find a bad guy, and prevent an explosion.

episodes.name: Sins of the Father
episodes.description: DiNozzo Senior is found unconscious, in a car with a murdered naval officer in the trunk.

episodes.name: Newborn King
episodes.description: A Navy captain dies by gunfire; Gibbs and company investigate; the gang meet Emma, a pregnant Marine first lieutenant, who says that she's the real target. The team figure out the pieces, and they deal with the problems and the bad guys.

episodes.name: Housekeeping
episodes.description: Two boys find the body of a Navy commander in a quiet suburban neighborhood; Gibbs and company investigate. EJ Barrett reappears from her hiatus but remains a target. Another man dies, and the gang protect EJ and find and catch the killer.

episodes.name: A Desperate Man
episodes.description: A Navy woman lieutenant commander dies of gunfire; she has served as a Naval attaché overseas, and her husband is a detective for the Metro PD; Gibbs and company investigate; the widower's help does not help, but the gang solve the puzzle.

episodes.name: Life Before His Eyes
episodes.description: At a diner an unknown person with a drawn pistol approaches Gibbs, who deals with him; then Gibbs experiences flashbacks and fantasies, which Franks explains. The next day McGee announces a decision, then the gang gear up and head out.

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.description: A civilian and a Navy captain die of gunfire in Washington, DC; Gibbs and company investigate; the Duck sees unusual undergarments, which are also costumes. The gang solve the puzzle and nab the bad guys; Wendy reveals something to Tony.

episodes.name: Psych Out
episodes.description: When two burglars enter a home in Arlington, Virginia, in the burbs of Washington, DC, they find the hanged body of a man; the victim proves to be that of a psychologist (with a PhD degree), who was also a Naval Reservist on active duty, and who held a high-level security clearan... Read all

episodes.name: Need to Know
episodes.description: When Gibbs meets with a Navy chief petty officer and his attorney (to make a deal), the CPO collapses and dies; while the gang investigate, they find a connection to an illicit arms dealer. The team figure it out, and everything works out.

episodes.name: The Tell
episodes.description: While Gibbs and Tony man a protective detail for the SecNav, a gunman shoots the secretary; the NCIS investigates quietly with the help of Dr. Ryan. Blackmail is involved; the gang and Ryan figure it out and find a hacker and the bad guy.

episodes.name: The Good Son
episodes.description: While on liberty in Baltimore, Maryland, a boatswain's mate second-class dies of a stab wound; Gibbs and company investigate; the prime suspect is a brother-in-law of Vance. The team persist, Abby solves the case, and they nab the bad guy.

episodes.name: The Missionary Position
episodes.description: A picnicking couple encounter a dead body, which proves to be that of a first lieutenant in the US Marine Corps; after Gibbs chats with Dr. Ryan, he and the team investigate; the gang see that the victim had plummeted from somewhere in the sky after he had first been beaten, stab... Read all

episodes.name: Rekindled
episodes.description: A fire in a warehouse in Baltimore brings in the NCIS; they find connections to Watcher Fleet. The gang work with a city arson investigator with a mysterious connection to Tony.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.description: Gibbs and company continue to investigate an explosion and a fire; Tony, McGee, and Ziva work aboard aircraft carriers; Ducky and Abby provide much support. Tony and Ziva nab a bad guy, who tells who hired him and why. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Up in Smoke
episodes.description: Dorneget gets a surprise from a dentist; Gibbs and company continue to investigate Dearing and the thermite incidents. Dearing visits the Navy Yard and messes with Gibbs. Moves and countermoves abound; Vance disappears. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Till Death Do Us Part
episodes.description: Gibbs and the gang continue to pursue Dearing, the explosions, and the disappearance of the director; Dearing continues to mess with Gibbs and Ryan. After another explosion and another death, disaster strikes at the Navy Yard. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Extreme Prejudice
episodes.description: After the attack on NCIS, the President orders all agencies to pursue Harper Dearing with "extreme prejudice". Meanwhile, Ducky tries to recover from his heart attack.

episodes.name: Recovery
episodes.description: Abby has more nightmares; Navy Seabees continue to work on the building; a shrink does mandatory psychologic evaluations on all hands; the body of an armory worker appears four months after the explosion; Abby and the rest work out it all.

episodes.name: Phoenix
episodes.description: Ducky, on medical leave, unofficially calls for the exhumation of the body of a commander whose autopsy he conducted 12 years ago; he now suspects murder; the gang investigate another death, and they find the connection and the solution.

episodes.name: Lost at Sea
episodes.description: An inflatable raft washes ashore with three survivors from a missing Navy helo; the pilot also is missing; Gibbs and company plus Borin (of the CGCIS) investigate. The team and the other Abby find the pilot, the truth, and the chopper.

episodes.name: The Namesake
episodes.description: While the Gibbs team investigate a murder of a Navy petty officer first-class, Gibbs himself sees a Medal of Honor, which his father's former best friend received for valor during WW2. The gang figure out and work out both problems.

episodes.name: Shell Shock (Part I)
episodes.description: Two Marine officers return from Afghanistan after an ambush; one night one of them dies in a fistfight in an alley in Washington, DC; Gibbs and company investigate. The gang see a familiar face but do not yet find the person. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Shell Shock (Part II)
episodes.description: Gibbs tells Joe that Joe was right about Kersey's presence with the enemy in Afghanistan, and that he and the gang need his help to find the bad guy; Gibbs talks with Joe, his brother (Evan), and their father. Evan stays to help Joe, but their father goes back home in Ohio; Joe g... Read all

episodes.name: Gone
episodes.description: A kidnapper shoots to death a Navy captain who intervenes; the bad guys get one teenage girl but not the other; both girls are Navy juniors; Gibbs and company investigate, pursue, solve, capture, and recover. Tony joins Ziva and her date.

episodes.name: Devil's Trifecta
episodes.description: A Navy seaman fires on Fornell, who returns fire and kills him; Gibbs and company investigate, along with Fornell and the mutual ex-wife of Gibbs and Fornell. The gang find frozen fish, a dead body, a missing accountant, and two bad guys.

episodes.name: You Better Watch Out
episodes.description: A Navy Lieutenant Commander returns from an overseas tour to her home and finds the decomposing body of her husband. When Gibbs and his team investigate, they find a new kind of uncirculated $100 bills.

episodes.name: Shabbat Shalom
episodes.description: A human ear in the Potomac River leads to the rest of the body, wearing a uniform of a Navy petty officer; Gibbs and company investigate. Ziva's father shows up, as does his Iranian counterpart. Gunfire interrupts a dinner. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Shiva
episodes.description: Gibbs and company continue to investigate the killings at Vance's home, seeking whoever hired the shooter; the gang identify the hit man and later figure out who's responsible. Ziva buries her father, and Vance and the team bury Jackie.

episodes.name: Hit and Run
episodes.description: Two passersby find the bodies of a Marine and a young woman in a wrecked car; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky raises questions. Flashbacks trouble Abby. The gang find anger, hostility, a feud, a history, a solution, and the bad guy.

episodes.name: Canary
episodes.description: Gibbs and company capture the world's number-2 cyberterrorist; as Ducky suggests, the gang use an unconventional technique to gain evidence from the stubborn bad guy; Tony and Ziva find the body of an Ebola victim; the team come out ahead.

episodes.name: Hereafter
episodes.description: A lance corporal collapses and dies on an obstacle course at the MCB, Quantico, Virginia; Gibbs and company investigate; Ducky sees many wounds. Another injured Marine dies. The team figure it out. Vance finds and solves personal business.

episodes.name: Detour
episodes.description: An injured Navy lieutenant commits suicide; Gibbs and company investigate; three people kidnap Ducky, Palmer, and the body, and the abductors demand an improvised autopsy. The gang find the missing body, teammates, answers, and bad actors.

episodes.name: Prime Suspect
episodes.description: Gibbs's barber confides in him about the former's son; Gibbs quietly asks around. Meanwhile the gang investigate the disappearance of $120K of Navy money; they suspect a Marine and his girlfriend. Gibbs and company work out both cases.

episodes.name: Seek
episodes.description: In Afghanistan a Marine sergeant, a dog handler, dies of a single round, said to have come from a Taliban sniper; his widow tells Gibbs about her doubt and the reason; Gibbs and company investigate and solve, then Gibbs arrests the shooter.

episodes.name: Squall
episodes.description: Aboard a destroyer of the US Navy during a storm at sea, the ship's medical officer dies, apparently by homicide; Gibbs and company investigate; McGee's father, an admiral, is aboard. The gang follow the tracks and catch the killer.

episodes.name: Chasing Ghosts
episodes.description: A Navy lieutenant returns home from TAD; her husband is missing, and the family room is a mess; Gibbs and company investigate; a suspect dies. The team assemble the pieces, and they bust two bad actors. Gibbs sends Ziva and Tony to Rome.

episodes.name: Berlin
episodes.description: Orli, the new director of the Mossad, asks for NCIS assistance in hunting down a group of rogue operatives. Tony and Ziva travel to Berlin in their search for Ilan Bodnar.

episodes.name: Revenge
episodes.description: Tony and Ziva, with only minor injuries, return to work; the others find the getaway car and the body of the wheelman, which provides a clue; Ilan contacts Ziva; Tony interprets the lead, then Ziva pursues it and draws the case to an end.

episodes.name: Double Blind
episodes.description: A Navy petty officer chases and attacks a man; he asks to speak with someone at NCIS; the gang solve. An official from the DoD starts snooping around, apparently on a witch hunt; he and a goon squad of grim feds confront Gibbs. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Damned If You Do
episodes.description: A familiar face defends Gibbs in Parson's investigation. While the team tries to help Gibbs, they must solve the murder of a Navy SEAL.

episodes.name: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
episodes.description: Parsons gripes about his project; then a bomb explodes, killing the SecNav; Gibbs volunteers for a spec op, which takes him to Iran, where he runs into Parsons, and where they investigate. Tony tries to pursue Ziva in Israel. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Past, Present, and Future
episodes.description: Tony searches for Ziva in Israel and elsewhere; he finally finds her, but he returns without her. Gibbs, Fornell, and others work hard on the case of the bomber. McGee makes a huge discovery, which allows Gibbs to solve and to take a shot.

episodes.name: Under the Radar
episodes.description: A bomb explodes in a Navy Lieutenant's apartment, killing his unfortunate building manager. The team must find the missing Lieutenant and identify the bomber minus McGee, who has lost his credentials.

episodes.name: Anonymous Was a Woman
episodes.description: Gibbs and company investigate the death of a woman with an ID card of a sergeant in the US Marine Corps; McGee finds that the real sergeant died in Afghanistan three years ago. Gibbs and McGee go to Kabul, sort things out, and do some good.

episodes.name: Once a Crook
episodes.description: A Navy petty officer dies of a gunshot in a park in Baltimore, Maryland; Gibbs and company investigate; at the scene Tony sees a clue and a man. Abby finds links, then the gang put the pieces together and nail the shooter. Tony nods off.

episodes.name: Oil and Water
episodes.description: An explosion and a fire damage an offshore drilling platform near the Virginia Capes, killing one (a major in the US Marine Corps Reserve) and injuring many others; Gibbs and company, along with Abby of the CGIS, investigate. The CEO and the chief legal counsel of the oil company... Read all

episodes.name: Better Angels
episodes.description: A Marine sergeant dies of gunfire during an alleged armed robbery; Gibbs and company investigate. Gibbs responds to a call for help for his dad; Tony and McGee take over; Abby provides an important fact.

episodes.name: Alibi
episodes.description: At night at Quantico a hit-and-run driver kills a woman Navy petty officer; while investigating, Gibbs and company find a suspect, who has a solid but complicated alibi; the gang, a lawyer, and a local cop figure out the whole thing.

episodes.name: Gut Check
episodes.description: A security system detects a bug on the person of the SecNav; Tony contacts the NSA, where he finds a two-year-old paper describing such a breach; one man dies; the author helps the gang to nail the bad guys; Gibbs wants to keep her around.

episodes.name: Devil's Triad
episodes.description: A clown kills a Marine corporal; while investigating, Gibbs and company find Fornell, Diane, and her boyfriend, who says that he's someone else, and that he knows the clown. All the pieces come together, and the team bust the main bad guy.

episodes.name: Homesick
episodes.description: Within 30 miles of Washington, DC, eight kids in Navy and Marine Corps families have suddenly become badly ill, requiring treatment in ERs and ICUs; Gibbs and company investigate; Carol, of the Naval Medical-research Center, joins the effort; immediately the number of sick kids g... Read all

episodes.name: Kill Chain
episodes.description: A Navy petty officer dies of gunfire in a park in Washington, DC; Gibbs and company investigate; Hollis helps. The gang find an accessory for hire to a terrorist. An explosion kills six and injures 22, including Delilah. [Continued.]

episodes.name: Double Back
episodes.description: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence from the drone attack. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident.

episodes.name: Monsters and Men
episodes.description: Ellie's gut says that Parsa is in his home district in NW Pakistan; there a SEAL team captures him alive. Gibbs, McGee, and Ellie fly to an aircraft carrier, where Gibbs and Ellie question him. Ellie gets into a bind, but Gibbs saves her.

episodes.name: Bulletproof
episodes.description: An overturned van in Washington, DC, contains body armor, which Abby shows to be faulty and fatal; Gibbs and company find the body of the driver, then the source of the bad gear and the path to the troops in the Middle East. Justice wins.

episodes.name: Dressed to Kill
episodes.description: When Tony seeks to question a man who appears to impersonate a Naval officer, the man draws a pistol; Tony kills him. The dead man proves to be a private investigator who had become involved in international intrigue. The gang sort it out.

episodes.name: Rock and a Hard Place
episodes.description: Backstage before a charity-benefit concert in Washington, DC, an explosion kills a Navy petty officer first-class; Gibbs and company investigate; Abby fingers the bad guy, McGee finds out about him, and Gibbs and Ellie catch him at work.

episodes.name: Crescent City (Part I)
episodes.description: In New Orleans, Louisiana, two local special agents of the NCIS, Pride and LaSalle, start to investigate the death of Dan McLane, who was not only a member of the US House of Representatives but also both a retired Naval Reserve commander and a retired agent of the NIS (before th... Read all

episodes.name: Crescent City (Part II)
episodes.description: While investigating the death of a US congressman, the Gibbs team and the gang in Nola continue to seek both a killer and a connection to an old case. Another man dies. Ducky suggests a theory, and the bunch put all the pieces together.

episodes.name: Page Not Found
episodes.description: Delilah finds a clue, which may help to solve the alleged death of a US Navy lieutenant, Kit, two weeks ago in Budapest, Hungary; then her boss orders her that she has never seen it; however, she surreptitiously speaks with Tony, McGee, and Gibbs, who sends Tony and McGee to chec... Read all

episodes.name: Alleged
episodes.description: A distracted texting driver runs over the dead body of a Naval officer; Gibbs and company investigate; they find a connection to a previously unreported rape of a drugged victim. The team figure out everything, and they catch the bad guy.

episodes.name: Shooter
episodes.description: During a court-martial of an Army first lieutenant, a Marine photojournalist disappears before he can testify; while Gibbs and company lend a hand, they find the body of the Marine, solve his murder and another one, and arrest two bad guys.

episodes.name: The Admiral's Daughter
episodes.description: Tony goes to France to escort an admiral's daughter, Amanda, back to DC; meanwhile Gibbs and company investigate a death. Tony and Amanda run into trouble, work it out, find solutions for all seven executions, and report to the admiral.

episodes.name: Honor Thy Father
episodes.description: The team must investigate a prison escape without Gibbs as he heads to Stillwater after his father's death.

episodes.name: Twenty Klicks
episodes.description: Gibbs and McGee are shot down in a Naval helicopter over remote parts of Russia while on a mission to escort an NCIS computer geek safely home. Meanwhile, the gang at home anxiously work to help bring them all home safely.

episodes.name: Kill the Messenger
episodes.description: A Navy Commander is murdered near the White House, it is learned that he was on his way to talk to the President. Gibbs and his team must determine if it is because of his relationship with the President or because of his marital problems.

episodes.name: So It Goes
episodes.description: Flashbacks into his past help tell the tale for Dr. Mallard as he and Bishop travel to England in search of answers to find out why an Englishman murdered in the United States would have a list of deceased Navy men on his person.

episodes.name: Choke Hold
episodes.description: After a scientist is decapitated by a strangulation device in a park, Gibbs and his team search for the woman who was her former research partner in Russia in order to learn who is behind her murder. They learn it may be a familiar foe.

episodes.name: The San Dominick
episodes.description: While the NCIS team is on a training exercise with CGIS Special Agent Abigail Borin, Gibbs spots a man overboard. It leads him to board another ship called The San Dominick, and he soon discovers that it has been taken over by pirates.

episodes.name: Parental Guidance Suggested
episodes.description: The wife of a Navy Seal is murdered, and the NCIS team discovers she has a background in criminal forensics and recently visited a serial killer in prison seeking his help with another sociopath. Gibbs and company must figure out who it is.

episodes.name: The Searchers
episodes.description: While investigating the death of a retired Marine Master Sergeant, Gibbs and the NCIS team discover there is a possibility that his death may be connected to another Marine who was MIA from the Vietnam War.

episodes.name: Semper Fortis
episodes.description: A former Navy hospital corpsman gives aid to the victims of a wreck; local officials arrest her for practicing medicine without a license; Gibbs and company find the other driver, his killer, and a lawyer who makes a deal for the corpsman.

episodes.name: Grounded
episodes.description: On the eve of Thanksgiving, DiNozzo and Bishop experience a weather delay at the D.C airport when Gibbs informs them of an elevated terror threat specific to area airports. An impostor posing as an air marshal leads them to the real threat.

episodes.name: House Rules
episodes.description: Tis the season to be hacking. In a Christmas letter to his father, McGee describes in detail a case in which he, Gibbs and the rest of the NCIS team investigate the hackers who are responsible for the Internet going down in the D.C. area.

episodes.name: Check
episodes.description: The NCIS team investigate a series of crime scenes that appear to be copycats of previous cases. Meanwhile, two of Gibbs' ex-wives show up at a crime scene to discuss something important with him.

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.description: Gibbs and the rest of the NCIS team, along with FBI agent Fornell are on the hunt for an American born terrorist who was detected in Syria but is now back in the D.C area.

episodes.name: We Build, We Fight
episodes.description: When an openly-gay Navy Lieutenant who was about to be awarded the Medal of Honor is murdered, Gibbs and the team investigate. Meanwhile, Breena goes into labor.

episodes.name: Cadence
episodes.description: DiNozzo returns to the military academy he attended as a teenager after a murdered Marine and alumni of the school is found clutching the photo of a current student. Also, Bishop and her husband invite Gibbs and the team out for a special dinner.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.description: Gibbs and the NCIS team continue to track down the Russian terrorist Sergei after two young Marines are killed in a bombing. Agent Fornell struggles to cope with the recent shooting death of his ex-wife at the hands of Sergei.

episodes.name: Blast from the Past
episodes.description: A covert identity created for one of Gibbs' undercover cases 20 years ago resurfaces after a murder victim is found living under the alias.

episodes.name: The Artful Dodger
episodes.description: After a Vice Admirals aide is murdered, Gibbs and the NCIS team theorize that it was because of a valuable painting in her office. DiNozzo's father is more than happy to help with the investigation by sharing his knowledge of the artwork.

episodes.name: Status Update
episodes.description: After the body of a thief is found in a Marine's house, NCIS discovers the calling card of a terror group Delilah and the Department of Defense have been tracking. Margo Harshman guest stars.

episodes.name: Patience
episodes.description: A petty officer's murder provides clues to a 40 year unsolved airport bombing which Gibbs and DiNozzo have been reexamining recently.

episodes.name: No Good Deed
episodes.description: DiNozzo is partnered with his girlfriend, ATF Special Agent Zoë Keates, after evidence reveals that the murder weapon in an NCIS case was originally purchased for the controversial ATF sting, "Operation Fast and Furious." Also, Anthony DiNozzo Sr. returns to town for a special di... Read all

episodes.name: Lost in Translation
episodes.description: Gibbs and Bishop travel to Afghanistan when a murder investigation is linked to a terror group holding a Marine hostage. Meanwhile, Tony is annoyed when McGee steals his gig as the face of the NCIS recruitment brochures.

episodes.name: Troll
episodes.description: Special Agent Ned Dorneget from NCIS cyber operations assists the team when a Navy ensign who worked in the Office of Naval Intelligence is murdered. Also, the team discovers that Jake and Gibbs have become good friends.

episodes.name: The Lost Boys
episodes.description: The NCIS cyber case turns into a united global effort after evidence confirms "The Calling," an international terrorist group that recruits children through the Internet, has been purchasing German S-mines off the black market.

episodes.name: Neverland
episodes.description: NCIS feverishly investigates a global terrorist group that is recruiting teens via the Internet, following a deadly bombing overseas that results in an emotional and surprising loss for the team.

episodes.name: Stop the Bleeding
episodes.description: Gibbs fights for his life after being shot by Luke Harris. Meanwhile, Agent Tony DiNozzo and CIA officer Joanna Teague travel to Egypt to take down The Calling.

episodes.name: Personal Day
episodes.description: Gibbs asks the team to work on a case with a DEA Agent to bring down a drug dealer who is connected to Gibbs and the agent.

episodes.name: Incognito
episodes.description: Hours after calling Gibbs about a possible case, a Marine is found dead in Quantico; McGee and Bishop pose as a married couple.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.description: Vance partners with Gibbs and returns to field duty when a murder case is connected to a former NCIS agent he put in jail for stealing evidence.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.description: During an investigation, Abby is trapped in a pharmaceutical lab when armed men enter the building and take hostages.

episodes.name: Viral
episodes.description: When a petty officer is murdered, the crime matches a local serial killer's method of operation; Delilah and McGee prepare to move in together.

episodes.name: 16 Years
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the death of a retired Navy officer whose son was convicted of a murder 16 years earlier. A flawed forensic test from that time can prove whether the son is the real murderer or if he is innocent of the crime.

episodes.name: Saviors
episodes.description: DiNozzo is reunited with his ex-girlfriend, Jeanne Benoit, when insurgents in South Sudan attack a group of volunteer doctors, including her husband. DiNozzo and McGee travel to the crime scene for the joint murder and kidnapping case and join the search for the missing doctors. ... Read all

episodes.name: Day in Court
episodes.description: A Petty Officer, accused of killing an ex-girlfriend, is set free on mistrial. Professing to be innocent he asks NCIS to investigate and if necessary court martial him. Bishop and her husband have marital problems.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.description: The Secretary of Defense turns to NCIS to help a sailor dying from leukemia locate a bone marrow transplant after two of his siblings are killed in the line of duty. Meanwhile, Bishop returns home to Oklahoma for Thanksgiving after learning of Jake's cheating.

episodes.name: Spinning Wheel
episodes.description: After Ducky is attacked by a man claiming to have information about his half-brother who died decades ago, the NCIS team searches for the perpetrator, as Ducky recalls the final emotional days he had with his sibling. Also, with the holidays approaching, Bishop and Jake (Jamie Ba... Read all

episodes.name: Sister City (Part I)
episodes.description: Gibbs and his team work with Pride and the New Orleans team to find Abby's brother and figure out why the passengers and crew of a private plane he catered were poisoned.

episodes.name: Déjà Vu
episodes.description: The investigation of a seaman's murder uncovers the resurface of a human-trafficking ring, while McGee hopes to spend the night with a colleague during a power outage.

episodes.name: Decompressed
episodes.description: The team investigates the murder of a deep-sea diver outside a high-tech decompression chamber where the body and suspects have to stay for four days.

episodes.name: React
episodes.description: The team partners with the FBI to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Sarah Porter.

episodes.name: Loose Cannons
episodes.description: Dr. Cyril Taft feels the rush of an NCIS case when he's assigned to operate on Gibbs' suspect and discovers key evidence.

episodes.name: After Hours
episodes.description: The team member's plans are interrupted when they discover discrepancies in what appeared to be an open and shut case.

episodes.name: Scope
episodes.description: Gibbs tries to connect with a wounded Special Ops sniper when an American couple is attacked in the same area in Iraq where the sniper's team was ambushed.

episodes.name: Reasonable Doubts
episodes.description: The wife and mistress of a Navy Public Affairs officer accuse each other of murdering him, so the team must figure out who's lying.

episodes.name: Charade
episodes.description: Tony is shocked by a confrontation with a Senator at a fundraiser.

episodes.name: Return to Sender
episodes.description: When an undertaker finds that one of their shipment of coffins already has an occupant, the FBI is called. The FBI calls in NCIS when they find a link to an old case.

episodes.name: Homefront
episodes.description: Gibbs and the team investigate a military home invasion thwarted by a 14-year-old, while Vance and Fornell head to London to continue pursuing the escaped British spy.

episodes.name: Dead Letter
episodes.description: The team continues the international manhunt for an escaped British spy while a colleague fights for their life in the ICU.

episodes.name: Family First
episodes.description: The NCIS, FBI and MI6 teams continue the international manhunt for an escaped British spy who's targeting current and former agents. Anthony DiNozzo bids farewell to NCIS.

episodes.name: Rogue
episodes.description: The team investigates a car explosion with a connection to an agent who went missing six months earlier; Gibbs asks NCIS Special Agent Alex Quinn to shadow his team.

episodes.name: Being Bad
episodes.description: Torres and Quinn adjust to life on Gibbs' team while investigating a death at a High School reunion.

episodes.name: Privileged Information
episodes.description: A marine sergeant falls from a building, it appears she attempted suicide, but her psychiatrist, Dr Grace Confalone, urges Gibbs to investigate her attempted murder.

episodes.name: Love Boat
episodes.description: Gibbs, Quinn and Palmer head out to sea when the body of a navy lieutenant is found on a destroyer during a tiger cruise.

episodes.name: Philly
episodes.description: Gibbs sends Bishop and Quinn to Philadelphia to work with MI-6 Officer Clayton Reeves on the murder case of a British operative. Meanwhile, Quinn deals with the NCIS case that caused her to leave the field.

episodes.name: Shell Game
episodes.description: When a petty officer escapes from her kidnapper, the team finds a connection to her missing husband.

episodes.name: Home of the Brave
episodes.description: Torres breaks protocol when he identifies a suspect that is wanted by ICE; Abby, McGee, and Bishop try to woo Anthony DiNozzo, Sr. Into subletting his son's apartment.

episodes.name: Enemy Combatant
episodes.description: Bishop questions her previous work at the NSA when she's sent to Gitmo to collect evidence for a Navy chaplain murder case. In the meantime, her brothers visit for Thanksgiving and want to know from her co-workers who she's dating.

episodes.name: Pay to Play
episodes.description: The team investigates threats against Congresswoman Jenna Flemming, while Vance oversees temporary protection detail.

episodes.name: The Tie That Binds
episodes.description: Ducky looks back on a choice he made 37 years ago when evidence in the murder of a Navy captain is linked to his dead mother.

episodes.name: Willoughby
episodes.description: The team searches for new leads when an undercover mission to apprehend a businessman who's committing acts of terrorism to manipulate the stock market is compromised.

episodes.name: Off the Grid
episodes.description: When Gibbs spots the brother of a Most Wanted suspect, he assumes an old alias and goes undercover with their anti-government militia.

episodes.name: Keep Going
episodes.description: During a hit-and-run investigation, Palmer tries to prevent a stranger from jumping off the ledge of a building.

episodes.name: Nonstop
episodes.description: The team partner with "The Sherlocks" - one of whom is Anthony DiNozzo, Sr. - to investigate the murder of a petty officer outside D.C.

episodes.name: Pandora's Box, Part I
episodes.description: When Abby's homeland security think tank is compromised, the team realizes that a theoretical terror playbook has been stolen.

episodes.name: A Many Splendored Thing
episodes.description: Bishop is more determined to avenge her boyfriend's murder when the team finds a new lead in the Chen case. In the meantime, Torres teaches his fellow agents the art of pick-pocketing.

episodes.name: What Lies Above
episodes.description: McGee's apartment is torn apart by a robber looking for a valuable item hidden by the previous tenant, a convicted criminal.

episodes.name: M.I.A.
episodes.description: To honor a sailor's dying wish, the team reopens a murder case that was originally ruled an accidental death.

episodes.name: The Wall
episodes.description: The team must rely on an irritable Vietnam War veteran to solve a Marine's murder.

episodes.name: A Bowl of Cherries
episodes.description: McGee and the team race to find the hacker responsible for infecting a vice admiral's laptop with ransomware.

episodes.name: One Book, Two Covers
episodes.description: The murder of a Marine is linked to an old dirt bike gang Torres joined while undercover.

episodes.name: Beastmaster
episodes.description: The team partners with the Mounted Police to solve a series of murders in a National Park.

episodes.name: Something Blue
episodes.description: The stress of McGee and Delilah's upcoming wedding lands Delilah in the hospital; the NCIS team investigates the mysterious death of a healthy, young petty officer aboard a Navy destroyer.

episodes.name: Rendezvous
episodes.description: Gibbs, McGee and Torres travel to a remote area of Paraguay, controlled by a violent group of rebels, in an attempt to locate a missing Navy Seal who disappeared during an unsanctioned trip.

episodes.name: House Divided
episodes.description: The team continues their search for Gibbs and McGee two months after they went missing fighting rebels in Paraguay; Vance and Torres are summoned to a congressional hearing regarding the fallout from the Paraguay mission.

episodes.name: Twofer
episodes.description: NCIS investigate the body of a murdered Navy lieutenant, who disappeared over a year ago; Gibbs and McGee must pass a psych evaluation to officially resume working.

episodes.name: Exit Strategy
episodes.description: When an undercover cop suddenly reappears after faking their death 10 years earlier, chaos ensues.

episodes.name: Skeleton Crew
episodes.description: The NCIS team, including recently transferred Special Agent Jacqueline Sloane, investigating the kidnapping of a sailor during a storm that shuts down Washington DC.

episodes.name: Fake It 'Til You Make It
episodes.description: After Reeves sees his friend get kidnapped, the NCIS team discovers the primary suspect disappeared two days ago with confidential military information. Also, a photo from McGee's teenage years becomes a popular meme.

episodes.name: Trapped
episodes.description: After a petty officer is found murdered, McGee spends hours on the victim's ham radio trying to locate a key witness. Also, Palmer asks co-workers to donate to a charity that builds playgrounds for kids of all abilities.

episodes.name: Burden of Proof
episodes.description: Gibbs begins his own investigation when a convicted felon swears he was framed; FBI agent Fornell joins the team.

episodes.name: Voices
episodes.description: An NCIS person of interest in a bribery and fraud case is found murdered after a runner is led to his body by a strange voice. Also, McGee and Delilah disagree on whether to find out the baby's sex.

episodes.name: Ready or Not
episodes.description: Turkey day plans are on hold while tracking international arms dealer Andre Yorka, who recently murdered an MI5 officer who was Sloane's close friend. Also, Abby races Delilah to the hospital when labor for the twins starts 3 weeks early.

episodes.name: Double Down
episodes.description: Torres and Sloane run protection detail for a U.S. senator in Afghanistan during the holidays and must return to the States when they learn the senator's son is in the ICU.

episodes.name: High Tide
episodes.description: Torres and Bishop go undercover as a criminal couple for hire during a sting operation.

episodes.name: Dark Secrets
episodes.description: A Navy Lieutenant JAG lawyer that appeared to have a happy life is found dead by her parents in an apparent suicide. Capt. Bud Roberts helps in the investigation.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.description: After McGee and Torres visit the home of a high schooler who witnessed a hit and run, her parents flee with their daughter, leaving NCIS in the lurch.

episodes.name: Keep Your Friends Close
episodes.description: When the body of a missing Navy commander is found, Gibbs and his team are ordered to work with former FBI agent Tobias Fornell, the private investigator who was hired to find him.

episodes.name: Keep Your Enemies Closer
episodes.description: NCIS makes a deal with Paul Triff to give him a 48-hour furlough at his former residence, now McGee's home, in exchange for information to convict Gabriel Hicks.

episodes.name: Handle with Care
episodes.description: The team works to clear the name of a retired Marine sergeant when cyanide is found in one of the packages he sends to active-duty Marines.

episodes.name: One Man's Trash
episodes.description: Gibbs and Ducky see an antique war stick on television that could be the missing murder weapon to a 16-year-old cold case.

episodes.name: Death From Above
episodes.description: The headquarters are evacuated when the team finds a body and bomb materials on the roof of the squad room.

episodes.name: The Numerical Limit
episodes.description: Gibbs is granted protective custody of a 10-year-old orphaned refugee when a case reveals she is the target of a violent gang.

episodes.name: Sight Unseen
episodes.description: NCIS searches for a petty officer suspected of assault who escapes when the sheriff transporting him crashes into a lake. Also, Torres works closely with Annie Barth, a key blind witness who heard vital evidence needed to solve the case.

episodes.name: One Step Forward
episodes.description: A daughter begs Gibbs to investigate her mother's murder because she believes the police convicted the wrong man. Abby receives a hard to get reservation at a new restaurant that is cold like an igloo.

episodes.name: Two Steps Back
episodes.description: When evidence reveals an NCIS team member is a hitman's latest target, the team must search through old case files to determine who is seeking vengeance.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.description: While Gibbs attends the memorial service for a friend who was lost at sea, he discovers that the deceased has been hiding in a fallout shelter after his boat was attacked and he swam to shore.

episodes.name: Date with Destiny
episodes.description: Sloane is certain she saw the man who tortured her in Afghanistan, leading Vance and Gibbs to fear she'll risk everything to destroy him.

episodes.name: Destiny's Child
episodes.description: Vance is still missing, and Gibbs is assigned as acting director while the team searches his whereabouts.

episodes.name: Love Thy Neighbor
episodes.description: A Navy lieutenant's peculiar neighbors are the key suspects in his murder; Torres has a crazy night out with Palmer.

episodes.name: Boom
episodes.description: The team investigates an explosion outside the home of a Navy petty officer and a popular reality TV star.

episodes.name: Third Wheel
episodes.description: While Gibbs is on a quiet vacation in the woods, he is interrupted by his friends, Fornell and Brooks, and a case near his cabin.

episodes.name: Fragments
episodes.description: The team works to exonerate a Marine serving a life sentence for murder after the discovery of a 50-year-old tape recording of the victim.

episodes.name: Beneath the Surface
episodes.description: At a Halloween crime scene, Torres recognizes the NCIS victim as a former friend from federal law enforcement training, and Jimmy thinks his lab may be haunted!

episodes.name: A Thousand Words
episodes.description: The theft of a street artist's mural leads the team to investigate a conspiracy regarding a Navy contractor and the safety of ocean mammals.

episodes.name: Friendly Fire
episodes.description: McGee and Bishop travel to Afghanistan after a murder case in the states is linked to a string of soldiers killed by friendly fire overseas.

episodes.name: Tailing Angie
episodes.description: After the lead suspect of an unsolved high-profile burglary case is released from prison, the team resumes their investigation with an undercover stakeout.

episodes.name: What Child is This?
episodes.description: The team's holiday plans are put on hold after the murder investigation of a Navy veteran includes the discovery of a newborn baby with no identification.

episodes.name: Toil and Trouble
episodes.description: The Secretary of Defense shuts down Gibbs' murder investigation and demands that McGee and Torres be arrested for their actions in the case.

episodes.name: The Last Link
episodes.description: An old family friend beseeches Gibbs to join him on a road trip to search for a missing military I.D. bracelet.

episodes.name: She
episodes.description: After a malnourished and confused 9-year-old is found hiding in a storage unit, the team reopens an old missing persons case that Special Agent Ziva David had a personal interest in.

episodes.name: Once Upon A Tim
episodes.description: McGee reluctantly visits his former high school after the unique computer password he used as a teenager is linked to the murder of a department of defense contractor.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.description: The team investigate a fatal man overboard case at sea; Torres is assigned to mentor three high school students.

episodes.name: Bears and Cubs
episodes.description: Jimmy is torn between family and work after his father-in-law asks him to tamper with evidence from the team's current murder investigation.

episodes.name: Silent Service
episodes.description: Vance is notified by the Pentagon that the nuclear submarine Gibbs and Bishop are aboard to conduct a murder investigation has gone radio silent.

episodes.name: Mona Lisa
episodes.description: After Torres wakes up on a dilapidated fishing boat covered in blood, the team helps him piece together the last 12 hours.

episodes.name: Perennial
episodes.description: The team searches for an active shooter following a lockdown at a naval hospital.

episodes.name: Hail & Farewell
episodes.description: The team investigates the murder of a Marine Major believed to have been killed in the 9/11 attack on the Pentagon after human remains are discovered at a construction site.

episodes.name: Judge, Jury...
episodes.description: Kasie solves a 30-year-old murder case, but a loophole in the legal system may set the suspect free; McGee visits an elite technology company that is offering him a highly paid position.

episodes.name: ...and Executioner
episodes.description: After the team finds a secret government bank account that's funding a nationwide network of vigilante justice, they must determine who is acting as judge and jury.

episodes.name: Lost Time
episodes.description: The team investigates the murder of Marine Gunnery Sergeant Richard Wilson who was hailed as a war hero for his efforts overseas; Gibbs turns to Dr. Confalone for advice after uncharacteristically abandoning the team at a crime scene.

episodes.name: Daughters
episodes.description: Fornell pleads with Gibbs to do whatever is necessary to take down drug dealers in the area after his daughter is hospitalized from a drug overdose; Gibbs is haunted by aspects of the case.

episodes.name: Out of the Darkness
episodes.description: Ziva surprises Gibbs with a cryptic warning, prompting him to question why she remained underground for years while being presumed dead, and what led to her return.

episodes.name: Into the Light
episodes.description: With their lives in danger, Gibbs and Ziva's rogue investigation takes an unexpected turn when a possible terrorist plot is revealed.

episodes.name: Going Mobile
episodes.description: After a body is found hidden under an 18-wheeler delivering to the Navy yard, the team tracks the vehicle's previous locations to pinpoint the crime scene and suspect; Sloane encourages the team to talk about Ziva's recent reappearance.

episodes.name: Someone Else's Shoes
episodes.description: The team links a bizarre crime scene at Arlington National Cemetery to a string of attacks on homeless veterans; Vance orders McGee, Bishop and Torres to complete hours of evidence garage cleanup duty for withholding information.

episodes.name: Wide Awake
episodes.description: The team investigates a Marine Corporal after she finds a gun in her house. The gun is linked to a murder, but the Marine had no connection with the victim and was fast asleep when the crime was committed.

episodes.name: Institutionalized
episodes.description: When a Petty Officer's son is found murdered at his welcome home from prison party, evidence suggests that Kasie's lifelong best friend, Dante Brown, is the suspect.

episodes.name: No Vacancy
episodes.description: While investigating a Marine's murder, the NCIS team uncovers a network of live-streaming hidden spy cameras in the rooms of a Virginia motel.

episodes.name: Musical Chairs
episodes.description: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a musician in the Navy's most elite band, which performs at diplomatic events around the world. Gibbs gives McGee the lead when he unexpectedly takes some leave time.

episodes.name: IRL
episodes.description: The team investigates a petty officer's murder that was live-streamed on a popular gaming app. Also, Gibbs is asked to look after his 9-year-old neighbor, Phineas, when his mom must leave on a last-minute trip.

episodes.name: The North Pole
episodes.description: Gibbs and the team help Ziva with the "one thing" she said she'd take care of before returning to her family.

episodes.name: In the Wind
episodes.description: Gibbs must face the consequences of helping Ziva with "the one thing" she said she'd take care of before returning to her family.

episodes.name: Flight Plan
episodes.description: The NCIS team investigates an F-18 crash and subsequent disappearance of the pilot; McGee reluctantly discusses a very personal decision with his teammates

episodes.name: Sound Off
episodes.description: After a body is found at an unmanned aerial vehicle testing site, the NCIS team must determine if the death was murder or an accident. Also, Palmer carefully interviews medical examiner assistant candidates.

episodes.name: On Fire
episodes.description: After Torres and Bishop are victims of a hit-and-run, Torres fights for his life in the ICU.

episodes.name: Lonely Hearts
episodes.description: The lead suspect in an NCIS murder investigation is a woman Gibbs' friend, Phillip Brooks (Don Lake), met on a dating site. Also, Sloane has a secret admirer on Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: Ephemera
episodes.description: While investigating the suicide of a retired Navy officer who left a rare, valuable - and possibly stolen - coin to the National Museum of the Navy, the team imagines themselves in his life story in order to piece together how the coin ended up in his possession.

episodes.name: In a Nutshell
episodes.description: The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy Petty Officer murdered the same way as his parents a decade ago. They stumble across a storage container filled with dollhouses that display recreations of murder scenes. Also, the team agrees to clean out their living spaces, but so... Read all

episodes.name: Schooled
