episodes.description: The team searches for answers when the body of a well-regarded Navy technician in the Reserves is found floating in a lake where a popular community event is being held. Also, Sloane is caught off-guard when her daughter, Faith (Kate Hamilton), makes an unexpected request.

episodes.name: Blarney
episodes.description: Three gun thugs fleeing a failed robbery enter the diner where Palmer and Kasie are eating. A hostage situation ensues.

episodes.name: The Arizona
episodes.description: While investigating an off-base burglary at an Admiral's residence, NCIS becomes involved in a case of an older man that claims to be a Pearl Harbor survivor. He wishes to have his remains buried on the USS Arizona.

episodes.name: Sturgeon Season
episodes.description: Gibbs and Fornell attempt to track down the leader of a drug ring who supplied drugs to Fornell's daughter; the team deals with the case of a missing cadaver from the NCIS autopsy room.

episodes.name: Everything Starts Somewhere
episodes.description: The discovery of a murder victim in the NCIS garage brings back memories of Gibbs and Ducky's first meeting.

episodes.name: Blood and Treasure
episodes.description: The discovery of an eviscerated body leads the team into the world of treasure hunting. Meanwhile, Fornell thinks he has a lead in his search for the head of the drug dealing operation.

episodes.name: Sunburn
episodes.description: McGee and his wife Delilah's Bahamian vacation turns into a high-stakes mission when a case NCIS is tracking of a dead escape room manager has ties to the island. Also, Gibbs fears the worst when his search for Fornell leads to blood.

episodes.name: Head of the Snake
episodes.description: Gibbs and Fornell's crusade to find the head of the drug ring responsible for Fornell's daughter Emily's overdose comes to a climax. Also, Gibbs and Vance finally let the team in on a case that has dangerous implications.

episodes.name: 1mm
episodes.description: Following a tip about smuggled weapons, Bishop and Torres have a shoot out and find themselves locked in cells in the suspects house.

episodes.name: The First Day
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the murder of a Navy officer who was killed while driving home a recently released inmate. Also, Gibbs helps Palmer deal with personal trauma.

episodes.name: True Believer
episodes.description: When Sloane's name is discovered in Afghanistan at the site of an abandoned bus with a dead driver, Gibbs accompanies her on a trip to find a group of girls who were kidnapped from the bus. Also, McGee, Bishop and Torres track down a hacker who emailed compromising information to... Read all

episodes.name: Winter Chill
episodes.description: NCIS dives into the competitive world of food trucks after finding a man frozen to death in the back of one.

episodes.name: Watchdog
episodes.description: NCIS is called in when missile falls off the back of a transport vehicle, which leads them to an injured dog, who they discover has been shot. One of the team takes unexpected action when a confronting a suspect.

episodes.name: Gut Punch
episodes.description: Vance assigns McGee, Torres and Bishop to COVID compliance duty at a function at the Secretary of Defence's mansion, where they discover a link to another NCIS team's murder case.

episodes.name: Sangre
episodes.description: Evidence from the stabbing of a Marine Sergeant is a familial DNA match to Torres, bringing up questions about his family history.

episodes.name: Misconduct
episodes.description: The team investigates when a cyclist is killed in a hit and run. Gibbs prepares to testify against a financial advisor who stole millions from his Navy clients.

episodes.name: Unseen Improvements
episodes.description: NCIS tracks a stolen laptop to the uncle of a young boy, Phineas, Gibbs' former neighbor.

episodes.name: Blown Away
episodes.description: When members of an NCIS Regional Enforcement Action Capabilities Training Team (REACT) are killed during an explosion, NCIS Special Agent Jessica Knight, the lone surviving member, joins the team to find out what happened.

episodes.name: Rule 91
episodes.description: While pursuing a dangerous arms dealer, the team is shocked when Bishop shows new impressive abilities. Gibbs and Marcie suspect that the killer they've been tracking may be onto them.

episodes.name: Blood in the Water
episodes.description: The NCIS team searches for Gibbs after the wreckage from his boat is discovered. The investigation reveals his work on the serial killer case with Marcie. Torres looks for answers after Bishop's departure.

episodes.name: Nearly Departed
episodes.description: While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the NCIS team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well.

episodes.name: Road to Nowhere
episodes.description: Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killer's victims. Also, Agent Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders.

episodes.name: Great Wide Open
episodes.description: The path leads to Alaska, where Gibbs and McGee go on a very long road trip. It's still all about getting information on the serial killer, Paul Lemere.

episodes.name: Face the Strange
episodes.description: The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy Commander found in a shallow grave.

episodes.name: False Start
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the death of a beloved Navy commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country.

episodes.name: Docked
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body is discovered in the ship's sauna.

episodes.name: Peacekeeper
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the case of a Navy reservist whose body is found in a target car on a shooting range.

episodes.name: Collective Memory
episodes.description: When a hotshot financial advisor is found shot at a naval station, NCIS investigates the case by interviewing the victim's three-dimensional hologram of herself, which she created before her death.

episodes.name: Pledge of Allegiance
episodes.description: The team track a pilot suspected of stealing classified Navy software, when he flees shortly before officers arrive at his home to arrest him.

episodes.name: All Hands
episodes.description: After a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic picks up a small boat of wounded Navy officers, NCIS arrives on the ship and is forced to hide after discovering terrorists on board.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.description: When the body of a Navy lieutenant is discovered, the team discover the victim was in possession of highly classified secrets, which have gone missing.

episodes.name: The Helpers
episodes.description: Investigating the death of an intruder at Quantico, Jimmy and Kasie are exposed to a deadly bio-toxin. The NCIS team calls on Doctor Carol Wilson for help as they race to find the antidote. Torres tries to distract Jimmy's daughter, who came to spend the day with her dad.

episodes.name: First Steps
episodes.description: As NCIS investigates the cause of death of a reservist Navy Seal surgeon, they're forced to bring Vance's daughter, Kayla, who recently trained with NCIS, to help with a highly dangerous mission.

episodes.name: Thick as Thieves
episodes.description: Parker's delinquent past resurfaces when NCIS is called to Philadelphia to investigate the death of a Navy petty officer.

episodes.name: The Wake
episodes.description: A gruesome mishap at a Navy petty officer's gender-reveal party leads NCIS to the case of a missing teacher that was popularized on a true crime podcast.

episodes.name: Starting Over
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the apparent suicide of a retired Navy officer who was in Palmer and Knight's grief group. Torres gets a call from Tennant to come to Hawaii when she gets a lead on a witness from a case they worked on together.

episodes.name: Last Dance
episodes.description: When an infamous arms dealer, Reymundo Diaz, is released from prison and bodies start piling up, Torres is forced to face the repercussions of his actions during an undercover operation he worked on years ago.

episodes.name: The Brat Pack
episodes.description: NCIS investigates a ring of clever teenage partygoers when a string of break-ins takes place at Marine Base Quantico. While working the case, Special Agent McGee forms a bond with one of the teens, Teagan Fields.

episodes.name: All or Nothing
episodes.description: The NCIS team investigates the unexpected death of a Navy reservist who was working on a Deputy Attorney General's investigation. Also, Knight and Jimmy's budding romance is put on hold when a vital liver transfer goes fatally wrong.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather
episodes.description: The team investigate a kidnapping that has a personal connection for one of them, and stirs up painful memories from the past.

episodes.name: A Family Matter
episodes.description: Alden Parker is still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, now the team is investigating on who might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker's name.

episodes.name: Daddy Issues
episodes.description: McGee's personal life and professional life intersect when a dad from his children's school is linked to a break-in at a government storage bunker.

episodes.name: Unearth
episodes.description: A dead body is found at an ancient burial site where the team tries to determine the motive and the behind the crime. Torres continues therapy with Dr. Grace, And discovers that their lives are in danger .

episodes.name: Leave No Trace
episodes.description: Agent Knight's past resurfaces when her ex-boyfriend, a National Parks Service agent, teams up with NCIS to investigate a campsite murder.

episodes.name: Guardian
episodes.description: Agent Parker steps up to protect Director Vance after a terrifying home invasion. The team detects advancements in Jessica and Jimmy's blossoming romance.

episodes.name: The Good Fighter
episodes.description: While investigating the death of a fellow NCIS agent who was cat-sitting for a friend the team realizes that one of their own has been secretly investigating them to locate a possible mole.

episodes.name: Love Lost
episodes.description: NCIS should investigate the Secretary of the Navy when her husband starts accusing her of trying to murder him.

episodes.name: Turkey Trot
episodes.description: An unknown shooter causes chaos at an annual Thanksgiving 5K, time is of the essence for the NCIS team to find the culprit. Kasie joins Knight for Thanksgiving lunch at Knight's sister's house.

episodes.name: Higher Education
episodes.description: The team investigate the death of a college student who was hit by a truck, after inexplicably stripping in the street before running into the road.

episodes.name: Too Many Cooks
episodes.description: The entire NCISverse who are in Washington D.C. to celebrate the retirement of their former professor. However, their worlds intertwine when the NCIS agents are forced to investigate the same professor's suicide.

episodes.name: Bridges
episodes.description: Parker discovers he's a victim of identity theft while investigating the unusual murder of a Navy ensign. Knight and Jimmy face hurdles in their relationship as their connection heightens.

episodes.name: Big Rig
episodes.description: When an old pal of Torres' comes to him - disheveled and bloodied - for guidance amid a undercover FBI operation and then disappears, NCIS helps track him down. McGee prepares to be a contestant on a popular game show.

episodes.name: Evil Eye
episodes.description: In preparation for a role, a world-renowned actress shadows the NCIS team as they investigate a decapitation case.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.description: Parker grapples with his emotions when a con man from his past turns up as a murder suspect.

episodes.name: Unusual Suspects
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the death of a ride-share driver who was found after a car accident. Parker's dad, who is temporarily living with him, assists the team in their investigation.

episodes.name: Butterfly Effect
episodes.description: The NCIS team starts to investigate on who is responsible for a potential bio terror attack at a strip mall parking garage.

episodes.name: Stranger in a Strange Land
episodes.description: NCIS works to solve the murder of a marine who has been killed for helping Afghan refugees. Jimmy Palmer navigates the pressures of parenting when his teenage daughter is eager to go on a date.

episodes.name: Head Games
episodes.description: The NCIS team digs deep to investigate a Navy lieutenant who's accused of trying to murder her husband, but has no memory of the attack; Kasie navigates a potential medical scare.

episodes.name: In the Spotlight
episodes.description: Agent Knight saves a mother and child from a potentially fatal car accident and she is now viral for this reason.

episodes.name: Second Opinion
episodes.description: NCIS works to solve the murder of a senator's daughter who has a rebellious reputation and large online following: Jimmy gets competitive with an old college rival.

episodes.name: Kompromat
episodes.description: When a suspicious murder occurs in the classified section of the National Archive, NCIS must investigate a string of Russian spy encounters that may be linked to the crime.

episodes.name: Black Sky
episodes.description: Torres finds himself in prison as the team tries to stop an impending terror attack on U.S. soil.

episodes.name: Algún Día
episodes.description: The NCIS team must help Torres when he puts his future at stake by confronting the man who tormented his family when he was a child.

episodes.name: The Stories We Leave Behind
episodes.description: As NCIS mourns the loss of Ducky, the agents find comfort in working on one of his unfinished cases involving a woman whose father was dishonorably discharged from the Marines.

episodes.name: Lifeline
episodes.description: The NCIS team experiences fresh views during "Walk-a-Mile in My Shoes" day, then Kasie receives an urgent mystery message.

episodes.name: Left Unsaid
episodes.description: The NCIS team races against time to find a missing Petty Officer who disappears during his marriage proposal.

episodes.name: The Plan
episodes.description: NCIS Special Agent in Charge Feng Zhao, Knight's father helps the team unravel the mystery of a recently used service weapon belonging to a missing agent. McGee is in a tailspin when DNA results reveal a close relative he was unaware of.

episodes.name: Strange Invaders
episodes.description: After discovering a navy pilot's body riddled with unusual wounds, NCIS' investigation draws the team into the rabbit hole of UFO conspiracy theories.

episodes.name: A Thousand Yards
episodes.description: NCIS comes under attack by a mysterious enemy from the past. Vance tries to mend fences with his estranged son by explaining why, despite the ongoing dangers of his job, he still chooses to stay at NCIS.

episodes.name: Heartless
episodes.description: NCIS team looks for a motive behind the kidnapping and death of a famous heart surgeon.

episodes.name: Prime Cut
episodes.description: After discovering the remains of a Marine captain, the NCIS team travels to Texas to interrogate the suspected killer.

episodes.name: Reef Madness
episodes.description: Three bodies are found on an old Navy ship that's about to be sunk and turned into an artificial reef. When Parker and Knight are going to investigate, they're suddenly locked inside by a mysterious figure.

episodes.name: Empty Nest
episodes.description: NCIS searches for a missing undercover agent in the midst of an active hostage situation.

episodes.name: Foreign Bodies
episodes.description: As Vance prepares to host diplomatic talks with Venezuela, the team is called in to investigate the dead body of one of his inside men.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Hal
episodes.description: NCIS is called in to investigate when a lieutenant returns home on the eve of Halloween to find a surprise party being thrown for someone else at his place.

episodes.name: Sticks & Stones
episodes.description: After receiving intelligence on deadly threats to multiple locations that could lead to a catastrophic war, NCIS is called in to try to neutralize the danger.

episodes.name: In from the Cold
episodes.description: NCIS works with the CIA to discover what secrets are being kept by Captain Butler, an elderly former spy with dementia.

episodes.name: Knight and Day
episodes.description: Things become tense when Knight is assigned to protect his wife after the home of a high-level defense contractor is attacked.

episodes.name: Hardboiled
episodes.description: Torres receives intel from a confidential informant regarding top secret naval information that's at risk of being sold.

episodes.name: Out of Control
episodes.description: NCIS investigates a murder related to a car that begins driving on its own.

episodes.name: Humbug
episodes.description: NCIS has to find out the truth behind a tell all book that threatens a decorated Marine's life before it is published.

episodes.name: Baker's Man
episodes.description: After NCIS learns that the owner of Parker's favorite bakery is being blackmailed, they hatch a plan to save her from the perpetrators; tensions heighten when Torres' secret romance is discovered.

episodes.name: For Better or Worse
episodes.description: NCIS stages a fake wedding in an attempt to take down the mob.

episodes.name: Fun and Games
episodes.description: NCIS investigates the fatal poisoning of one of Kasie's forensic scientists. McGee is questioned by the Pentagon regarding the contents of his book.

name: Yellowjackets
description: A wildly talented girls high school soccer team become the unlucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.description: On the eve of a fateful flight, a championship high school girls soccer team celebrates by betraying one another. Twenty-five years later, the survivors do their best imitations of well-adjusted people. Series premiere.

episodes.name: F Sharp
episodes.description: The teens get their bearings as Misty finds hell on earth quite becoming. In the present: revenge, sex homework, and the policeman formerly known as Goth.

episodes.name: The Dollhouse
episodes.description: The Yellowjackets debate the merits of probably dying while staying put or probably dying while looking for shelter. Taissa navigates a dirty attack ad and the other C-word. Shauna sees about a boy.

episodes.name: Bear Down
episodes.description: The girls play with guns to determine who is the most responsible. Natalie untangles a lifetime of piecing together broken men. Taissa greets the rich.

episodes.name: Blood Hive
episodes.description: Out in the wilderness plan a dark arts slumber party. Natalie and Misty tame a stallion. On Halloween night, Shauna parties like it's 1996.

episodes.name: Saints
episodes.description: The girls tangle with the birds and the bees, navigating love, lust and DIY surgery. In the present: blackmail, bunnies and an icy reunion. Misty prepares for a houseguest.

episodes.name: No Compass
episodes.description: As starvation looms, Taissa leads a last-ditch effort and/or suicide mission. The Yellowjackets are forced to commit small talk.

episodes.name: Flight of the Bumblebee
episodes.description: What is madness and what is divine? While in triage after a vicious attack, the Yellowjackets are left to suss out the best of their worst ideas. Shauna dabbles in some light cyberstalking.

episodes.name: Doomcoming
episodes.description: You are cordially invited to The Doomcoming. On the brink of death, the Yellowjackets opt to throw one last rager before careening into oblivion. An increasingly paranoid Shauna struggles between keeping her cool and being Shauna.

episodes.name: Sic Transit Gloria Mundi
episodes.description: On the night of their 25-year reunion, the Yellowjackets navigate damning evidence, false alibis and a dubious attempt to heal. In the wilderness, the Doomcoming fallout finds everything firmly off the rails as resentments come to a head.

episodes.name: Friends, Romans, Countrymen
episodes.description: Two months into winter the survivors cope with falling rations, low morale and their latest disastrous attempt to freeze a teammate out of the game. Taissa, Misty and Natalie all seek out best friends, both old and new.

episodes.name: Edible Complex
episodes.description: Breaking off that friendship with the person who keeps ghosting you isn't always easy. Tai speeds through an unexpected reunion, Nat shacks up with Lottie, and Misty encounters a riddle wrapped in an enigma dressed in cargo shorts.

episodes.name: Digestif
episodes.description: The girls experience an unusual hangover. Shauna learns the thrill of peer-to-peer car rentals. Natalie audits Lottie's class in emotional apiology. Misty hits the high seas - and the Yellowjackets throw a baby shower like no other.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.description: Relive your youth by hitting the road! Go on vacation with a new friend! Hitchhike, if you must! Just make sure you pack a good playlist for the ride. Some recommendations from us: "Anything You Can Do" and "You Get What You Give".

episodes.name: Two Truths and a Lie
episodes.description: Rise and shine and don't forget your booties because it's coooold out there. Misty makes a leap of faith, Natalie and Lottie play a game, Shauna finds herself unexpectedly randy, and Tai seeks out a movie recommendation.

episodes.name: Qui
episodes.description: Trapped inside on a snow day, the Yellowjackets revisit the highlights, humiliations and traumas of Health Class. Tai and Van help each other rewind, while Misty explores joining a classic Cosmic American tribute band.

episodes.name: Burial
episodes.description: Out in the wilderness, Coach Scott does a great Karl Havoc impression for an unimpressed Misty.

episodes.name: It Chooses
episodes.description: Callie encounters an old flame, Van proves goalies never say die, most of the adults intentionally commune in the sharing shack.

episodes.name: Storytelling
episodes.description: Heavy is the head that wears the antler crown is a lesson you don't learn until much later in life... if you ever even learn it at all. Everything's about to get really wild(erness), and we're so excited (so excited!). Season finale.

episodes.name: It Girl
episodes.description: Summer inspires the Yellowjackets to ditch soccer for a more contact-intensive sport and revive an old pagan tradition. In the present, a cringe-worthy funeral flows organically into a bar therapy session. Season premiere.

episodes.name: Dislocation
episodes.description: The Yellowjackets are stuck deciding whether to track down a missing teammate or just trip out on mushrooms. Shauna secures a spot on the world's most unsupportive partner list.

episodes.name: Them's the Brakes
episodes.description: A hostile reunion ignites chaos among former teammates, while Lottie's behavior gives Callie unexpected insights into her mom's dark history. Meanwhile, Tai and Van face consequences for their past actions.

name: The Walking Dead
description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

episodes.name: Days Gone Bye
episodes.description: Deputy Sheriff Rick Grimes awakens from a coma, and searches for his family in a world ravaged by the undead.

episodes.name: Guts
episodes.description: In Atlanta, Rick is rescued by a group of survivors, but they soon find themselves trapped inside a department store surrounded by walkers.

episodes.name: Tell It to the Frogs
episodes.description: Rick is reunited with Lori and Carl but soon decides - along with some of the other survivors - to return to the rooftop and rescue Merle. Meanwhile, tensions run high between the other survivors at the camp.

episodes.name: Vatos
episodes.description: Rick, Glenn, Daryl and T-Dog come across a group of seemingly hostile survivors whilst searching for Merle. Back at camp, Jim begins behaving erratically.

episodes.name: Wildfire
episodes.description: After the attack on the camp, Rick leads the survivors to the C.D.C., in the hope that they can cure an infected Jim.

episodes.name: TS-19
episodes.description: The survivors gain access to the C.D.C. in the hope of a safe haven.

episodes.name: What Lies Ahead
episodes.description: The group's plan to head for Fort Benning is put on hold when Sophia goes missing.

episodes.name: Bloodletting
episodes.description: After Carl is accidentally shot, the group are brought to a family living on a nearby farm. Shane makes a dangerous trip in search of medical supplies.

episodes.name: Save the Last One
episodes.description: As Carl's condition continues to deteriorate, Shane and Otis try to dodge the walkers as they head back to the farm.

episodes.name: Cherokee Rose
episodes.description: With Carl recovering, the group puts their focus on finding Sophia. Glenn and Maggie go for a trip to find supplies.

episodes.name: Chupacabra
episodes.description: In the woods alone, Daryl finds a clue but is injured and attacked by walkers. Rick questions his choices. Glenn gets mixed signals from Maggie.

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.description: Dale confronts Hershel after Glenn tells him about the walkers in the barn. Meanwhile, Lori struggles to come to terms with her pregnancy, and Shane tries to teach Andrea how to use weapons.

episodes.name: Pretty Much Dead Already
episodes.description: Glenn tells the rest of the group about the walkers in the barn, dividing them on what to do. Meanwhile, Hershel sets a deadline for the group to leave, unless Rick does a difficult task.

episodes.name: Nebraska
episodes.description: In the aftermath of the barn incident; the group bury loved ones, Beth falls into shock, and Rick and Glenn head out to find Hershel when he disappears.

episodes.name: Triggerfinger
episodes.description: Rick, Glenn and Hershel come under enemy fire after their encounter with Dave and Tony. Meanwhile, Shane goes after Lori when everyone realizes she is missing.

episodes.name: 18 Miles Out
episodes.description: Rick and Shane argue over what to do with Randall. Back at the farm, Lori, Andrea and Maggie deal with a suicidal Beth.

episodes.name: Judge, Jury, Executioner
episodes.description: Dale fears the group is losing its humanity as Rick and the others vote to execute Randall.

episodes.name: Better Angels
episodes.description: Shane's antagonistic behaviour reaches new heights, while Carl suffers the consequences of his actions.

episodes.name: Beside the Dying Fire
episodes.description: As the farm is overrun by walkers, the group fights to escape.

episodes.name: Seed
episodes.description: After months on the run, the group take refuge in a federal prison, while elsewhere, Andrea's health starts to deteriorate.

episodes.name: Sick
episodes.description: As Hershel's condition worsens, Rick, Daryl and T-Dog deal with a group of prisoners.

episodes.name: Walk with Me
episodes.description: Andrea and Michonne are brought to a walled community run by a man called The Governor.

episodes.name: Killer Within
episodes.description: Lori goes into labour when the prison comes under attack. Michonne tries to convince Andrea to leave Woodbury.

episodes.name: Say the Word
episodes.description: Rick struggles to cope. Andrea and Michonne part ways. Daryl and Maggie head out to find food and clothes for the baby.

episodes.name: Hounded
episodes.description: Rick receives a mysterious phone call. Andrea grows closer to The Governor. Merle tries to hunt down Michonne.

episodes.name: When the Dead Come Knocking
episodes.description: Michonne leads Rick, Daryl and Oscar to Woodbury to rescue Glenn and Maggie. Merle tries to force information out of Glenn.

episodes.name: Made to Suffer
episodes.description: Rick, Daryl, Michonne and Oscar enter Woodbury in search of Glenn and Maggie. Meanwhile, a new group of survivors encounter the prison.

episodes.name: The Suicide King
episodes.description: Woodbury is left in disarray following the attack by Rick's group. Merle's presence in the group causes conflict.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.description: Rick continues to see visions of Lori. The Governor plans an assault on the prison. Daryl and Merle fend for themselves out in the forest.

episodes.name: I Ain't a Judas
episodes.description: As Rick and the group debate their next course of action, Andrea tries to negotiate with them. Meanwhile, The Governor prepares Woodbury for battle.

episodes.name: Clear
episodes.description: Rick runs into a familiar face when he, Carl and Michonne head back to Rick's hometown for more guns to fortify themselves against The Governor.

episodes.name: Arrow on the Doorpost
episodes.description: Rick and The Governor meet face-to-face, ostensibly to make a peaceful resolution to prevent further bloodshed. Back at the prison, tensions arise between Merle and the rest of the group.

episodes.name: Prey
episodes.description: The Governor hunts down Andrea when she flees Woodbury. Meanwhile, tensions arise within Tyreese's group, and The Governor's plan for Rick's group is sabotaged.

episodes.name: This Sorrowful Life
episodes.description: While Rick decides the fate of Michonne, Merle takes matters into his own hand.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Tombs
episodes.description: As Rick and the group prepare for the Governor's impending attack, Andrea fights to escape captivity.

episodes.name: 30 Days Without an Accident
episodes.description: Several months have passed and Rick and the expanded group are living a more peaceful life at the prison. Problems surface when Rick encounters a new survivor, and a supply run ends in disaster.

episodes.name: Infected
episodes.description: Rick is forced to abandon his quiet lifestyle when a mysterious virus puts the lives of everyone at the prison at risk.

episodes.name: Isolation
episodes.description: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Indifference
episodes.description: Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob continue to the veterinary college on foot in search of medicine. Rick and Carol go on a run to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

episodes.name: Internment
episodes.description: Hershel struggles to care for the sick as the situation in the cell block escalates. Meanwhile, Rick and Carl defend the prison as the fences give way.

episodes.name: Live Bait
episodes.description: The Governor bonds with a small family following the downfall of Woodbury.

episodes.name: Dead Weight
episodes.description: The Governor plans his next move as he, Lilly, Tara and Meghan adjust to new surroundings.

episodes.name: Too Far Gone
episodes.description: Rick and the group face imminent danger as The Governor tries to take the prison.

episodes.name: After
episodes.description: With the prison overrun, Rick and Carl find themselves on the road looking for shelter. Meanwhile, Michonne is haunted by memories of the past.

episodes.name: Inmates
episodes.description: Beth tries to remain hopeful. Tyreese, Lizzie and Mika run into a familiar face. Glenn and Maggie struggle to cope without each other.

episodes.name: Claimed
episodes.description: While Carl and Michonne look for supplies, Rick is faced with a gang of marauders. Meanwhile, Glenn and Tara are brought together with three strangers on an important mission.

episodes.name: Still
episodes.description: Daryl and Beth seek refuge in the woods, where conflict emerges between the pair.

episodes.name: Alone
episodes.description: Maggie, Sasha and Bob clash over whether they should head to Terminus. Daryl and Beth take shelter in a seemingly abandoned funeral home.

episodes.name: The Grove
episodes.description: Carol has to cope with old secrets and Lizzie's psychotic behavior when she, Tyreese and the girls take refuge in a vacant house on the way to Terminus.

episodes.name: Us
episodes.description: Glenn and Tara are set on the way to Terminus, but Abraham is reluctant. Daryl struggles to adjust to the Claimers' rules.

episodes.name: A
episodes.description: Rick, Carl and Michonne cross paths with the Claimers once again on the way to Terminus, as the so-called sanctuary begins to reveal its true face.

episodes.name: No Sanctuary
episodes.description: Carol takes drastic action to rescue Rick and the group from the cannibals of Terminus as she and Tyreese reach the compound. A familiar face makes a return.

episodes.name: Strangers
episodes.description: Rick and the group cross paths with a mysterious priest and take shelter in his church, soon realizing that they're being hunted. Meanwhile, Daryl and Carol follow a lead to the whereabouts of Beth.

episodes.name: Four Walls and a Roof
episodes.description: With Bob's life hanging in the balance, the group prepares to fight back against Gareth and his group of cannibals.

episodes.name: Slabtown
episodes.description: After being separated from Daryl, Beth finds herself in Grady Memorial Hospital in Atlanta, now controlled by what's left of the police force.

episodes.name: Self Help
episodes.description: As Glenn, Maggie, Abraham and co. head to D.C., a new revelation threatens to bring the whole journey to a halt.

episodes.name: Consumed
episodes.description: Daryl and Carol chase the white-crossed car to a desolated Atlanta with hopes of finding Beth and her kidnappers.

episodes.name: Crossed
episodes.description: While Carl, Michonne and Gabriel hold the church, Rick takes a rescue mission to Atlanta, as Abraham's group deal with the fallout from Eugene's revelation.

episodes.name: Coda
episodes.description: Rick and the group go face-to-face against Dawn and her officers in an attempt to save both Beth and Carol without any more bloodshed.

episodes.name: What Happened and What's Going On
episodes.description: Rick, Glenn, Michonne and Tyreese take Noah to his home in Shirewilt Estates with hopes of finding sanctuary, but what they encounter is something else entirely.

episodes.name: Them
episodes.description: Grieving from the deaths of Beth and Tyreese in different ways and with dwindling supplies, the group face the harsh road to Washington D.C.

episodes.name: The Distance
episodes.description: Recovering from a devastating storm, Rick and the group find themselves mistrustful of a new survivor who promises them safety in a walled-off community.

episodes.name: Remember
episodes.description: Scarred from their experiences in the outside world, the group struggles to adapt to the normality of the Alexandria Safe-Zone.

episodes.name: Forget
episodes.description: As Deanna throws a party for the new arrivals, Carol comes up with a plan to get the group's weapons back. Meanwhile, Daryl bonds with Aaron, and Sasha struggles to cope.

episodes.name: Spend
episodes.description: Eugene is forced to step up when a run led by Glenn goes awry. Back at Alexandria, Carol uncovers a secret.

episodes.name: Try
episodes.description: While out recruiting, Daryl and Aaron find troubling signs of human activity. Back at Alexandria, Carl bonds with Enid, and the tension between Rick and Pete comes to a head.

episodes.name: Conquer
episodes.description: Daryl and Aaron cross paths with Morgan. Back at the safe-zone, the people of Alexandria decide what to do with Rick, as a new danger emerges.

episodes.name: First Time Again
episodes.description: Rick and the group come up with a plan to lure a massive herd of walkers away from Alexandria, while flashbacks show the events following Pete's death, including Rick's reunion with Morgan.

episodes.name: JSS
episodes.description: While Rick and his group lure the herd away, Carol and Morgan lead a line of defense against the Wolves when Alexandria comes under attack.

episodes.name: Thank You
episodes.description: With half of the herd out of control, Glenn and Michonne lead Nicholas and their group back to Alexandria, as Rick crosses paths with the surviving members of the Wolves.

episodes.name: Here's Not Here
episodes.description: Morgan tells the captured wolf about his journey from King County to Alexandria, where he met a lone survivor with a code.

episodes.name: Now
episodes.description: Deanna begins to question her leadership. Meanwhile, Maggie shares a secret with Aaron while searching for Glenn, as the herd approaches the safe-zone.

episodes.name: Always Accountable
episodes.description: Wounded after being separated from Abraham and Sasha, Daryl finds himself captive of three survivors on the run.

episodes.name: Heads Up
episodes.description: Glenn and Enid make their way back to Alexandria. Meanwhile, Spencer puts his life at risk, as the herd finds its way inside the safe-zone.

episodes.name: Start to Finish
episodes.description: With the walls down, Alexandria finds itself swarmed by walkers. Meanwhile, Daryl, Abraham and Sasha come face-to-face with a new danger.

episodes.name: No Way Out
episodes.description: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha face-off against the Saviors. Back at Alexandria, Rick and his group make their way through the herd.

episodes.name: The Next World
episodes.description: Weeks after the walker invasion, Rick and Daryl cross paths with Jesus, a mysterious man with many secrets. Meanwhile, Michonne helps Spencer find closure, as Carl recovers from his injury.

episodes.name: Knots Untie
episodes.description: Jesus takes Rick and the group to the Hilltop Colony, a peaceful community overshadowed by the power of the Saviors.

episodes.name: Not Tomorrow Yet
episodes.description: Rick leads a surprise attack against the Saviors with the joint forces of Alexandria and the Hilltop. As two group members end up captured, Tara and Heath leave on a two-week supply run.

episodes.name: The Same Boat
episodes.description: Carol and Maggie must fight for their lives after being taken by a group of Saviors.

episodes.name: Twice as Far
episodes.description: With medicine running low, Denise goes on a supply with Daryl and Rosita. Meanwhile, Eugene tries to prove himself to Abraham.

episodes.name: East
episodes.description: Rick and Morgan set out in the search for Carol. Meanwhile, Daryl and Rosita track down Dwight, as Glenn and Michonne fall into a trap.

episodes.name: Last Day on Earth
episodes.description: Morgan continues his search for Carol. Meanwhile, Rick and the group travel to the Hilltop with an ailing Maggie, leading to a daunting and life-changing confrontation.

episodes.name: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be
episodes.description: Having been brutally overpowered by Negan and his Saviors, Rick and the group kneel helplessly as they suffer heavy losses that will haunt them forever.

episodes.name: The Well
episodes.description: Carol and Morgan are brought to a community called the Kingdom, led by the eccentric King Ezekiel.

episodes.name: The Cell
episodes.description: Daryl is taken by Negan to the Sanctuary, home of the Saviors. Meanwhile, Dwight is sent on a mission to bring back a runaway member of his group.

episodes.name: Service
episodes.description: Still mourning from the recent tragic losses, Rick and the people of Alexandria receive a sobering visit from Negan and his Saviors.

episodes.name: Go Getters
episodes.description: Maggie and Sasha recover from their grief at the Hilltop. Meanwhile, Carl and Enid journey to the community, as the Saviors arrive to get their tribute.

episodes.name: Swear
episodes.description: Tara encounters a group of female survivors living near the coast after being separated from Heath during their two-week supply run.

episodes.name: Sing Me a Song
episodes.description: As Eugene and Rosita head to the bullet factory, Rick and Aaron search for supplies for Negan. Meanwhile, Carl and Jesus find themselves on their way to the Sanctuary.

episodes.name: Hearts Still Beating
episodes.description: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.

episodes.name: Rock in the Road
episodes.description: Jesus leads Rick and the group to the Kingdom, to convince King Ezekiel in joining Alexandria and the Hilltop in the incoming fight against Negan.

episodes.name: New Best Friends
episodes.description: While searching for Father Gabriel, the group comes across a mysterious new collective of survivors. Back at the Kingdom, Carol and Daryl have an emotional reunion.

episodes.name: Hostiles and Calamities
episodes.description: Eugene unwillingly begins to work for Negan and the Saviors at the Sanctuary. Meanwhile, Dwight pays a visit to a place from his past.

episodes.name: Say Yes
episodes.description: The group scavenge for supplies. Back in Alexandria, Tara must make a morally challenging decision.

episodes.name: Bury Me Here
episodes.description: Things don't go as planned, when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.

episodes.name: The Other Side
episodes.description: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.

episodes.name: Something They Need
episodes.description: A group of Alexandrians embark on a journey; One member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.

episodes.name: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
episodes.description: The stakes continue to grow higher as paths cross; The group enacts an intricate plan as the saviors arrive in Alexandria.

episodes.name: Mercy
episodes.description: Rick and his group, along with the Kingdom and Hilltop, band together to bring the fight to Negan and the Saviors.

episodes.name: The Damned
episodes.description: The plan involving Alexandrians, Kingdommers and Hilltoppers unfolds; As Rick continues to fight, he encounters a familiar face.

episodes.name: Monsters
episodes.description: Conflict with the Saviors leads to unintended consequences for the Hilltop, the Kingdom, and Alexandria.

episodes.name: Some Guy
episodes.description: A new weapon in the Savior arsenal proves to be a giant hurdle as fighting continues between Rick's forces and those of the Saviors.

episodes.name: The Big Scary U
episodes.description: A close look at Negan and the lives of the Saviors during the conflict through a familiar set of eyes.

episodes.name: The King, the Widow and Rick
episodes.description: With things looking up for Rick and the group, an argument breaks out at the Hilltop, where the consequences of the decision are life versus death.

episodes.name: Time for After
episodes.description: Negan has to enlist the help of his lieutenants in solving a huge issue facing The Sanctuary; Rick and the group continue to enact the plan.

episodes.name: How It's Gotta Be
episodes.description: Every story and battle comes crashing together as everything Rick and his group have done will be put to the test.

episodes.name: Honor
episodes.description: Rick faces new difficulties after a battle. Meanwhile, the fight continues in other communities as core members face hard decisions.

episodes.name: The Lost and the Plunderers
episodes.description: Groups unite their forces and converge on the Hilltop; Aaron and Enid search for allies; Simon takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Dead or Alive Or
episodes.description: Daryl finds himself in bad company as his group heads to the Hilltop; Gabriel's faith gets tested.

episodes.name: The Key
episodes.description: Hilltop's leadership faces a difficult dilemma after the arrival of unexpected visitors; Rick comes face to face with an adversary.

episodes.name: Do Not Send Us Astray
episodes.description: Trouble arises when unexpected visitors arrive at the Hilltop and the community is thrust into action; heartbreaking discoveries are made.

episodes.name: Still Gotta Mean Something
episodes.description: A Heaps prisoner makes a discovery; Carol searches for someone in the nearby forest; Rick and Morgan find themselves in the company of strangers.

episodes.name: Worth
episodes.description: With the threat of the Saviors still looming, Aaron continues searching for allies; Daryl and Rosita take action and confront an old friend.

episodes.name: Wrath
episodes.description: The communities join forces in the last stand against the Saviors as all-out war unfolds.

episodes.name: A New Beginning
episodes.description: Rick and his group make a risky run into Washington, D.C. to search for artifacts they will need to build the civilization he and Carl envisioned.

episodes.name: The Bridge
episodes.description: The communities join forces to restore a bridge that will facilitate communication and trade; someone is gravely injured at the construction site.

episodes.name: Warning Signs
episodes.description: A mysterious disappearance from the work camp threatens Rick's vision for the future.

episodes.name: The Obliged
episodes.description: Rick's vision of a civilized future is threatened by a sudden reckoning with past sins that remain unavenged and unforgiven.

episodes.name: What Comes After
episodes.description: Rick is forced to face the past as he struggles to maintain the safety of the communities and protect the future he and Carl envisioned.

episodes.name: Who Are You Now?
episodes.description: The Survivors encounter unfamiliar faces outside the safety of their community's walls and must decide whether or not this new group can be trusted.

episodes.name: Stradivarius
episodes.description: Carol seeks out an old friend living alone in a wilderness teeming with walkers; survivors make the perilous trek to a new home.

episodes.name: Evolution
episodes.description: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.

episodes.name: Adaptation
episodes.description: The group unmasks a disturbing and dangerous new threat. An escaped captive revisits his past.

episodes.name: Omega
episodes.description: Another arrival at the Hilltop Colony reveals information about the leader of a hostile new group of savages. A party searches for Alden and Luke.

episodes.name: Bounty
episodes.description: The Whisperers, led by Alpha, confront the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.

episodes.name: Guardians
episodes.description: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has potentially deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Chokepoint
episodes.description: Daryl's daring rescue mission forces Alpha to unleash a group of her own to retrieve what belongs to her, even if the price is paid in blood; the Kingdom's plans to reunite the communities are put in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Scars
episodes.description: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.

episodes.name: The Calm Before
episodes.description: The four communities come together in celebration at the Kingdom's fair, but while some pacts are renewed, others come at a much steeper price.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.description: In the aftermath of an overwhelming loss, the communities must brave a ferocious blizzard; as one group deals with an enemy from within, another is forced to make a life or death decision.

episodes.name: Lines We Cross
episodes.description: The group in Oceanside continues to train in case the Whisperers return; tensions are high as the heroes struggle to hold onto their concept of civilization.

episodes.name: We Are the End of the World
episodes.description: The origins of Alpha and Beta are revealed; Alpha attempts to toughen up Lydia as they prepare to walk with the dead; the Whisperers create their herds.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.description: The threat of the Whisperers return leads to paranoia sweeping over Alexandria; in the meantime, Carol battles with the need for revenge.

episodes.name: Silence the Whisperers
episodes.description: The outcast Lydia is badly treated by three Alexandrians. When Negan saves her from an attack, the life changes in Alexandria. Meanwhile Michonne and a group of Alexandrians head to Hilltop to save survivors of a collapsed wall.

episodes.name: What It Always Is
episodes.description: Supplies go missing from Hilltop; Negan is idolized by Brandon; Ezekiel holds a secret.

episodes.name: Bonds
episodes.description: Carol and Daryl go on a mission together; Siddiq struggles to solve a mystery.

episodes.name: Open Your Eyes
episodes.description: Carol pushes boundaries that make Daryl uneasy; Alpha and Beta have reservations about someone.

episodes.name: The World Before
episodes.description: A fight causes tensions in Oceanside; The Alexandrians set out on a high-stakes mission.

episodes.name: Squeeze
episodes.description: The collected communities are reluctantly respecting the new borderlines being imposed on them.

episodes.name: Stalker
episodes.description: The group must defend Alexandria from a threatening outside force.

episodes.name: Morning Star
episodes.description: The Whisperers are coming for Hilltop, after Daryl and Lydia's encounter with Alpha, the communities must decide whether to run or fight; Eugene's communication with Stephanie gets complicated.

episodes.name: Walk with Us
episodes.description: The survivors try to escape from the Whisperer's walkers horde after the battle of Hilltop.

episodes.name: What We Become
episodes.description: Michonne takes Virgil back to his mysterious island to reunite with his family; in exchange, Virgil promises weapons that could change the tide of the Whisperer War.

episodes.name: Look at the Flowers
episodes.description: Heroes and villains reckon with the aftermath of the Hilltop fire; Eugene takes a group on a journey to meet Stephanie, with the hopes of befriending another civilization.

episodes.name: The Tower
episodes.description: The communities prepare for the final battle of the Whisperer War; meanwhile, Eugene's group encounters Princess.

episodes.name: A Certain Doom
episodes.description: Beta engages the final battle of the Whisperer War.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.description: Maggie returns, to the dismay of Negan; the trials she endured since leaving have made her harder in order for her and her son to survive; Daryl and Maggie unexpectedly fight an unseen and unknown threat.

episodes.name: Find Me
episodes.description: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.

episodes.name: One More
episodes.description: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.

episodes.name: Splinter
episodes.description: Eugene, Ezekiel, Yumiko, and Princess are captured and separated. Princess struggles with memories of her traumatic past and tries to escape one way or another with the help of Ezekiel.

episodes.name: Diverged
episodes.description: Daryl and Carol come to a fork in the road and head their separate ways. Each going into their own type of survival mode, the easiest of challenges become much harder.

episodes.name: Here's Negan
episodes.description: Carol takes Negan on a journey, hoping to minimize the increasing tension. Negan reflects on the events that led him to this point and comes to a conclusion about his future.

episodes.name: Acheron: Part I
episodes.description: Daryl leads a team to scavenge the military base he discovered; Maggie tells her story, prompting a new mission for survival that only Negan can lead; Eugene and his group go through assessment by the Commonwealth's paramilitary police.

episodes.name: Acheron: Part II
episodes.description: Maggie's mission takes the team through a subway tunnel, challenged by a recalcitrant Negan and lurking walkers; with Eugene's group, Yumiko searches for answers about her brother and challenges the processes at the Commonwealth outpost.

episodes.name: Hunted
episodes.description: Maggie's mission team gets separated and hunted by the Reapers; Carol, Rosita, Magna and Kelly attempt to catch horses for Alexandria; Judith, RJ, Hershel and Gracie cope with their parents going away.

episodes.name: Rendition
episodes.description: Daryl and Dog get captured by the Reapers; they are taken to the Meridian and reconnect with a familiar figure from their past.

episodes.name: Out of the Ashes
episodes.description: Aaron, Carol, Lydia, and Jerry go to the Hilltop ruins for blacksmith tools and nearby game; Eugene's group goes through orientation at the Commonwealth; Maggie and Negan trudge through the woods; Judith and the kids clash with teenagers.

episodes.name: On the Inside
episodes.description: Escaping from walkers, Connie and Virgil hide in a house occupied by mysterious creatures; Pope tests Daryl's loyalty to the Reapers with a conflicting mission; Kelly leaves Alexandria in search of Connie.

episodes.name: Promises Broken
episodes.description: Maggie and Elijah learn a new survival tactic from Negan; Eugene's group clears walkers to pay their fines; Yumiko interviews for an upper-class job; Daryl learns more about Leah and the Reapers; Gabriel encounters a man of God.

episodes.name: For Blood
episodes.description: The Reapers defend Meridian from an incoming herd; Pope suspects Maggie is behind the attack, while Daryl treads carefully; Alexandrians scramble to protect themselves when a violent storm leaves them vulnerable to walkers.

episodes.name: No Other Way
episodes.description: Hellfire rains down on those at Meridian as every fight with the Reapers proves to be a brutal battle. At home in Alexandria, the violent rainstorm rages on as walkers continue to pour in, threatening everyone's safety.

episodes.name: New Haunts
episodes.description: The heroes experience Halloween in the Commonwealth; Daryl and Rosita undergo military training led by Mercer; Carol investigates Ezekiel's medical condition.

episodes.name: Rogue Element
episodes.description: Eugene looks for Stephanie after she mysteriously goes missing. Connie investigates a story on Trooper Davis. Carol helps Hornsby with a labor dispute at a drug farm.

episodes.name: The Lucky Ones
episodes.description: Aaron and Maggie meet Gov. Pamela Milton as she tours Alexandria, Oceanside and Hilltop; Ezekiel finds himself lucky during a routine checkup; Eugene processes Max's story.

episodes.name: Warlords
episodes.description: Maggie, Lydia, and Elijah help a stranger from another community called Riverbend. They run into Aaron, who tells them about a mission he embarked on with Gabriel as emissaries for the Commonwealth.

episodes.name: The Rotten Core
episodes.description: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help Aaron and Gabriel on a rescue mission; in the chaos, Negan finds himself watching over Hershel; Sebastian coerces Daryl and Rosita into pulling a heist.

episodes.name: Trust
episodes.description: Hornsby marches Daryl and troops to confront Maggie at Hilltop; after a harrowing heist, Rosita gets Connie, Kelly, Eugene, and Max to investigate the Miltons; Ezekiel helps hospital patients in need.

episodes.name: Acts of God
episodes.description: Maggie prepares to defend Hilltop and the people of Riverbend against Hornsby.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.description: Daryl and Negan rush to the commonwealth to stop Hornsby from going after their families. Pamela deals with protesters demanding justice for Sebastian's crimes. Mercer needs Rosita's help to fight a swarm.

episodes.name: A New Deal
episodes.description: Carol makes a deal with Pamela to wipe the slate clean on behalf of her friends. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah get on the road to Oceanside to fill them in on a plan. The Commonwealth celebrates Founders Day.

episodes.name: Variant
episodes.description: Eugene goes on the run, and Mercer is tasked to find him; Aaron's group faces a complication on the road.

episodes.name: What's Been Lost
episodes.description: Daryl and Carol search for their disappeared friends.

episodes.name: Outpost 22
episodes.description: The survivors track a convoy to a mysterious destination.

episodes.name: Faith
episodes.description: Ezekiel and Negan plan a work camp revolt; Eugene stands trial with Yumiko as his defense attorney.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.description: Reunited, the group heads back to the commonwealth where the aftermath of Eugene's trial is felt.

episodes.name: Rest in Peace
episodes.description: Our survivors must save their kids and the Commonwealth.

name: SAS Rogue Heroes
description: SAS: Rogue Heroes charts the creation of the famed Special Forces unit. Based on the book by Ben Macintyre.

episodes.name: Episode #1.1
episodes.description: Spring 1941. Frustrated with military command's handling of war, Stirling and Lewes formulate a plan to parachute men into the desert, attacking enemy forces from behind the lines.

episodes.name: Episode #1.2
episodes.description: While recovering in hospital, Stirling ruminates on Lewes's idea to attack the enemy from behind and hatches a plan to get approval for their unit from General Auchinleck at GHQ.

episodes.name: Episode #1.3
episodes.description: The newly recruited members of the SAS carry out a disastrous and devastating first mission. Determined to prove their strategy will work, they prepare to try again.

episodes.name: Episode #1.4
episodes.description: As the SAS's reputation spreads among the Axis Italian and German forces, another daring mission results in a shocking and devastating loss to the team.

episodes.name: Episode #1.5
episodes.description: Paddy initiates the Free French soldiers into some unorthodox training methods, and Stirling leads a raid on Benghazi accompanied by the prime minister's son, Randolph Churchill.

episodes.name: Episode #1.6
episodes.description: A meeting with Winston Churchill sees the SAS embark on their most daring operation to date. While success sees them achieve official status, Stirling receives some terrible news.

episodes.name: Episode #2.1
episodes.description: The SAS faces a new mission and potential disbandment, but an ally with a familiar name emerges.

episodes.name: Episode #2.2
episodes.description: The SAS experiences camaraderie and hostility during their Sicilian deployment. Simultaneously, David Stirling, imprisoned at Gavi, receives an unanticipated guest.

episodes.name: Episode #2.3
episodes.description: In war-torn Italy, an SAS commando confronts a harrowing fate decreed by Hitler's cruel Commando Order while fighting alongside the partisan resistance.

episodes.name: Episode #2.4
episodes.description: Reg Seekings forms an unlikely bond with a young Italian boy, Matteo, but their friendship takes a dark turn, leading to further tragedy.

episodes.name: Episode #2.5
episodes.description: As John Tonkin tries to return to the unit, the men of the SAS receive a visit from General Montgomery who can smell drink and heroism.

episodes.name: Episode #2.6
episodes.description: The SAS returns to Britain, preparing for the invasion of France. Meanwhile, David attempts another escape from Gavi.

name: True Detective
description: Anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

episodes.name: The Long Bright Dark
episodes.description: In 2012, former detective partners Rust Cohle and Martin Hart recap one of their very first cases together involving a serial killer, back in 1995.

episodes.name: Seeing Things
episodes.description: Cohle and Hart travel around trying to track down leads to their case. Darker sides of Hart's personal and family lives are revealed.

episodes.name: The Locked Room
episodes.description: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

episodes.name: Who Goes There
episodes.description: Martin is faced with marital problems. The search for Reggie Ledoux leads the detectives to a motorcycle gang called the Iron Crusaders, which Rust worked undercover in the past.

episodes.name: The Secret Fate of All Life
episodes.description: Hart and Cohle share the spoils of a solved case; Papania and Gilbough confront the detectives with troubling new intelligence.

episodes.name: Haunted Houses
episodes.description: Cohle's activities in 2002, when his partnership with Hart disintegrated and he quit the force, are recalled by Maggie.

episodes.name: After You've Gone
episodes.description: Cohle and Hart try to discover if a series of missing persons reports could be related to the Dora Lange murder and the Tuttle family.

episodes.name: Form and Void
episodes.description: An overlooked detail provides Hart and Cohle with an important new lead in their 17-year-old case.

episodes.name: The Western Book of the Dead
episodes.description: A bizarre murder brings together three police officers and a career criminal in the corrupt city of Vinci, California.

episodes.name: Night Finds You
episodes.description: Ray, Ani, and Paul are assigned to Casper's murder case. Frank tries to keep his business deals going, even after Caspere's death.

episodes.name: Maybe Tomorrow
episodes.description: Paul works the prostitute angle; Frank receives the first casualty in a secret war.

episodes.name: Down Will Come
episodes.description: The detail works a pawn shop lead to close in on a suspect in the Caspere case. Frank revisits his past to pay for the present.

episodes.name: Other Lives
episodes.description: Ray and Frank consider new life choices; Ani and Paul go up to the coast to follow a lead.

episodes.name: Church in Ruins
episodes.description: Desperate to locate a missing woman with intel about Caspere, Frank meets with Mexican drug dealers; Ani infiltrates an exclusive inner circle, with Ray and Paul keeping close tabs.

episodes.name: Black Maps and Motel Rooms
episodes.description: As Ani, Paul, and Ray get closer to finding out the truth about Caspere, circumstances become more dangerous for them all and everyone around them. Frank deals with an inside betrayal, learns important information, and plans his next move.

episodes.name: Omega Station
episodes.description: Ray and Ani attempt to escape their desperate situation while Frank ties up some loose ends.

episodes.name: The Great War and Modern Memory
episodes.description: The disappearance of a young brother and sister leads to a frantic search which will haunt one detective for the rest of his life.

episodes.name: Kiss Tomorrow Goodbye
episodes.description: As the search for Julie continues, the doll discovered at the crime scene provokes a reaction, while Wayne and Roland learn of a potential suspect.

episodes.name: The Big Never
episodes.description: The search for Julie brings Wayne and Amelia together again, Wayne and Roland retrace their investigation to spot missed clues, while one White Finger resident receives a warning.

episodes.name: The Hour and the Day
episodes.description: Wayne and Roland investigate possible connections between the local church and the Purcell crimes as tensions in West Finger reach boiling point.

episodes.name: If You Have Ghosts
episodes.description: In 1980, all hell breaks loose at the home of Woodard, while in the present, Wayne and Roland reconnect after Wayne makes a discovery.

episodes.name: Hunters in the Dark
episodes.description: In 1990, Wayne and Roland revisit the Purcell case to uncover previously hidden or forgotten clues, while Tom looks for answers and two faces from the past resurface.

episodes.name: The Final Country
episodes.description: In 1990, following an apparent suicide, the Purcell case is deemed solved, but Wayne and Roland have other ideas, which leads them to a defining course of action.

episodes.name: Now Am Found
episodes.description: Wayne struggles to hold on to his memories, and his grip on reality, as the truth behind the Purcell case is finally revealed.

episodes.name: Night Country: Part 1
episodes.description: In Ennis, Alaska, the men that operate a research station vanish. To solve the case, Chief Danvers and Navarro will have to confront the darkness themselves, and dig into the haunted truths that lie buried under the eternal ice.

episodes.name: Night Country: Part 2
episodes.description: While Connolly threatens to transfer the Tsalal case to Anchorage, Navarro and Danvers make a discovery that brings the former colleagues closer together.

episodes.name: Night Country: Part 3
episodes.description: While searching for Clark, Prior asks Danvers about the case that strained her partnership with Navarro. Sifting through Clark's trailer, they find a lead about another Tsalal worker. Danvers clashes with her stepdaughter.

episodes.name: Night Country: Part 4
episodes.description: Navarro takes Julia to a local facility when her mental health issues resurface, promising improvement. Danvers and Navarro locate where Annie was killed. Danvers severely punishes Leah for protesting.

episodes.name: Night Country: Part 5
episodes.description: While investigating connections between Tsalal and Silver Sky mining, Navarro saves Leah from a violent protest. Kate McKitterick of Silver Sky cautions Danvers against pursuing the case.

episodes.name: Night Country: Part 6
episodes.description: When night falls in Ennis, Alaska, the eight men who operate the Tsalal Arctic Research Station vanish without a trace; to solve the case, detectives Danvers and Navarro will have to confront the darkness they carry in themselves.

name: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
description: Follows the New York City Police Department's (NYPD) Special Victims Unit (SVU), a specially trained squad of detectives who investigates sex crimes including rape, child sexual abuse, human trafficking and domestic violence.

casts.role: Special Agent Dr. George Huang, M.D.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.description: Stabler and Benson investigate the murder and castration of a New York cab driver. They discover that the victim had assumed the identity of another man because he himself was wanted by police.

episodes.name: A Single Life
episodes.description: A probable suicide becomes a murder investigation with suspects that include the writer's psychiatrist, a family member and a local news anchor, but the woman's sister brings evidence that will turn the case on its head.

episodes.name: ...Or Just Look Like One
episodes.description: Two underage models are attacked, raped, and killed. The detectives identify the background details of the modeling business.

episodes.name: Hysteria
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of a young woman who is initially believed to be a prostitute and the latest in a long line of victims.

episodes.name: Wanderlust
episodes.description: When a travel writer is found dead, gagged by a pair of female underwear, suspicion first falls on his landlady, and then to her rebellious teenage daughter.

episodes.name: Sophomore Jinx
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate a female student's murder at a local college. When they develop a suspect on the basketball team, they experience resistance from the college, which is trying to preserve its reputation and its chance at an upcoming championship.

episodes.name: Uncivilized
episodes.description: After a young boy is found raped and murdered in Central Park, suspicion obviously falls on a known child molester in the area, but the true offender may be closer than anybody knows.

episodes.name: Stalked
episodes.description: An ADA who had worked on sex crimes is raped and murdered. The detectives suspect it may have been someone whom she had prosecuted.

episodes.name: Stocks & Bondage
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler look into the murder of a respected derivatives trader. Their investigation takes them into the world of bondage and sadomasochism.

episodes.name: Closure
episodes.description: Stabler and Benson struggle with a sexual assault case when the shaken victim proves unable to identify the prime suspect. As time moves on, she becomes more reluctant to discuss the crime.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler look into the death of a gay man at a party. Their investigation leads them to man who has a dysfunctional relationship with his brother.

episodes.name: Russian Love Poem
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of multi-millionaire Andrew Harlin. They begin with Harlin's long list of male and female lovers and continue to a pair of Russian escorts, one of whom turns up dead, and the other's boyfriend confesses to the murder.

episodes.name: Disrobed
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of a judge who often delivered special verdicts for women in return for sexual favors and was also behind the funding of a local governor's bid for re-election. The team soon steers their attention to a battered wife with a secret.

episodes.name: Limitations
episodes.description: At a victim's request, the police commissioner tries to convince Cragen to close a rape case whose statute of limitations is about to expire. Benson and Stabler finally realize that one of the victims knows the rapist, but she's not willing to talk.

episodes.name: Entitled
episodes.description: After a salesman is murdered, the detectives turn their attention to Stephanie Mulroney, the youngest daughter of a well-known family with some deep connections. But as they join forces with the officers from the 27th precinct of the Law & Order series, they realize that their ca... Read all

episodes.name: The Third Guy
episodes.description: Two teenagers are arrested in connection with the assault and robbery of an elderly woman, but it soon becomes clear that someone else committed the attack.

episodes.name: Misleader
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of the pregnant daughter-in-law of a prominent religious figure. They initially focus on the victim's well-connected family and conclude that her infidelity, and the identity of the child's probable father, likely led to her murder.

episodes.name: Chat Room
episodes.description: A teenager's report of being raped by someone she met in a chat room lead the detectives into the middle of a child porn ring.

episodes.name: Contact
episodes.description: The squad investigates a serial rapist targeting women on subways. Meanwhile, Benson begins dating an ambitious crime reporter.

episodes.name: Remorse
episodes.description: An investigative reporter bravely airs a piece about her own rape that occurred 2 months earlier. Her description of the men that attacked her results in fresh leads and unexpected turns of events along the way.

episodes.name: Nocturne
episodes.description: The trial of an accused child molester is jeopardized when the prime witness has difficulty dealing with his past.

episodes.name: Slaves
episodes.description: An attorney (guest star Andrew McCarthy) suspected of keeping a Romanian immigrant as a sex slave is linked to a woman's murder.

episodes.name: Wrong Is Right
episodes.description: Detective Stabler's daughter witnesses a gory crime scene involving a murdered man who had a secret life. Meanwhile, a new ADA is assigned to the unit while Stabler and Jeffries come under review by the department.

episodes.name: Honor
episodes.description: The assault of an Afghan diplomat's daughter uncovers clues that may suggest ancient traditions justify "honor killings" when a child goes against time-honored values.

episodes.name: Closure: Part 2
episodes.description: Stabler and Benson investigate a sexual assault very similar to one they worked a year and a half ago, whose first-known victim now follows her alleged attacker and reports his activities anonymously to the police, and the rapist's wife.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.description: A 7-year-old girl lapses into a coma and the detectives investigate the members of her family to determine who's responsible for the abuse.

episodes.name: Baby Killer
episodes.description: The tragic shooting death of a young girl leads investigators to a little boy. They soon realize that the gun used has been used in another crime scene.

episodes.name: Noncompliance
episodes.description: A patient rights controversy come to light when a schizophrenic man refuses to take his medication and becomes a suspect in the stabbing death of a psychiatric doctoral student.

episodes.name: Asunder
episodes.description: A woman accuses her husband, a cop, of raping her. When Benson and Stabler arrest him, he denies his wife's claims and claims she's unbalanced.

episodes.name: Taken
episodes.description: When a young female reports a brutal rape during a hotel's grand opening, the police investigates the details of the attack to pin down their suspect, who has a prior conviction for statutory rape.

episodes.name: Pixies
episodes.description: When a young gymnast is found murdered, Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate both her demanding coach and a wealthy benefactor.

episodes.name: Consent
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate the case of a college girl who is raped during a fraternity party, but who can't remember what happened. The medical investigation reveals a date rape drug in her system, which leaves the detectives with several suspects and accomplices.

episodes.name: Abuse
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler suspect parental neglect in the death of the son of two famous singers, The detectives fear for their surviving daughter, who has a history of serious injuries, and Benson grows attached to her. Her parents resent Benson attention to their daughter, and they ta... Read all

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.description: A dedicated inner-city schoolteacher is murdered. Initial indications that the victim lived a quiet and simple life take a turn when pictures of her posing nude are found.

episodes.name: Victims
episodes.description: Elliot faces personal demons when Cragen asks him to investigate the murder of a convicted rapist that Elliot himself helped to put away.

episodes.name: Paranoia
episodes.description: SVU investigates the rape and choking of a police sergeant investigating a silent alarm on a warehouse. When the victim recants, and internal affairs ends the investigation, the detectives look at the officers working with the victim.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.description: The Team at SVU has 72 hours to locate a man who has kidnapped, raped, and murdered four young girls. Can they find him before time runs out?

episodes.name: Runaway
episodes.description: A police officer's daughter runs away and the squad uses the help of a internet journalist to track her down.

episodes.name: Folly
episodes.description: After several male escorts are assaulted and one murdered the team finds a link to a couple whose sexual fantasy may have turned violent.

episodes.name: Manhunt
episodes.description: Detectives Munch and Tutuola become increasingly frustrated as they follow a brutal pair of kidnappers who rape and murder their victims; and even when they get their men, they end up in a legal dispute with the Canadian authorities.

episodes.name: Parasites
episodes.description: After the remains of a woman who was murdered three years earlier are found in a backyard, a composite sketch leads detectives to her identical twin sister.

episodes.name: Pique
episodes.description: A brutal rape and murder are connected to a man who through a weird relationship with his mother has a sexual fetish

episodes.name: Scourge
episodes.description: A disturbed man is arrested after a murder spree. Alexandra Cabot comes under fire for seeking the death penalty.

episodes.name: Repression
episodes.description: The false memories of a girl's childhood molestation by her father lead to a tragedy.

episodes.name: Wrath
episodes.description: Three people are found murdered, all unconnected to each other, except to that of cases that Detective Benson has investigated.

episodes.name: Stolen
episodes.description: The kidnapping of an infant at a grocery store leads to a scheme of snatching and selling babies for adoption which brings back a case from 12 years ago that involved Captain Cragen and his partner, the late Max Greevey.

episodes.name: Rooftop
episodes.description: Detective Tutuola becomes personally involved in a case when a friend's daughter becomes a fatal victim of sexual assault.

episodes.name: Tangled
episodes.description: When arriving party guests find a prominent doctor murdered and his wife raped, the investigation starts with his estranged son and a former patient, then moves to his mistress and her neighbor.

episodes.name: Redemption
episodes.description: Detectives Stabler and Hawk work together to capture a serial rapist and murderer, but as the investigation leads to fresh evidence, Hawk begins to suspect that he may have convicted the wrong man.

episodes.name: Sacrifice
episodes.description: The squad is called in to investigate when a detective discovers a man shot and sodomized in an alley behind a gay bar.

episodes.name: Inheritance
episodes.description: The detectives search for a rapist targeting Asian women. The case becomes particularly significant for Benson when the rapist's defense is that he inherited the "violence gene" from his father, also a rapist.

episodes.name: Care
episodes.description: When a girl in foster care is found dead, the squad's investigation leads close to home.

episodes.name: Ridicule
episodes.description: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the death of a young wife who was recently accused of assaulting a male stripper with a group of her girlfriends.

episodes.name: Monogamy
episodes.description: The case involves the beating of a seven-months-pregnant woman, whose unborn child has been torn from her body via a primitive cesarean section. Among the many witnesses questioned is the woman's husband, a psychiatrist with several devastating secrets and knows more about his wi... Read all

episodes.name: Protection
episodes.description: A 6-year-old boy is shot and then abandoned in an emergency room by his fearful mother, sending detectives in search of his missing family and the gunman before his mother becomes a victim too.

episodes.name: Prodigy
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler have the gruesome task of identifying the remains of a man and a woman who were stabbed in a park.

episodes.name: Counterfeit
episodes.description: A woman is found by her car, where she had been raped and killed. Benson and Tutuola try to figure out why there were drugs in the victim's trunk but then find that a similar rape was committed. This victim says that a police officer raped her after pulling her over for a suppose... Read all

episodes.name: Execution
