episodes.description: When the parents of a teenage murder victim approach Stabler, he goes with Dr. Huang to interview their prime suspect, a serial killer soon to be executed in a New Jersey prison.

episodes.name: Popular
episodes.description: When Stabler hears from a family friend about a teenage girl who was raped, but refuses to report it to police, he begins a covert investigation, and the case progresses to uncover a web of sexual activity among teenagers.

episodes.name: Surveillance
episodes.description: Cellist Cassie Germaine is attacked in her apartment. Benson & Stabler's investigation leads to discovery of hidden cameras streaming Cassie's home activities to a web site with only one discovered visitor, and a shrine.

episodes.name: Guilt
episodes.description: When one difficulty after another hinder the prosecution of serial pedophile, Roy Barnett, desperate A.D.A. Alexandra Cabot oversteps the bounds of the law, risking both her job, and that of Benson and Stabler, to put this dangerous man behind bars.

episodes.name: Justice
episodes.description: A teen with no ID found beaten and apparently raped dies in ER. Benson & Stabler spend all day trying to identify the victim, who turns out to be the stepdaughter of a local judge. Further investigation reveals the victim to have become a mother four years ago, and be a pen pal o... Read all

episodes.name: Greed
episodes.description: Stabler and Benson investigate two rapes that seem to have been committed by the same man, but clues that originally lead them in one direction soon point towards another perpetrator.

episodes.name: Denial
episodes.description: A woman is raped at a party and the attacker is quickly caught but the detectives must still determine why the victim was carrying a finger from a long dead infant.

episodes.name: Competence
episodes.description: The detectives investigate to determine whether a 22-year-old woman with Down syndrome is pregnant as a result of rape, as her mother contends.

episodes.name: Silence
episodes.description: A murder in a church leads Benson and Stabler to an alleged cover-up involving sexual abuse by a priest.

episodes.name: Chameleon
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler investigate the death of a prostitute but then find their main suspect has in turn been killed. Is the woman who shot him acting in self-defense or is she a murderer?

episodes.name: Deception
episodes.description: A child's drawing leads detectives to investigate a mother for possible abuse of her teenage stepson.

episodes.name: Vulnerable
episodes.description: A senile elderly lady is found wandering inside in a home that she was familiar with as a child. Detectives realize that she has been suffering abuse, when cigarette burns are discovered all over her frail body. Following the trail from her greedy, neglectful son, to the expensiv... Read all

episodes.name: Lust
episodes.description: The detectives launch a search for a serial killer who raped and murdered two women in Central Park.

episodes.name: Disappearing Acts
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler clash with an assistant U.S. attorney (Pam Grier) when their rape victim and their prime suspect disappear into witness protection.

episodes.name: Angels
episodes.description: While investigating the death of a young Hispanic boy found in a bus at an airport, the detectives find another boy hiding there, and it soon becomes apparent that the two boys are victims of the same child sex ring.

episodes.name: Dolls
episodes.description: Detectives Benson and Stabler begin hunting for a serial pedophile after a 5-year-old girl's decomposed body is found in the trash.

episodes.name: Waste
episodes.description: The SVU team is put on the case of a woman who has been in a coma for 14 months and is found to be 7 weeks pregnant. After going though many suspects, they focus on the patient's doctor. They discover that he is impregnating comatose female patients with a rich donor's sperm in o... Read all

episodes.name: Juvenile
episodes.description: Two young middle school boys are accused of the rape of a woman.

episodes.name: Resilience
episodes.description: The attempted suicide of a 15-year-old girl leads to her family, promiscuity, and her regression to a child.

episodes.name: Damaged
episodes.description: A 6-year-old girl who was a victim of a video store shooting tests positive for a sexually transmitted disease.

episodes.name: Risk
episodes.description: When cans of baby formula are found to be filled with cocaine, Detective Elliot Stabler, with the help of Detective Olivia Benson and the rest of SVU, goes undercover to bust open the world of corporate drug trafficking.

episodes.name: Rotten
episodes.description: A prison inmate is found dead shortly after he arrives in his cell, and the SVU team investigates because the death was caused by sodomy. Benson and Tutuola uncover a lot more as they explore the case.

episodes.name: Mercy
episodes.description: When the body of a baby girl is found inside a cooler, the detectives need to investigate just who she is and how she got there. They soon learn that the little girl had a genetic disorder known as Tay-Sachs disease, and that her name is Sarah Brown, and she is the only daughter ... Read all

episodes.name: Pandora
episodes.description: The brutal rape and subsequent death of a female motorist turns out to be an informant for the FBI acting as a cyber vigilante for catching on-line pedophiles to capture the predators. Stabler, along with the homicide detective who found the victim's husband murdered, follow the ... Read all

episodes.name: Tortured
episodes.description: A Tibetan woman who was tortured in her home country is found murdered, with her foot missing, and after an exhaustive search of potential suspects, the killer is a victim of torture himself.

episodes.name: Privilege
episodes.description: Detectives Benson and Stabler are called to a crime scene--a young woman dressed in a maid's uniform has apparently committed suicide. But there's lots of sexually-related bruising so they question whether she was pushed and if she was raped.

episodes.name: Desperate
episodes.description: After a young boy witnesses the brutal sexual assault and murder of his stepmother, his father blocks the efforts of the detectives to question him.

episodes.name: Appearances
episodes.description: A nine-year-old child's asphyxiated body is found in a suitcase on a bus, with evidence of having been in the Everglades. The coroner found she had had a quality nose job, and been raped. Benson and Stabler find she was a regular beauty pageant contestant. A suspect's computer is... Read all

episodes.name: Dominance
episodes.description: A quadruple homicide with sexual overtones is just the start of an intense rampage of killings that brings a homicide detective into the mix. As the entire squad races against time to prevent further victims, the evidence leads Tutuola and Deuthorn to a building superintendent, h... Read all

episodes.name: Fallacy
episodes.description: At a party, a young woman is assaulted in the bathroom, and her assailant ends up dead. The girl leaves the ambulance before SVU can talk to her. Is this a case of self-defence, or something far more complex?

episodes.name: Futility
episodes.description: After arresting a man accused of raping several neighborhood women, Detectives Benson and Stabler attempt to obtain an indictment for their suspect with the help of a key eyewitness--his last victim. However, the suspect's decision to handle his own defense casts some doubt over ... Read all

episodes.name: Grief
episodes.description: The death of a waitress is ruled as a suicide. However, the girl's disturbed father takes justice into his own hands when the investigation reveals that his daughter suffered from depression, due to her boss sexually abusing her.

episodes.name: Perfect
episodes.description: The investigation into a missing girl leads the detectives to a doctor of reproductive therapy, who runs shelters for troubled girls. When she is found at shelter, the doctor's sinister agenda is revealed.

episodes.name: Soulless
episodes.description: Detectives suspect bored young socialites of raping a girl at a popular Manhattan nightclub, kidnapping her from a hospital, and then killing her.

episodes.name: Tragedy
episodes.description: When a pregnant woman is kidnapped and carjacked, the squad thinks, at first, that she's the latest victim of a serial rapist, only to realize that she's the victim of an intricate ransom plot.

episodes.name: Manic
episodes.description: While investigating a school shooting that claimed the lives of two students, the squad realizes that the surviving victim is actually the shooter and the side effects of a medication may have caused his actions.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.description: Police find a female forensic psychiatrist unconscious and bound in a basement, along with would-be rapists. She turns out to be the author of a book about rehabilitating convicted sex offenders. The detectives identify one of her patients as a suspect, and ask the doctor for his... Read all

episodes.name: Loss
episodes.description: Investigating the brutal rape and murder of an undercover federal agent and forced to use discretion in order to protect the identities of those agents in the field, the detectives arrest a suspect highly connected with a Colombian drug cartel. As the case proceeds towards trial,... Read all

episodes.name: Serendipity
episodes.description: The discovery of the bodies of a newborn and her mother leads to a dermatologist coming under suspicion of the rapes of young girls.

episodes.name: Coerced
episodes.description: In resolving the kidnapping case of a little boy by a schizophrenic, Stabler uncovers further crimes at an adult group home with Huang's help.

episodes.name: Choice
episodes.description: After a man is arrested for attacking his pregnant wife and then seeks to have her charged with neglect for drinking during her pregnancy, Benson learns that this is not the first time a child has been exposed to the devastating repercussions of the woman's uncontrolled alcoholis... Read all

episodes.name: Abomination
episodes.description: A gay man who had a brief stint in a Fundamentalist Christian-sponsored sexual re-education course is found murdered, and suspects range from the conversion program itself, a bigoted church group who kept sending him threatening letters, a group of psychologists studying the natu... Read all

episodes.name: Control
episodes.description: The Detectives find themselves hunting for a person who cut off a man's genitals and left him to die.

episodes.name: Shaken
episodes.description: A toddler seems to have been abducted from a park while her babysitter is several yards distant talking to a nanny. Searching detectives shortly after arriving on the scene find the child unconscious behind nearby bushes.

episodes.name: Escape
episodes.description: A pair of inmates jump a guard and escape from prison using the guard's clothes. One of the two kidnaps his own son's older half-brother, a son who was born after the escapee was imprisoned for raping the older brother.

episodes.name: Brotherhood
episodes.description: The murder and sodomy of a local fraternity pledge master leads the detectives to his pornographic Web site, which features college girls at a local bar. Further investigation points back to the fraternity, whose members are not cooperating, and their code of conduct for prospect... Read all

episodes.name: Hate
episodes.description: After an Arab-American woman is set on fire, the detectives discover an intensely xenophobic man aiming to cleanse America.

episodes.name: Ritual
episodes.description: Two garbage collectors run into what they first think is a scene of animal sacrifice.

episodes.name: Families
episodes.description: A high school student is found murdered, and it appears she's the victim of incest.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.description: Detectives interview an overprotective mother to find out why her son is scavenging for food.

episodes.name: Mean
episodes.description: When a schoolgirl's body is found in the trunk of a car, Stabler and Benson find themselves investigating allegations of bullying among her classmates.

episodes.name: Careless
episodes.description: After a young boy dies during a church vigil, Tutuola and Munch investigate the boy's foster parents and social worker for neglect.

episodes.name: Sick
episodes.description: Two children claim that they were molested by a billionaire.

episodes.name: Lowdown
episodes.description: When the death of a prosecutor is staged using information gleaned from a coworker's caseload, Novak endangers her career to obtain a confession.

episodes.name: Criminal
episodes.description: When it becomes obvious that a forensics expert raped and murdered a student, the investigation focuses on a criminology professor that Cragen arrested decades earlier for similar crimes.

episodes.name: Painless
episodes.description: A woman claiming to have been raped and left for dead commits suicide while waiting to be treated in the emergency room.

episodes.name: Bound
episodes.description: The investigation into the murder of a senior citizen leads the squad to suspect that the killer is actually a serial killer who preys on elderly women.

episodes.name: Poison
episodes.description: Novak enlists Clark's assistance in obtaining evidence to remove a judge from the bench after his bias in two child abuse cases leads to the death of a child and the wrongful incarceration of an innocent woman.

episodes.name: Head
episodes.description: A urophile, cyber-Peeping Tom catches a child abuse case on video.

episodes.name: Birthright
episodes.description: The investigation into the attempted kidnapping of a six-year-old girl uncovers a fertility doctor's scheme to steal embryos, and prompts a custody battle between the child's biological and birth mothers.

episodes.name: Debt
episodes.description: The detectives are stumped by cultural barrier when smugglers hold illegal Chinese immigrants captive.

episodes.name: Obscene
episodes.description: A young TV star is attacked and the evidence suggests a radio shock jock who may have gone too far.

episodes.name: Scavenger
episodes.description: The entire SVU squad races against the clock to solve the puzzles and uncover clues scattered throughout NYC by a serial killer who is taunting them to find him and the next victims on his list.

episodes.name: Outcry
episodes.description: A missing teenager found beaten and tied up in a college dormitory under construction claims that she was raped by three students, but as the investigation proceeds and information obtained by the police and the press causes her story to unravel quickly, the girl recants. Since B... Read all

episodes.name: Conscience
episodes.description: A young boy is kidnapped and a local pedophile becomes the main subject. But what is the truth behind the murder?

episodes.name: Charisma
episodes.description: A career con artist, forger and thief turns to murder and serial pedophilia to populate the cult he created and get his hands on a multi-million dollar trust fund.

episodes.name: Doubt
episodes.description: An art professor's alleged rape accusation devolves into confusing battle of "he said, she said".

episodes.name: Weak
episodes.description: Benson enlists the help of a former cop turned psychiatrist in apprehending a serial rapist and murderer who attacks disabled women.

episodes.name: Haunted
episodes.description: After nearly losing his life to save a young boy from a pair of gangbangers, Fin is declared a hero... until a woman surfaces from his days in Narcotics.

episodes.name: Contagious
episodes.description: A medical exam after a car accident reveals a fourth-grader's sexual assault. The perpetrator is obvious -- but not as obvious as everyone thinks.

episodes.name: Identity
episodes.description: When a murdered gang member is linked to a sexual assault, Benson and Stabler find neither the alleged victim nor the alleged killer to be who they think.

episodes.name: Quarry
episodes.description: An old body of a young kid is found and there seems to be a link to a soon-to-be-executed pedophile. Can the squad find the link between him and the body, or is there a more sinister link?

episodes.name: Game
episodes.description: A prostitute is violently murdered and outside of a weird phone call there seems to be little to no motive. Then Stabler's son notices some similarities to a GTA style video game.

episodes.name: Hooked
episodes.description: A teenage girl who moonlighted as a hooker is killed and found to be HIV positive.

episodes.name: Ghost
episodes.description: When a wealthy couple is found dead in their home, Benson and Stabler soon realize that their deaths are connected to a drug smuggling ring. Eventually the road leads back to the same drug dealers who forced a former assistant district attorney into hiding, and Alex Cabot comes h... Read all

episodes.name: Rage
episodes.description: Years ago Stabler was unable to get a conviction on a rape-murder case. Now the suspect is held and questioned once again, and Stabler is sure he is guilty. But can he keep his head straight enough to get a confession?

episodes.name: Pure
episodes.description: The team races against time to locate a kidnapped 18-year-old girl. The case is complicated when the detectives receive a dubious offer of help from a man who claims to have had psychic visions of the missing teenager.

episodes.name: Intoxicated
episodes.description: When a mom finds her 15-year-old daughter in bed with a 21-year-old man, she goes to the SVU to report rape.

episodes.name: Night
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler have a suspect (Alfred Molina) but not enough evidence when a serial rapist preys on undocumented immigrant women, and Tracy Kibre (Bebe Newirth) is brought in to work on the case.

episodes.name: Blood
episodes.description: After a young woman's baby is tossed out of a car, Benson and Stabler investigate to find out what happened, and after learning the young woman is addicted to prescription painkillers, their investigation leads them to an elderly woman named Jenny Rogers, who lives with her son K... Read all

episodes.name: Parts
episodes.description: When the head of a woman is found with traces of semen on it, the detectives suspect they have a necrophiliac. But they learn that they're dealing with a black market organ ring. John learns that Amy Solway, a person they sent to prison is looking for a kidney. As are the parents... Read all

episodes.name: Goliath
episodes.description: After the wife of a police officer claims her husband raped her, Benson and Stabler arrest the man and come close to believing his version of events when he attacks his captain. When another officer murders his wife and attempts to kill himself that same night, the whole force ge... Read all

episodes.name: Demons
episodes.description: Det. Stabler goes undercover to determine if a recent parolee is reverting to his rapist urges.

episodes.name: Design
episodes.description: A female con artist is found at the center of a colossal designer baby ring.
A little girl calls for help, claiming she's being held hostage, but the team has to keep her on the line to track her down.

episodes.name: Ripped
episodes.description: When a girl is attacked, a young man is arrested. They later learn that he takes steroids which is what made him attack her. The guy turns out to be the son of a cop Stabler knows. The cop later attacks his son and it turns out he is also taking steroids. Stabler is forced to dea... Read all

episodes.name: Strain
episodes.description: An AIDS activist is suspected of murdering a gay couple, and Detective Tutuola discovers something about a family member.

episodes.name: Raw
episodes.description: An investigation of a horrific school sniper attack leads the team to a particularly obnoxious Neo-Nazi group.

episodes.name: Name
episodes.description: The discovery of a boy's remains 30 years after he disappeared sets off a search for five other boys who went missing and were never found.

episodes.name: Starved
episodes.description: Detective Benson goes undercover at a speed dating event to catch a rapist.

episodes.name: Rockabye
episodes.description: A teenage girl runs away from home to get an abortion and winds up brutally attacked, killing her unborn child.

episodes.name: Storm
episodes.description: Detectives pursue a child molester who kidnapped 3 orphans abducted from New Orleans after Hurricane Katrina and discover a more dangerous threat.

episodes.name: Alien
episodes.description: An investigation into the serious stabbing of a grade-school boy uncovers a suspect whose trial becomes about the rights of same-sex parents.

episodes.name: Infected
episodes.description: When a boy shoots the man he believes killed his mother, it leads to a legal battle over gun control.

episodes.name: Blast
episodes.description: The abduction of a little girl turns even more desperate when it's found she's suffering from an undiagnosed leukemia.

episodes.name: Taboo
episodes.description: When a baby boy is discovered in the rubbish, detectives Benson and Stabler use a t-shirt found at the scene to trace the crime back to a well-to-do college student.

episodes.name: Manipulated
episodes.description: A successful lawyer's secret life as an exotic dancer is revealed to her boss and her fiancé after she and a stripper friend are found murdered.

episodes.name: Gone
episodes.description: A female student from Montreal goes missing during a class trip to New York City after she spends a night partying with three cocky prep school boys.

episodes.name: Class
episodes.description: A Hudson University co-ed dependent on financial aid is found murdered with an unexplained influx of cash. Her wealthy roommate is found with one of her rings, making her a suspect as the two were not friends. Benson, Fin, and Stabler have several theories about her murderer and ... Read all

episodes.name: Venom
episodes.description: Detective Tutuola is torn between his work and family when his son, Ken, is implicated in a crime. While investigating, Detectives Benson and Stabler find themselves with a much bigger crime.

episodes.name: Fault
episodes.description: A serial pedophile murders members of a family and runs off with the two younger children prompting a citywide manhunt.

episodes.name: Fat
episodes.description: Stabler and his one-time partner, Lucius Blaine, investigate a case dealing with childhood obesity.

episodes.name: Web
episodes.description: After a young boy claims molestation, the investigation turns from his pedophile father to another family member.

episodes.name: Influence
episodes.description: An unstable woman stops taking medication and mows down 10 people with her car; a former rock star wages an anti-psychiatric-drug campaign.

episodes.name: Informed
episodes.description: When a particularly brutalized rape victim resists all efforts to help her, Olivia takes her as a cause and turns up an old acquaintance during the investigation.

episodes.name: Clock
episodes.description: A 17-year-old with the features of a little girl is kidnapped. Stabler sees parallels with his own daughter, and must deal with a new partner.

episodes.name: Recall
episodes.description: Stabler and his new partner go after a possible serial rapist with the help of an unlikely victim from 30 years earlier.

episodes.name: Uncle
episodes.description: A homeless man is suspected of murder. As the case unfolds, so do Munch's family secrets.

episodes.name: Confrontation
episodes.description: Stabler and Beck track down a serial rapist who repeatedly attacks his victims based on their ovulation cycles so that he can impregnate them.

episodes.name: Infiltrated
episodes.description: The environmental group Olivia is infiltrating for the FBI is accused of murdering the CEO of a pharmaceutical company. But when she discovers that the crime may be sexual in nature, she conducts her own independent investigation.

episodes.name: Underbelly
episodes.description: Three teenage homicide victims with matching tattoos lead Detectives Stabler and Beck to an underage prostitution ring.

episodes.name: Cage
episodes.description: SVU investigates a shady private adoption agency after two undocumented children are found deserted near an automobile accident.

episodes.name: Choreographed
episodes.description: A model is poisoned to death, and it could be connected to a love triangle between her manipulative choreographer husband, his mistress, and the mistress' jealous husband.

episodes.name: Scheherazade
episodes.description: A dying man's confessions to Benson and Stabler reveal secrets about the true identity of his estranged daughter and other, more disturbing secrets.

episodes.name: Burned
episodes.description: A bitter estrangement pits divorcing couple Miles and Valerie Sennet against one another with tragic consequences.

episodes.name: Outsider
episodes.description: Fin reluctantly works with a Brooklyn detective who thinks that Fin's rape cases are connected to his unsolved murder cases.

episodes.name: Loophole
episodes.description: An investigation into a potential child pornography case actually uncovers a chemical company testing possibly toxic products on a group of building tenants.

episodes.name: Dependent
episodes.description: A woman is murdered and her husband attacked, with their 6 year old son a witness to the attack. The man awakens in the hospital and remembers seeing his teenage daughter at the scene.

episodes.name: Haystack
episodes.description: A woman accused of killing her baby commits suicide after being interrogated by an overzealous television reporter. It later turns out that the baby was kidnapped, perhaps by the baby's biological father.

episodes.name: Philadelphia
episodes.description: Olivia finds her biological brother in New Jersey, but discovers that he is under investigation by local police for sexual crimes. But her obsession with finding him puts another investigation in jeopardy as well as her partnership with Elliot.

episodes.name: Sin
episodes.description: A gay male sex worker is murdered, and the investigation reveals that a pastor who preaches extreme intolerance toward homosexuals may have had a relationship with him.

episodes.name: Responsible
episodes.description: The mother of a high school girl is caught having a sexual relationship with one of her daughter's classmates, and she may have supplied alcohol for a high school party where another student died.

episodes.name: Florida
episodes.description: Benson (Mariska Hargitay) hears from her half-brother (Michael Weston), who is on the run because of sexual assault charges. He continues to claim his innocence, though because evidence continues to pile up against him, Benson reluctantly agrees to help in the investigation.

episodes.name: Annihilated
episodes.description: The investigation of a bride-to-be's murder uncovers a man's double life; a turn in the case rattles Stabler, who turns to his wife and children for comfort.

episodes.name: Pretend
episodes.description: The investigation into an extreme fighting death leads to the discovery of a 28-year-old woman posing as a 16-year-old high school student.

episodes.name: Screwed
episodes.description: Fin's nephew, Darius, goes to trial and seems determined to take the unit down with him.

episodes.name: Alternate
episodes.description: A woman's child is missing, but her multiple personalities make finding out what happened to the child more difficult. And the case is further complicated by the appearance of a relative.

episodes.name: Avatar
episodes.description: A young woman is abducted, and the clues to her disappearance can be found by investigating at her character in an online role-playing game. And her case may also reveal clues about an unsolved case involving another girl's disappearance.

episodes.name: Impulsive
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler arrest a high school teacher for having sex with one of her students, but the teacher alleges that the student raped her.

episodes.name: Savant
episodes.description: The only witness to a mother's beating is her mentally disabled daughter who is suffering from Williams Syndrome. The husband is an early suspect, but he is protected from prosecution because of the Patriot Act.

episodes.name: Harm
episodes.description: A New York psychiatrist goes on trial after her torture methods are cited in the death of a former Iraqi prisoner.

episodes.name: Svengali
episodes.description: A grisly murder scene at the bottom of an elevator shaft leads SVU detectives to a group of individuals who are under the spell of a charismatic, imprisoned serial killer.

episodes.name: Blinded
episodes.description: Stabler suffers temporary blindness after an injury bringing a sexual predator who suffers from schizophrenia into custody. Benson's special interest in the case puts her at odds with ADA Novak, who has a personal agenda of her own.

episodes.name: Fight
episodes.description: Two troubled brothers are connected to murder investigation. However, detective Lake suspects that they are trying to put their lives back together, and that they are victims of a setup by a gang leader.

episodes.name: Paternity
episodes.description: The discovery of a lost boy leads detectives to a case involving the rape and murder of a nanny, and an automobile accident puts the lives of Stabler's wife and unborn child in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Snitch
episodes.description: A 15-year-old African immigrant is murdered and the evidence points to a neighborhood thug who intimidates murder witnesses. However, the case is complicated by the discovery that she was married to a 35-year-old polygamist.

episodes.name: Streetwise
episodes.description: A Park Avenue socialite's body is found in NYC'S Central Park, and the investigation leads SVU to the father figure of a homeless "street family."

episodes.name: Signature
episodes.description: Detectives Benson and Lake get the help of an FBI agent as they search for a serial killer who brutally attacks young women. However, there are signs that the agent may not be able to handle the mental and emotional weight of the case.

episodes.name: Unorthodox
episodes.description: After a young boy is hospitalized for blood loss following a rape, Stabler and Munch focus on a Hasidic order whose reluctance to cooperate may lead the investigation away from the real perpetrator.

episodes.name: Inconceivable
episodes.description: A canister of frozen embryos is stolen from a fertility clinic. The SVU team race against the clock to retrieve it before the embryos are no longer suitable for implantation.

episodes.name: Undercover
episodes.description: When a teenage girl says a corrections officer raped her and has also been threatening her mother in prison, Benson risks her own safety to go deep undercover and investigate.

episodes.name: Closet
episodes.description: After a gay man is murdered, the prime suspect is a star professional football quarterback who turns out to his partner. The quarterback is "outed" in the media during the investigation, and he becomes a beating victim himself.

episodes.name: Authority
episodes.description: A man accused of impersonating a police officer over a telephone and telling a fast food manager to sexually assault an employee is found not guilty, and as a result becomes a vocal crusader telling other people to defy authority figures.

episodes.name: Trade
episodes.description: A wealthy, successful coffee trader and his son are both suspects in a young woman's murder, when evidence suggests that the woman was sexually involved with both men.

episodes.name: Cold
episodes.description: Detective Lake is accused of killing a police officer, and SVU soon discovers that he has been investigating a 10-year-old cold rape case without anyone's knowledge.

episodes.name: Trials
episodes.description: Olivia discovers that a case involving a troubled foster child is tied to a cold rape case from her past, and it could be the missing link that could help catch a serial rapist. Meanwhile, Olivia is haunted by her sexual assault in prison.

episodes.name: Confession
episodes.description: A teenager comes to SVU asking for help because he is having sexual desires for his five-year-old stepbrother. He says that he has not acted on his impulses yet, but not everyone believes that this part of his story is true.

episodes.name: Swing
episodes.description: Stabler is forced to confront his mother and the ghosts of his childhood when he learns that his daughter is in trouble with the law and in desperate need of psychiatric attention.

episodes.name: Lunacy
episodes.description: Stabler runs into an old friend when the team investigates the rape and murder of an astronaut.

episodes.name: Retro
episodes.description: While investigating a case involving a baby infected with the AIDS virus, the unit uncovers a connection to a doctor who claims that AIDS does not exist and is part of a government conspiracy.

episodes.name: Babes
episodes.description: The grisly murder of a homeless man leads detectives to four high school girls with a pregnancy pact. But after their pact is revealed, somebody drives the girls' ringleader to an apparent suicide.

episodes.name: Wildlife
episodes.description: Stabler is shot while working undercover investigating a violent animal smuggling ring believed to be connected to a young woman's murder.

episodes.name: Persona
episodes.description: While trying to stop a case of domestic abuse, Benson crosses paths with a woman who has been a fugitive for over 30 years and claims that she was also a domestic abuse victim.

episodes.name: PTSD
episodes.description: SVU clashes with the Marines over jurisdiction in a case involving the murder in New York of a pregnant soldier who claims she was raped in Iraq. During the investigation, Benson has traumatic flashbacks of her sexual assault.

episodes.name: Smut
episodes.description: SVU tries to make a case against an accused serial rapist who drugs his victims so that they have no recollection of the incidents.

episodes.name: Stranger
episodes.description: Detectives Stabler and Benson's suspicions arise when a teenage Jane Doe takes on two identities.

episodes.name: Hothouse
episodes.description: The death of a teenage mathematics prodigy sheds light on some disturbing and unhealthy practices taking place among a group of competitive students at a prestigious academy.

episodes.name: Snatched
episodes.description: As SVU tries to recover a girl who was stolen from her home, the unit discovers that the victim's family is filled with con artists and career criminals--none of whom can be trusted or are beyond suspicion.

episodes.name: Transitions
episodes.description: A man is brutally beaten outside a strip club because of his lack of support for his transgender teenage daughter's desire for gender reassignment.

episodes.name: Lead
episodes.description: A pediatrician who is a convicted child molester is killed after his trial, but is the guilty party mentally competent to stand trial? Alex Cabot returns to the DA's office to prosecute the accused.

episodes.name: Ballerina
episodes.description: Detectives suspect that a murder suspect was thrown out of a window to his death, and their investigation focuses on the suspect's wife, her nephew who lives with them, and their unusual special relationship.

episodes.name: Hell
episodes.description: A former African child refugee's throat is slashed, and SVU connects the case to two former Ugandan war criminals--one a ruthless killer, the other a sympathetic former child soldier trying to change his life.

episodes.name: Baggage
episodes.description: Stabler is forced to work on a serial killer case with an abrasive detective who has been on the case for months and would prefer to work alone. However, Stabler discovers that the detective's motivation is not glory and recognition.

episodes.name: Selfish
episodes.description: An immature, irresponsible young mother is assumed to have killed her child, but it turns out to be part of a measles outbreak. A.D.A. Cabot then goes after the mother of the child who started the outbreak, who refused to immunize him.

episodes.name: Crush
episodes.description: Over the course of a complex "sexting" case involving an abused teenage girl, the team encounters a corrupt family court judge who hands down unusually harsh sentences for borderline sexual offenses.

episodes.name: Liberties
episodes.description: A judge asks an odd request for a plaintiff who is seeking a restraining order: he asks detectives to interview a convicted serial killer concerning his son's kidnapping, which took place 30 years ago.

episodes.name: Zebras
episodes.description: CSU Stuckey's careless error causes a deranged killer to go free on a technicality. Later, more signature killings emerge, and more people connected to the case may be targeted.

episodes.name: Unstable
episodes.description: SVU gets the help of an angry, violent police officer to solve a rape case. They soon discover that they may be dealing with a serial rapist, and the wrong man may be in prison for one of his crimes.

episodes.name: Sugar
episodes.description: The body of an online call girl is found in a suitcase, and the prime suspect for her murder is an Internet entrepreneur who was one of her "sugar daddies."

episodes.name: Solitary
episodes.description: Stabler is attacked by a man that he helped put away 19 years earlier. When that man faces attempted murder charges, he claims that he was the victim because of the solitary confinement he faced during his sentence.

episodes.name: Hammered
episodes.description: An alcoholic who fell off the wagon is charged in the brutal rape and murder of an abortion doctor. His defense argues that alcoholism is a disease, but why is ADA Paxton so bitterly opposed to the claim?

episodes.name: Hardwired
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler are faced with a dilemma when a child-abuse suspect offers to reveal the identity of the leader of a controversial civil rights group in exchange for amnesty.

episodes.name: Spooked
episodes.description: A grisly double homicide appears to be drug related, but the FBI soon becomes involved, and Benson and Stabler are led toward a new motive.

episodes.name: Users
episodes.description: A controversial therapist goes under the microscope after a teenage girl under his care is killed. During the investigation, Dr. Huang risks his medical license to rescue a heroin addict who is also under his care.

episodes.name: Turmoil
episodes.description: ADA Cabot is being investigated by the state bar because of a rape case, but Benson and Stabler are too preoccupied to come to her aid because Stabler's son and best friend are missing.

episodes.name: Perverted
episodes.description: Detective Benson claims that she is being framed for the brutal murder and mutilation of a biker, but how can she explain away the discovery of her DNA on the murder weapon?

episodes.name: Anchor
episodes.description: After Fin catches a serial killer who is targeting immigrant "anchor babies," his high-profile ACLU lawyer argues that he was brainwashed by a right-wing television personality.

episodes.name: Quickie
episodes.description: While investigating the death of a sexually-active 17-year-old girl, SVU finds that a suspect in the case is deliberately spreading HIV to his many sexual partners.

episodes.name: Shadow
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler work with a Special Frauds Unit detective who believes that an heiress murdered her parents and could be a sociopath.

episodes.name: P.C.
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler are forced to deal with the abrasive militant leader of a lesbian rights group as they search for a rapist and killer who may be targeting members of the lesbian community.

episodes.name: Savior
episodes.description: SVU tries to make the case against a Christian zealot who is targeting prostitutes, but it hangs on the cooperation of a pregnant prostitute who is terrified of the man and has her own demons.

episodes.name: Confidential
episodes.description: An attorney confesses that she had knowledge that her client committed a 22-year-old murder that another man was serving time for, but could not come forward because of attorney-client privilege.

episodes.name: Witness
episodes.description: A potential witness in a rape case is reluctant to testify because she is an illegal immigrant who both witnessed and was the victim of unspeakable war crimes against women in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

episodes.name: Disabled
episodes.description: The team tries to persuade a disabled woman, who cannot speak, confront and identify her rapist in court, while also protecting her from her angry, abusive sister.

episodes.name: Bedtime
episodes.description: A rape and murder helps Benson and Stabler crack a case involving a serial rapist and killer from the 1970s. However, one copycat crime remains open when investigation reveals that the crime was committed by a woman.

episodes.name: Conned
episodes.description: An abused, schizophrenic 16-year-old is a suspect in the brutal murder of his close friend. But why is Fin's son protecting the suspect from the police? And did his psychiatrist misdiagnose him for selfish reasons?

episodes.name: Beef
episodes.description: Investigation reveals that a victim with multiple DNA samples whose throat was slashed was an aspiring investigative journalist about to expose the highly unsanitary practices at a meat-packing plant.

episodes.name: Torch
episodes.description: One of Stabler's former partners joins SVU as an ADA, and helps Benson and Stabler find an arsonist responsible for the deaths of two girls.

episodes.name: Ace
episodes.description: While investigating the disappearance of a pregnant woman who was raped, SVU uncovers a Bulgarian baby-smuggling ring, and ADA Marlowe is forced to be creative and deceptive to ensure a conviction.

episodes.name: Wannabe
episodes.description: The arresting officer in a serial rapist case turns out to be a 16-year-old impersonating a police officer, and his actions put ADA Marlowe's case in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Shattered
episodes.description: A delusional and grief-stricken mother, distraught over the botched kidnapping that resulted in the death of the son she was trying to take away from his father, shoots Dr. Warner and creates a hostage situation in the morgue.

episodes.name: Locum
episodes.description: While Benson and Stabler investigate the circumstances behind a foster child's disappearance, they discover that her overprotective parents are still struggling to cope with the disappearance of another daughter.

episodes.name: Bullseye
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler reluctantly get help from a neighborhood vigilante group leader to help find out which registered sex offender may have raped two young girls.

episodes.name: Behave
episodes.description: A rape victim claims that she has been raped 4 times and harassed across the country by the same man, and the investigation reveals that she may not be his only victim.

episodes.name: Merchandise
episodes.description: A malnourished teenage girl is killed when she is hit by a car, and Benson and Stabler soon discover that she and her brother are victims in a human trafficking and sex trade scheme.

episodes.name: Wet
episodes.description: New A.D.A. Mikka Von is brought in to prosecute a case involving a professor accused of killing an attorney for a big cola company because their policies threaten free water supplies, but her first case may be her last.

episodes.name: Branded
episodes.description: A woman sexually assaults and brands two men. But after she is caught, she claims that it is revenge for an assault on her by the targets from when she was a teenager.

episodes.name: Trophy
episodes.description: While investigating a serial rapist and killer case, an interview with a victim's daughter leads Olivia to believe that she may be looking for her own biological father.

episodes.name: Penetration
episodes.description: FBI agent Dana Lewis is the victim of a sexual assault, but Benson and Stabler's investigation could compromise her undercover operation involving a right-wing militia group.

episodes.name: Gray
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler discover that an accused campus rapist may have used a drug to make his girlfriend have an abortion without her knowledge.

episodes.name: Rescue
episodes.description: While investigating a separate case involving a paramedic suspected of rape, Olivia discovers that Vivian from her serial rapist case is still in town, and her actions could jeopardize her guardianship of Vivian's son Calvin.

episodes.name: Pop
episodes.description: While investigating a boy's death, Stabler uncovers a teenage fighting ring, and tries to reach out to one of the fighters, who is being abused and forced to participate by his cruel stepfather.

episodes.name: Possessed
episodes.description: SVU goes after a man who continues to find ways to haunt a young woman he molested when she was a child.

episodes.name: Mask
episodes.description: Stabler goes undercover as a sex addict to catch a predator after the daughter of a respected sexual psychotherapist is attacked. The therapist, however, is reluctant to cooperate and suspects that he may be responsible.

episodes.name: Dirty
episodes.description: Benson reluctantly teams up with a tough detective from the Brooklyn DA's office when the latter's colleague is thrown off a roof following a violent attack.

episodes.name: Flight
episodes.description: SVU investigates whether a wealthy and powerful defense contractor forced an underage French girl to give him an inappropriate massage, and whether he used his ex-girlfriend to arrange the encounter.

episodes.name: Spectacle
episodes.description: After a sexual assault is broadcast over a university Intranet, Stabler is led to a computer expert on campus who is threatening to kill the victim if SVU doesn't look into the disappearance of his brother in 2003.

episodes.name: Pursuit
episodes.description: A journalist who hosts a program that exposes predators gets a disturbing package from a stalker, but it may also help her find the person who kidnapped her sister 25 years ago, with the help of detective Benson and Sonya Paxton.

episodes.name: Bully
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler believe that the abusive CEO of a wine company killed her CFO, but why are the company's other employees refusing to step forward and expose her?

episodes.name: Bombshell
episodes.description: After the CEO of a weapons company is stabbed in the groin in a parking garage, Benson and Stabler are forced to go undercover in a modern-day swingers club to get information about the possible suspects.

episodes.name: Totem
episodes.description: Captain Jackson helps Benson and Stabler investigate the rape and murder of a young girl, and tells them that they may be looking for a female predator.

episodes.name: Reparations
episodes.description: Casey Novak returns to the DA's office to prosecute a man accused of rape. However, Los Angeles ADA Jonah Dekker comes to New York City to serve for the defense as a favor to his family .

episodes.name: Bang
episodes.description: An abandoned baby case leads SVU to a "reproductive abuser" who has over 20 children.

episodes.name: Delinquent
episodes.description: After a teenage predator falsely accuses Stabler of sexual assault, Stabler goes on a personal mission to catch him in the act, leading to a shocking discovery about his troubled past.

episodes.name: Smoked
episodes.description: A rape victim is killed right before the trial of her accused rapist, a celebrity hair stylist, begins. However, prosecuting the suspected killer is difficult because he is working as a federal informant.

episodes.name: Scorched Earth
episodes.description: An African immigrant working as a maid accuses an Italian diplomat of rape, but is she really in it just for the money? Meanwhile, Stabler's return remains in doubt after his latest shooting.

episodes.name: Personal Fouls
episodes.description: SVU investigates an accusation that a revered high school basketball coach sexually abused his players, but they ultimately may need the cooperation of a reluctant pro superstar to make the case.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.description: An investigation into a 13-year-old girl's pregnancy leads Detective Olivia Benson to uncover family secrets of a prominent politician.

episodes.name: Double Strands
episodes.description: Detective Rollins believes that SVU has caught a serial rapist from one of her earlier cases in Georgia, but an impassioned request after a suicide attempt leads Amaro to think they may have the wrong person.

episodes.name: Missing Pieces
episodes.description: When a baby of a couple from out of town goes missing, the team tries to find him. But they later turn their focus on the parents, because the story they tell doesn't add up. And they find evidence that leads them to think that the baby died and they brought it to New York to dis... Read all

episodes.name: True Believers
episodes.description: A.D.A. Cutter tries to prosecute an African American drug dealer who raped a 19 year old music student, but his opposing counsel is a high-priced attorney who is devoted to protecting the civil rights of accused minorities.

episodes.name: Russian Brides
episodes.description: In order to bring down a Russian mobster running an international prostitution/kidnapping ring disguised as a Russian bride website, Cragen steps from behind the desk to go undercover as a "john".

episodes.name: Educated Guess
episodes.description: Benson and Rollins investigate whether a psychiatric patient was raped in her hospital ward, which ultimately leads to a possible predator close to her home.

episodes.name: Lost Traveller
episodes.description: The child of a Romani couple in Brooklyn disappears on his way home from school, but the neighborhood's rom-baro may be interfering with SVU's investigation.

episodes.name: Spiraling Down
episodes.description: A retired pro quarterback is busted for having sex with a 14-year-old prostitute, but he may be suffering from diminished capacity because of all the concussions he had on the field.

episodes.name: Theatre Tricks
episodes.description: SVU tries to figure out who was responsible for the real-life rape of an actress during an interactive theater performance that everybody just assumed was part of the show.

episodes.name: Official Story
episodes.description: SVU investigates an accusation of a brutal rape in Iraq involving a private defense contractor, and Olivia takes a romantic interest in the ADA who is prosecuting the case.

episodes.name: Father's Shadow
episodes.description: A 19-year-old creates a hostage situation after his father is accused of sexual assault, and Olivia uses her personal experience to help defuse the situation.

episodes.name: Home Invasions
episodes.description: After a couple is murdered in their home and their daughter is critically injured, SVU uncovers a number of twisted family secrets, as well as detective Rollins' gambling addiction.

episodes.name: Hunting Ground
episodes.description: An underage escort is reported missing, and SVU soon discovers that they are dealing with a serial killer who may be playing games with his victims.

episodes.name: Child's Welfare
episodes.description: While Olivia tries to help her brother regain custody of his two children, SVU discovers that a baby abandoned in front of a church belongs to a missing teen.

episodes.name: Justice Denied
episodes.description: Benson's relationship with ADA Hayden threatens to be exposed after she discovers that she helped put the wrong man in prison eight years earlier for rape.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.description: A rape investigation is set into motion after a husband sees his wife being attacked while video chatting.

episodes.name: Street Revenge
episodes.description: The task of find a serial rapist becomes more difficult when a team of neighborhood vigilante "superheroes" starts trying to avenge the crimes.

episodes.name: Father Dearest
episodes.description: Is a sperm donor father trying to have babies with the children he fathered, or could it be part of an even more fiendish plot?

episodes.name: Learning Curve
episodes.description: As Fin tries to get justice after his gay son's fiancé is brutally beaten in a hate crime, SVU uncovers a scandal involving a teacher sexually abusing a student at a prep school.

episodes.name: Strange Beauty
episodes.description: The investigation of the homicide of a young woman who recently had her leg amputated sends SVU into the strange culture of body modification.

episodes.name: Rhodium Nights
episodes.description: The murder of a prostitute at a bachelor party sends SVU on a dangerous investigation that could lead all the way into the highest reaches of New York power and influence.

episodes.name: Lost Reputation
episodes.description: After Cragen is accused of murder, the team works secretly around the clock to defend him. Meanwhile, when Amaro also becomes implicated in the scandal and his personal life falls apart, he refuses to go down quietly.

episodes.name: Above Suspicion
episodes.description: As the prostitution scandal continues to grow, key witnesses against the alleged madam begin to die under mysterious circumstances, and undercover agent Cassidy becomes a victim of friendly fire.

episodes.name: Twenty-Five Acts
episodes.description: An erotic novelist is sexually assaulted by a popular TV-show host who attempts to bring her book to life. The SVU detectives persuade her to press charges, but the investigation reveals a secret that could ruin the novelist's career and her case.

episodes.name: Acceptable Loss
episodes.description: SVU is forced to work with Homeland Security--represented by former Major Case detective Eames--when a sex slave ring it is investigating is discovered to have ties to terrorism.

episodes.name: Manhattan Vigil
episodes.description: A child abduction case brings back haunting memories of 13 year old cold case from the same neighborhood, and the two cases may turn out to be related.

episodes.name: Friending Emily
episodes.description: While Amanda's troubled sister comes for a surprise visit, the team searches for a 14 year old girl who was abducted at a frat party.

episodes.name: Vanity's Bonfire
episodes.description: A baby kidnapped from a playground leads to a twisted case of lies, betrayal, and infidelity.

episodes.name: Lessons Learned
episodes.description: A retired English teacher's suicide sheds light on a long-secret sex abuse scandal at a prestigious boy's prep school.

episodes.name: Dreams Deferred
episodes.description: The SVU needs the help of an abused, older prostitute to catch one of her Johns who is on a killing spree, but can they also help her get out of her chosen life, and save her family?

episodes.name: Presumed Guilty
episodes.description: The beating of a priest exposes a secret long hidden by the Church, but is the wrong man in prison for the crime?

episodes.name: Beautiful Frame
episodes.description: The SVU clashes with the Suffolk County DA, who is prosecuting a recent rape victim for murder .The story fails to add up when the accuser appears to be connected to the crime.

episodes.name: Criminal Hatred
episodes.description: SVU and the DA's office struggle with finding the right strategy in a case dealing with a gay man who is picking up and then attacking closeted gay married men.

episodes.name: Monster's Legacy
episodes.description: Benson and attorney Bayard Ellis help a death row inmate in Ohio whose history as a sex abuse victim may have been ignored by his defense attorney.

episodes.name: Secrets Exhumed
episodes.description: SVU becomes suspicious when FBI agent Dana Lewis aggressively tries to get a serial rapist confess to a murder that he steadfastly denies having committed.

episodes.name: Deadly Ambition
episodes.description: After Amanda kills the father of her pregnant sister's child after what she believes is an attack, SVU discovers that Amanda was just a pawn in the sister's sinister plot to get rid of him and become rich.

episodes.name: Funny Valentine
episodes.description: When a rising star is beaten by her high-profile boyfriend, the SVU detectives work every angle to bring justice against the manipulative and shameless abuser.

episodes.name: Undercover Blue
episodes.description: A former prostitute accuses Detective Cassidy of rape from his undercover days, and his defense opens up a can of worms for Detective Amaro.

episodes.name: Legitimate Rape
episodes.description: A sports reporter who became pregnant after a rape goes through torture when she takes the accused rapist to court.

episodes.name: Born Psychopath
episodes.description: The detectives deal with a 10-year-old boy who is displaying extreme psychopathic behavior.

episodes.name: Girl Dishonored
episodes.description: SVU discovers that a college may be covering up rape accusations against the members of a fraternity and shaming the victims into backing down.

episodes.name: Traumatic Wound
episodes.description: SVU has to turn to an Iraq War veteran suffering from PTSD to figure out who was responsible for a teenage girl's assault at a rock concert.

episodes.name: Poisoned Motive
episodes.description: Detective Rollins is shot by a sniper, and all of the sniper's victims have a connections to Fin and a disabled ex-partner who once took a bullet for him.

episodes.name: Brief Interlude
episodes.description: A mother from Canada taking a personal trip to New York City is found battered and raped in a rowboat in Central Park.

episodes.name: Her Negotiation
episodes.description: In the shocking Season Finale, a mysterious criminal sets off a dangerous chain of events.

episodes.name: Surrender Benson
episodes.description: Serial rapist and killer William Lewis abducts Olivia in her home, tortures her, and hides her away in a Long Island beach home.

episodes.name: Imprisoned Lives
episodes.description: The case of an abandoned seven-year-old boy in Times Square leads to the shocking discovery of two women locked in a basement cage by their abductors for nearly a decade.

episodes.name: American Tragedy
episodes.description: A celebrity Southern chef shoots and kills a teenage African-American boy that she thought was a serial rapist. But was her life in danger, or was she just an over-reactive racist?

episodes.name: Internal Affairs
episodes.description: Cassidy is forced to infiltrate a corrupt precinct whose officers are suspected of raping young women during their shifts.

episodes.name: Wonderland Story
episodes.description: Munch's retirement party is interrupted by an accusation by a recent rape victim that she has been attacked for a second time.

episodes.name: October Surprise
episodes.description: SVU uncovers a sex scandal involving New York City's mayoral front-runner, but is A.D.A. Barba too close to the case to prosecute objectively?

episodes.name: Dissonant Voices
episodes.description: A singing coach and popular TV personality is accused of sexual abuse by his students.

episodes.name: Military Justice
episodes.description: When SVU and A.D.A. Barba investigate a gang rape involving the Coast Guard, they must deal with military stonewalling, red tape, and odd legal issues.

episodes.name: Rapist Anonymous
episodes.description: A member of Rollins' 12-step group comes to her with a rape accusation, but are the accusations real or is she abusing Rollins' goodwill?

episodes.name: Psycho/Therapist
episodes.description: Detective Benson is placed in the position of facing her kidnapper, William Lewis, as he has his day in court and decides to represent himself.

episodes.name: Amaro's One-Eighty
episodes.description: Detective Nick Amaro shoots a suspect, that turns out to be an unarmed African-American 14-year-old boy and suffers the wrath of the city, internal affairs and the justice system.

episodes.name: Jersey Breakdown
episodes.description: As SVU fights for justice for an underage rape victim who was working illegally in a strip club, they find themselves stonewalled by corruption in the New Jersey legal system.

episodes.name: Betrayal's Climax
episodes.description: Sixteen year-old Avery Capshaw's (guest star Fiona Robert) parents report her kidnapped, and the SVU finds signs of a party turned violent. Her boyfriend, Manny Montero (Juan Castano), is a scholarship student from the Projects, and though his family swears he's on the right trac... Read all

episodes.name: Wednesday's Child
episodes.description: A child may be in grave danger when a child broker puts him in the hands of a couple with a history of child pornography.

episodes.name: Comic Perversion
episodes.description: SVU goes after a controversial comedian who makes crude jokes about rape after a college student accuses him of rape.

episodes.name: Gridiron Soldier
episodes.description: SVU uncovers disturbing activities in a New York City college football program when a high school player disappears after a recruiting trip.

episodes.name: Gambler's Fallacy
episodes.description: Rollins makes a deal with the managers of a gambling club to protect her job, arousing the suspicions of Benson and Tutuola.

episodes.name: Criminal Stories
episodes.description: SVU investigates a possible hate crime involving the alleged rape of a Muslim woman in Central Park. However, the actions of a meddlesome newspaper journalist given full access to Benson makes their job more difficult.

episodes.name: Downloaded Child
episodes.description: When SVU investigates accusations that a young woman is being raped by her husband, they uncover even more disturbing patterns of abuse from her childhood.

episodes.name: Beast's Obsession
episodes.description: William Lewis escapes from prison, holds a young girl hostage, and demands that Benson confess that she lied under oath at his trial.

episodes.name: Post-Mortem Blues
episodes.description: William Lewis takes his own life, but Benson remains under the microscope when some people don't believe her version of what happened since nobody can corroborate her story.

episodes.name: Reasonable Doubt
episodes.description: A famous television producer is accused by his ex-wife of molesting their daughter, but is she just trying to get revenge for leaving her for her younger sister?

episodes.name: Thought Criminal
episodes.description: Taking an active approach to catching sex offenders, the team targets a photographer with a secret life whose fantasies may have crossed into reality.

episodes.name: Spring Awakening
episodes.description: Benson stumbles upon the mother of a Baby Doe from an earlier case after an arrest, and John Munch returns to help Amaro after he is arrested.

episodes.name: Girls Disappeared
episodes.description: Sergeant Benson juggles work and her new role as foster mother to baby Noah Porter. Amaro, now working the traffic beat in Queens, arrests an underage prostitute with connections to Noah's mother Ellie, who was "greenlit" by her pimp and brutally murdered. Amaro's undercover work... Read all

episodes.name: American Disgrace
episodes.description: A basketball legend is accused of raping multiple women, but exactly what role did the powerful CEO of the sports apparel company who had a contract with him play in the situation?

episodes.name: Producer's Backend
episodes.description: While investigating the erratic behavior of a former teen actress, SVU discovers that she may have been the victim of sexual abuse by her former producer.

episodes.name: Holden's Manifesto
episodes.description: A lovelorn, socially awkward young man begins to exact revenge on the the women he believes has wronged him in his life, and his actions soon escalate to murder.

episodes.name: Pornstar's Requiem
episodes.description: Two college students are accused of raping a classmate who had appeared in a series of violent online pornographic videos.

episodes.name: Glasgowman's Wrath
episodes.description: One young girl is attacked and two older girls are missing after they go out into Central Park in search a strange creature known as "Glasgowman."

episodes.name: Chicago Crossover
episodes.description: SVU and Chicago PD officer Erin Lindsay try to track down Lindsay's half-brother, who may be able to help take down a child pornography ring.

episodes.name: Spousal Privilege
episodes.description: A retired professional football star is captured on surveillance video knocking out his longtime girlfriend, but the victim is reluctant to leave his side.

episodes.name: Pattern Seventeen
episodes.description: SVU is dealing with a serial rapist whose specific pattern connects him to several other rapes across the country, but connecting the dots becomes a jurisdictional and logistical nightmare.

episodes.name: Forgiving Rollins
episodes.description: Rollins must confront the ghosts of her past when the police chief who raped her when she worked in Atlanta is now accused of attacking another female employee.

episodes.name: Agent Provocateur
episodes.description: An actor is suspected of raping a 15-year-old girl, but are he and his agent trying to spin it into a publicity stunt for his new movie? And why is a tabloid journalist keeping the NYPD from discovering the truth?

episodes.name: Padre Sandunguero
episodes.description: Detective Amaro is put in a uncomfortable situation when his estranged, abusive father is accused of striking his bride the night before their wedding.

episodes.name: Decaying Morality
episodes.description: A confused and drugged rape victim accuses the wrong man, which leads to his death at the hands of her father. However, the search for the real culprit leads to a shocking result.

episodes.name: Intimidation Game
episodes.description: A female video game developer is harassed and threatened by a group of misogynistic cyber terrorists.

episodes.name: Undercover Mother
episodes.description: SVU helps a desperate mother who went undercover as a madam to find her daughter, who was kidnapped by sex slave traffickers.

episodes.name: December Solstice
episodes.description: The two daughters of an elderly writer suffering from dementia accuse his current wife of abusing him by giving erectile dysfunction pills to produce a new heir, and the case only becomes more complicated after he dies.

episodes.name: Parole Violations
episodes.description: Carisi's future brother-in-law makes a rape accusation against his female parole officer, forcing Carisi to investigate whether his sister's fiancé is telling the truth or allowing his old habits to resurface.

episodes.name: Devastating Story
episodes.description: SVU investigates after a news story reveals that an unidentified Hudson University coed was gang raped by a four fraternity brothers. But once the accuser finally steps forward and tells her story, everything begins to unravel.

episodes.name: Granting Immunity
episodes.description: SVU's investigation of an underage "Rainbow Party" involving prep school students is interrupted when Benson's son Noah and several of the students involved in the party contract Measles.

episodes.name: Daydream Believer
episodes.description: The joint investigation between SVU and Chicago PD moves to a new location when their rape and murder suspect kidnaps Nadia Decotis from her Chicago precinct and takes her to New York City.

episodes.name: Perverted Justice
episodes.description: A woman who accused her father of raping her when she was six now says the accusations were false. With the help of attorney Bayard Ellis and retired captain Cragen, SVU tries to get to the truth and make sure justice is served.

episodes.name: Parents' Nightmare
episodes.description: SVU helps a mother find her kidnapped son. But after they find the boy unharmed, the kidnapper has an interesting story to tell.

episodes.name: Surrendering Noah
episodes.description: Sgt. Benson (Mariska Hargitay) and ADA Barba (Raúl Esparza) take Johnny D (guest star Charles Halford) to trial for sex trafficking, rape, assault and kidnapping. But when Baby Noah's adoption becomes entangled in the case, Benson fears for Noah's future and his safety. In an int... Read all

episodes.name: Devil's Dissections
episodes.description: Rollins turns to imprisoned serial killer, Dr. Gregory Yates, when a new dead body with a similar m.o. washes up on a beach. In response, Yates makes a shocking accusation against Manhattan's Deputy Chief Medical Examiner.

episodes.name: Criminal Pathology
episodes.description: As SVU uncovers disturbing secrets about Manhattan Deputy Chief Medical Examiner Carl Rudnick, an acquaintance of Dr. Yates and key figure helping SVU with the case disappears and later turns up dead.

episodes.name: Transgender Bridge
episodes.description: A transgender teen dies after she is pushed off a bridge by another teen. The DA's office wants to try the aggressor as an adult and charge him with a hate crime, even though he appears to be genuinely remorseful.

episodes.name: Institutional Fail
episodes.description: SVU goes after Social Services after a pattern of falsified reports leads to the death of a young girl, but Benson is receiving a lot of political pressure to let it go and not open up a can of worms.

episodes.name: Community Policing
episodes.description: Police officers kill an innocent, unarmed black man whose description resembled a rape suspect. The case soon escalates into a public circus, with the police taking sides against A.D.A. Barba, who is feeling political pressure to indict.

episodes.name: Maternal Instincts
episodes.description: Rollins is placed in a no-win situation when her sister becomes a key figure in a complex case involving a rape, a drugging, and a valuable stolen flute. Meanwhile, the son of deputy chief Dodds begins working at SVU.

episodes.name: Patrimonial Burden
episodes.description: A reality TV family secrets begin to spill when their young teenage daughter learns she's pregnant.

episodes.name: Melancholy Pursuit
episodes.description: Noah gives Olivia a scare. The team catches a tough case and has to backtrack DNA from a prolific philanderer. Dodds is having difficulty with the job.

episodes.name: Depravity Standard
episodes.description: In trying a prior case the team runs into many obstacles, including recalcitrant witnesses and an overreaching volunteer cop. Carisi job-shadows Barba and Rollins runs into problems at the hospital.

episodes.name: Catfishing Teacher
episodes.description: While trying to locate a teacher who may have kidnapped a 15-year-old boy for a romantic weekend, the team discovers that the boy's kidnapping may be part of an even more sinister plot involving a coach.

episodes.name: Townhouse Incident
episodes.description: Benson winds up stuck in the middle of a hostage situation after her babysitter tells her that something suspicious is happening at the home of another family she works for.

episodes.name: A Misunderstanding
episodes.description: A high school rape accusation turns into a complicated "he said, she said" without a conclusive or satisfactory resolution of what--if anything--has taken place.

episodes.name: Forty-One Witnesses
episodes.description: A woman is sexually assaulted by a group of teens outside of an apartment building. SVU tries to build a case against her aggressors, but none of the the dozens of potential witnesses who saw the attack are willing to come forward.

episodes.name: Nationwide Manhunt
episodes.description: Two notorious killers from SVU and Chicago officer Erin Lindsey's past, Greg Yates and Dr. Carl Rudnick, escape from prison, prompting a massive manhunt.

episodes.name: Collateral Damages
episodes.description: A disgraced ex-boxer makes a deal to take down a group of child pornography distributors, but SVU is surprised when their busts include a deputy police commissioner.

episodes.name: Star-Struck Victims
episodes.description: Rollins takes matters into her own hands when Barba is forced to drop rape charges against a popular actor due to lack of evidence.

episodes.name: Manhattan Transfer
episodes.description: While SVU investigates a pair of vice cops found in the middle of an underage prostitution sting involving high-ranking public officials, the team discovers that a priest may be involved in a high school sex trafficking ring.

episodes.name: Unholiest Alliance
episodes.description: While Benson is removed from her job at SVU, the rest of the team tries to figure out who is responsible for the underage sex trafficking ring: the Catholic Church or a group of vice cops claiming to take their instructions from Ed Tucker.

episodes.name: Sheltered Outcasts
episodes.description: Carisi goes undercover at a homeless shelter to find out if a resident is the suspect in a series of neighborhood rapes.

episodes.name: Fashionable Crimes
episodes.description: A fashion photographer is accused of raping a model during a shoot, but his much more successful older designer brother tries to make the case go away.

episodes.name: Assaulting Reality
episodes.description: During a live broadcast, a dating reality show contestant claims she was raped by another contestant. SVU investigates, but soon learns that the show's producers are more interested in creating a successful storyline than actual justice.

episodes.name: Intersecting Lives
episodes.description: A corrections officer is arrested for sexually assaulting female inmates, leading his supportive union to go after Barba and SVU.

episodes.name: Heartfelt Passages
episodes.description: The case against corrections officer Gary Munson continues, Barba continues to receive death threats, and Dodds winds up in a hostage situation with the accused in Munson's home.

episodes.name: Terrorized
episodes.description: While identifying a young boy left alone in Central Park, SVU uncovers a possible terrorist plot that leads to several casualties. The DA needs a slam-dunk conviction, but the defendant's history as an abuse victim complicates matters.

episodes.name: Making a Rapist
episodes.description: A man convicted of rape is exonerated and released 16 years later. However, on the night of his release, the daughter of the woman he was convicted of raping is also raped and murdered, and he is SVU's prime suspect.

episodes.name: Imposter
episodes.description: SVU chooses to pursue a risky "rape by fraud" case involving a con artist who poses as a college admissions director to have sex with the mothers of prospective students.

episodes.name: Heightened Emotions
episodes.description: An aspiring Olympic athlete claims she is a rape victim, but the publicity surrounding the case could threaten her Olympic future, and reveal some shocking details about her sordid personal life.

episodes.name: Rape Interrupted
episodes.description: Olivia discovers that a young man facing rape charges is the son of her first police partner, who comes to her asking to cash in on an a favor that she owes him.

episodes.name: Broken Rhymes
episodes.description: A rising hip-hop star is a suspect in a brutal transgender beating, but his alibi might be as shocking as the crime itself.

episodes.name: Next Chapter
episodes.description: A woman is sexually assaulted by a masked man, but she believes the rapist is the same man who went to jail for stalking her. Meanwhile, Tucker contemplates retirement and a future with Benson.

episodes.name: Chasing Theo
episodes.description: SVU is on the lookout for a missing 6-year-old boy, but also discovers that the victim has a very dysfunctional home life and that the kidnappers may have actually had the boy's best interests in mind.

episodes.name: Decline and Fall
episodes.description: A bartender says she was raped after a birthday party for a notorious philandering businessman. The man's grandson soon claims that he had consensual sex with the woman, but the investigation later reveals a second familial match.

episodes.name: Motherly Love
episodes.description: A teenage boy uses a rifle to save his mother from her attacker, only to learn the target was someone he knows.

episodes.name: Great Expectations
episodes.description: SVU investigates the players of a youth hockey league after a locker room hazing incident.

episodes.name: No Surrender
episodes.description: Fin returns to his military roots when a fellow Army ranger attempts to recover from a sexual assault.

episodes.name: Genes
episodes.description: A suspect claims his genetics make him commit rape.

episodes.name: Net Worth
episodes.description: An investment banker accuses her client of rape.

episodes.name: Know It All
episodes.description: The suspect in a rape and murder investigation threatens to reveal the secrets of those working the case.

episodes.name: The Newsroom
episodes.description: Benson and Barba ask witnesses to risk their jobs when a news anchor makes a rape accusation against her boss on the air.

episodes.name: Real Fake News
episodes.description: A congressman asks SVU for help when he's accused of soliciting underage girls, but the investigation uncovers a sex trafficking ring.

episodes.name: Spellbound
episodes.description: A spiritual healer is accused of using hypnosis to sexually assault a client.

episodes.name: Conversion
episodes.description: Barba must argue that the First Amendment does not give a person the right to break the law when a woman is raped by a member of her church group.

episodes.name: American Dream
episodes.description: The daughter of a Muslim family is killed in a hate crime against them; Barba is forced to drop charges against a suspect when a witness is deported; tensions rise between communities on both sides of the case.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.description: Benson and Barba are caught between two families seeking justice for their loved ones in a hate crime; Benson takes desperate measures to make an arrest as public protests turn violent.

episodes.name: Gone Fishin'
episodes.description: Fin catches a fugitive rapist in Havana, but Barba's case is jeopardized by a political tug-of-war.

episodes.name: Mood
episodes.description: The bizarre details of a woman's rape put the SVU at odds when Rollins and Carisi think her story is fabricated. Meanwhile, Benson goes on the offensive when her personal life is scrutinized.

episodes.name: Contrapasso
episodes.description: Rollins and Carisi uncover 3 female suspects in the castration of a man who was left for dead. Langan has devastating news for Benson.

episodes.name: No Good Reason
episodes.description: A teenager disappears after schoolmates make her the subject of a vicious cyberbullying attack.

episodes.name: Complicated
episodes.description: A young woman is found wandering alone in Central Park resulting in the reopening of a 10 year old case, while Olivia Benson and Sheila Porter go to family court regarding Noah.

episodes.name: Unintended Consequences
episodes.description: When a teenaged girl is found dead, Rollins goes undercover at a high-end rehab center where she was last seen alive. Meanwhile, Benson tries to overcome her doubts about Sheila.

episodes.name: Something Happened
