episodes.description: Benson must disclose the secrets of her past to help a rape victim recall the details of one terrible, traumatic night.

episodes.name: Intent
episodes.description: The cops get tangled in an elaborate online hoax that leads to the rape of a popular social media star. Meanwhile, Benson sets firm ground rules with Sheila.

episodes.name: Gone Baby Gone
episodes.description: Emotions run high as the SVU squad searches frantically for Benson's missing son.

episodes.name: Pathological
episodes.description: When the SVU investigates a case involving two students in a special needs school, Rollins discovers that one child's medical issues stem from a surprising source.

episodes.name: Flight Risk
episodes.description: When an airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault, Barba convenes a grand jury to determine their employer's complicity in the crime. Meanwhile, Fin takes steps to ensure Benson is protected at work.

episodes.name: Info Wars
episodes.description: After a female pundit is assaulted during a protest, Benson and Barba struggle to put their political beliefs aside in order to help bring the attacker to justice.

episodes.name: The Undiscovered Country
episodes.description: When an infant goes missing, detectives take sides in the family's right-to-die court case. Meanwhile, Barba's interference in the case puts the whole DA's office in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Chasing Demons
episodes.description: A doctor who was arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free due to Cassidy's testimony which results in a mistrial.

episodes.name: In Loco Parentis
episodes.description: Carisi's niece reports a classmate's sexual assault; Stone discovers that there aren't any perfect witnesses when it comes to sex crimes.

episodes.name: Dare
episodes.description: A girl's death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.

episodes.name: Send in the Clowns
episodes.description: The cops search for a masked man when a student vanishes during a field trip to New York City.

episodes.name: Service
episodes.description: The SVU must break through military red tape when a soldier is suspected of sexual assault.

episodes.name: Sunk Cost Fallacy
episodes.description: Benson crosses paths with Alexandra Cabot while searching for an abducted woman and her daughter.

episodes.name: The Book of Esther
episodes.description: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.

episodes.name: Guardian
episodes.description: Fin investigates a man's claim that his sister was gang raped.

episodes.name: Mama
episodes.description: An Alzheimer's patient claims to have been raped; Fin receives his sergeant orders.

episodes.name: Remember Me
episodes.description: When a young woman takes a man hostage, Benson puts herself at risk to defuse the situation; SVU discovers the reason for the abduction.

episodes.name: Remember Me Too
episodes.description: Benson's suspicions about a kidnapping victim uncover a criminal network determined to silence anyone who gets in their way.

episodes.name: Man Up
episodes.description: A teenager refuses to name his attacker; Benson and Rollins reveal major life changes.

episodes.name: Man Down
episodes.description: In the conclusion to the season premiere, ADA Stone blames himself for the shocking verdict in Sam's case, and before Benson can offer help, Sam makes a tragic decision.

episodes.name: Zero Tolerance
episodes.description: After the rescue of a young girl from a sex trafficker, Benson and Stone must take drastic measures to reunite her with her mother. Meanwhile, Rollins decides to give her rocky relationship another chance.

episodes.name: Revenge
episodes.description: As a string of break-in assaults grows more violent, the cops investigate an online incel group to identify a suspect.

episodes.name: Accredo
episodes.description: A member of a women's empowerment group is found murdered, leading the cops to the group's charismatic male leader. Meanwhile, Rollins keeps her pregnancy under wraps to avoid going on desk duty.

episodes.name: Exile
episodes.description: A young woman wakes up in the hospital with no memory of her assault, and Carisi's investigation stalls when she disappears.

episodes.name: Caretaker
episodes.description: The cops wrestle with an unthinkable crime when a family is murdered in their sleep.

episodes.name: Hell's Kitchen
episodes.description: A waitress from a trendy New York restaurant is sexually assaulted at an after-hours VIP party.

episodes.name: Mea Culpa
episodes.description: Stone asks Benson to investigate a sexual assault from his past that he feels guilt and uncertainty about; Rollins considers a proposal from Al.

episodes.name: Alta Kockers
episodes.description: The investigation into a promising new author's death leads to a decades-old secret kept between two reclusive brothers.

episodes.name: Plastic
episodes.description: A woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon (guest star Mark Feuerstein) and his girlfriend of rape.

episodes.name: Dear Ben
episodes.description: A serial rapist strikes again after two decades of silence, and SVU is determined to uncover the elusive criminal and bring justice to his many victims. Stone discovers that his father worked on the case before it went cold.

episodes.name: A Story of More Woe
episodes.description: Benson tries to help two teenage sisters whose father has been murdered. Meanwhile, Rollins reconsiders her relationship with Al before she later goes into labor.

episodes.name: Part 33
episodes.description: As Stone prosecutes the case of a woman who killed her abusive husband, Benson and her squad wrestle with the duty of testifying against her.

episodes.name: Brothel
episodes.description: Benson and the team investigate the death of a prostitute at a brothel. They wonder if there was foul play or if this could be a case of a junkie who relapsed, turned to tricking, got depressed and committed suicide.

episodes.name: Facing Demons
episodes.description: Benson and the SVU investigate the death of a man they believe to be a pedophile. When they dig deeper, they realize things are not what they seem and that the case actually hits really close to home.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.description: The SVU squad pursues a suspect after a child is found in the trunk of an abandoned car.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.description: When defense attorney Nikki Staines is raped after a police charity event, Benson reluctantly looks to her own for a suspect.

episodes.name: Dearly Beloved
episodes.description: The SVU investigates a he-said, she-said case when a woman crashes a wedding to accuse her therapist of sexual assault.

episodes.name: The Good Girl
episodes.description: Benson and the team work to uncover a pregnant teenager's secret when she refuses to name the baby's father.

episodes.name: Exchange
episodes.description: Benson helps a teenaged foreign exchange student after she's assaulted by a cab driver.

episodes.name: Diss
episodes.description: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing record artist. Meanwhile, Fin's family ties to a suspect takes him off the case.

episodes.name: Assumptions
episodes.description: After a Muslim woman is assaulted inside of a synagogue, SVU searches for two suspects that were spotted fleeing the scene of the crime.

episodes.name: End Game
episodes.description: Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death of a girl found dead in the Hudson River but can't prove it. Despite having only circumstantial evidence ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

episodes.name: I'm Going To Make You a Star
episodes.description: When an actress accuses a high-powered media mogul of attempted rape, Benson finds herself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse. Changes in the squad room put Carisi between a rock and a hard place.

episodes.name: The Darkest Journey Home
episodes.description: Benson works with a young woman to help her remember details and suspects in her rape. In order to learn a new witness interview technique, Rollins and Fin have to experience it for themselves.

episodes.name: Down Low in Hell's Kitchen
episodes.description: A serial predator targeting men in gay bars proves difficult to catch, until a celebrity comes forward with his story.

episodes.name: The Burden of Our Choices
episodes.description: Rollins clashes with the parents of a teenaged runaway. The squad comes together for a special event.

episodes.name: At Midnight in Manhattan
episodes.description: The detectives are spread thin when three major cases come in at Midnight. Amanda and Carisi argue over an arrest.

episodes.name: Murdered at a Bad Address
episodes.description: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery; Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

episodes.name: Counselor, It's Chinatown
episodes.description: The SVU squad joins an undercover task force to bust a human trafficking ring.

episodes.name: We Dream of Machine Elves
episodes.description: Rollins goes undercover to find a suspect who is drugging and assaulting tourists, while Benson helps the victims sort out their memories from their hallucinations.

episodes.name: Can't Be Held Accountable
episodes.description: A former detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two young daughters are being groomed by the influential predatory owner of a modeling agency for teenage girls and his equally predatory female assistant.

episodes.name: Must Be Held Accountable
episodes.description: A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.

episodes.name: She Paints for Vengeance
episodes.description: After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.

episodes.name: The Longest Night of Rain
episodes.description: Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault. Captain Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.

episodes.name: Redemption in Her Corner
episodes.description: Kat steps over the line when she suspects a trainer at her boxing gym is taking advantage of his students.

episodes.name: I Deserve Some Loving Too
episodes.description: Rollins goes undercover to root out a government worker withholding green cards in exchange for sex.

episodes.name: Swimming with the Sharks
episodes.description: A woman accuses her business partner of rape, which leads to an investigation into her company's practices.

episodes.name: Eternal Relief from Pain
episodes.description: Rollins' sister stirs up trouble and a possible SVU investigation when she reports a doctor who trades prescription painkillers for sex.

episodes.name: Dance, Lies and Videotape
episodes.description: An ingénue ballerina discovers she's been secretly videotaped for a pornographic website.

episodes.name: Garland's Baptism by Fire
episodes.description: Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

episodes.name: Solving for the Unknowns
episodes.description: The SVU struggles to find a serial predator who uses a date rape drug that leaves no evidence behind. Rollins receives some good news.

episodes.name: The Things We Have to Lose
episodes.description: As Carisi begins the long-anticipated trial of Sir Toby Moore, the SVU faces setbacks in several other cases.

episodes.name: Guardians and Gladiators
episodes.description: When the squad tries to solve an assault in Central Park, they are hampered by their own blind spots and a community that is losing trust in the police.

episodes.name: Ballad of Dwight and Irena
episodes.description: Rollins and Tamin respond to a dangerous domestic violence call, while Fin gives his deposition in the lawsuit against him.

episodes.name: Remember Me in Quarantine
episodes.description: The SVU questions a group of college roommates when one of them, an Italian exchange student, goes missing during COVID-19 lockdown.

episodes.name: Sightless in a Savage Land
episodes.description: While the squad spends New Year's Eve tracking down an Amber Alert ADA Carisi and Counselor Barba square off in an emotional courtroom battle.

episodes.name: Turn Me on Take Me Private
episodes.description: The SVU investigates when a role-play session on a camming website turns violent after one user decides to meet his idol in person.

episodes.name: The Long Arm of the Witness
episodes.description: Carisi takes on a powerful judge when he inexplicably dismisses the rape case of a university student.

episodes.name: Hunt, Trap, Rape, and Release
episodes.description: Benson teams up with Lt. Barek and the Bronx SVU to track down a serial rapist with victims in both boroughs.

episodes.name: The Only Way Out Is Through
episodes.description: Benson helps two sisters get closure from a harrowing childhood assault; Kat's cousin reaches out for help.

episodes.name: Return of the Prodigal Son
episodes.description: The squad rallies around Det. Stabler to find the suspect behind a threat to his family.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Pedo Motel
episodes.description: The SVU must contend with an angry neighborhood watch group when a girl goes missing near a building that houses several sex offenders.

episodes.name: Our Words Will Not Be Heard
episodes.description: A high-profile activist suspects her sister has been kidnapped by a hate group; Garland & Benson push for change with NYPD brass; Kat gets some good news.

episodes.name: In the Year We All Fell Down
episodes.description: Benson walks into a hostage situation at a neighborhood restaurant. Rollins tries to help her father after he's hospitalized.

episodes.name: Trick-Rolled at the Moulin
episodes.description: The SVU search for three women suspected of drugging and robbing wealthy men. The case leads to personal connections for both Benson and Kat.

episodes.name: Post-Graduate Psychopath
episodes.description: Rollins must revisit an old case when a child sent to juvenile detention is released after his 18th birthday.

episodes.name: What Can Happen in the Dark
episodes.description: Garland asks Benson to investigate an unusual domestic violence case when his neighbor is found injured.

episodes.name: Wolves in Sheep's Clothing
episodes.description: While Fin and Phoebe make wedding plans, Benson and Rollins try to help a homeless single mother who's being trafficked in exchange for safe housing.

episodes.name: And the Empire Strikes Back
episodes.description: As the investigation into a sex-for-housing scheme expands, Benson's loyalty to Garland is tested. Rollins and Carisi try to keep their witnesses on board when a powerful congressman is identified as a suspect.

episodes.name: Never Turn Your Back on Them
episodes.description: The search for a missing witness leads Fin and Kat down a dangerous path; Chief McGrath puts pressure on Garland and Benson to get a conviction.

episodes.name: I Thought You Were on My Side
episodes.description: Benson and Rollins must contend with the FBI and the Organized Crime bureau when a rape victim identifies a dangerous mobster as her assailant.

episodes.name: One More Tale of Two Victims
episodes.description: The SVU searches for a serial rapist who preys on mothers with young children. Benson and Fin struggle under the tightened reins of Chief McGrath.

episodes.name: Fast Times @TheWheelhouse
episodes.description: The SVU faces the fury of social media fans when they arrest two popular influencer brothers.

episodes.name: The Five Hundredth Episode
episodes.description: Amaro returns back and surprise the squad While Olivia's ex-boyfriend Burton Lowe ask SVU for help with overturning a wrongful conviction in one of Cragen's old cases.

episodes.name: They'd Already Disappeared
episodes.description: An investigation into missing sex workers leads SVU to a horrifying discovery.

episodes.name: Nightmares in Drill City
episodes.description: A fringe, possibly trafficked 17-year-old leads her rap crew to a rival's hideout under the guise of a hookup text. Homicide gets involved, and her mere involvement vs. masterminding come to question.

episodes.name: People vs. Richard Wheatley
episodes.description: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler. Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barba agrees to take the case.

episodes.name: Silent Night, Hateful Night
episodes.description: The squad is called in to investigate a wave of hate crimes on Christmas Eve. Amanda catches up with an old flame.

episodes.name: Burning with Rage Forever
episodes.description: A boy disappears after meeting up with an online gamer. Benson suspects her son is being bullied.

episodes.name: Tommy Baker's Hardest Fight
episodes.description: When a popular fighter doesn't show up for the biggest bout of the year, Rollins and Velasco are drawn into a complicated web of secrets. McGrath confides in Benson.

episodes.name: If I Knew Then What I Know Now
episodes.description: A young woman learning about her birth parents asks Benson for help. Carisi and Rollins weigh the risks of publicly disclosing their relationship.

episodes.name: Video Killed the Radio Star
episodes.description: Benson investigates allegations against a popular radio personality. Rollins goes undercover when a shocking confession leads to another crime.

episodes.name: Promising Young Gentlemen
episodes.description: Carisi's niece helps a friend report a sexual assault; Benson investigates a college's secret society that preys on female students.

episodes.name: Sorry If It Got Weird for You
episodes.description: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time in El Barrio
episodes.description: Velasco asks Benson for help finding three girls who were trafficked from his hometown to New York City.

episodes.name: Eighteen Wheels a Predator
episodes.description: Rollins and Fin investigate an assault in Kentucky that has striking similarities to that of a victim found in Central Park; Benson receives intel that turns the case upside down.

episodes.name: Tangled Strands of Justice
episodes.description: Garland asks Benson to reopen a missing persons case he worked as a rookie officer. A victim in one of Carisi's recent cases is arrested.

episodes.name: Did You Believe in Miracles?
episodes.description: When a student's school reports a girl missing, the squad must track down a trusted family friend for answers. Benson gets a Mother's Day surprise.

episodes.name: Confess Your Sins to Be Free
episodes.description: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty. Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

episodes.name: A Final Call at Forlini's Bar
episodes.description: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

episodes.name: Gimme Shelter - Part Two
episodes.description: Benson and Stabler assist in the case of a young girl's shooting and realize it's more than a typical homicide.

episodes.name: The One You Feed
episodes.description: A group of teens terrorizing tourists has the SVU squad working overtime; McGrath teams them up with the Bronx gang unit to track down a crucial lead.

episodes.name: Mirror Effect
episodes.description: Benson tries to help a pop star in a volatile relationship; Rollins struggles with taking the stress of work home with her; Fin teaches a rookie a lesson in respecting fellow officers.

episodes.name: The Steps We Cannot Take
episodes.description: A home invasion and kidnapping leads the SVU to a shocking discovery. Muncy tries to fit in with the squad.

episodes.name: Breakwater
episodes.description: A young man asks the SVU for help when he suspects his boss is preying on his sister; Velasco tries to convince a reluctant witness to testify in court.

episodes.name: Controlled Burn
episodes.description: A workaholic is raped after joining her boss to a shady elite party.

episodes.name: Dead Ball
episodes.description: When the case against a popular sports star falls through, Benson digs into the suspect's past to uncover additional victims; Velasco is disappointed when he meets one of his heroes.

episodes.name: A Better Person
episodes.description: The SVU hunts for a violent suspect who killed a detective's child; Rollins ponders a potential opportunity.

episodes.name: And a Trauma in a Pear Tree
episodes.description: Carisi and Rollins work together on an important arraignment. Benson tries to make Noah's Christmas wish come true when a case falls in her lap.

episodes.name: Jumped In
episodes.description: When Benson becomes the target of a ruthless gang leader, Capt. Duarte takes the case; Fin works with the Bronx SVU to help clear its case backlog; Lt. Dixon offers to translate when a deaf student is raped.

episodes.name: Soldier Up
episodes.description: While Benson tries to help the gang member who attacked her, Duarte reveals a shocking piece of evidence in the case. Fin is tasked with hiring new detectives for the Bronx SVU.

episodes.name: Blood Out
episodes.description: As Benson and Carisi put a vengeful crime boss on trial, Fin tries to help a woman who was drugged and left for dead; Velasco takes drastic action to get information from a witness.

episodes.name: Intersection
episodes.description: A car accident leads the detectives on a search for an ambulance driver assaulting his charges; Fin gives Detective Bruno a tour of Manhattan SVU.

episodes.name: Dutch Tears
episodes.description: A recently released convict goes looking for his arresting officer, Fin Tutuola; Carisi tries to get an arrest warrant without a positive suspect ID.

episodes.name: King of the Moon
episodes.description: A man with dementia confesses to murder, but Benson and Carisi believe there's more to the case; when rumors swirl around the squad room, Fin presses Velasco for the truth.

episodes.name: The Presence of Absence
episodes.description: An internet dating site becomes the source of terror for a young widow; Muncy struggles with Velasco's absence.

episodes.name: Lime Chaser
episodes.description: The search for a suspect who drugs women's drinks in crowded bars leads the SVU to Muncy's brother; Churlish makes a risky move to impress Benson.

episodes.name: Bubble Wrap
episodes.description: A construction tycoon interferes with an SVU investigation into her family. Carisi struggles to get an indictment when the complainant backs down.

episodes.name: Bend the Law
episodes.description: Carisi must tread carefully when Maxwell's husband becomes a person of interest in an SVU investigation. Benson sends Velasco to take an old friend into custody.

episodes.name: Debatable
episodes.description: Benson tries to help a student after she's assaulted on a field trip. Fin suspects a witness in the case may not be telling the whole truth.

episodes.name: Bad Things
episodes.description: Benson and Carisi are baffled when a series of assaults have the same M.O. but different DNA at each crime scene. Muncy believes Elias Olsen has struck again and is determined to prove it.

episodes.name: All Pain Is One Malady
episodes.description: In the search for a revenge-for-hire crime ring, Benson and Stabler combine forces on a case that has now spread globally.

episodes.name: Tunnel Blind
episodes.description: As the squad celebrates the birth of Rollins and Carisi's child, another child goes missing in broad daylight.

episodes.name: Truth Embargo
episodes.description: As Benson teams up with the FBI on an unsolved case, Fin and Velasco investigate a flash mob robbery that lead to a sexual assault.

episodes.name: The Punch List
episodes.description: The SVU helps a man come to terms with being victimized; Benson tries to support a victim's family when tragedy strikes twice.

episodes.name: Duty to Report
episodes.description: When Chief McGrath's daughter discloses a sexual assault, Benson must balance the intricacies of the investigation with McGrath's impulsive actions.

episodes.name: Zone Rouge
episodes.description: A cryptic message sends SVU on a new track to find Maddie. Benson tries to help a federal agent when the case hits too close to home. Capt. Curry tries to make amends with Fin.

episodes.name: Carousel
episodes.description: The SVU must track down a mysterious suspect targeting tourists staying in hostels and race to identify one woman's attacker before she opts to go home.

episodes.name: Probability of Doom
episodes.description: When a woman turns her husband in for possessing child pornography, the case is complicated by a sudden death. Benson tries to reconnect with a victim she saved.

episodes.name: Third Man Syndrome
episodes.description: A brutal assault in the street leads Carisi to pursue hate crime charges. Benson must support a home-bound witness too scared to speak up.

episodes.name: Children of Wolves
episodes.description: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation. Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

episodes.name: Combat Fatigue
episodes.description: The squad is on edge as Carisi waits for a verdict in Maddie's kidnapping case. Benson tries to help the Flynn family pick up the pieces of their broken life.

episodes.name: Prima Nocta
episodes.description: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding. Rollins pitches in on her day off.

episodes.name: Marauder
episodes.description: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sister's disappearance. Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

episodes.name: Duty to Hope
episodes.description: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder. Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son. Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

episodes.name: Fractured
episodes.description: The SVU investigates a brutal attack on a group of law students; Benson hopes the discovery of a hidden camera will crack the case open; Carisi's best chance at conviction is catching the defendant in a lie.

episodes.name: Excavation
episodes.description: Devastating repressed memories come back to a woman when she finds an old notebook in her family home; bringing charges in a decades-old crime proves even more difficult for Carisi when a powerful judge stalls the case.

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.description: A couple's dinner party ends with a violent home invasion and assault by masked men; Rollins suspects the crime is linked to her Intelligence investigation of an international gang of thieves.

episodes.name: Constricted
episodes.description: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi can't help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

episodes.name: Economics of Shame
episodes.description: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

episodes.name: Rorschach
episodes.description: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

episodes.name: Tenfold
episodes.description: Bruno must get to the center of a victim's incomplete story to track down a serial rapist; Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

episodes.name: Cornered
episodes.description: Carisi tries to protect two women taken hostage in a tense standoff between police and a violent thief. Benson and Rollins devise a risky plan to get everyone to safety.

episodes.name: First Light
episodes.description: An abhorrent web of lies and betrayal is uncovered when a woman is confronted with video of a night she can't remember. Carisi struggles to move on from his ordeal when the suspect changes his plea.

episodes.name: Master Key
episodes.description: When a teen from a group home goes missing, the squad must quickly determine if he ran away or was abducted. Velasco puts pressure on the system at large for letting children slip through the cracks.

episodes.name: Deductible
episodes.description: A young boy seeks help when his sister doesn't come home from work. Benson and Carisi suspect a woman's assault was prearranged by a third party.

episodes.name: Calculated
episodes.description: When a high school principal busts a student for sexting, the SVU uncovers a sinister case of distribution concerning hundreds of underage students; Silva pleads for leniency for a suspect she believes is innocent.

episodes.name: Extinguished
episodes.description: Velasco teams up with a community security guard eager to prove his mettle to find a suspect in the assault of two teens.

name: Supernatural
description: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.description: Sam and Dean Winchester were trained by their father to hunt the creatures of the supernatural. Now, their father has mysteriously disappeared while hunting the demon that killed their mother, 22 years ago.

episodes.name: Wendigo
episodes.description: Sam and Dean make a stop at Blackwater Ridge and end up helping a young woman and her brother find their other brother, who mysteriously disappeared, while on a camping trip, in the woods.

episodes.name: Dead in the Water
episodes.description: Something in the lake of a small town is killing innocent people.

episodes.name: Phantom Traveler
episodes.description: A friend of John's calls Sam and Dean for help about a strange recording on the black box of a crashed plane. They soon realize that the demon which caused the crash is picking off the crash's only seven survivors.

episodes.name: Bloody Mary
episodes.description: A game of Bloody Mary unleashes a ghost who lives in mirrors and kills by gouging out the eyes of her prey, Sam and Dean must find a way to stop her before she claims another victim.

episodes.name: Skin
episodes.description: A serial killer shape-shifter adopts the likeness of Sam's college buddy to commit a gruesome murder. When the brothers investigate, the being "borrows" Dean's form to continue the killing spree.

episodes.name: Hook Man
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate an age-old urban legend known only as the Hook-Man, the spirit of a 19th century pastor with a twisted sense of morals that is unknowingly being used as an innocent girl's attack dog.

episodes.name: Bugs
episodes.description: Sam and Dean head to Oklahoma to investigate a recent spate of insect related deaths around a new housing development.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.description: Following visionary Sam's recent nightmare about the former Winchester home in Lawrence, Kansas, where the present dwellers, Jenny from Wichita and mother to two small kids, are suspiciously accident-prone, Dean reluctantly accepts to drive there. Dean and Sam reassure Jenny but ... Read all

episodes.name: Asylum
episodes.description: While investigating a haunting in an abandoned asylum and rescuing two teenagers who ventured in, Sam and Dean become trapped with the spirits of those who had died in a riot decades ago, one of which was a doctor who causes extreme rage in his victims.

episodes.name: Scarecrow
episodes.description: After arguing about the search for their father, Sam and Dean split ways - Sam to continue the search in California, Dean to hunt the mysterious disappearances of passing-through couples in Indiana.

episodes.name: Faith
episodes.description: After Dean is fatally injured on a case, Sam thinks he's found a cure in a preacher who performs miracles. However, after they discover that these miracles are not as 'holy' as advertised, the brothers race to stop them before another innocent life is sacrificed.

episodes.name: Route 666
episodes.description: Dean is contacted by an ex-flame who asks him for help when black men in her hometown are being murdered by a driver-less racist truck.

episodes.name: Nightmare
episodes.description: When Sam's visions start happening while he's awake, he and Dean investigate the unusual murders he foretold only to find them all to be true. And that perhaps he's not the only one with special abilities.When visiting the Millers the boys go as priests.

episodes.name: The Benders
episodes.description: After following a history of disappearances in Hibbing, Minnesota, Sam finds himself locked in a cage and Dean must team up with a by the book sheriff to find him......before the hunt begins.

episodes.name: Shadow
episodes.description: While looking into a mysterious murder in Illinois, Sam and Dean come across Meg, an old 'friend' of Sam's, who may be far worse than they ever thought possible and who plans to use the brothers as bait to trap their father, John.

episodes.name: Hell House
episodes.description: When a case of a seemingly average haunting begins to go haywire, Sam and Dean come to find that two bumbling, wanna-be paranormal investigators, Harry and Ed, are already on the case.

episodes.name: Something Wicked
episodes.description: Dean gets a second chance to right a wrong from his past when the brothers get a mysterious tip from their father about a case they'd worked years ago, but left unfinished after Sam was nearly killed by the creature.

episodes.name: Provenance
episodes.description: When two sets of owners of the same painting are brutally murdered, Sam and Dean investigate with the help of an auction house owner's daughter, all while Dean shamelessly tries to pair her with his little brother.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Blood
episodes.description: After John's mentor, a vampire hunter, is murdered, John shows up to help his sons solve the case. The vampires have taken an antique gun with supernatural powers. The Winchesters set out to retrieve the gun.

episodes.name: Salvation
episodes.description: Meg turns to killing John's friends in order to get the Colt. Sam and Dean stakeout the Demon's next target; a family with a six month old baby showing signs of special abilities. John heads off alone to confront Meg.

episodes.name: Devil's Trap
episodes.description: Sam and Dean seek help from Bobby Singer, an old family friend in their mission to save their father from Meg. The brothers set a trap for Meg.

episodes.name: In My Time of Dying
episodes.description: In the aftermath of the car crash, the surviving Winchesters go to the hospital, where one is stalked by a Reaper while another must consider sacrificing himself to save the others.

episodes.name: Everybody Loves a Clown
episodes.description: After the events at the hospital, the brothers have no idea where the demon that killed their mother is hiding. While biding their time trying to come up with an idea, they investigate murders committed by a killer clown.

episodes.name: Bloodlust
episodes.description: Sam and Dean encounter a vampire hunter whose obsession may get them all killed.

episodes.name: Children Shouldn't Play with Dead Things
episodes.description: Dean and Sam investigate the death of a young college student who died in a car accident, but whose grave is now surrounded by a circle of dead plants.

episodes.name: Simon Said
episodes.description: Sam and Dean meet Andy Gallagher, a slacker with psychic powers of persuasion. Once the brothers learn that Andy's family was visited by the Demon, Sam wonders if he could be one of the special children.

episodes.name: No Exit
episodes.description: Sam and Dean meet up with America's first serial killer, while Jo lies to her mother about going to Vegas and joins Sam and Dean to help them on their hunt.

episodes.name: The Usual Suspects
episodes.description: Dean has been framed for murder. Sam tries to find the one behind it.

episodes.name: Crossroad Blues
episodes.description: The people of a small town have been selling their souls to a crossroad demon.

episodes.name: Croatoan
episodes.description: Sam has a vision of Dean shooting a defenseless man, and they go to the town of River Grove, where they find the townspeople have been possessed by a virus that makes them violent.

episodes.name: Hunted
episodes.description: Sam meets a woman who shares his ability to have visions, and she warns him that she has seen the future where he dies in an explosion.

episodes.name: Playthings
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate an Connecticut inn run by a single mother where mysterious deaths are taking place. They find evidence of Hoodoo, and try to figure out who is causing the chaos.

episodes.name: Nightshifter
episodes.description: The Winchesters investigate a series of crimes where robbers with no criminal past commit suicide after the hold-ups.

episodes.name: Houses of the Holy
episodes.description: An angel causes people to cheerfully go out to murder, and when the Winchesters investigate one of them falls under its sway.

episodes.name: Born Under a Bad Sign
episodes.description: Sam contacts Dean after being missing for a week. When they reunite, Dean finds Sam covered in blood and with no recollection of what happened.

episodes.name: Tall Tales
episodes.description: The Winchester brothers seek the help of their family friend Bobby while investigating a series of unexplained happenings on a local college campus.

episodes.name: Roadkill
episodes.description: A fatal automobile accident from 1992 leaves an angry apparition haunting a remote stretch of highway, and Sam and Dean try to lay it to rest.

episodes.name: Heart
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a brutal death and discover that the killer is a lycanthrope: a werewolf.

episodes.name: Hollywood Babylon
episodes.description: Sam and Dean discover that a group of ghosts are attempting to shut down production of a movie that they feel is mocking them.

episodes.name: Folsom Prison Blues
episodes.description: Sam and Dean allow themselves to be arrested in order to investigate a series of murders inside a penitentiary. However things get complicated when FBI agent Henricksen shows up to take over their case.

episodes.name: What Is and What Should Never Be
episodes.description: Dean is attacked by a Djinn and finds himself in a new reality where his mother is still alive but another dead woman keeps appearing to him.

episodes.name: All Hell Breaks Loose: Part 1
episodes.description: Sam and other "special children" are abducted by the Yellow-Eyed Demon and taken to a ghost town, where the ultimate battle must start.

episodes.name: All Hell Breaks Loose: Part 2
episodes.description: Dean hits an emotional rock bottom after a devastating personal loss. The Yellow Eyed Demon begins a calculated strategic move to unleash the armies of hell.

episodes.name: The Magnificent Seven
episodes.description: Seven demons, based on the Seven Deadly Sins, are released into the world and the brothers must combat them with the aid of a married Hunter couple.

episodes.name: The Kids Are Alright
episodes.description: A strange death reported in the newspaper prompts Dean and Sam to find Lisa Braeden, a woman Dean had a weekend fling with about 8.75 years ago, only to find she has a son turning 8. While investigating the death in the paper along with several other mysterious recent deaths, Sam... Read all

episodes.name: Bad Day at Black Rock
episodes.description: The Winchesters are called regarding a robbery of their father's storage unit, and track down the robbers to find the item stolen is a cursed rabbit's foot, which provides great luck until lost, and once lost the previous owner dies within a week. Sam picks up the foot and has gr... Read all

episodes.name: Sin City
episodes.description: The brothers investigate the death of a man who committed suicide in a church. However, Sam is forced to team up with an unexpected ally when Dean disappears with a female demon who is interested in him personally.

episodes.name: Bedtime Stories
episodes.description: A young girl trapped in a coma by her wicked stepmother sets off a series of murders based on the fairy tales her father reads her. Meanwhile, Sam tries to get Dean out of his deal.

episodes.name: Red Sky at Morning
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate the mysterious demise of drowning victims who were nowhere near water at the time of their death. They learn that each of the victims saw a ghost ship before they died.

episodes.name: Fresh Blood
episodes.description: Gordon Walker is out of prison and out for blood, Sam's blood, and pays Bela to reveal their location. Meanwhile, the Winchesters are hot on the trail of a vampire named Dixon, who in turn has a beef with Gordon.

episodes.name: A Very Supernatural Christmas
episodes.description: In this Christmas-themed episode, Sam and Dean follow the trail of an "anti-Santa" that abducts its victims by using their chimneys. Dean tries to get Sam to celebrate Christmas like they used to but Sam doesn't want to accept that it could be the last one they'll spend together.

episodes.name: Malleus Maleficarum
episodes.description: The seemingly harmless practices of a group of neighborhood witches goes bad when one of them kills a woman. Ruby offers her assistance... but she has a few secrets of her own.

episodes.name: Dream a Little Dream of Me
episodes.description: When Bobby Singer is discovered in a coma, Dean and Sam uncover a student who works through people's dreams to destroy them.

episodes.name: Mystery Spot
episodes.description: Sam relives the same day over and over, continually having to deal with Dean's death.

episodes.name: Jus in Bello
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are arrested by Agent Henriksen and thrown into a jail cell in Colorado just as an army of demons makes their first move under a new leader who wants Sam dead.

episodes.name: Ghostfacers
episodes.description: Sam and Dean inexplicably encounter the Hell Hounds while investigating a case that John failed to crack years earlier and become fixtures in their pilot for a reality show called Ghostfacers.

episodes.name: Long Distance Call
episodes.description: While hunting a creature that kills people by pretending to be their dead loved ones, Dean receives a call from John who says he has a way to get him out of his deal.

episodes.name: Time Is on My Side
episodes.description: Sam and Dean discover a doctor who, back in 1816, became obsessed with finding the secret of eternal life by taking people's vital organs. Meanwhile, Bobby finds Bela and Dean leaves Sam to confront her.

episodes.name: No Rest for the Wicked
episodes.description: Dean's time is up and he has to pay the Devil his due. When Lilith resurfaces in New Harmony, Indiana terrorizing a family to no end Sam, Dean, and Bobby steal Ruby's knife and confront the mother of all demons in a battle to the death.

episodes.name: Lazarus Rising
episodes.description: Sam tries to move on without his brother and becomes hardened and more reckless in the way he hunts. Bobby and his psychic friend Pamela try to contact the other side to find out more about Dean's ultimate fate.

episodes.name: Are You There, God? It's Me, Dean Winchester
episodes.description: The Winchesters and Bobby Singer encounter the angry spirits of people they couldn't save.

episodes.name: In the Beginning
episodes.description: Castiel sends Dean back in time to 1973 where he encounters younger versions of his parents and for the first time meets his grandfather Samuel Campbell who holds a secret that sheds a light on the Winchester Family's connection to the hunter community.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.description: A hunter named Travis points Sam and Dean towards a meat eating creature called a Rugaru. Complicating matters is the fact that Travis's target is a normal suburban dad in the earlier process of changing and he hasn't killed anyone yet.

episodes.name: Monster Movie
episodes.description: It's Halloween time and the Winchesters face-off against a shapeshifter with a penchant for impersonating classic movie monsters like Dracula, the Wolfman, and the Mummy.

episodes.name: Yellow Fever
episodes.description: Hell beckons again when Dean is stricken with a mysterious illness that frightens its sufferers to death. Sam and Dean scramble to find the cause of the disease in time to save Dean from sure death.

episodes.name: It's the Great Pumpkin, Sam Winchester
episodes.description: Investigating two mysterious deaths in a small town, Sam and Dean discover a witch is sacrificing people to summon an ancient powerful and extremely dangerous demon.

episodes.name: Wishful Thinking
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate when a small town's wishing well actually starts to grant the people's wishes.

episodes.name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
episodes.description: Sam, Dean, and Ruby discover the existence of a female prophet named Anna Milton, who can hear the voices of angels and thus figures into the plans of a demon named Alastair who wants to use her as a tool against the angels.

episodes.name: Heaven and Hell
episodes.description: "I'll Kill her gentle." The angels want Anna dead, so Sam and Dean go on the run with the frightened girl, determined to discover the secret that has set the furies of Heaven on her.

episodes.name: Family Remains
episodes.description: The Winchesters try to stop a family from moving into a haunted house.

episodes.name: Criss Angel Is a Douche Bag
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate the activities of a trio of magicians who are using a grimoire to execute real feats of magic.

episodes.name: After School Special
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a haunting at one of their old high schools where we will see what school was like for the brothers back in 1997.

episodes.name: Sex and Violence
episodes.description: The Winchesters' investigation into a series of deaths takes a deadly turn when a siren tries to tear them apart for good.

episodes.name: Death Takes a Holiday
episodes.description: Sam and Dean try to find out why people in a small town are having near death experiences with alarming frequency by going into the spirit world.

episodes.name: On the Head of a Pin
episodes.description: Castiel and Uriel ask Dean to torture Alastair for information. But when Alastair breaks free, Castiel starts to believe that there is a traitor among the angels.

episodes.name: It's a Terrible Life
episodes.description: At Sandover Bridge & Iron Inc., Dean is Dean Smith, the buttoned-down director of Sales & Marketing. Sam is Sam Wesson, a cubicle-dwelling tech support guy. What the heck is going on? Or is it what the Hell?

episodes.name: The Monster at the End of This Book
episodes.description: An author has been writing books about Sam and Dean since 2005. Sam and Dean try to figure out how he knows so much about them.

episodes.name: Jump the Shark
episodes.description: Meet the Winchester boys: Dean, Sam and... Adam. The Winchesters discover they have a younger half-brother, whose mother vanishes just as a long-dormant grave robber renews his ghoulish career.

episodes.name: The Rapture
episodes.description: Castiel has been sent back to Heaven. His human host, Jimmy, tries to regain his life. But the demons won't leave him alone and now his family is at risk. Sam and Dean can help a little, but they're going to need a "miracle" to win.

episodes.name: When the Levee Breaks
episodes.description: Dean and Bobby have something frightening locked in Bobby's panic room: Sam, contaminated by demon blood. But as the apocalypse draws nearer, Bobby wants to free Sam to battle on their side.

episodes.name: Lucifer Rising
episodes.description: The brothers prepare to fight the forces of the apocalypse in different camps. While Sam and Ruby hunt down Lilith, Dean joins Castiel and Zachariah to take on Lucifer.

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.description: Sam, Dean, and Bobby must deal with the aftermath of the Devil's escape from Hell, and receive startling news from the Prophet Chuck.

episodes.name: Good God, Y'All
episodes.description: Rufus, an old friend of Bobby's calls, panicked about demons attacking a town in Colorado. Sam and Dean arrive to help, but soon discover things aren't exactly as they seem.

episodes.name: Free to Be You and Me
episodes.description: Sam decides to stop hunting but has a hard time after he receives a surprise visit. Dean and Castiel try to find the Archangel Raphael in their bid to stop the Apocalypse.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.description: Dean refuses Sam's efforts to help him battle the Devil, and then wakes up to find himself five years in the future, in a wasteland where Lucifer has begun his endgame by unleashing a virus that transforms humans into zombies.

episodes.name: Fallen Idols
episodes.description: Sam and Dean head to a small town where people are murdered by famous dead icons. However the brothers come to a dead end when two teenagers reveal they saw Paris Hilton kidnap their friend.

episodes.name: I Believe the Children Are Our Future
episodes.description: Dean and Sam investigate a series of murders that resemble fairy tales and urban legends; the brothers track down an 11-year-old boy that Castiel deems a serious threat.

episodes.name: The Curious Case of Dean Winchester
episodes.description: Dean and Sam learn that a witch is running a poker game where the currency is life years versus money; Dean tries to intervene when Bobby starts losing the game.

episodes.name: Changing Channels
episodes.description: Dean and Sam are thrown into an alternate universe by the Trickster where they are characters in different TV series.

episodes.name: The Real Ghostbusters
episodes.description: Dean and Sam are at a Supernatural convention where they meet lots of fans of the Supernatural Books. After a while they get the impression that something is not right at the location of the convention.

episodes.name: Abandon All Hope
episodes.description: Dean and Sam get to know the whereabouts of Lucifer and want to hunt him down. But Lucifer is well prepared and is working his own plans.

episodes.name: Sam, Interrupted
episodes.description: Dean and Sam check themselves into a mental hospital so they can investigate a monster that is attacking patients.

episodes.name: Swap Meat
episodes.description: While investigating a school, Sam is the target of a teenager's body-switching spell.

episodes.name: The Song Remains the Same
episodes.description: The renegade angel Anna escapes from her prison in heaven. She travels back in time to kill Sam and Dean's parents so that Sam is never born, and cannot be the vessel for Lucifer. Castiel sends Sam and Dean back to stop Anna.

episodes.name: My Bloody Valentine
episodes.description: Castiel helps Dean and Sam hunt down Cupid after people start killing each other for love on Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
episodes.description: Sam and Dean travel to Bobby's hometown to investigate why the dead are rising from their graves. Dean has a strange encounter with Bobby's dead wife.

episodes.name: Dark Side of the Moon
episodes.description: Dean and Sam are killed by the hunters Walt and Roy. They awake in heaven and Castiel contacts Dean and asks him to seek out the angel Joshua. Meanwhile Zachariah is chasing them in Heaven to force Dean to be Michael's vessel.

episodes.name: 99 Problems
episodes.description: Sam and Dean meet a woman in a small town who claims to be a prophet.

episodes.name: Point of No Return
episodes.description: Zachariah has a new plan to overcome Lucifer but the strategy has unforeseen destructive consequences.

episodes.name: Hammer of the Gods
episodes.description: The Winchesters are abducted by a group of renegade gods who want to use them as a bargaining tool to stop the apocalypse.

episodes.name: The Devil You Know
episodes.description: Crowley offers to help the brothers hunt down Pestilence and reclaim his ring, while Dean gets a lesson in trust when Sam's history with the Four Horsemen's demon `Stable Boy' is revealed.

episodes.name: Two Minutes to Midnight
episodes.description: Bobby sells Crowley his soul in exchange for the location of Death, while Pestilence infects the Winchesters with a deadly disease.

episodes.name: Swan Song
episodes.description: With the Apocalypse looming, Sam and Dean realize they are out of options and make heart-breaking decisions that will change their lives forever.

episodes.name: Exile on Main St.
episodes.description: Sam is mysteriously released from Hell and seeks out his brother who is trying to have a normal life. Together the brothers must join forces with their maternal grandfather, Samuel, and begin the fight anew.

episodes.name: Two and a Half Men
episodes.description: When four families are killed and their babies are missing, Sam finds that a security company may be involved in the case and summons Dean to help him to bring the baby of a fifth slaughtered family to Samuel. However they are chased by a powerful shape shifter that wants the bab... Read all

episodes.name: The Third Man
episodes.description: When three policemen are struck down by the plagues of Moses, the brothers investigate, calling upon Castiel. He reluctantly appears,explaining that the murders are caused by the Staff of Moses and that there's a civil war in Heaven.

episodes.name: Weekend at Bobby's
episodes.description: After Bobby discovers Crowley has no intentions of returning his soul, the hunter takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Live Free or Twi-hard
episodes.description: When a vampire links the disappearance of a number of girls, Sam and Dean track down the bloodsucker who sinks his teeth into one of the brothers.

episodes.name: You Can't Handle the Truth
episodes.description: When several people kill themselves after asking for the truth, Sam and Dean investigate and realise that Veritas, an ancient goddess of truth, has been summoned. Her victims die when they hear more truth than they can stand.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.description: Dean becomes suspicious of Samuel's motives, but Sam isn't sold on the idea that their grandfather is doing anything wrong. The brothers go along on a hunt with Samuel and the other Campbells, but things go terribly awry.

episodes.name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
episodes.description: Crowley forces Dean and Sam to bring him an alpha monster. They go after a skinwalker, who plans to infiltrate his people into homes disguised as dogs and then have them all bite and transform their owners, creating a growing army.

episodes.name: Clap Your Hands If You Believe
episodes.description: The brothers investigate a series of abductions attributed to aliens. However, when Dean disappears and then reappears, they realise that the culprits are fairies and that only someone taken to the fairy realm can see them.

episodes.name: Caged Heat
episodes.description: Dean and Sam are captured by Meg who wants to know Crowley's hideout. Sam proposes to show where Crowley is provided she gets his soul back. The Winchester brothers ask the reluctant Samuel who has made a deal with Crowley to have his daughter Mary back but he finally points out ... Read all

episodes.name: Appointment in Samarra
episodes.description: Dean decides to bargain with Death to get Sam's soul back, and has to accept a wager. Meanwhile, Sam refuses to take the risk of getting his damaged soul back, and prepares to cast a spell to prevent Dean's efforts.

episodes.name: Like a Virgin
episodes.description: Sam emerges from his coma and discovers that he remembers nothing since losing his soul. Dean and Bobby try to keep the secret, and the brothers head to Oregon to investigate the disappearance of several local female virgins.

episodes.name: Unforgiven
episodes.description: Sam has flashbacks of a case he worked with Samuel; Sam and Dean follow the coordinates received in a text message to a small town, where Sam used to live; townspeople's comments surprise Dean.

episodes.name: Mannequin 3: The Reckoning
episodes.description: When Ben calls Dean and tells him that Lisa is in trouble, Dean leaves Sam to investigate a case alone and rushes to the rescue. However, he's not prepared for what meets him at the door.

episodes.name: The French Mistake
episodes.description: To protect Sam and Dean from a surprise attack from Raphael, Balthazar sends them both into an alternate universe where their lives are a TV show called Supernatural (2005).

episodes.name: And Then There Were None
episodes.description: When Sam, Dean and Bobby run into Rufus, and the Campbells all hunting the cause of an upsurge in supernatural activity, tensions erupt into violence.

episodes.name: My Heart Will Go On
episodes.description: The timeline is changed after Balthazar stops the Titanic from sinking.

episodes.name: Frontierland
episodes.description: Castiel sends Sam and Dean back in time to 1861 to collect the ashes of a phoenix.

episodes.name: Mommy Dearest
episodes.description: Dean, Sam, Castiel and Bobby find Eve in a small town where the citizens have been converted to demons; Eve decides to torture Sam and Dean by bringing their mother back as a demon.

episodes.name: The Man Who Would Be King
episodes.description: Castiel tells his story in his own words and confesses to some interesting choices.

episodes.name: Let It Bleed
episodes.description: Dean's worst nightmare comes true when a demon kidnaps Ben and Lisa in order to get to him. The brothers are forced to join forces with an unlikely ally to free them.

episodes.name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
episodes.description: The wall comes down in Sam's head and all hell breaks loose. Dean and Bobby are, for once, at a total loss on how to help him and are forced to stand by and do nothing while Sam breaks. The battle for heaven comes to a head.

episodes.name: Meet the New Boss
episodes.description: Castiel believes he is the new God and becomes obsessed with power. Sam, Dean, and Bobby try to find a way to stop him before he explodes with power, even if that means talking to Death himself.

episodes.name: Hello, Cruel World
episodes.description: The leviathans destroy Castiel's body and break loose. Now Sam, Dean, and Bobby have to track them all down. Meanwhile, Sam is beginning to struggle with what is real and what is a hallucination.

episodes.name: The Girl Next Door
episodes.description: Sam reunites with a childhood girlfriend who is supposedly preying on human brains.

episodes.name: Defending Your Life
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate murders of people who have their guilty pasts come back and kill them. Could Dean be next?

episodes.name: Shut Up, Dr. Phil
episodes.description: Sam and Dean get caught in the middle of a feud between a married witch couple.

episodes.name: Slash Fiction
episodes.description: Two Leviathans are impersonating Sam and Dean and going on a killing spree. Now, Sam and Dean are the most wanted criminals in the country.

episodes.name: The Mentalists
episodes.description: An estranged Sam and Dean reunite to solve a curious case in the most psychic town in America, but it's far from happy families for the Winchester brothers.

episodes.name: Season Seven, Time for a Wedding!
episodes.description: Sam runs into Becky and they end up getting married. Dean finds it suspicious that Sam is falling for her and decides to investigate.

episodes.name: How to Win Friends and Influence Monsters
episodes.description: Something is turning all of the people of a small town in New Jersey into cannibals.

episodes.name: Death's Door
episodes.description: Bobby is close to dying. He must confront his worst memory to escape, before his reaper catches up to him.

episodes.name: Adventures in Babysitting
episodes.description: While Dean and Frank try to figure out the numbers from Bobby's clue, Sam tries to help a young girl search for her missing father.

episodes.name: Time After Time
episodes.description: After attacking Chronos, the time god, Dean is sent back to 1944.

episodes.name: The Slice Girls
episodes.description: Sam and Dean go up against the Amazons as they go on a killing spree. But it's twice as difficult for Dean because one of them is his daughter.

episodes.name: Plucky Pennywhistle's Magical Menagerie
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are stumped. Somehow, a group of children's personal fears are becoming a reality and killing off a parent that each child has a certain hatred for.

episodes.name: Repo Man
episodes.description: Four years ago, Sam and Dean exorcised a demon serial killer. Now he's back for revenge.

episodes.name: Out with the Old
episodes.description: Sam and Dean stumble onto one part of the Leviathan's ultimate plot while tracking down some cursed objects in a small town.

episodes.name: The Born-Again Identity
episodes.description: Lucifer is driving Sam into madness. Desperate to save him, Dean tries to find someone who can help. He finds Castiel with amnesia, instead.

episodes.name: Party On, Garth
episodes.description: Garth calls Sam and Dean for assistance in battling a ghost that you can only see when drunk.

episodes.name: Of Grave Importance
episodes.description: Bobby's spirit tries to help Sam and Dean as they try to find a missing friend inside a haunted house.

episodes.name: The Girl with the Dungeons and Dragons Tattoo
episodes.description: Sam and Dean discover that Frank's hard drive, containing everything on the leviathans, is now in Dick's company building. To retrieve it, they ask for help from one of the employees, a young computer hacker.

episodes.name: Reading is Fundamental
episodes.description: Sam and Dean have possession of a Word of God, but are unable to read it. They find a young prophet that can help, but unfortunately, the angels and leviathans are after him, too.

episodes.name: There Will Be Blood
episodes.description: To officially kill the leviathans, Sam and Dean need the blood of an Alpha. But Dick knows what the Winchesters are up to and sends his men after them.

episodes.name: Survival of the Fittest
episodes.description: Sam and Dean make a plan to storm Dick's company building and kill him once and for all, with help from Castiel and Meg. Providing Bobby doesn't get to Dick first.

episodes.name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
episodes.description: Dean returns from Purgatory, one year after the fight with the Leviathans. After reuniting with Sam, they find out that Kevin escaped Crowley with another Word of God that may hold the key to closing the gates of Hell forever.

episodes.name: What's Up, Tiger Mommy?
episodes.description: After saving Kevin's mother from demons, Sam, Dean, and Kevin go after the Word of God which is being auctioned off by Plutus, the god of greed.

episodes.name: Heartache
episodes.description: While trying to track down Kevin, Sam and Dean get sidetracked by a series of murders where the victims have gotten their hearts ripped out.

episodes.name: Bitten
episodes.description: Sam and Dean come across a home made video of three friends whose lives are turned upside down by a werewolf.

episodes.name: Blood Brother
episodes.description: Dean assists the vampire, Benny, who helped him escape from Purgatory. Together they go after the nest led by the vampire that bit Benny. Sam thinks back to his life before Dean returned.

episodes.name: Southern Comfort
episodes.description: Sam and Dean team up with Garth, who has taken over Bobby's job, as they hunt down a Specter that's possessing innocent people who have a grudge against someone.

episodes.name: A Little Slice of Kevin
episodes.description: Crowley has kidnapped Kevin and the rest of the prophets that are able to read the Word of God. Castiel mysteriously returns from Purgatory and helps Sam and Dean rescue Kevin.

episodes.name: Hunteri Heroici
episodes.description: Castiel decides to become a hunter, like Sam and Dean. But his first day on the job is a doozy when they investigate a series of murders caused by old cartoon gags. Meanwhile, Sam thinks back to his first time meeting Amelia's father.

episodes.name: Citizen Fang
episodes.description: Benny seems to be attacking innocent people and only Dean believes he's innocent.

episodes.name: Torn and Frayed
episodes.description: Dean and Castiel try to rescue Samandriel from Crowley. Sam tries to decide whether or not he should continue hunting or be with Amelia.

episodes.name: LARP and the Real Girl
episodes.description: When two LARPers turn up dead, Sam and Dean investigate the fictional world of Moondoor, where they find a familiar face.

episodes.name: As Time Goes By
episodes.description: Sam and Dean's grandfather, Henry Winchester, arrives by time travel, claiming that he has something to protect from an Abaddon that is hot on his trail.

episodes.name: Everybody Hates Hitler
episodes.description: Sam and Dean go up against a group of Nazi necromancers.

episodes.name: Trial and Error
episodes.description: Kevin has found out that in order to close the gates of Hell, the person needs to accomplish three tasks. The first, is to kill a Hellhound.

episodes.name: Man's Best Friend with Benefits
episodes.description: James Frampton, an old friend of Sam and Dean, has become a witch. Now he's supposedly killing innocent people.

episodes.name: Remember the Titans
episodes.description: Sam and Dean come across a mysterious man that dies once every day.

episodes.name: Goodbye Stranger
episodes.description: Sam and Dean hunt down the angel tablet with assistance from Castiel and Meg.

episodes.name: Freaks and Geeks
episodes.description: A hunter has been training Krissy and other kids to be hunters.

episodes.name: Taxi Driver
episodes.description: The second task is to rescue an innocent soul from Hell and deliver it to Heaven.

episodes.name: Pac-Man Fever
episodes.description: While searching for Kevin, again, Charlie joins up with Sam and Dean as they track down a creature that's been liquefying its victims. Plus, a new side of Charlie is revealed.

episodes.name: The Great Escapist
episodes.description: Sam and Dean search for the Word's author, Metatron. Castiel tries to protect the angel tablet. Kevin tries to solve the third trial under Crowley's supervision.

episodes.name: Clip Show
episodes.description: Sam and Dean try to figure out how to cure a demon. Crowley starts killing victims that Sam and Dean have saved from previous jobs. Castiel and Metatron begin the trials to close the gates to Heaven.

episodes.name: Sacrifice
episodes.description: Sam and Dean capture Crowley to finish the trials and close the gates of Hell. Castiel and Metatron continue the trials to close the gates of Heaven. Sam is left with a huge decision.

episodes.name: I Think I'm Gonna Like It Here
episodes.description: Sam is dying. Dean asks for help from the angels. Castiel tries to adjust to being human as the angels come after him.

episodes.name: Devil May Care
episodes.description: Sam and Dean reveal to Kevin that they have Crowley hostage, while Abaddon returns to hunt them all down.

episodes.name: I'm No Angel
episodes.description: Sam and Dean track down Castiel, while Bartholomew, a new leader of the fallen angels, tries to destroy him.

episodes.name: Slumber Party
episodes.description: Sam and Dean accidentally free Dorothy, who has been trapped in the bunker for years, who seeks their help in killing the wicked witch.

episodes.name: Dog Dean Afternoon
episodes.description: When the only witness to a couple of mysterious murders is a dog, Dean performs a risky spell to help him communicate with canines.

episodes.name: Heaven Can't Wait
episodes.description: Dean and Castiel team up to find a Rit Zien, an angel healer, who is easing peoples' suffering by killing them. Sam and Kevin ask Crowley for help in finding a way to open the gates to Heaven.

episodes.name: Bad Boys
episodes.description: Dean and Sam visit Dean's old boy's home that's now being haunted by a ghost.

episodes.name: Rock and a Hard Place
episodes.description: Sheriff Mills calls Sam and Dean for help with multiple disappearances in the town. Discovering all four victims belonged to the same church chastity group, Sam and Dean decide to infiltrate by joining the group themselves.

episodes.name: Holy Terror
episodes.description: The angels go to war against each other. A secret about Ezekiel is revealed.

episodes.name: Road Trip
episodes.description: Dean and Castiel ask Crowley for help in finding Gadreel and getting him out of Sam's body.

episodes.name: First Born
episodes.description: Sam and Castiel believe that they found a way to track Gadreel. Dean and Crowley team up to find the first blade, which is in the hands of the biblical Cain.

episodes.name: Sharp Teeth
episodes.description: Sam and Dean find out that Garth has been taken in by a family of werewolves.

episodes.name: The Purge
episodes.description: Sam and Dean apply for jobs at a wellness spa so they can investigate the murders of guests who have had the fat sucked out of them.

episodes.name: Captives
episodes.description: Kevin's spirit returns to ask Sam and Dean to find his mother. Castiel is taken to Bartholomew.

episodes.name: #thinman
episodes.description: As Dean and Sam investigate the murder of a teenage girl, they once again cross paths with the Ghostfacers.

episodes.name: Blade Runners
episodes.description: Sam and Dean assist Crowley in the search for the first blade.

episodes.name: Mother's Little Helper
episodes.description: Dean copes with the side effects of the Mark of Cain, as Sam investigates a series of violent murders related directly to Abaddon.

episodes.name: Meta Fiction
episodes.description: When Castiel rejects Metatron's offer to join forces, a surprising plan is set in motion; Gadreel is apprehended.

episodes.name: Alex Annie Alexis Ann
episodes.description: Sheriff Mills calls Sam and Dean for help when she finds a young girl running from a vampire pack.

episodes.name: Bloodlines
episodes.description: Sam and Dean visit Chicago and find the city's underbelly is divided between powerful clans of monsters, including werewolves and shape-shifters.

episodes.name: King of the Damned
episodes.description: Abaddon makes a deal with Crowley to stop the Winchesters and recover the first blade. Castiel tries to bring Gadreel to his side in the war against Metatron.

episodes.name: Stairway to Heaven
episodes.description: Angels are committing suicide in Castiel's name. Sam and Dean try to find out why.

episodes.name: Do You Believe in Miracles
episodes.description: The influence of the mark on Dean reaches new heights, as Metatron begins to reveal himself to humanity.

episodes.name: Black
episodes.description: Dean is a demon and running amok with Crowley while Sam tries to figure out what happened to his brother. Meanwhile, Castiel is dealing with his diminishing grace.

episodes.name: Reichenbach
episodes.description: Crowley is worried about Dean getting out of control, giving him a target to feed the mark. Sam struggles to escape from Cole. Hannah tries to convince Metatron to give Castiel's grace back.

episodes.name: Soul Survivor
episodes.description: Sam continues to try to save Dean from the Mark of Cain. Realizing that Dean's antics are causing problems for him in hell, Crowley seeks help from a reluctant Castiel.

episodes.name: Paper Moon
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a series of werewolf attacks in an attempt to find out who the culprit is.

episodes.name: Fan Fiction
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a haunting at a theatre.

episodes.name: Ask Jeeves
episodes.description: Dean encounters a surprising message on Bobby's phone, and Sam and Dean investigate.

episodes.name: Girls, Girls, Girls
episodes.description: Sam and Dean discover a group of witches "gone wild" and they attempt to stop them.

episodes.name: Hibbing 911
episodes.description: Jody Mills is matched with an overeager partner during a mandatory sheriff's retreat; when a gruesome corpse is discovered, Jody calls Sam and Dean to help investigate.

episodes.name: The Things We Left Behind
episodes.description: When Castiel finds Jimmy's daughter in a group home, she persuades him to break her out; Crowley is faced with a big challenge.

episodes.name: The Hunter Games
episodes.description: Sam and Dean try to deal with the aftermath following the bloodbath. Castiel attempts to fix a struggling relationship with Claire, and Claire wants revenge on Dean for what he did to her friend.

episodes.name: There's No Place Like Home
episodes.description: When Sam comes across a video of Charlie attacking a district attorney, Dean thinks she has returned from Oz to hunt on her own.

episodes.name: About a Boy
episodes.description: Dean is mysteriously transformed into a teenager. He has to deal with teenage struggles all over again, along with being a hunter.

episodes.name: Halt & Catch Fire
episodes.description: To take his mind off of the Mark of Cain, Dean goes hunting. They track down a ghost that is killing college students through electronics and the internet.

episodes.name: The Executioner's Song
episodes.description: Sam, Dean, and Castiel must deal with Cain's return. Rowena and Crowley grow closer.

episodes.name: The Things They Carried
episodes.description: Despite Dean's directive to forget about looking for a cure for the MOC, Sam continues to do research. Dean suspects Sam is hiding something but decides to focus on a murder case where they run into Cole.

episodes.name: Paint It Black
episodes.description: Dean and Sam investigate grisly, identical suicides by various people with little in common; the brothers begin to suspect that a priest is involved.

episodes.name: Inside Man
episodes.description: Castiel comes back and he and Sam check out a lead on the Mark of Cain. They decide to go to Bobby for help. Meanwhile Dean and Rowena meet up.

episodes.name: Book of the Damned
episodes.description: Charlie contacts Sam and Dean after she finds the Book of the Damned - which could help eliminate the mark of Cain; Castiel and Metatron look for Castiel's grace.

episodes.name: The Werther Project
episodes.description: Sam looks for a magical box built by former Men of Letters, Magnus, hoping it will cure Dean, but is surprised by a deadly alarm system.

episodes.name: Angel Heart
episodes.description: Castiel tries to reconnect Claire with her mother who went missing, and calls Sam and Dean for help with the case.

episodes.name: Dark Dynasty
episodes.description: While investigating a strange murder, Sam and Dean discover the killer has the same tattoo as those from the Styne family; Castiel plays referee when Charlie and Rowena must work together; Crowley turns to an old enemy for help with Rowena.

episodes.name: The Prisoner
episodes.description: Dean takes matters into his own hands regarding Stynes; Sam attempts to come to terms with his decision.

episodes.name: Brother's Keeper
episodes.description: Dean comes to a stunning decision that will alter his life -- as well as Sam's; Rowena and Crowley face off, putting Castiel in the middle.

episodes.name: Out of the Darkness, Into the Fire
episodes.description: Dean and Sam dealing with the aftermath of freeing the darkness on earth.

episodes.name: Form and Void
episodes.description: Jenna winds up in a dangerous situation and calls Dean for help, leaving Sam to deal with monsters on his own.

episodes.name: The Bad Seed
episodes.description: Sam and Dean try to help Castiel recover from Rowena's spell, while searching for Amara who has now grown into a young girl. Rowena tries to use her powers to protect herself from the Winchesters, while Crowley tries to use Amara for his personal gain.

episodes.name: Baby
episodes.description: Sam and Dean's road trip to fight monsters and demons is chronicled entirely from the Impala's perspective.

episodes.name: Thin Lizzie
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a series of murders at a local B&B that also happens to be Lizzie Andrew Borden's old home. When a man tells them he saw a little girl around the B&B around the time of the murders, the brothers realize Amara may be responsible.

episodes.name: Our Little World
episodes.description: Castiel seeks out Metatron's help to stop the Darkness. However, Metatron is pretty happy with his new life as a freelance videographer for the local news and isn't inclined to help the Winchesters or Castiel.

episodes.name: Plush
episodes.description: Sheriff Donna calls Sam and Dean for help after a horrific murder with supernatural elements happens in her town. Sam continues to have visions and asks God for help, which frustrates Dean.

episodes.name: Just My Imagination
episodes.description: Sam is shocked when his imaginary childhood friend, Sully, makes an unexpected appearance. Sam tries to understand why he is seeing Sully now. Even more surprising, Dean can see him too.

episodes.name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
episodes.description: With Amara leaving a trail of bodies in her search for God, Sam enlists Crowley and Rowena to set up a meeting between him and Lucifer in the cage.

episodes.name: The Devil in the Details
episodes.description: Now that he has Sam in the cage with him, Lucifer offers Sam a way out but it comes with a steep price. Dean and Castiel look into the angel smiting that might have killed Amara.

episodes.name: Into the Mystic
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a case where people are suffering violent deaths after hearing a mysterious sound.

episodes.name: Don't You Forget About Me
episodes.description: Claire thinks recent murders in town are supernatural and asks Sam and Dean for help; Jody Mills reveals that Claire has been attacking people and accusing them of being monsters.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a set of murders on Valentine's Day and discover they are dealing with an ancient curse. Once kissed by the curse, the person is marked to die.

episodes.name: The Vessel
episodes.description: Sam and Dean convince Lucifer (unknowingly, thinking he's Castiel) to send them back in time to find a hand of God which could destroy Amara.

episodes.name: Beyond the Mat
episodes.description: Sam and Dean attend a wrestling match to relive one of their fondest memories, but when a wrestler turns up dead, they suspect foul play.

episodes.name: Safe House
episodes.description: After dangerous creature is released into an old house, a mother and child are comatose. Sam and Dean find that Bobby and Rufus tracked the same creature so the Winchesters look to the past to catch the monster before any one dies.

episodes.name: Red Meat
episodes.description: In the midst of battling werewolves Sam gets shot then strangled and goes into shock. Dean, thinking Sam is actually dead, takes drastic measures to talk to a reaper in order to save his brother.

episodes.name: Hell's Angel
