episodes.description: Lucifer tries to assert himself into heaven; Crowley tells Sam and Dean they must take down Lucifer.

episodes.name: The Chitters
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are visiting a small town in Colorado where people are mysteriously disappearing every 27 years. While they are investigating, the boys encounter a pair of hunters seeking revenge on the monster causing the disappearances.

episodes.name: Don't Call Me Shurley
episodes.description: Amara unleashes a dark fog on a small town that causes everyone to go mad. Dean and Sam realize this is a stronger version of the original black vein virus Amara previously unleashed.

episodes.name: All in the Family
episodes.description: Concerned for Castiel, Dean and Sam devise a plan to rescue Lucifer from Amara's clutches.

episodes.name: We Happy Few
episodes.description: Sam and Dean face their biggest challenge yet. Rowena makes her move.

episodes.name: Alpha and Omega
episodes.description: Chuck tries to lock Amara away for good but then faces some unexpected complications.

episodes.name: Keep Calm and Carry On
episodes.description: Dean comes face to face with his mother while Sam fights for his life after being shot by Toni.

episodes.name: Mamma Mia
episodes.description: Dean, Castiel and Mary have a lead on Sam and set out to rescue him. Dean is uncomfortable putting Mary in danger, but she insists on going. Meanwhile, Crowley is tipped off that Lucifer has taken over the body of rock star Vince Vicente.

episodes.name: The Foundry
episodes.description: When a crying baby leads to death in a mysterious abandoned house, Mary, Sam and Dean decide to investigate. Meanwhile, Castiel's hunt for Lucifer leads him, begrudgingly, to partner up with Crowley.

episodes.name: American Nightmare
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate a case that leads them to a devout religious family living off the grid. They realize the parents are hiding a huge secret that could destroy them all. Meanwhile, Dean struggles to accept Mary's latest decision.

episodes.name: The One You've Been Waiting For
episodes.description: After learning that the soul of Adolf Hitler has been trapped in a 1930's gold pocket watch, Dean and Sam must act quickly to prevent a group of Nazi necromancers from resurrecting the Führer.

episodes.name: Celebrating the Life of Asa Fox
episodes.description: When hunters gather together to celebrate the life and tragic death of one of their own, Sam, Dean and Mary must take action when a demon starts picking off hunters one by one.

episodes.name: Rock Never Dies
episodes.description: Lucifer realizes that as Vince Vincente, he can get his fans to do whatever he wants. Thrilled with this power, he arranges a VIP concert in order to kill them. Sam, Dean and Castiel enter the underbelly of the music industry to stop him.

episodes.name: LOTUS
episodes.description: Sam, Dean, Castiel, Crowley and Rowena band together to fight Lucifer when his search for power leads him to the White House.

episodes.name: First Blood
episodes.description: Sam and Dean must find a way to escape from a government-run detention facility; in an effort to find her sons, Mary and Castiel seek assistance from a surprising source.

episodes.name: Lily Sunder Has Some Regrets
episodes.description: Lily Sunder plots her revenge against a band of angels that killed her family; Sam and Dean must save Castiel from becoming her next victim.

episodes.name: Regarding Dean
episodes.description: Rowena helps Sam find a powerful family of witches when a spell is placed on Dean that's quickly erasing his memory.

episodes.name: Stuck in the Middle (With You)
episodes.description: Mary asks Sam, Dean and Castiel for help on a case she's working, but neglects to mention the British Men of Letters are involved. When Mary is double crossed, everything is revealed.

episodes.name: Family Feud
episodes.description: A ghost from a merchant ship may be responsible for a murder at a museum; an angel tries to kill Kelly.

episodes.name: The Raid
episodes.description: Mary and the British Men of Letters have a chance to take out a nest of Vampires, but the alpha-vamp turns the tables on them.

episodes.name: Somewhere Between Heaven and Hell
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate an attack by an invisible hellhound at a campsite. Meanwhile, two of Crowley's own personal demons uncover what he has been hiding. Elsewhere, Castiel gets a lead on Kelly Kline.

episodes.name: Ladies Drink Free
episodes.description: Dean and Sam let Mick Davies tag along on a case as they search for a werewolf and they run into Claire Novak, the reunion is short lived after Claire is bitten and the brothers race to find a way to help her before she turns.

episodes.name: The British Invasion
episodes.description: Sam and Dean get a lead on Kelly Kline's whereabouts. Mick drops by the bunker unexpectedly and decides to join the hunt.

episodes.name: The Memory Remains
episodes.description: When Sam and Dean investigate the case of a missing person, the lead witness says the victim was attacked by a man with the head of a goat.

episodes.name: The Future
episodes.description: Sam comes up with a way to stop Lucifer's baby, but Castiel has something else in mind for Kelly. Dean is furious when he finds out someone stole the Colt.

episodes.name: Twigs & Twine & Tasha Banes
episodes.description: Alicia Banes calls Mary for help after her mother goes missing. Later, Mary begins to have some doubts about the British Men of Letters.

episodes.name: There's Something About Mary
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are alarmed when they learn hunters are being killed by suspicious "accidents" all over the country. They decide it is best to find Mary and make sure she's safe. Meanwhile, Toni is back in the states and she and Mary face off.

episodes.name: Who We Are
episodes.description: Sam and Dean only have each other to rely on when they're caught in a dangerous situation; the fight between the American hunters and the British hunters comes to a head.

episodes.name: All Along the Watchtower
episodes.description: Lucifer battles Sam, Dean and Castiel for control of his unborn son.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are left to pick up the pieces following the loss of their mother, Crowley's demise and Castiel's death.

episodes.name: The Rising Son
episodes.description: Sam and Dean discover what Jack is capable of with his powers.

episodes.name: Patience
episodes.description: A wraith kills her friend and Missouri enlists the help of Dean and Jody to protect her granddaughter, Patience, and could be next on the wraith's hit list. Sam continues to work with Jack to control his powers.

episodes.name: The Big Empty
episodes.description: When multiple patients of grief counselor Mia Vallens turn up dead, Dean, Sam and Jack investigate the mystery surrounding the murders and, each inadvertently, are forced to deal with unresolved grief of their own.

episodes.name: Advanced Thanatology
episodes.description: Sam and Dean work on a case involving the ghost of a demented doctor; they get assistance from an unexpected source; Castiel finds his way back to the Winchesters.

episodes.name: Tombstone
episodes.description: Castiel is reunited with Jack and together with Sam and Dean, they head to a sleepy old western town to investigate a murder. Dean gets to live out his boyhood fantasy when he comes face to face with a famous, gun-slinging outlaw.

episodes.name: War of the Worlds
episodes.description: As Dean and Sam continue their search for Jack, they stumble across a familiar foe; Lucifer manages to escape Michael's grasp and finds an unlikely and mostly unwilling ally.

episodes.name: The Scorpion and the Frog
episodes.description: The Winchesters agree to steal a trunk belonging to a demon in exchange for a spell they can use to find Jack.

episodes.name: The Bad Place
episodes.description: Dean and Sam get a lead on Jack. Jack seeks help from a reluctant dreamwalker. Patience makes a life-changing decision after a disturbing vision.

episodes.name: Wayward Sisters
episodes.description: When Dean and Sam go missing Jody Mills calls Claire Novak and tells her to come home they need to find the Winchesters. As they search for Kaia the dreamwalker who opened the rift Jody is worried about Patience's vision.

episodes.name: Breakdown
episodes.description: Donna calls Dean and Sam for help after her niece Wendy goes missing. They find out she was kidnapped by a man who sells human parts to monsters in online auctions and race to rescue her.

episodes.name: Various & Sundry Villains
episodes.description: Dean falls victim to a couple of witches, sisters Jamie and Jennie Plum who manage to steal a powerful book of spells from the Winchesters. When Dean and Sam go after the book, they get help from a powerful and surprising ally when Rowena, back from the dead, intervenes to assist... Read all

episodes.name: Devil's Bargain
episodes.description: "Devil's Bargain" Dean, Castiel and Sam search for Lucifer who, meanwhile, strikes an unlikely deal with a local faith healer named Sister Jo. Asmodeus gets closer to finding Jack.

episodes.name: Good Intentions
episodes.description: Jack and Mary escape Michael's clutches and end up finding an ally in Bobby Singer; Sam, Dean, and Castiel continue to search for a way to open a breach; one of their own may be working against them and costing them precious time.

episodes.name: A Most Holy Man
episodes.description: Close to opening a rift into the Apocalyptic World, Sam and Dean search for the last missing ingredient. They wind up at a black market for religious relics, where they discover that things are not what they seem.

episodes.name: ScoobyNatural
episodes.description: Sam, Dean, and Castiel are transported into the animated world of Scooby Doo where they join forces with the Scooby gang to solve a ghostly mystery.

episodes.name: The Thing
episodes.description: Sam and Dean continue to collect the pieces necessary to open a rift to the other world in order to save their family. Their latest quest leads them to a Men of Letters bunker from the 1920s and a hungry God from another dimension. Meanwhile, Ketch makes a shocking decision about... Read all

episodes.name: Bring 'em Back Alive
episodes.description: Lucifer rules over heaven and makes a confession to Jo. Sam and Castiel are perplexed by the return of Gabriel. Dean gets one step closer to finding Mary and Jack.

episodes.name: Funeralia
episodes.description: Sam and Dean must stop Rowena, who is on a deadly mission. Meanwhile, Castiel looks to heaven to recruit angels for an impending invasion but is shocked by not only what he finds, but who.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.description: Gabriel agrees to team up with the Winchester Brothers, if they join him on his revenge mission. Dean attempts a big kill alone. War in Apocalypse World rages.

episodes.name: Beat the Devil
episodes.description: Sam, Dean, Castiel and Gabriel must work together if they have any hope of bringing Mary and Jack home. Meanwhile, Rowena's encounter with Lucifer may alter the outcome of the journey for one of our heroes.

episodes.name: Exodus
episodes.description: Sam and Dean devise a plan that will save innocent lives. Meanwhile, Jack continues to wrestle with the consequences of his decisions.

episodes.name: Let the Good Times Roll
episodes.description: Our heroes, Sam and Dean Winchester, continue to be tested in the battle between good and evil, but one impulsive decision could alter the lives of one of the brothers forever.

episodes.name: Stranger in a Strange Land
episodes.description: Castiel negotiates with an unreliable source to get a lead on Dean's whereabouts. Sam ponders a proposition. Jack adjusts to his new reality.

episodes.name: Gods and Monsters
episodes.description: Sam finds a clue to Dean's whereabouts, so he, Mary and Bobby set out to investigate. Castiel imparts some sage advice on Jack, who, still desperate to belong, seeks out a familial connection.

episodes.name: The Scar
episodes.description: Still trying to solve the mystery of what happened to Dean, Sam enlists the help of Sheriff Jody Mills who may unknowingly already be on the case. Castiel continues to be a father figure to Jack, who surprises even himself, when a life is on the line.

episodes.name: Mint Condition
episodes.description: Dean continues to struggle, and then Sam has to think when action figures come to life and Dean finds himself inside a real life horror movie.

episodes.name: Nightmare Logic
episodes.description: After a hunt gone wrong leaves Maggie's whereabouts unknown, Sam, Dean, Mary and Bobby race to find her, but what they find are their own worst nightmares.

episodes.name: Optimism
episodes.description: Sam and Charlie team up to get to the bottom of a string of random disappearances; Jack believes that he has found a case and convinces Dean to partner with him on the hunt.

episodes.name: Unhuman Nature
episodes.description: Sam and Castiel track down a Shaman who may be able to help a friend. Nick continues to spiral down a dark path as he looks for answers surrounding the deaths of his wife and son. Jack turns to Dean for help enjoying the human experience.

episodes.name: Byzantium
episodes.description: When Dean and Sam join forces with an unexpected ally, the outcome will alter the course of two lives. Meanwhile, Heaven faces an attack from a dark force, driving Castiel to make an enormous sacrifice to make things right.

episodes.name: The Spear
episodes.description: Sam and Dean enlist the help of their pal Garth to gain inside information on what Michael may be planning. The brothers split up to each go after weapons that can aid in their fight against the Archangel, but this may be a fight our heroes cannot win.

episodes.name: Nihilism
episodes.description: Michael retakes control of Dean as his army of monsters continue to move in; Sam devises a plan to reach Dean and stop Michael before anyone else dies.

episodes.name: Damaged Goods
episodes.description: Dean spends some bonding time with Mary and Donna. Nick finally finds the answer he has been searching for. Sam is left to make an unimaginable choice.

episodes.name: Prophet and Loss
episodes.description: To distract themselves from Dean's dire plan, the Winchesters take a case involving dead bodies with mysterious symbols carved in them. Nick's past unveils a shocking desire.

episodes.name: Lebanon
episodes.description: Sam and Dean look to occult lore for a solution to their latest problem, but instead of a resolution, they find much more than either of them had anticipated.

episodes.name: Ouroboros
episodes.description: Sam and Dean enlist the help of Rowena to track down a demi-god who feasts on human flesh; the challenge of keeping Michael at bay is proving to be more difficult than originally anticipated.

episodes.name: Peace of Mind
episodes.description: Sam and Castiel follow a case to a picturesque little town in Arkansas, only to find out nothing is as idyllic as it appears to be. Dean and Jack take a road trip to visit an old friend.

episodes.name: Don't Go in the Woods
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are baffled when they come up against a monster they have never heard of before; Jack does his best to impress a new group of friends.

episodes.name: Game Night
episodes.description: Sam and Dean race to help a friend in need. Meanwhile, Mary is concerned for Jack's wellbeing, and Castiel enlists help from Jo/Anael to track down a miracle.

episodes.name: Absence
episodes.description: Sam and Dean continue to worry about the condition of Jack's soul.

episodes.name: Jack in the Box
episodes.description: Sam, Dean and Castiel investigate a string of suspicious deaths that have a biblical element to them.

episodes.name: Moriah
episodes.description: Sam, Dean and Castiel are thrown into an epic battle. Meanwhile, Jack becomes disenchanted with all the lies, and an old friend from the past shows up.

episodes.name: Back and to the Future
episodes.description: Picking up where we left off last season, Sam, Dean and Castiel are left to defend the world after all the souls in hell have been released and are back on Earth and free to kill again.

episodes.name: Raising Hell
episodes.description: Dean, Castiel and Sam call on Rowena to help keep the evil souls at bay and get an unexpected assist by Ketch.

episodes.name: The Rupture
episodes.description: Sam and Dean, together with Rowena, work tirelessly to keep all of hell from breaking loose; Castiel cannot forgive an arrogant betrayal.

episodes.name: Atomic Monsters
episodes.description: Sam and Dean investigate the mysterious death of a girl and the disappearance of another.

episodes.name: Proverbs 17:3
episodes.description: Sam and Dean's routine case turns out to be anything but.

episodes.name: Golden Time
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are visited by an old friend; Castiel investigates the disappearance of a local teen.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.description: Dean goes off on his own to take on a case. Meanwhile, Castiel has an idea of how he can help Sam track down God.

episodes.name: Our Father, Who Aren't in Heaven
episodes.description: Sam, Dean and Castiel's continued search for a way to defeat Chuck leads them to unexpected places and toward unlikely allies.

episodes.name: The Trap
episodes.description: Sam and Eileen are faced with the brutal truth. Meanwhile Dean and Cass work together in the hopes of getting a step ahead of Chuck.

episodes.name: The Heroes' Journey
episodes.description: Sam and Dean hit the road to help an old friend, but it appears that their luck may have finally run out and they are the ones who may be in need of rescue.

episodes.name: The Gamblers
episodes.description: Dean and Sam press their luck in a winner-takes-all game of pool. Meanwhile, Castiel hunts down a would-be murderer, but not for reasons one might think.

episodes.name: Galaxy Brain
episodes.description: Sam and Dean respond to a frantic call and assist in an extraordinary and heartbreaking rescue; Billie surprises everyone with a visit to the bunker.

episodes.name: Destiny's Child
episodes.description: A search for the one thing that may give the Winchesters an edge against God leads Sam and Dean to Jo's door and to a secret that may have died with a past enemy; Castiel asks Jack to do the unthinkable to help the brothers in their quest.

episodes.name: Last Holiday
episodes.description: Dean and Sam discover a wood nymph living in the bunker who is determined to protect her "family", at any cost.

episodes.name: Gimme Shelter
episodes.description: Castiel and Jack work a case involving members of a local church. Meanwhile, Sam and Dean go off in search of Amara.

episodes.name: Drag Me Away (From You)
episodes.description: Sam and Dean are asked to investigate the murder of a childhood friend, calling them back to a hotel from their past and perplexing the brothers with a case they thought was solved a long time ago.

episodes.name: Unity
episodes.description: Dean hits the road with Jack who needs to complete a final ritual in the quest to beat Chuck; a difference of opinion leaves Sam and Castiel behind looking for answers to questions of their own.

episodes.name: Despair
episodes.description: With the plan in full motion, Sam, Dean, Castiel and Jack fight for the good of the common goal.

episodes.name: Inherit the Earth
episodes.description: Everything is on the line as the battle against God continues; a familiar face returns to join the fight.

episodes.name: Carry On
episodes.description: It's the final ride for saving people and hunting things.

name: Outlander
description: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

episodes.name: Sassenach
episodes.description: 1945 England: Claire Randall reunites with her husband after five years of war. A second honeymoon goes awry when she falls back through time to 1740's Scotland.

episodes.name: Castle Leoch
episodes.description: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

episodes.name: The Way Out
episodes.description: Claire's abilities as a healer puts her at odds with the town priest when she saves a boy's life, and deepens the suspicions against her. Hearing a folk-tale, Claire realizes that she may be able to travel back through the stones to Frank.

episodes.name: The Gathering
episodes.description: The Gathering shows Claire's attempt at her first real planned escape. The run-ins she has with various characters on the way include a major run-in with Dougal, and yet another moment with Jamie alone - building their relationship. Also an oath-taking ceremony could have awful r... Read all

episodes.name: Rent
episodes.description: Claire goes on the road with Dougal as he collects rents from the tenants. She meets the clans solicitor who is riding with them. She also becomes aware of Dougal's involvement in trying to raise money for the Jacobite rebellion.

episodes.name: The Garrison Commander
episodes.description: Claire and Dougal are questioned at the local garrison.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.description: Marriage to a Scot seems to be the only legal way out to save Claire from falling into the paws of Black Jack Randall.

episodes.name: Both Sides Now
episodes.description: In 1945, Frank is still seeking Claire, but is starting to lose hope of ever finding her. Meanwhile in 1743, Claire is trying to come to terms with her marriage to Jamie. While traveling, a life changing opportunity arises.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.description: Jamie and the Highlanders attempt to rescue Claire from Black Jack Randall.

episodes.name: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
episodes.description: Jamie hopes the Duke of Sandringham can help remove the price on his head.

episodes.name: The Devil's Mark
episodes.description: Claire and Geillis stand trial for witchcraft; Claire learns a secret about Geillis' past.

episodes.name: Lallybroch
episodes.description: Old wounds are reopened when Jamie returns to his family home.

episodes.name: The Watch
episodes.description: A Redcoat deserter from Jamie's past returns; Jenny goes into labor; Jamie and Ian join the Watch.

episodes.name: The Search
episodes.description: Claire and Jenny set out to rescue Jamie from his redcoat captors; unorthodox tactics are used.

episodes.name: Wentworth Prison
episodes.description: A visit from Black Jack causes Jamie to realize a fate exists that is worse than his death sentence.

episodes.name: To Ransom a Man's Soul
episodes.description: Jamie is freed following a daring rescue, but his mind lingers on the torture he endured.

episodes.name: Through a Glass, Darkly
episodes.description: Returning to her own time, Claire must reconcile her future with the life she left behind. Shifting back to the 18th century, Jamie, Claire and Murtagh arrive in France, but learn that Paris presents its own challenges.

episodes.name: Not in Scotland Anymore
episodes.description: Claire and Jamie plan to infiltrate Royal Court of France to disrupt Jacobite Rebellion. Jamie is forced to deal with Prince Charlie in Paris Brothels.

episodes.name: Useful Occupations and Deceptions
episodes.description: Claire finds an outlet for her skills at L'Hôpital des Anges treating the sick, while Jamie tries to derail the Jacobite Rebellion with the help of a pickpocket. Claire's new relationship with Mother Hildegarde provides a source of needed help for Jamie.

episodes.name: La Dame Blanche
episodes.description: Jamie has an unusual response to Claire's news, which brings about a confrontation. Louise asks Claire for assistance with a delicate situation, and friendly revelations provide disagreements at a dinner party with uninvited guests.

episodes.name: Untimely Resurrection
episodes.description: After the dinner party, Claire tends to Mary (and Alex), while Jamie deals with Charles' plotting. A visit to Versailles leads to turmoil for Claire and Jamie.

episodes.name: Best Laid Schemes...
episodes.description: Jamie and Claire use Claire's medical knowledge to devise a scheme to stop a wine deal which could fill the Prince's war chest. When Claire learns Jamie has gone back on his word, the couple is met with dire consequences that will forever change their lives.

episodes.name: Faith
episodes.description: Doctors at L'Hopital des Anges attempt to save the lives of Claire and her unborn baby; King Louis asks Claire to judge two men accused of engaging in the dark arts.

episodes.name: The Fox's Lair
episodes.description: Claire and Jamie return to Scotland, and back to their home, Lallybroch. Away from the nightmares of Paris, they find solace until a letter arrives. Jamie must go and visit his grandfather Lord Lovat, Simon Fraser aka The Old Fox. Claire accompanies Jamie to meet The Old Fox.

episodes.name: Je Suis Prest
episodes.description: Jamie trains his militia men for the upcoming Rising before joining the forces. Claire keeps to Jamie and gives him full disclosure on what little she knows about Scotland's fate in the Rising. Meanwhile, a young British soldier tries to kill Jamie.

episodes.name: Prestonpans
episodes.description: Jamie needs to bypass a swamp to lead the Jacobite army to win over the British army in a critical battle. Benefiting from her experience as a combat nurse during WWII, Claire tends to wounded and dying warriors.

episodes.name: Vengeance Is Mine
episodes.description: Claire and Highlanders are sent north after the Jacobite leaders decided to halt their march on London. A band of Redcoats makes trouble for the Scots, leading to the most unexpected reunion for Claire.

episodes.name: The Hail Mary
episodes.description: As Jamie puts all of his efforts into turning the Jacobite army away from the impending slaughter at Culloden Moor, Claire attempts to comfort the sick Alex Randall. She is stunned when Alex reveals an outrageous plan to save the mother of his child.

episodes.name: Dragonfly in Amber
episodes.description: In 1968, Claire attends a wake with her daughter; in 1746, the battle of Culloden Moor is looming.

episodes.name: The Battle Joined
episodes.description: Jamie's past provides his only hope of survival following the Battle of Culloden; a pregnant Claire attempts to adjust to life in 1940s Boston.

episodes.name: Surrender
episodes.description: Hiding in an isolated cave, Jamie leads a lonely life until Lallybroch is threatened by redcoats pursuing the elusive Jacobite traitor known as "Red Jamie." Back in Boston, Claire and Frank struggle to coexist in a marriage haunted by the ghost of Jamie's love."

episodes.name: All Debts Paid
episodes.description: In prison, Jamie discovers that an old foe has become the warden - and now has the power to make his life a living hell. Over the years, Claire and Frank both put their best foot forward to share a harmonious marriage, but an uninvited guest shatters this illusion, bringing their... Read all

episodes.name: Of Lost Things
episodes.description: While serving as groomsman at the aristocratic estate of Helwater, Jamie is reluctantly pulled into the intrigue of a noble British family. In 1968 Scotland, Claire, Brianna and Roger struggle to trace Jamie's whereabouts in history, leaving Claire to wonder if they will ever fin... Read all

episodes.name: Freedom & Whisky
episodes.description: As Brianna grapples with the life-changing revelations of the past summer, Claire must help her come to terms with the fact that she is truly her father's daughter - her 18th century Highlander father. To complicate matters further, Roger brings news that forces Claire and Briann... Read all

episodes.name: A. Malcolm
episodes.description: After decades apart, Jamie and Claire finally reunite and rekindle their emotional and physical bonds. But Jamie's new business dealings jeopardize the couples' hopes for a simple life together.

episodes.name: Crème de Menthe
episodes.description: In the aftermath of a violent confrontation, Claire follows her conscience as a surgeon, even though it could put her and Jamie's lives at risk. At the same time, Jamie attempts to evade the reach of the Crown as its representative closes in on his illegal dealings.

episodes.name: First Wife
episodes.description: Claire returns to Lallybroch with Jamie, where she does not receive quite the reception she was expecting; the choices Jamie made during their time apart comes back to haunt them.

episodes.name: The Doldrums
episodes.description: Claire and Jamie leave Scotland, sailing to the West Indies on an urgent quest. But when the superstitious crew looks for someone to blame after a string of bad luck, rescue comes from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Heaven and Earth
episodes.description: Claire races to discover the source of an epidemic aboard a disease-stricken ship before hundreds of sailors die. And as Jamie locks horns with Captain Raines, Fergus finds himself torn between loyalty and love.

episodes.name: Uncharted
episodes.description: After making a leap of faith, Claire washes up on a seemingly deserted island where survival is her only option. Navigating treacherous waters has crippled the Artemis, so Jamie devises a joyful moment for his crew in the midst of devastating setbacks.

episodes.name: The Bakra
episodes.description: The Artemis finally reaches Jamaica bringing Jamie and Claire that much closer to their goal. During a lavish ball on the island, the Frasers encounter old allies, as well as former adversaries who threaten to derail their mission.

episodes.name: Eye of the Storm
episodes.description: Claire is forced to play a game of cat and mouse with an old adversary as she searches for Young Ian. The Frasers race through the jungles of Jamaica to prevent the unthinkable.

episodes.name: America the Beautiful
episodes.description: Claire and Jamie cross paths with Stephen Bonnet, a pirate and smuggler who enlists their help. Claire illuminates Jamie on some of America's history, leading him to wonder if it's possible for them to lay down roots.

episodes.name: Do No Harm
episodes.description: Claire and Jamie visit his Aunt Jocasta at her plantation, River Run. When tragedy strikes at the plantation, Jamie and Claire find themselves caught between what's right and the law of the land.

episodes.name: The False Bride
episodes.description: Jamie and Claire search for a place to call home. Meanwhile, in the 20th century, Brianna and Roger's romance heats up and then fizzles during a road trip that winds up highlighting their differences.

episodes.name: Common Ground
episodes.description: Having been led by providence to Fraser's Ridge, Jamie, Claire and Young Ian begin to build a home in the Blue Ridge Mountains. In the 20th Century, Roger tries to reconnect with Brianna.

episodes.name: Savages
episodes.description: Claire's medical expertise proves invaluable, but she begins to fear for her life when tragedy strikes her patients' household. Jamie and Young Ian travel to a nearby town to recruit settlers for Fraser's Ridge.

episodes.name: Blood of My Blood
episodes.description: Jamie and Claire are surprised when Lord John Grey drops in on Fraser's Ridge with an unexpected traveling companion; when Grey takes ill, Claire must reconcile her personal feelings with her duties as a doctor.

episodes.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
episodes.description: Brianna follows in her mother's footsteps and travels through the stones back in time to 18th century Scotland, where she struggles to make her way to the Colonies to find her parents

episodes.name: Wilmington
episodes.description: Roger's diligent search for Brianna pays off when he finds her in Wilmington, but their romantic reunion comes to an abrupt halt when she discovers pertinent information he intentionally kept from her.

episodes.name: The Birds and The Bees
episodes.description: As Brianna struggles to compartmentalize the trauma she suffered in the wake of the tragedy that befell her in Wilmington, she refocuses on finding her parents.

episodes.name: The Deep Heart's Core
episodes.description: Jamie and Claire keep secrets from one another as they try to help Brianna process her recent trauma; however, the secrets they keep cause a bigger familial rift once they are revealed.

episodes.name: If Not For Hope
episodes.description: Jamie, Claire and Young Ian embark on a long and uncertain journey to rescue Roger, while Brianna forges a friendship with one of Jamie's old friends.

episodes.name: Providence
episodes.description: Brianna confronts a violent figure from her past in an attempt to cope with her trauma; Roger befriends a fellow captive and endeavors to escape the Mohawk Village, while Fergus and Marsali plan a dangerous mission.

episodes.name: Man of Worth
episodes.description: The attempt to rescue Roger from his Mohawk captors goes awry when a ghost from Claire's past lays waste to their plan. Meanwhile, a heavily pregnant Brianna anxiously awaits their return at River Run.

episodes.name: The Fiery Cross
episodes.description: The celebrations in honor of the wedding of Brianna and Roger. Governor Tryon reminds Jamie of his obligation to persecute and kill Murtagh Fitzgibbons.

episodes.name: Between Two Fires
episodes.description: As Jamie continues to hunt Murtagh with the aid of the zealous Lieutenant Hamilton Knox, he's forced to consider whether or not he's on the right side of history.

episodes.name: Free Will
episodes.description: The growing Regulator threat forces Jamie, Claire and Roger to embark on a mission to raise a militia.

episodes.name: The Company We Keep
episodes.description: Roger leads Jamie's militia to the trading post of Brownsville and finds himself embroiled in a bitter feud. Jamie and Claire arrive to find that Roger's unusual strategy may have cost them the loyalty of the militia.

episodes.name: Perpetual Adoration
episodes.description: Jamie and his militia arrive at Hillsborough to learn that Governor Tryon has proposed a rather unorthodox solution to deal with the threat posed by the Regulators and to resolve the growing political crisis.

episodes.name: Better to Marry Than Burn
episodes.description: At Jocasta's wedding, Jamie learns Tryon's true motivation for ending the Regulator threat.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Roger Mac
episodes.description: The Regulator Rebellion reaches a boiling point, forcing Jamie to face his fear and confront the consequence of his divided loyalties.

episodes.name: Famous Last Words
episodes.description: The Frasers must come to terms with all that has changed in the aftermath of the Battle of Alamance Creek. Brianna tries to help Roger overcome the trauma he has endured. An unexpected visitor arrives at the Ridge.

episodes.name: Monsters and Heroes
episodes.description: When Jamie is bitten by a venomous snake, Claire fears she may not have the resources to save him; Jamie asks Roger to complete an important task in the event of his death.

episodes.name: Mercy Shall Follow Me
episodes.description: Jamie and Roger implement their plan to eliminate the threat looming over them, but it goes awry; Brianna is forced to confront her greatest fear and fight for her and her son's lives.

episodes.name: Journeycake
episodes.description: Roger and Brianna need to decide if they want to stay or return to the future; Jamie discovers a new power that started from an unrest in the backcountry.

episodes.name: Never My Love
episodes.description: Claire struggles to survive brutal treatment from her captors, as Jamie gathers a group of loyal men to help him rescue his wife; Roger and Brianna's journey takes a surprising turn.

episodes.name: Echoes
episodes.description: Claire and Jamie continue the fight to protect those they love, as the threat of the Revolutionary War looms over Fraser's Ridge.

episodes.name: Allegiance
episodes.description: Jamie struggles with his first request as Indian Agent. Roger presides over an unusual funeral. Marsali gives birth. However, the joy is short lived when a discovery is made.

episodes.name: Temperance
episodes.description: Fergus worries about his new son's quality of life when the baby is bullied by superstitious Protestants. Claire performs surgery on Tom's hand.

episodes.name: Hour of the Wolf
episodes.description: Ian reveals to Jamie his life among the Mohawks. Jamie tells Chief Bird something he should consider in the future.

episodes.name: Give Me Liberty
episodes.description: There is something in the air. Jamie and lord John talk about politics. Roger receives an excellent news.

episodes.name: The World Turned Upside Down
episodes.description: A dysentery epidemic spreads on the Ridge, and Claire falls deathly ill. She is almost recovered when the Christies arrive and drop a bombshell. As nefarious rumors spread like wildfire on the Ridge, tragedy strikes.

episodes.name: Sticks and Stones
episodes.description: Claire struggles with her inner demons as a nefarious rumor begins to spread on the Ridge. Tensions rise as residents fear there is a dangerous person in their midst.

episodes.name: I Am Not Alone
episodes.description: Richard Brown and his Committee of Safety arrive to arrest Claire for murder. However, due to the rising political tensions in the colonies, Brown's plan to find a judge for a trial does not go as expected.

episodes.name: A Life Well Lost
episodes.description: Jamie races towards Wilmington to rescue Claire from the gallows, only to discover that the American Revolution has well and truly reached North Carolina.

episodes.name: The Happiest Place on Earth
episodes.description: Claire makes a startling discovery about Roger and Brianna's newborn daughter. A familiar face returns to the Ridge with explosive consequences.

episodes.name: Death Be Not Proud
episodes.description: Jamie discovers Arch Bug has been keeping a dangerous secret. In the 20th century, Roger and Brianna find a link to Jamie and Claire.

episodes.name: A Most Uncomfortable Woman
episodes.description: On the way to Scotland, Jamie is pulled back into the Revolutionary War. William is sent on a covert mission. Roger and Brianna struggle to adapt to life in the 1980s

episodes.name: Singapore
episodes.description: At Ticonderoga, Jamie and Claire prepare for an imminent British assault. Roger compiles information about time travel while Brianna earns the respect of her coworkers.

episodes.name: Where the Waters Meet
episodes.description: Jamie and Claire help civilians flee Ticonderoga after the fort falls into British hands; Roger discovers the identity of the mysterious "Nuckelavee."

episodes.name: A Practical Guide for Time-Travelers
episodes.description: Jamie prepares to face British forces in battle. Roger and Brianna question Buck MacKenzie's intentions in the 20th century; William fights in the First Battle of Saratoga.

episodes.name: Turning Points
episodes.description: Jamie fights in the pivotal Second Battle of Saratoga. Roger and Brianna search for Jemmy.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.description: During her honeymoon in 1945 Scotland, a combat nurse unexpectedly travels through time to the 1700s.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love
episodes.description: Claire and Ian arrive in Philadelphia to help the ailing Henry Grey. Roger and Buck receive an unexpected clue in their search for Jeremy.

episodes.name: A Hundredweight of Stones
episodes.description: Claire turns to John Grey for comfort as they process difficult news. Ian and Rachel discuss their love and their future. Brianna confronts an intruder at Lallybroch.

episodes.name: Carnal Knowledge
episodes.description: After a heated meeting, Lord John's circumstances take a turn. An extraordinary deed merits an offer from Gen. George Washington.

episodes.name: Hello, Goodbye
episodes.description: Brianna works thwart a treacherous plan that endangers her family. Ian and Rachel take a huge step in their relationship. A surprise encounter for Roger brings a new understanding.

episodes.name: Ye Dinna Get Used to It
episodes.description: The truth about Lord John Grey's mysterious disappearance is revealed; Brianna faces off with the foes threatening her family.

episodes.name: Written in My Own Heart's Blood
episodes.description: The American Revolution reaches the pivotal Battle of Monmouth; Lord John Grey and Ian race to save William; Brianna makes an important decision.

episodes.name: A Hundred Thousand Angels
episodes.description: Denzell must perform a dangerous operation with the skills he's learned from Claire; William asks for help from an unexpected source in his mission to save Jane.

name: Grey's Anatomy
description: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

episodes.name: A Hard Day's Night
episodes.description: The first shift for new surgical interns Meredith, Cristina, Izzie, George, and Alex proves eventful and backbreaking.

episodes.name: The First Cut Is the Deepest
episodes.description: A rape victim is admitted, who managed to hold onto part of her attacker; Izzie has difficulty with a patient who cannot speak English; Meredith becomes concerned about a sick baby.

episodes.name: Winning a Battle, Losing the War
episodes.description: Izzie and Cristina are assigned a close-to-brain-dead John Doe who may be a viable candidate for organ donation, and helpful to George's patient, who needs a new liver. Meanwhile, Meredith and Alex butt heads over a patient of their own.

episodes.name: No Man's Land
episodes.description: Alex uses Izzie's modeling against her, and her last ad causes a patient to reject her care. Meredith finds parallels between a patient and her mother, and Christina must deal with a hospital-savvy patient.

episodes.name: Shake Your Groove Thing
episodes.description: Meredith worries she did something wrong during a heart bypass, an error in a past procedure is discovered, putting a staff member's conduct under scrutiny, while a party thrown by Izzie to introduce her boyfriend becomes a fiasco.

episodes.name: If Tomorrow Never Comes
episodes.description: A woman with a massive tumor is admitted, with all the surgeons required to scrub in. In their absence, Meredith is assigned a patient with Parkinson's and, because Alex's pager is not working, Izzie is left in charge of the floor herself.

episodes.name: The Self-Destruct Button
episodes.description: Izzie and George find out about Meredith and Derek, while Cristina makes a discovery of her own. George thinks an anesthesiologist is drinking on the job, and Meredith deals with a young girl who has had illegal surgery.

episodes.name: Save Me
episodes.description: Meredith wants to learn more about Derek, but he remains cagey. Meanwhile, a supposedly psychic patient proves bothersome, Alex must convince a young girl to agree to a life saving operation, and Cristina is conflicted about her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Who's Zoomin' Who?
episodes.description: George finally gets laid but gets syphilis. It's rampant among staff. Surgeon Webber is losing his sight. He wants Shepherd to operate secretly. A male patient has an ovary. A lifesaving autopsy's performed without consent.

episodes.name: Raindrops Keep Falling on My Head
episodes.description: Meredith, shattered by revelations, is forced to work with Addison, Joe collapses at the bar, Cristina has some pretty shattering news of her own, and Alex starts working on Izzie.

episodes.name: Enough Is Enough
episodes.description: A family is admitted after being involved in a car crash, but there is more to them than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Bailey and her team deal with a strange case, and relationship woes plague Meredith, Cristina and George.

episodes.name: Make Me Lose Control
episodes.description: Meredith is horrified when her mother is admitted, and everyone is concerned when Cristina collapses in the operating room. Meanwhile, Addison is determined to save a very sick baby.

episodes.name: Deny, Deny, Deny
episodes.description: Cristina is determined to get back to work, and despite not being fully recovered, she manages to crack an odd case. Meanwhile, Addison offers to help Bailey with a complicated surgery, and Alex receives important news.

episodes.name: Bring the Pain
episodes.description: A storm rages, causing power outages and jamming the elevator, trapping George and Alex inside with a vulnerable patient. Meanwhile, Meredith and Derek arrange a religious ritual for a young woman, and Cristina deals with an unusual case.

episodes.name: Into You Like a Train
episodes.description: A train wreck brings in multiple casualties, leaving Meredith hanging for her answer. Meanwhile, Alex finds working without his mojo a disheartening experience, and Cristina searches high and low for a missing appendage.

episodes.name: Something to Talk About
episodes.description: Derek reluctantly attends marriage counseling with Addison, while Meredith, Izzie and Cristina steal a patient with an unusual problem. Alex helps a young patient gain her independence, and Cristina thinks Bailey knows about her and Burke.

episodes.name: Let It Be
episodes.description: Friends of Derek and Addison come from New York for a preventative surgery that causes discord among both couples. Meanwhile, George helps a man who has fallen from a roof, and Bailey delivers news to the Chief.

episodes.name: Thanks for the Memories
episodes.description: Thanksgiving sends the occupants of Meredith's house in different directions: Meredith escapes to the hospital, George goes hunting with his family, and Izzie throws a dinner to which it appears no one is coming.

episodes.name: Much Too Much
episodes.description: Meredith's one night stand causes complications when he shows up at the hospital with an embarrassing problem. Meanwhile, Burke tries to push Cristina toward the next step, and Alex's problems affect his performance.

episodes.name: Owner of a Lonely Heart
episodes.description: The mother of the quints blames herself. Meanwhile, Izzy becomes attached to her patient, Karev must face the consequences of his actions, and Cristina takes care of an inmate desperate to stay at the hospital.

episodes.name: Grandma Got Run Over by a Reindeer
episodes.description: Christmas hits Seattle, with Izzie caring for a man who fell from his roof while hanging decorations. Meanwhile, Cristina helps perform a heart transplant on a depressed boy, and George has to contend with the family from Hell.

episodes.name: Begin the Begin
episodes.description: Izzie becomes attracted to a male patient with a heart condition, and George treats Bex, an intersex patient. Meanwhile, Meredith's mother receives a visitor, and Derek and Addison's relationship is still rocky.

episodes.name: Tell Me Sweet Little Lies
episodes.description: Meredith must choose between her dog and her roommates. Meanwhile, George deals with an elderly patient who has outstayed her welcome, Bailey's pregnancy has complications, Alex gets his exam results, and Richard has a strike on his hands.

episodes.name: Break on Through
episodes.description: The nurses are striking, and George refuses to cross the picket line. The interns are surprised by Bailey's seemingly immature replacement, Izzie connects with a pregnant girl, and an elderly woman's plight pushes Meredith to the limit.

episodes.name: It's the End of the World
episodes.description: The lives of everyone in the OR are threatened when a patient enters with a bomb inside him, and a young paramedic with her arm inside the cavity is the only thing keeping it from going off.

episodes.name: As We Know It
episodes.description: While the man with the bomb lodged in his chest remains in Burke's OR with Meredith's hand in the cavity, Bailey's injured husband remains in Derek's. Meanwhile, Bailey's distress puts her unborn baby at risk.

episodes.name: Yesterday
episodes.description: Derek and Addison are shaken by the arrival of a figure from their past. Meanwhile, Burke learns Cristina's secret, Izzie deals with a very unusual case, Meredith delves into her family's dirty laundry, and George pours his heart out.

episodes.name: What Have I Done to Deserve This?
episodes.description: Meredith and George face the consequences of their actions, Izzie gets closer to Denny, who has been readmitted, and Addison asks for Bailey's help with an embarrassing ailment.

episodes.name: Band-Aid Covers the Bullet Hole
episodes.description: Cristina babysits for Bailey and does not take to it well at all. Meanwhile, Addison and Derek come to terms with their relationship, George connects with Callie, and Denny continues to come between Alex and Izzie.

episodes.name: Superstition
episodes.description: Superstition strikes, with the interns convinced a series of deaths will occur. A complication from the LVAD surgery puts Denny in the OR, Cristina plans to make George move out, and Richard's old AA sponsor is admitted for treatment.

episodes.name: The Name of the Game
episodes.description: Cristina is desperate for George to move out of the apartment, while Izzie is jealous of Callie's relationship with him. Meanwhile, Cristina and Richard are rivals in a surgery seminar, and Meredith discovers a secret about her father.

episodes.name: Blues for Sister Someone
episodes.description: Meredith considers going on a date with Finn, and Izzie tries to find out more about George and Callie. Meanwhile, Alex clashes with Addison over a sensitive case, and Burke is nervous about operating on a patient who is one of his heroes.

episodes.name: Damage Case
episodes.description: The victims of a serious car accident are admitted, with every surgeon required to help. Meanwhile, Callie's forwardness grates on Izzie, Addison makes Alex suffer, and Derek takes his frustration out on Meredith.

episodes.name: 17 Seconds
episodes.description: The victims of a workplace shooting are admitted. Izzie puts her job on the line to ensure Denny gets a new heart, Callie makes an effort with Meredith, and Addison is suspicious of Derek.

episodes.name: Deterioration of the Fight or Flight Response
episodes.description: Burke is admitted as a patient, along with Richard's niece. Izzie and the others fight to keep Denny alive, while Alex tries to secure the donor heart for him.

episodes.name: Losing My Religion
episodes.description: Richard is determined to discover the guilty party, and punishes the interns by making them arrange a prom for his niece. Meanwhile, Callie presses George about his feelings, and Derek and Meredith have to make a decision about Doc.

episodes.name: Time Has Come Today
episodes.description: Everyone reminisces about the past. Meanwhile, Izzie is emotionally devastated, with the others trying to help her, Adele gives Richard an ultimatum, and George and Derek are put in quarantine when an outbreak of the plague is suspected.

episodes.name: I Am a Tree
episodes.description: Izzie copes with her grief by baking furiously, and George has to deal with an obstinate patient. Meanwhile, Meredith must choose between Derek and Finn, Addison drowns her sorrows in alcohol, and Cristina meets Burke's difficult mother.

episodes.name: Sometimes a Fantasy
episodes.description: Izzie returns to the hospital, but finds it difficult to go inside, and George is tired of Callie's presence at home. Meanwhile, Addison cannot seem to get rid of Mark, and Cristina tries to cope with caring for Burke.

episodes.name: What I Am
episodes.description: Meredith becomes a patient, and Derek and Addison are equally angry at Richard for allowing Mark to join the staff. Meanwhile, Izzie receives a visit from Denny's father, and Burke is plagued by doubt over his ability to return to surgery.

episodes.name: Oh, the Guilt
episodes.description: Guilt causes different actions in everyone, the interns are allowed to attend an M&M meeting, and Derek and Addison finalize things.

episodes.name: Let the Angels Commit
episodes.description: Izzie returns to the hospital under probation, and George tries to make amends with Callie. Meanwhile, Cristina's deletion of Bailey's name on Burke's OR board makes her assume he is against her, and Derek's irritating sister Nancy visits.

episodes.name: Where the Boys Are
episodes.description: Derek, George, Alex, Burke, Richard, Joe and Walter go on a camping trip. Meanwhile, Meredith assists Mark with gender reassignment surgery, Izzie avoids discussing her grief, Addison works with Callie, and Cristina feels Bailey's wrath.

episodes.name: Staring at the Sun
episodes.description: George must deal with his family's presence when his father is admitted. Meanwhile, Burke's secret is almost out, Alex tries to get close to Izzie again, and Richard comes to a decision about his marriage.

episodes.name: From a Whisper to a Scream
episodes.description: A traumatic car accident fills the ER. Cristina has a crisis of conscience about her deceptive teamwork with Burke, Izzie pushes the boundaries of her probation, and Callie tries to explain herself to George.

episodes.name: Don't Stand So Close to Me
episodes.description: Bailey is adamant that Burke and Cristina should be punished, Derek doubts his abilities, Izzie tries to take a stand against Mark's patronizing behavior, and Meredith deals with family in two very different ways.

episodes.name: Six Days: Part 1
episodes.description: As George's father's surgery approaches, he begins to realize how serious his condition is. Meanwhile, Izzie has to prove to Bailey that she is ready to scrub in on a surgery, and Meredith keeps running into her father.

episodes.name: Six Days: Part 2
episodes.description: George's father's surgery has left him very weak, Izzie's act of generosity backfires on her, Cristina and Burke continue their war of silence, and Meredith reaches out to her father.

episodes.name: Great Expectations
episodes.description: George deals with his grief, Cristina and Burke continue to ignore each other, Addison avoids Alex, and Izzie decides to help Bailey with a project. Meanwhile, Richard makes a decision which sends all the attendings scrambling.

episodes.name: Wishin' and Hopin'
episodes.description: A toxic patient wreaks havoc. Meanwhile, Bailey opens the free clinic, but the lack of patients makes Izzie question her investment. Meredith's mother is admitted again, and Cristina makes Burke wait for an answer.

episodes.name: Walk on Water
episodes.description: The interns each react differently to a mass-casualty incident. Meanwhile, George crosses the professional line with Callie, Cristina asks Burke to keep quiet about their engagement, and Richard dons a new hairstyle.

episodes.name: Drowning on Dry Land
episodes.description: Izzie fights to save her patient's life, George searches for the son of his patient, and Alex has to contend with the relatives of victims. Meanwhile, Meredith is unconscious underwater, with Derek her only hope.

episodes.name: Some Kind of Miracle
episodes.description: An unconscious Meredith interacts with some ghosts from her past while Richard, Burke and Bailey devise an unusual method of reviving her. A despondent Cristina leaves during her shift, and Derek speaks his mind to Meredith's mother.

episodes.name: Scars and Souvenirs
episodes.description: A Korean war veteran with a bullet lodged in his shoulder is admitted. Meanwhile, tensions escalate between Izzie and George, Callie reveals a big secret, Cristina contends with an old flame, and Alex continues to work with the Jane Doe.

episodes.name: My Favorite Mistake
episodes.description: The attendings face their board interviews. Meanwhile, Izzie seems to be the only one who remembers the night before, Derek is overly protective of Meredith when Mark offers her a surgery, and Callie's father pays a visit.

episodes.name: Time After Time
episodes.description: Meredith deals with her over protective stepmother, Cristina is caught between Burke and Marlow, and Derek fights to become Chief. Meanwhile, Alex continues the search for Jane Doe's identity, and Izzie's past comes back to haunt her.

episodes.name: Desire
episodes.description: The Chairman of Seattle Grace's board of directors is admitted, and the attendings vie for his favor, while the interns study for exams. Izzy and George are reminded of their infidelity, and Burke presses Cristina about wedding plans.

episodes.name: The Other Side of This Life, Part 1
episodes.description: Addison heads for warmer climate to figure things out, Meredith's stepmother visits the clinic, Cristina's perfect wedding is challenged when she and Burke's mothers visit, and Izzie tries to talk to George.

episodes.name: The Other Side of This Life, Part 2
episodes.description: Addison is pulled into the case of a high-risk surrogate mother, Meredith's stepmother develops a complication, Izzie struggles with George's decision, and Ava has surgery which may restore her memory.

episodes.name: Testing 1-2-3
episodes.description: The interns face their first year medical exams. With the interns busy, the attendings must do their own legwork, Burke appoints a new best man, Cristina writes her vows, and Callie grows suspicious of George and Izzie.

episodes.name: Didn't We Almost Have It All?
episodes.description: The wedding day arrives. Richard chooses the new Chief and Chief Resident, the interns receive their exam results, Callie drops a bombshell on George while Izzie pours her heart out to him, and Burke makes an important decision.

episodes.name: A Change Is Gonna Come
episodes.description: The interns, now residents, deal with their own crops of interns. Callie struggles with her new position, and Burke makes a decision.

episodes.name: Love/Addiction
episodes.description: Lexie persists in trying to get to know Meredith, and Mama Burke descends once more.

episodes.name: Let the Truth Sting
episodes.description: Callie hides in her office, frustrating Bailey who's itching to teach someone. Elsewhere, age becomes the theme as Izzie tries to convince 'Really Old Guy' he shouldn't die, Webber and Sloan set out to prove they're not too old to learn a new technique, and Karev is saddled with ... Read all

episodes.name: The Heart of the Matter
episodes.description: Meredith and her intern lose a patient after they give her the wrong diagnosis, Callie confronts Izzie, and McDreamy bonds with the other Grey.

episodes.name: Haunt You Every Day
episodes.description: Meredith feels she's being haunted by her Mother's ashes, and Cristina is denied a surgery for a surprising reason.

episodes.name: Kung Fu Fighting
episodes.description: A man survives a parachute accident without serious injury, two women refuse treatment because of a wedding contest, and Cristina and Izzie jockey for inclusion in Hahn's surgeries.

episodes.name: Physical Attraction... Chemical Reaction
episodes.description: Hahn bans Cristina from her service, Bailey covers more and more of Torres' duties, and Izzie and George go to extreme lengths to recapture the magic of their first encounter.

episodes.name: Forever Young
episodes.description: Bailey crosses the line when the guy she had a crush on in high school shows up in the ER during an onslaught of high school students involved in a bus crash. The Grey sisters run and hide when their father shows up drunk, while Derek tries to get back into the dating scene with ... Read all

episodes.name: Crash Into Me: Part 1
episodes.description: An accident in the ER bay leaves two paramedics fighting for their lives, and a third who refuses Bailey's care. Meanwhile, Alex juggles two women, and Lexie begins to bond with a patient.

episodes.name: Crash Into Me: Part 2
episodes.description: Tragedy abounds for everyone at Seattle Grace as they all continue in efforts to get the paramedic out of the overturned ambulance, stop the bleeding of a man who won't quit, and a bigot with a Nazi tattoo on his stomach. On the personal side, Rebecca returns to spend time with A... Read all

episodes.name: Lay Your Hands on Me
episodes.description: Bailey's son comes to the ER, Derek takes a housing step that puts pressure on Meredith, Izzie has a crisis of faith, and Cristina's choice may change her course with Hahn.

episodes.name: Where the Wild Things Are
episodes.description: The judgment of the residents is skewed by a competition, Meredith tries therapy and a bear attack may be more than it appears.

episodes.name: Piece of My Heart
episodes.description: Addison is not prepared for all the changes that greet her upon her return to Seattle Grace for a specialized surgery, Meredith and Derek begin their clinical trial, Izzie feels left out, and Karev is confronted with an unexpected announcement.

episodes.name: The Becoming
episodes.description: The new clinical trial patient has a secret, Yang is dealt a blow from a distance by Burke, the nurses refuse to work with Sloan, and Meredith's therapist tells her some home truths.

episodes.name: Losing My Mind
episodes.description: Cristina is still in her slump and turning mean, Izzie finally confronts Ava/Rebecca, and Meredith's anger with her therapist is challenged by a patient with a Cinderella story.

episodes.name: Freedom: Part 1
episodes.description: A surgical team battles the clock as they try to save a boy encased in cement, Karev's situation with an ever-disintegrating Ava brings back painful memories that interfere with his judgment, Derek and Meredith have one last chance at their clinical trial.

episodes.name: Freedom: Part 2
episodes.description: Meredith and Derek are at odds over whether or not to continue with their 13th clinical trial patient and the doctors lift the final critical pieces of cement from the young boy's body. Meanwhile, Alex rushes Ava into the hospital and is forced to confront the reality of her cond... Read all

episodes.name: Dream a Little Dream of Me: Part 1
episodes.description: Meredith and Derek find that "happily ever after" isn't as easy as they hoped, Cristina finds interest in a military doctor, and the Chief is surprised to hear that Seattle Grace is no longer ranked as a top-tier teaching hospital.

episodes.name: Dream a Little Dream of Me: Part 2
episodes.description: As a group of best friends deal with the aftermath of their car crash, Dr. Torres takes the lead on a groundbreaking course of treatment for one of the patients. Meanwhile, Major Hunt starts to irritate other attendings with his presence in the hospital.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Flood
episodes.description: There is a huge problem affecting the whole hospital including patients too. Richard is trying to do his best to solve the problem.

episodes.name: Brave New World
episodes.description: Callie worries over her first real date with Erica. Cristina stumbles upon a neglected area of the hospital.

episodes.name: There's No 'I' in Team
episodes.description: Bailey's dream of a domino surgery crumbles when one of the donors learns of her husband's affair. Meredith is insulted when she gets no credit for the procedure she and Derek worked on together.

episodes.name: Life During Wartime
episodes.description: The new trauma surgeon shocks everyone with his methods, Bailey is asked to save a girl with an inoperable tumor, and Callie's not sure what she wants.

episodes.name: Rise Up
episodes.description: The residents and interns squabbling over procedures upsets Dr. Hunt, Erica discovers what happened to the heart she lost, and Derek asks Sloan to break out the McSteamy to distract Yang.

episodes.name: These Ties That Bind
episodes.description: Izzie wrestles with her ghost, Torres uses a ground-breaking procedure to get her mind off of Hahn, and the interns continue teaching themselves spurred on by a new cohort.

episodes.name: In the Midnight Hour
episodes.description: Sadie manipulates the interns into performing a procedure that goes horribly wrong, Izzie's ghost refuses to leave, and Mark bonds with a girl who's taken responsibility for her sleep-walking father.

episodes.name: All by Myself
episodes.description: The residents make their cases for the solo surgery, Sadie chafes at her restrictions, and Sloan battles his desires.

episodes.name: Wish You Were Here
episodes.description: Derek has trouble with objectivity concerning his death row patient, Cristina and Meredith continue their feud, Izzie confides her problem to Alex, and the Chief faces what's become of his life's work.

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.description: Derek's mother visits, the death row patient starts angling for death in the hospital, Izzie craves more in her relationships, and Jackson's need for organs becomes critical.

episodes.name: Stairway to Heaven
episodes.description: Meredith and Miranda each cross a line, William Dunn regrets his decision and Izzie finally confronts what Denny's appearance means.

episodes.name: Beat Your Heart Out
episodes.description: Cristina carries on an intense flirtation with Owen, Derek gets advice from everyone on how to propose, Izzie gets some tests done, and Bailey's promotion may stand in the way of a new career possibility.

episodes.name: Before and After
episodes.description: Owen runs into someone very special from his past. Izzie employs her fellow doctors in a medical game made to help teach the interns. Naomi, Sam and Addison rush Archer to Seattle Grace and meet with Derek and Mark to save his life.

episodes.name: An Honest Mistake
episodes.description: Addison and Derek differ on the treatment plan for their patient, Cristina discovers malpractice in high places, Izzie gets bad news, and Mark spectacularly mistimes his confession.

episodes.name: I Will Follow You Into the Dark
episodes.description: Derek's malpractice deposition reveals an unhappy statistic, the interns finally diagnose 'Patient X', Karev stands up to two attendings to save a band geek, and when Webber shuts Miranda out completely she makes a call.

episodes.name: Stand by Me
episodes.description: Sloane's facial transplant fades to the background as the interns begin squabbling, Bailey's attempts to reach Derek unexpectedly clear surgeons from the hospital, and Cristina juggles her first solo surgery with treating a resistant Izzie.

episodes.name: Elevator Love Letter
episodes.description: Owen's PTSD endangers Cristina, Izzie's illness leaves the residents dealing with guilt and anger - at her expense, and Derek's fear causes him to persevere for Meredith's answer.

episodes.name: Sweet Surrender
episodes.description: Izzie bites off more than she can chew on her first day of chemotherapy, Mark and Derek are forced to work on the same patient, Meredith's plans for a simple wedding take a turn, and Karev finds himself split between worry over Izzie and excelling as a resident.

episodes.name: No Good at Saying Sorry (One More Chance)
episodes.description: Izzie's mother comes to town, a little girl shoots her father triggering a conflict between Meredith and the chief, Thatcher reappears, and Callie gets her first taste of life without her trust fund.

episodes.name: What a Difference a Day Makes
episodes.description: A car crash involving students going to their college graduation takes its toll on the residents in the ER, Derek's wedding gift is uniquely suited for Meredith - even if the oversight is not. Meanwhile, Denny's return has Derek and Bailey searching for the cause, and the results... Read all

episodes.name: Here's to Future Days
episodes.description: Izzie is torn over whether to have Derek's proposed brain surgery. A soldier on medical leave asks for a radical operation so he can return to active duty. The Chief tries to lure Bailey back to general surgery with a new toy, and Mark shifts into high gear with major life change... Read all

episodes.name: Now or Never
episodes.description: Izzie's memory problems panic Alex, the team takes care of a John Doe who was hit by a bus, Bailey rethinks her pediatrics fellowship, and the hospital endures losses.

episodes.name: Good Mourning
episodes.description: Covering days one through 13, everyone at Seattle Grace fights to save Izzie and George's lives and then deals with the aftermath. Elsewhere, Hunt treats a double amputation, and Arizona has a teen with painful growth spurts.

episodes.name: Goodbye
episodes.description: During days 20 through 40 the staff continues toward acceptance. Meanwhile, Arizona takes a manipulative step to diagnose her pain patient and Hunt's amputee patient sinks into a deep depression.

episodes.name: I Always Feel Like Somebody's Watchin' Me
episodes.description: As hospital personnel jockey for notice to keep from being fired, Izzie returns to surgery early and Bailey's triple aneurysm patient refuses her procedure because of her schizophrenic son.

episodes.name: Tainted Obligation
episodes.description: Thatcher is hospitalized with liver failure, and Meredith fights anger and guilt while deciding her responsibility. Sloan treats an octogenarian who wants an implant. Izzie's interference in Hunt's cancer case may have deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Invasion
episodes.description: As Mercy West merges with Seattle Grace, battle lines are drawn between the two hospital's residents over the patients.

episodes.name: I Saw What I Saw
episodes.description: After a burn victim unexpectedly dies in the midst of a chaotic ER, the Chief and board member Jennings interrogate the residents to find the culprit, as all the Mercy West and Seattle Grace residents defend their actions in an effort to save their jobs.

episodes.name: Give Peace a Chance
episodes.description: When Isaac, the hospital lab tech, has an inoperable tumor wrapped around his spine, he turns to Dr. Derek Shepherd to do the impossible, and Derek tests the Chief's authority when Richard objects to moving forward with the risky surgery.

episodes.name: Invest in Love
episodes.description: A generous donation is offered to Seattle Grace by the parents of Arizona's 10-year-old patient. When his condition worsens, however, she finds herself with a conflict of interest. Meanwhile, Cristina tests her boundaries with Owen at the hospital and, adding insult to injury, Al... Read all

episodes.name: New History
episodes.description: When Owen recruits his fellow Iraqi War vet, Dr. Teddy Altman, as the new cardiothoracic surgeon, Cristina questions Teddy's abilities in the OR and the nature of their past relationship. Meanwhile Izzie returns to Seattle Grace with her high school mentor seeking treatment for h... Read all

episodes.name: Holidaze
episodes.description: As Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's pass, Miranda is visited by her father, William, who disapproves of her choices in life; meanwhile, Mark and Lexie must cope with the shocking arrival of a woman from his past, and Thatcher Grey questions the Chief's recent behavior as Me... Read all

episodes.name: Blink
episodes.description: Mark flies Addison to Seattle to help with a difficult procedure on his pregnant daughter, Sloan. Owen questions Teddy's motives when she assigns Cristina the lead on a complicated surgery, and Derek's suspicions are raised when the Chief recruits Meredith to assist with a high p... Read all

episodes.name: I Like You So Much Better When You're Naked
episodes.description: After learning of Richard's drinking problem, Derek confronts him for the sake of his friend and the hospital, Izzie returns, hoping to reconcile with Alex, and tensions run high between Teddy, Cristina and Owen in the aftermath of Cristina's startling confession.

episodes.name: State of Love and Trust
episodes.description: An intra-operative crisis casts a shadow over Derek's first day as interim chief, Owen's influence worries Cristina, Karev's first pediatric surgery case turns out to be more than babysitting and Webber resents the decision he must make.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day Massacre
episodes.description: It's Valentine's Day and the doctors must treat dozens of injured people after the roof collapses at a popular romantic restaurant; Derek tries to manage his busy schedule as Chief of Surgery; Meredith wrestles with her new duties as the Chief's wife; and Mark and Callie team up ... Read all

episodes.name: The Time Warp
episodes.description: In his new role as Chief, Derek restores the hospital lecture series, and several attendings present to the group pivotal surgical cases from their pasts: Bailey reflects on how shy she was as an intern until getting advice from Webber, Callie looks back on a polio case, and Rich... Read all

episodes.name: Perfect Little Accident
episodes.description: When Avery's grandfather comes to the ER, Webber's wish for a stress-free first day back is lost after the surgeon requests an awake surgery. Elsewhere, Cristina and Teddy attempt a hand-me-down lung transplant for a cancer survivor.

episodes.name: Push
episodes.description: A patient who needs an extremely difficult surgery comes to Seattle Grace, and it's Richard and Owen who vie for the opportunity to tackle it. But the decision lies in the hands of Derek, who deems that Owen should take on the surgery, leaving Richard bitter. Meanwhile, Bailey de... Read all

episodes.name: Suicide Is Painless
episodes.description: When Teddy's patient seeks to end treatment and her life, she turns to Hunt for help. The situation triggers Hunt's memories of his life at war and his past relationship with Teddy. Meanwhile, Callie and Arizona have a difference in opinion on what their future holds, and Richard... Read all

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Parents
episodes.description: Alex's brother Aaron comes to Seattle with a hernia and needs a pro bono operation. Having children is on everyone's minds and tensions are high because of it.

episodes.name: Hook, Line and Sinner
episodes.description: Sloan returns to Mark's apartment just as she's going into labor. Teddy, Mark and the still-fighting Callie and Arizona are there to help with the birth and to get Mark through his grandson's pending adoption. Meanwhile Teddy sees Derek's invitation to illustrious cardiothoracic ... Read all

episodes.name: How Insensitive
episodes.description: Bailey preps the team with mandatory sensitivity training prior to admitting a 700-pound patient with compounded medical issues, and the case proves to be challenging. Meanwhile Derek has to come face to face with a former patient's husband in a wrongful death deposition, and spe... Read all

episodes.name: Shiny Happy People
episodes.description: An elderly patient admitted into the E.R. for a heart condition sees a familiar face, a long lost love who happens to be in the E.R. as well for a fractured arm, and the staff find themselves caught up in their love story. Meanwhile, Karev treats a troubled teenage patient whose ... Read all

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.description: Seattle Grace Hospital is hit with a crisis like no other in its history.

episodes.name: Death and All His Friends
episodes.description: Cristina and Meredith's surgical skills are put to the ultimate test.

episodes.name: With You I'm Born Again
episodes.description: Dereks near death experience results in reckless behaviour; Meredith has trouble getting cleared for surgery in the wake of the shooting and Cristina & Owen take their relationship to the next level.

episodes.name: Shock to the System
episodes.description: After weeks of concealing the fact she was pregnant and miscarried, Meredith at last tells Derek and is finally cleared to return to her surgical duties in the wake of the hospital shooting spree; Cristina experiences post-traumatic stress disorder in the midst of an operation; a... Read all

episodes.name: Superfreak
episodes.description: When Derek receives an unexpected and unwelcome visit from his estranged sister, Amelia, issues between the siblings -- both past and present -- come to the surface; the Chief tries to help Alex when he notices that he's refusing to use the elevators after his near-fatal shooting... Read all

episodes.name: Can't Fight Biology
episodes.description: Things are hostile on all fronts when a visit to the obstetrician results in some disturbing news for Meredith and Derek and Lexie loses it when she notices Meredith and April getting closer. Meanwhile, a car crash brings in multiple traumas and Jackson tries using his physical a... Read all

episodes.name: Almost Grown
episodes.description: As part of their training, the Chief puts Seattle Grace's residents -- including Meredith, Cristina, April and Jackson -- in charge; meanwhile, Derek, Callie, Owen and the other attending surgeons compete for a million-dollar grant.

episodes.name: These Arms of Mine
episodes.description: A documentary film crew visits the hospital six months after the shooting to document the road to recovery for doctors and patients. The camera lenses follow Derek, Owen, Mark & Callie as they ambitiously perform a rare arm transplant surgery, Meredith helps Cristina put on a bra... Read all

episodes.name: That's Me Trying
episodes.description: The residents are pushed to their limits when Owen puts them through a rigorous trauma certification drill; meanwhile, Cristina is also tested when left alone to monitor a very ill lung transplant patient.

episodes.name: Something's Gotta Give
episodes.description: Top security measures go into place as a team of doctors, led by the Chief, try to save the life of a major political figure from the Middle East. Meanwhile Cristina decides to finally decorate her new place and throw a housewarming party, and Alex shows up late from a weekend ge... Read all

episodes.name: Slow Night, So Long
episodes.description: Derek lands the grant he needs for his clinical trial and all the attendings take him out to Joe's Bar to celebrate, but they get a surprise when they see someone they know already at the bar. Meanwhile, Meredith and Alex have to fend for themselves during the night shift with a ... Read all

episodes.name: Adrift and at Peace
episodes.description: Despite Meredith's objections to the idea, a concerned Derek takes Cristina on a fishing trip in order to get away from it all, while Teddy, feeling directionless without Cristina, directs all of her efforts and compassion towards a dying patient who lacks the proper insurance to... Read all

episodes.name: Disarm
episodes.description: News of the incoming mass causalities after a gunman opens fire at a local college hits the staff hard when they must spring into action, even while their own wounds are still fresh; and Arizona does not receive a warm welcome home at the hospital.

episodes.name: Start Me Up
episodes.description: Arizona seeks Mark's advice as she tries to reconcile with Callie, who has big news of her own; Teddy must make a key decision for Henry during his surgery; and on the same day the residents receive a new crop of interns, the Chief announces he is looking for a new Chief Resident... Read all

episodes.name: Don't Deceive Me (Please Don't Go)
episodes.description: Meredith feels left out when Derek breaks ground on his clinical trial; Bailey's new idea does not go over well with the chief; Callie irritates her new obstetrician.

episodes.name: P.Y.T. (Pretty Young Thing)
