episodes.description: Thatcher Grey returns to Seattle Grace Hospital with stomach pains and a twenty-something year old girlfriend. Mark and Arizona refuse to let Callie drink coffee while pregnant, which creates problems at work. Mark puts Jackson on his service in exchange for information on Lexie.

episodes.name: Golden Hour
episodes.description: Meredith, looking to prove she is Chief Resident material, learns that anything and everything can happen in an hour's time when she steps up to run the ER for a night; meanwhile, Bailey sneaks off with Eli and gets into a little mischief, and everyone is surprised when the Chief... Read all

episodes.name: Not Responsible
episodes.description: Meredith must choose between her fertility treatments and her eyesight when she begins having trouble seeing, Mark makes it clear to Callie and Arizona that he takes his role as father-to-be very seriously, and April discovers there's more to Dr. Stark than first appears.

episodes.name: This Is How We Do It
episodes.description: Richard is desperate for Derek and Meredith to accept Adele into their Alzheimer's trial, but will Adele stand in her own way? Meanwhile Mark and Arizona have conflicting ideas of the kind of baby shower Callie wants, Teddy is freaked out when Henry has another health complicatio... Read all

episodes.name: Song Beneath the Song
episodes.description: In a series first, the music that has been at the heart of the show and been beloved by fans comes to life for Grey's Anatomy: The Music Event. A cataclysmic event rattles the doctors of Seattle Grace to the core, as Callie, on the verge of an enormous life-changing moment with A... Read all

episodes.name: It's a Long Way Back
episodes.description: Everyone pulls together to help Callie and baby Sofia on their painstaking journeys to recovery in hopes of allowing mother and baby to finally meet; the sudden death of a clinical trial patient has Derek proceeding with more caution while Meredith makes a calculated and risky mo... Read all

episodes.name: White Wedding
episodes.description: As Callie and Arizona's wedding approaches, the couple quickly realize that the day they've been looking forward to is not turning out the way they'd envisioned. Meanwhile Alex continues to make the other residents jealous as he appears to be the top contender for Chief Resident,... Read all

episodes.name: I Will Survive
episodes.description: As the official Chief Resident interviews begin, everyone steps up their game in the hopes of impressing Owen. Meanwhile, Meredith anxiously prepares for her first interview with the social worker and Cristina fights for a shot in the operating room.

episodes.name: Unaccompanied Minor
episodes.description: While Meredith faces the consequences of tampering with the trial Cristina and Owen fight over an unexpected pregnancy.

episodes.name: Free Falling
episodes.description: Meredith faces the repercussions of messing with the medical trial.

episodes.name: She's Gone
episodes.description: News of Meredith and Derek's unsteady relationship raises a red flag for Zola's adoption counselor; Alex quickly realizes that he has become the outcast of the group after ratting out Meredith; and Cristina makes a tough decision regarding her unexpected pregnancy. Also, Chief We... Read all

episodes.name: Take the Lead
episodes.description: The chief makes a decision that shocks everyone at Seattle Grace.

episodes.name: What Is It About Men
episodes.description: A stampede at a comic book convention leads to an influx of patients.

episodes.name: Love, Loss and Legacy
episodes.description: The residents try to impress Jackson's mother, Catherine Avery.

episodes.name: Poker Face
episodes.description: Lexie tries to get Derek interested in a patient's rare brain tumor.

episodes.name: Put Me in, Coach
episodes.description: Owen organizes a baseball game against Seattle Presbyterian.

episodes.name: Heart-Shaped Box
episodes.description: Jackson's suspicions about Mark and Lexie interfere with work.

episodes.name: Dark Was the Night
episodes.description: Teddy is called away on another case, as Henry is brought in for surgery.

episodes.name: Suddenly
episodes.description: Teddy asks Cristina to help with an OR patient.

episodes.name: This Magic Moment
episodes.description: The doctors form two teams to operate on conjoined twins.

episodes.name: Hope for the Hopeless
episodes.description: While Derek prepares to operate on a tumor deemed entirely inoperable, Hunt pressures Meredith to declare a specialty. As Cristina and Teddy try to steal a prized cardio surgery, the doctors celebrate Richard's 10,000th surgery.

episodes.name: If/Then
episodes.description: Meredith dreams of what her life would have been.

episodes.name: All You Need Is Love
episodes.description: On Valentine's Day Lexie volunteers to watch Zola for Meredith and Derek; Callie plans an evening for Arizona; and Ben shows Bailey how much he cares. Meanwhile, Christina and Owen drift farther apart despite the fact that he saves her when a car crashes into the hospital. Meredi... Read all

episodes.name: Have You Seen Me Lately?
episodes.description: In a final attempt to save Erica's life, Amelia arrives at Seattle Grace to beg Derek for help with the gliosarcoma case; Cristina and Owen engage in heated arguments during marriage counseling; Alex realizes that in order to be a good doctor, he'll need to improve his people ski... Read all

episodes.name: If Only You Were Lonely
episodes.description: As Adele's condition continues to deteriorate, Richard considers altering their living situation; an explosion at a local coffee shop results in a busy day in the ER for the doctors; Callie takes Meredith under her wing by helping her study for her boards; Lexie joins Arizona and... Read all

episodes.name: One Step Too Far
episodes.description: Derek encourages a hesitant Meredith to work with him again in neurology. When she complies, she listens as Derek is talking to a patient, who excitedly tells him about how she passed out in the middle of a big job interview. They're going to remove a cyst that's causing seizures... Read all

Meanwhile, Cristina continues to ignore Owen, Lexie reconsiders her feelings for Mark, Callie has to face Arizona's romantic past with other hospital staff, and Alex starts to feel uncomfortable about h... Read all

episodes.name: Support System

episodes.name: The Girl with No Name

Meanwhile, Adele Webber's memory continues to deteriorate, forcing Richard to reconsider their relationship.

episodes.name: Moment of Truth

episodes.name: Let the Bad Times Roll

episodes.name: Migration
episodes.description: Before the Seattle Grace doctors head to Boise to take part in an operation on conjoined twins, the Attendings pressure the 5th years for final decisions on their posts next year. Meanwhile, Arizona must face the reality of her friend's condition and Ben tries to get Bailey to go... Read all

episodes.name: Flight
episodes.description: As Meredith, Cristina, Derek, Mark, Lexie, and Arizona face the aftermath of their accident, the doctors back at the hospital face the future that seems to be taking them all in different directions.

episodes.name: Going, Going, Gone
episodes.description: Months after the plane crash, the doctors at Seattle continue to try and find a new sense of normalcy. With a new set of interns to put through the ringer, the new fellows and attendings get used to their roles while Cristina adjusts to her new life in Minnesota. But the life of ... Read all

episodes.name: Remember the Time
episodes.description: Each of the doctors involved in the crash experiences flashbacks that take them back to their time of rescue and explain how they got to where they are now.

episodes.name: Love the One You're With
episodes.description: The survivors of the crash are presented with a settlement offer, which forces them to choose between putting the incident behind them or investigate the true cause. Meanwhile various events occur: Jackson and April struggle to work with each other, Bailey is annoyed by the new a... Read all

episodes.description: As Cristina begins to make new "friends" in Minnesota, Meredith struggles with whether or not to tell Derek about an extremely rare case she is working on. Meanwhile, Arizona begins work with her new prosthetist and tensions flare around work when Jackson's mother comes into town... Read all

episodes.name: Beautiful Doom
episodes.description: Split between Meredith in Seattle and Cristina in Minnesota, this episode shows each surgeon tackling an incredibly challenging surgery. Meredith must juggle work and parental obligations while Cristina is caught between Dr. Thomas and Dr. Parker.

episodes.name: Second Opinion
episodes.description: Cristina's return to Seattle proves to be awkward when she and Owen must face each other again. Meanwhile, Jackson and April continue to try and negotiate their relationship, Jo deals with a perplexing case, and Bailey attempts to get Arizona into the hospital. Then, the survivor... Read all

episodes.name: I Was Made for Lovin' You
episodes.description: It's Arizona's first day back at work and Callie tries to keep things as normal as possible for her. Meanwhile, Bailey argues with Ben over wedding plans and Cristina and Owen continue to struggle with their relationship while Owen faces his first set of meetings about the plane ... Read all

episodes.name: Love Turns You Upside Down
episodes.description: In an intern-centered episode, Jo and Alex work closely together and Jo discovers she has a certain image. Meanwhile, Meredith's intern is forced to find a donor nerve for Derek's hand and Cristina pits two of her interns against one another in competition for time in the OR.

episodes.name: Run, Baby, Run
episodes.description: As a jittery Bailey prepares for her wedding, Meredith and Derek disagree on whether or not to go through with the nerve transplant from Lizzie. Then, Cristina learns of the real reason behind Owen's plea for a divorce and Jo finds herself in trouble when she accuses Alex of mish... Read all

episodes.name: Things We Said Today
episodes.description: As Bailey puts her wedding on hold to tend to Adele, a biker gang floods the hospital with injuries for all the other doctors to tend to. Meanwhile, Cristina and Owen make a final decision about the divorce and Callie and Arizona try to reconnect.

episodes.description: Alex and Jackson are pitted against each other to become the next "face" of Seattle Grace while they work on a sex reassignment surgery for a transgender teen. Then, April brings in an emergency trauma case which requires the help and discretion of many of the doctors. Meanwhile,... Read all

episodes.name: Hard Bargain
episodes.description: As the hospital inches closer to finding a buyer, many of the doctors don't like the new changes being made, causing the crash survivors to consider a crazy idea. Meanwhile, April's relationship with Matthew progresses and she asks Jackson for advice.

episodes.name: This Is Why We Fight
episodes.description: The crash survivors race against the clock to find a buyer for the hospital before Pegasus closes in. Meanwhile, the interns and other doctors at SGMW plan for what they believe will be their imminent departure while Jackson's mother continues to try to convince him to move to Bo... Read all

episodes.name: Transplant Wasteland
episodes.description: The transition to new management has the doctors at each others throats. Matters become worse when Owen quits, leaving the OR board in complete disarray.

episodes.name: Idle Hands
episodes.description: With the new Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital up and running smoothly, everyone is happy about the new changes. Meredith worries about the health of her baby while Bailey tries to get the board members to fund her new plan for genome mapping. Meanwhile, Arizona's new prosthetic gives... Read all

episodes.name: Can't Fight This Feeling
episodes.description: When a giant gas tanker explodes on a highway, a couple of parents are admitted to the hospital while Owen looks after their son. Matthew is caught in the explosion and is admitted to the hospital while a single mother fights to find out what mysterious illness is plaguing her so... Read all

episodes.name: She's Killing Me
episodes.description: A couple of Syrian doctors arrive at Grey Sloan Memorial to learn field techniques for war zones. Then, when a series of patients return with post-op infections, one doctor's work falls under suspicion.

episodes.name: Sleeping Monster

episodes.name: Do You Believe in Magic
episodes.description: A magician's assistant arrives at the hospital with a severe injury that has all the general surgeons involved, except for Bailey who is ignoring all of the attendings. As Cristina searches for a way to wake his father up, Ethan has a medical emergency of his own. Alex tries to a... Read all

episodes.name: Readiness Is All
episodes.description: With a major storm rolling in, the hospital is chaotic. When Jason comes into the hospital in critical condition, Alex does everything he can to protect Jo. With Meredith's due date just weeks away, Derek urges her to slow down.

episodes.name: Perfect Storm
episodes.description: As Seattle is plunged into a major storm, Meredith goes into labour. When the hospital loses power, her doctor and all the others are forced to work in the dark. Cristina must perform surgery in almost complete darkness while Arizona, Alex, and Lauren must ward off terrified pare... Read all

episodes.name: Seal Our Fate

episodes.name: I Want You with Me
episodes.description: Callie makes a decision about her relationship.

episodes.description: Derek and Meredith adjust to life at home with their newborn.

episodes.description: Meredith struggles to balance her roles as a surgeon and a mother.

episodes.description: A woman comes in badly hurt from a car jack and Owen pays some extra attention when she is found to have served in the military. episodes.description: The hospital doctors become fascinated with Dr. Herman's case when Amelia gives a lecture detailing the intricacies of the surgery. Arizona and Herman continue to bond over the amount of cases they are trying to complete before the big surgery. Meanwhile, Bailey brings them a cas... Read all

episodes.description: Derek witnesses a horrible car crash and jumps in to save lives.

episodes.description: Penny's first day gets off to a rocky start. April brings a young patient from overseas with tumors on his hands. Jo and Stephanie's feud continues.

episodes.description: As the rumor mill around the hospital continues to spiral out of control, Grey Sloan Memorial is flooded with injured firefighters from a nearby wildfire. Maggie struggles to keep things with Andrew professional at work; meanwhile, Jo questions Alex's priorities. Also, Alex decid... Read all

episodes.name: The Sound of Silence
episodes.description: Meredith is attacked by a patient, and Penny finds her injured. The staff of Grey Sloan Memorial is standing by Meredith trying to save her life.

episodes.name: All I Want Is You
episodes.description: As the hospital deals with Meredith's trauma, Callie and Maggie perform a risky, experimental surgery on Alex's 15-year-old patient against his professional opinion. Meanwhile, Owen and Nathan are still at odds with each other, and Maggie and Andrew's relationship continues to de... Read all

episodes.name: Unbreak My Heart

episodes.description: Jackson learns about April's pregnancy, while Alex and the team of doctors handles a long triple-organ transplant surgery. Meredith considers dating again, and Andrew insists on not receiving special treatment after he and Maggie go public.

episodes.name: Family Affair
episodes.description: Meredith and Maggie support Amelia on an important day; Jo reveals that she has been keeping secrets from Alex while Arizona and Callie deal with the impact of their custody arrangement. Meanwhile, Ben leaps into action to help a friend.

episodes.name: Undo
episodes.description: A crisis at the hospital cuts the wedding festivities short, Richard steps in with advice for Jo, and Meredith feels the burden of secrets.

episodes.name: Catastrophe and the Cure
episodes.description: Meredith thinks about her loyalties while Alex deals with the fallout of his actions; Amelia and Owen host a dinner party with surprising guests; Jackson makes a suggestion to help April through her recovery.

episodes.description: A family argues at the hospital following a car crash at a funeral; Arizona is caught between Alex and Andrew; Ben has a new parenting role; Amelia helps Meredith and Maggie work through a problem.

episodes.description: Alex realizes the clinic doesn't make him less of a doctor while Meredith struggles with professionalism with Riggs

episodes.description: Meredith and Bailey both have liver transplant patients; Owen needs to look after Harriet.

episodes.name: Roar
episodes.description: A familiar face returns to Grey Sloan throwing many of the doctors for a loop. With Catherine putting on the pressure, Bailey has to make a decision about Alex while a tough ER case makes Amelia's bad day even worse.

episodes.name: Why Try to Change Me Now
episodes.description: The arrival of a new consultant puts the doctors on edge; Amelia and Owen bring their personal problems into the hospital; April explores some unfamiliar territory.

episodes.name: The Room Where It Happens
episodes.description: A surgery brings back memories for Meredith, Richard, Owen and Stephanie.

episodes.name: You Haven't Done Nothin'
episodes.description: Alex makes a decision about his future when it looks like he'll be going to jail. In the meantime, Richard wants to know why Eliza is at Seattle Grace as victims of a building collapse are brought in.

episodes.name: You Can Look (But You'd Better Not Touch)
episodes.description: Bailey, Arizona and Jo treat a violent teenage girl and her unborn baby in a women's prison.

episodes.name: Jukebox Hero
episodes.description: The attendings plot to make Eliza's first day at Grey Sloan difficult.

episodes.name: None of Your Business
episodes.description: Maggie's mother unexpectedly visits; Bailey is forced to make a tough decision when an attending won't work with Eliza; Stephanie gets involved in Owen and Amelia's drama.

episodes.name: It Only Gets Much Worse
episodes.description: The residents get caught up in a conflict between attending physicians; April has a rough first day in her new role at the hospital.

episodes.name: Back Where You Belong
episodes.description: Alex learns a lot has changed at the hospital since he left; Jo has to make a tough decision on a case; Arizona tries to keep her distance from Eliza.

episodes.name: Civil War
episodes.description: Richard, Jackson, April and Catherine tackle a grueling trauma case intensified by hospital politics; Amelia finally faces her feelings about Owen; Meredith gets caught between Nathan and Alex over a patient.

episodes.name: Who Is He (And What Is He to You)?
episodes.description: Jackson and April go to Montana to perform a complicated surgery on a young patient.

episodes.name: 'Till I Hear It from You
episodes.description: Diane Pierce returns to Grey Sloan while Owen and Amelia collaborate on a trauma case.

episodes.name: Be Still, My Soul
episodes.description: When Maggie's mom's health deteriorates, the doctors are at odds over how to treat her. Meanwhile, Richard comes to grips with Bailey's betrayal over the Residency Program.

episodes.name: What's Inside
episodes.description: When Maggie takes on a big case, many of the doctors are worried she's not the right one for the job; Stephanie makes the mistake of treating one of Grey Sloan's own.

episodes.name: In the Air Tonight
episodes.description: Meredith and Nathan must face their feelings when they end up next to each other on a plane.

episodes.name: Don't Stop Me Now
episodes.description: Bailey and April work to fix things between Richard and Catherine; Eliza continues to pursue Arizona; one of Alex's previous patients returns to Grey-Sloan.

episodes.name: Leave It Inside
episodes.description: April and Andrew consult with a patient who has an inoperable heart tumor; Alex and Eliza disagree about the treatment of a young patient; Stephanie and Ben make major decisions.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.description: The doctors of Grey Sloan encounter a difficult case involving a dangerous patient; Owen receives life-changing news that pushes Amelia to step up to support him; Alex attends a medical conference after making a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Ring of Fire
episodes.description: A dangerous patient escapes the hospital room, putting the doctor's lives at risk; Alex faces a difficult decision in his relationship with Jo; Meredith has big news for Nathan.

episodes.name: Break Down the House
episodes.description: Meredith and the team are focused on helping Owen's sister after her shocking return, and Amelia faces a conflict over a patient. Meanwhile, Bailey is forced to give Grey Sloan a facelift after the fire and the doctors are introduced to a few new faces that spice things up around... Read all

episodes.name: Get Off on the Pain
episodes.description: Meredith struggles to come up with a new plan for Owen's sister. Jo makes a surprising choice regarding Alex, and Andrew's sister's controversial research leads to a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Go Big or Go Home
episodes.description: Harper Avery arrives at Grey Sloan, putting Bailey on edge. A familiar face from Meredith's past returns as a patient, and Amelia tries to manage a secret.

episodes.name: Ain't That a Kick in the Head
episodes.description: Amelia confronts a difficult situation; Meredith deals with the fallout from her conversation with Nathan; Maggie finds herself at an awkward family dinner; Jackson receives big news; Richard and Bailey search for the stars of tomorrow.

episodes.name: Danger Zone
episodes.description: Hunt joins his sister for a drive, while memories from older times surface up.

episodes.name: Come on Down to My Boat, Baby
episodes.description: Jackson invites the guys to relax with him on a day at sea; Arizona, April and Maggie treat a woman who is hiding a deadly secret.

episodes.name: Who Lives, Who Dies, Who Tells Your Story
episodes.description: After a roller coaster car falls off the track at the county fair, the doctors at Grey Sloan tend to patients who spark memories about ghosts from their past.

episodes.name: Out of Nowhere
episodes.description: The doctors must get creative to treat patients after a hacker shuts down the hospital's computer system.
Jo is forced to face her abusive husband, while Grey Sloan continues to work with the FBI after the hospital's computer system is compromised by a hacker.

episodes.name: Personal Jesus
episodes.description: A young boy's case has a profound impact on the doctors of Grey Sloan Memorial; April faces a surprising patient; Jo deals with her estranged husband.

episodes.name: (Don't Fear) the Reaper
episodes.description: The stress of managing the hospital and coming to terms with Ben's decision to become a Seattle firefighter pushes Bailey to her limits.

episodes.name: Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger
episodes.description: April is in charge of the new surgical innovation contest; the doctors are eager to start their projects; Catherine's old friend has a shocking idea for Catherine and Jackson; Meredith treats a returning patient who inspires her project.

episodes.name: You Really Got a Hold on Me
episodes.description: Two boys injured in a house fire are brought to Grey Sloan and firefighter Andy Herrera's skills are put to the test when one of the boys is near death.

episodes.name: Games People Play
episodes.description: Maggie invites Clive over to meet Meredith and Amelia.

episodes.name: Old Scars, Future Hearts
episodes.description: Relationships heat up at Grey Sloan-Memorial; Meredith tries to learn more about Marie Cerone.

episodes.name: Caught Somewhere in Time
episodes.description: Although he enjoys spending time with Maggie, Jackson must concentrate on the vaginoplasty surgery he scheduled with Catherine and Richard.

episodes.name: One Day Like This
episodes.description: April treats a rabbi who challenges her crisis of faith and Meredith treats a transplant surgeon from another hospital.

episodes.name: Hold Back The River
episodes.description: Amelia and Koracick perform a risky procedure to remove a brain tumor from a young patient. Meredith and Jo re-work their project submission. Richard's AA sponsor is admitted with a DNR.

episodes.name: Beautiful Dreamer
episodes.description: An agent from U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement searches the hospital for an employee; Alex's patient wants to leave the hospital to enjoy her final days, but Alex feels differently; Arizona treats Matthew Taylor's baby.

episodes.name: Judgment Day
episodes.description: After a doctor accidentally brings in "weed" cookies, the hospital turns upside down

episodes.name: Bad Reputation
episodes.description: Crisis management is brought in to help Grey Sloan sort out allegations against Harper Avery; Alex and Jo are thrown for a loop when Nurse Olivia shows up with her son; Arizona spends more time with Sofia.

episodes.name: Fight For Your Mind
episodes.description: Alex and Jo go on a road trip to Iowa to find Alex's mom, whom he hasn't heard from in a very long time. Meanwhile, Meredith gives a presentation on her mini-livers project, which attracts a ton of attention, and Jackson works to rebuild the foundation after its reputation is thr... Read all

episodes.name: Cold As Ice
episodes.description: One of Grey Sloan Memorial's own is seriously injured, making the team reflect on what is truly important to them. Meanwhile, Nicole Herman pays a visit to GSM and talks to Arizona about an exciting opportunity.

episodes.name: All of Me
episodes.description: It's the day of Jo and Alex's wedding, but things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: With a Wonder and a Wild Desire
episodes.description: The doctors vie for a new position, Meredith struggles to stay focused and Maggie finds herself the keeper of a secret. Elsewhere, Amelia and Owen try to figure out their relationship while Jo and Alex's honeymoon doesn't go as planned.

episodes.name: Broken Together
episodes.description: The new doctors continue to shake things up in the hospital; Meredith forms a connection with a patient; Jackson finds it difficult to find the meaning behind his recent experiences; Jo forges an unexpected alliance.

episodes.name: Gut Feeling
episodes.description: Meredith treats a patient who happens to specialize in matchmaking; a seemingly drunk patient pushes Richard's buttons and gives him a mystery to solve; Maggie tries to reach Teddy after the burden of her secret becomes overwhelming.

episodes.name: Momma Knows Best
episodes.description: Meredith turns heads when she shows up to work ready for a blind date later that day; Alex makes a questionable decision to save a patient; the burden of knowing Teddy's secret keeps Maggie up at night.

episodes.name: Everyday Angel
episodes.description: Meredith reaches out to Teddy and helps her talk through some of her personal struggles; Owen and Amelia hide out near Betty's school after she becomes a flight risk; Jo wants to get to work, but Bailey's attention is elsewhere.

episodes.name: Flowers Grow Out Of My Grave
episodes.description: Meredith has a patient whose family is celebrating Day of the Dead, making the doctors remember loved ones they have lost; Richard shares unexpected news with Meredith about her father; Teddy tries to tell Owen that she is pregnant.

episodes.name: Anybody Have a Map?
episodes.description: Catherine is in Los Angeles getting the new foundation ready. Meanwhile, Meredith and Koracick visit for a highly confidential consult and a pregnant nurse collapses at the hospital while talking to Richard.

episodes.name: Blowin' in the Wind
episodes.description: Seattle is hit by a huge windstorm, and Grey Sloan becomes inundated with patients. Alex and Jo are stuck at home and decide to make the best of it by having a honeymoon. Meredith confronts Richard about getting his life back on track.

episodes.name: Shelter From the Storm
episodes.description: The windstorm continues to blow through Seattle and when the power is knocked out at Grey Sloan, the doctors must scramble to save lives. Owen, Amelia and Teddy confront their complicated situation.

episodes.name: Help, I'm Alive
episodes.description: Meredith questions Link's relaxed approach to a patient's treatment; Maggie worries that Richard, Jackson and Catherine haven't come to terms with Catherine's diagnosis; DeLuca steps up in the operating room when Owen faces a setback.

episodes.name: The Winner Takes It All
episodes.description: Amelia and Koracick tackle a daunting surgery on Catherine; Richard urges Meredith to visit her father before his time is up.

episodes.name: Girlfriend in a Coma
episodes.description: As Meredith gains some clarity on her dating situation, the strain on Bailey and Ben's marriage comes to a head. Meanwhile, Betty surprises Owen and Amelia.

episodes.name: I Walk the Line
episodes.description: A sea of patients flood the hospital after gunfire goes off at a parade and a blast from the past throws Maggie off her game on the same day that Meredith tries to talk to her about DeLuca. Owen and Amelia get some life-altering news.

episodes.name: I Want a New Drug
episodes.description: Meredith breaks a hospital record; the doctors are sent scrambling in the wake of a massive overdose within the community; Jackson wants to take Maggie camping; Levi and Nico's relationship continues to develop.

episodes.name: We Didn't Start the Fire
episodes.description: When Jackson throws a party to celebrate Catherine's surgery and those who worked to save her, nothing goes as planned; Helen pays Alex and Jo a surprise visit.

episodes.name: Blood and Water
episodes.description: Meredith finds herself having to side with either Alex or DeLuca during a difficult situation; Maggie reveals details about her personal life that cause a public stir; Levi struggles with whether or not to tell his family about Nico.

episodes.name: And Dream of Sheep
episodes.description: Ties are strained as Andrew and Carina confront an unforgiving family history; Teddy and Owen work together on a married couple that is expecting; Amelia attends a conference for alternative pain relief.

episodes.name: Add It Up
episodes.description: Maggie introduces mood rooms as an alternative approach to medicine; Alex and DeLuca butt heads over an 11-year-old patient who tries to sabotage her own surgery; Teddy has a pregnancy scare that brings Owen and Koracick to odds.

episodes.name: Silent All These Years
episodes.description: When a trauma patient arrives at Grey Sloan, it forces Jo to confront her past. Meanwhile, Bailey and Ben have to talk to Tuck about dating.

episodes.name: The Whole Package
episodes.description: Owen and Teddy have to deal with the surprise arrival of Megan Hunt; upon her return, Catherine preps for a surgery on a war veteran who's not emotionally prepared for the procedure; Meredith worries about DeLuca operating with Richard.

episodes.name: Good Shepherd
episodes.description: Amelia and Link travel to New York to operate on a patient who has a severe spinal deformity, but they're in for more than they bargained for when Nancy Shepherd invites them to dinner at her home.

episodes.name: Head Over High Heels
episodes.description: As Meredith debates how to handle an unexpected situation in her personal life, Richard has an untimely reunion with an old friend. Meanwhile, Jo has a hard time at work, and Owen tries therapy.

episodes.name: What I Did For Love
episodes.description: Maggie treats one of Station 19's own, and Jo learns a hard lesson. Meanwhile, when working with a family seeking asylum, Meredith makes a call that could jeopardize her career.

episodes.name: Drawn to the Blood
episodes.description: Alex tries desperately to save his patient while he waits for a severely agoraphobic blood donor to arrive from London; Jo reveals to Meredith why she's been so down.

episodes.name: Jump Into the Fog
episodes.description: As fog begins to cover Seattle, the doctors must navigate through personal complications; Meredith and Alex attempt to save Gus; Levi talks some sense into a struggling Nico.

episodes.name: Nothing Left to Cling To
episodes.description: Meredith, Richard and Alex must deal with the consequences after Bailey fires them for insurance fraud; after disappearing in the fog, Jackson helps a man in a dangerous situation; Tom gets new responsibilities at the hospital.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle
episodes.description: The doctors operate on a man who crashed into Maggie's car; Owen, back from paternity leave, struggles with Tom's new position; Meredith's recent firing doesn't stop her from diagnosing those around her.

episodes.name: Reunited
episodes.description: A patient at the hospital is brain dead after falling into a construction site, and her two sisters must decide whether or not to keep her alive.

episodes.name: It's Raining Men
episodes.description: After Meredith inadvertently stirs up negative press for Grey Sloan, she tries to make things right with her former colleagues, jeopardizing her community service hours. Station 19's Ben and Vic bring a young woman into the hospital, and Jackson stands up to Koracick when he goes... Read all

episodes.name: Breathe Again
episodes.description: Meredith has a court hearing after skipping out on community service, while Bailey and Jo have a patient that Jo realizes is from the treatment facility. Richard and Gemma grab breakfast together and things go awry.

episodes.name: Whistlin' Past the Graveyard
episodes.description: Alex is hoping to impress investors at Pac-Gen North, but when he hears disturbing news about skeletons on the construction site grounds, he enlists Richard to help with distraction tactics. Teddy feels the pressure to be super-mom after tasking herself with creating original Hal... Read all

episodes.name: Papa Don't Preach
episodes.description: Catherine is back in town and has no idea what's been going on between Jackson and Maggie, while her relationship with Richard has become distant. Owen and Amelia treat a woman who fell in the basement and quickly realize that there is more to the story; and Maggie is shocked to ... Read all

episodes.name: My Shot
episodes.description: Meredith faces the medical board as her future as a doctor remains uncertain, and she's forced to reckon with her past in some challenging ways. Meanwhile, the interns are put to the test as they are each vying to be the most successful on their respective cases in the absence of... Read all

episodes.name: Let's All Go to the Bar
episodes.description: Jo becomes a safe haven volunteer and gets a call that a baby has been dropped off at Station 19. Meanwhile, Meredith moves forward with her life after facing the medical board. Jackson takes a big step in his budding romance with Vic, while Bailey and Amelia swap pregnancy updat... Read all

episodes.name: Help Me Through the Night
episodes.description: Following the car crash at Joe's Bar and subsequent rescue efforts led by the Station 19 firefighters, Grey Sloan doctors work through the night to save the lives of their colleagues. Meanwhile, Amelia worries about sharing her pregnancy revelation with Link. Owen and Teddy take ... Read all

episodes.name: A Hard Pill to Swallow
episodes.description: Richard finds out Maggie quit Grey Sloan and is concerned about how she's handling the death of her patient who was her estranged cousin. Bailey returns to work after taking some personal time off, although Koracick doesn't make her first day as easy as she'd like. Meanwhile, Mer... Read all

episodes.name: The Last Supper
episodes.description: Jackson creates an uncomfortable situation when he invites his new girlfriend to what he thinks is Richard and Catherine's anniversary celebration; Levi brings Nico on a trip to visit an ailing family member.

episodes.name: Save the Last Dance for Me
episodes.description: DeLuca has a seemingly incurable patient and turns to a diagnostics genius for help; Bailey checks in on Joey, a foster kid that Ben brought into Grey Sloan; Amelia is getting the results of her paternity test.

episodes.name: A Diagnosis
episodes.description: DeLuca is irritated after Meredith takes over his patient Suzanne whose symptoms continue to stump the doctors at Grey Sloan. Elsewhere in the hospital, Jackson, Owen and Jo work on a couple injured in a bear attack; and Levi is hurt when Nico doesn't want him to meet his parents... Read all

episodes.name: Snowblind
episodes.description: Meredith and Carina question DeLuca's uncharacteristic behavior when he volunteers to perform a life-threatening task during a blizzard. Meanwhile, Bailey tries to help Joey with his future, while Richard trains a new intern at the hospital.

episodes.name: Leave a Light On
episodes.description: Bailey and Ben face a huge, life-altering decision, while Meredith and several of the doctors reflect on the past.

episodes.name: Life on Mars?
episodes.description: A wealthy inventor arrives at Grey Sloan and asks Koracick for help, while Meredith struggles to save a woman with diabetes who has been rationing her insulin. Jo and Link fight to save a young man who fell onto train tracks, and Jackson and Vic's relationship hits a snag.

episodes.name: Give a Little Bit
episodes.description: Meredith heads up a pro bono surgery day, but the overwhelming patient response causes her to struggle to keep things in order. DeLuca treats a teenage patient whom he suspects is in danger and desperately tries to get Bailey to support his theory.

episodes.name: Love of My Life
episodes.description: Richard preps to present his PATH pen at the LA Surgical Innovation Conference but becomes distracted by his issues with Catherine. Maggie and Teddy run into people from their past at the same conference, while Hayes relives moments from when he met his late wife.

episodes.name: Sing It Again
episodes.description: Owen and Link treat an older woman who wakes up from surgery and can't stop singing, while Teddy helps Koracick stay afloat after an estranged loved one from his past comes to the hospital looking for help. Meredith, Bailey and Maggie focus their efforts on a difficult patient wi... Read all

episodes.name: Put on a Happy Face
episodes.description: Link tries to convince Amelia to take it easy during the final stage of her pregnancy. Hayes asks Meredith a surprising question, and Owen makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: All Tomorrow's Parties
episodes.description: In the midst of the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic, Grey Sloan Memorial and its surgeons' lives have been turned upside down. The season 17 premiere picks up one month into the pandemic, and it's all-hands-on-deck as Meredith, Bailey and the rest of the Grey Sloan doctors fi... Read all

episodes.name: The Center Won't Hold
episodes.description: Bailey finds herself in the middle of an argument with patients' families as they await news about their children who were injured in a fire. Winston surprises Maggie, and Amelia and Link try to have some fun as new parents. Teddy learns her colleagues know more than she may like... Read all

episodes.name: My Happy Ending
episodes.description: The doctors continue to face their new COVID-19 reality and deal with a familiar and stubborn patient; Koracick is put in charge of the interns; Link operates on a sex therapist; Maggie finds comfort in Winston's virtual presence.

episodes.name: You'll Never Walk Alone
episodes.description: Owen faces a medical diagnosis that challenges more than he imagined. Meanwhile, Koracick begins to go stir crazy; and Maggie gets a not-so-subtle glimpse into Winston's background.

episodes.name: Fight the Power
episodes.description: Bailey panics as she hears there has been a surge of COVID-19 cases, knowing she has loved ones in an assisted living facility. Meanwhile, Jackson and Richard team up against Catherine to teach her a lesson, and Teddy continues to try to mend her frayed relationships. After an in... Read all

episodes.name: No Time for Despair
episodes.description: Grey Sloan Memorial faces new pressures as Seattle Pres is overloaded, and Grey Sloan Memorial is now on surge capacity protocol. Meanwhile, Owen and Amelia are faced with one of the most controversial surgeries of their careers.

episodes.name: Helplessly Hoping
episodes.description: Both teams tend to a tense situation with so much at stake. Meanwhile, Jo convinces Hayes to bend the rules on a case, and Maggie and Winston reconnect.

episodes.name: It's All Too Much
episodes.description: As traumas and pressure mount, Grey Sloan doctors try to find a path forward, and Richard questions his faith. Meanwhile, Jo, Link and Jackson play an unconventional drinking game.

episodes.name: In My Life
episodes.description: After a heart-wrenching loss, Teddy struggles to cope and it triggers memories of her past; Amelia tries to help the situation by encouraging Owen to accept and forgive Teddy.

episodes.name: Breathe
episodes.description: Both a mother and daughter are in critical condition and fighting over the last ventilator. Meanwhile, Hayes' sister-in-law ends up in the hospital with a kidney stone, and the house has a few more kids join in as Amelia's the babysitter.

episodes.name: Sorry Doesn't Always Make It Right
episodes.description: A newlywed couple is injured in a car accident; Jackson's generosity with COVID-positive patients goes a bit too far; Hayes works to rebuild Maggie's confidence and convince her to perform an extremely risky heart surgery.

episodes.name: Sign O' the Times
episodes.description: Maggie is preoccupied with Winston while trying to treat a patient wounded in the Seattle protests. Meanwhile, Levi is tested by an emergency, and the doctors struggle to treat a patient who doesn't believe in COVID.

episodes.name: Good as Hell
episodes.description: Amidst the need for more surgeons, Jo tries to convince Bailey to let her switch specialties. Elsewhere, Link accuses Amelia of overstepping while he is treating a patient remotely, and Winston comes up with an out-of-the-box idea.

episodes.name: Look Up Child
episodes.description: Jackson pays a visit to his father that helps set him on the right path.

episodes.name: Tradition
episodes.description: Jackson shares his big news with his colleagues while Koracick and Levi fight to save a pregnant woman's grandfather as she goes into labor. Maggie keeps a watchful eye on Meredith as Bailey and Richard put off telling her about DeLuca.

episodes.name: I'm Still Standing
episodes.description: Levi gets accepted into the vaccine trial. Meanwhile, Amelia and Owen treat a car crash patient, and Hayes and Jo are met with Luna's legal guardian.

episodes.name: Someone Saved My Life Tonight
episodes.description: It's wedding day for Maggie and Winston. Meanwhile, Meredith takes on a new role at the hospital, and Jo makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Sun
episodes.description: The Grey Sloan doctors treat a patient who encountered illegal fireworks; Bailey has her sights set on hiring new doctors, but she's having trouble finding viable options; Owen and Teddy attempt to take the next step in their engagement.

episodes.name: Some Kind of Tomorrow
episodes.description: Meredith seeks advice from Amelia; Richard is re-energized as he takes teaching to a new level at the hospital; Winston treats a patient suffering from kidney failure.

episodes.name: Hotter Than Hell
episodes.description: Seattle's favorite redhead returns and graces the Grey Sloan halls with her experience and expertise as she attempts to help Richard teach the newest crop of residents.

episodes.name: With a Little Help from My Friends
episodes.description: Richard recruits Meredith and Bailey to help him launch a new program. Meanwhile, Addison's patient has complications from a procedure, and Jo helps a woman who goes into premature labor.

episodes.name: Bottle Up and Explode!
episodes.description: The Grey Sloan doctors immediately acts after an explosion rocks Seattle. Owen experiences PTSD when hearing the news of explosion, while his sister Megan enlists help from Winston and Hayes.

episodes.name: Every Day Is a Holiday (With You)
episodes.description: It's Thanksgiving, and Meredith has travel problems due to the weather; Amelia and Link reconnect.

episodes.name: Today Was a Fairytale
episodes.description: Dr. Hamilton takes his frustrations out on Meredith, so Nick gives her a chance to blow off steam by scrubbing in on a surgery; Link and Jo take their kids to a fairy-tale theater performance that goes wrong.

episodes.name: It Came Upon a Midnight Clear
episodes.description: The doctors celebrate the holidays; Hamilton and Meredith prepare for a milestone on their project; Link wants to spend the holiday with Amelia and Scout as a family; Schmitt is faced with a difficult decision during surgery.

episodes.name: No Time to Die
episodes.description: The Grey Sloan Memorial doctors grapple with the aftermath of the car crash that involved some of their own; Meredith works to save Dr. Hamilton's life; Levi is impacted from his latest loss.

episodes.name: Living in a House Divided
episodes.description: Schmitt faces the Morbidity and Mortality conference; Hayes says his goodbyes without revealing his real reason for leaving; Hunt's and Farouk's conditions each begin to improve after their surgeries; Jo acknowledges her feelings for Link.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.description: Meredith, Amelia and the team prepare for Dr. Hamilton's long-awaited groundbreaking surgery; Bailey receives an unexpected offer; Owen's impatience makes him a difficult physical therapy patient, forcing Link to intervene. Richard tries to get through to Levi.

episodes.name: The Makings of You
episodes.description: Nick whisks Meredith away to his Minnesota cabin for a romantic weekend, leaving Winston and Maggie to care for Meredith's children. Meanwhile, Amelia and Kai grow closer.

episodes.name: Put the Squeeze on Me
episodes.description: Richard ponders his surgical abilities; Jo is charmed by her patient's brother; Megan pushes Teddy and Owen to talk out their issues; A pet python is the show's main squeeze; Grey is offered a promotion and more funding by Dr. Hamilton.

episodes.name: Road Trippin'
episodes.description: Tensions at Grey Sloan Memorial rise as the effects of the physician shortage begin to show; Meredith struggles to step away from work as she spends a sick day at home with Zola; the hospital receives an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Put It to the Test
episodes.description: Bailey is on edge when an accreditation council reviews the residency program; Nick returns to Seattle to perform a first-of-its-kind operation with Meredith, and Levi is forced to face reality when his mother is injured.

episodes.name: Should I Stay or Should I Go
episodes.description: Bailey faces an unhappy Catherine who is facing audits for several of her Foundation hospitals. Meanwhile, Addison is back at Grey Sloan; tensions rise between Meredith and Richard, and Owen returns to work.

episodes.name: I'll Cover You
episodes.description: A former patient of Link's, Simon, is in the ER with his pregnant wife; and Bailey receives an offer from Nick.

episodes.name: Stronger Than Hate
episodes.description: A dinner party is thrown at the sister house in Nick's honor. Meanwhile, Grey Sloan Memorial receives a victim of a brutal hate crime.

episodes.name: Out for Blood
episodes.description: Due to a blood shortage, Grey Sloan Memorial is setting up a voluntary donation center. Meanwhile, Nick asks Meredith for help with his patient and Winston is hung up on his relationship with his brother.

episodes.name: You Are the Blood
episodes.description: The blood shortage at Grey Sloan Memorial continues. Meanwhile, Meredith makes a risky decision regarding a patient, and Owen's actions to help his fellow veterans come to light.

episodes.name: Everything Has Changed
episodes.description: Six months later. A new team of interns begins training at the hospital as familiar faces return.

episodes.name: Wasn't Expecting That
episodes.description: The attending surgeons and interns work together to solve a medical mystery when a college kid comes in with what first looks like food poisoning but has escalating and dire complications. Meanwhile, Jo spends her day off with Bailey.

episodes.name: Let's Talk About Sex
episodes.description: To give awareness on sexual health Bailey recruits some interns to create a series of social media videos.

episodes.name: Haunted
episodes.description: It's Halloween night at Grey Sloan Memorial. Meredith and Nick try to spend some alone time together, Levi is stressed due to overworking, and Winston and Owen have the interns practice trauma training on a real cadaver.

episodes.name: When I Get to the Border
episodes.description: Bailey and Addison take a road trip to volunteer at a family planning center, but a patient's ectopic pregnancy leads to complications. Elsewhere, the interns begin to clue in in regards to Lucas's and Amelia's relationship.

episodes.name: Thunderstruck
episodes.description: A life changing thunderstorm news hits Grey Sloan. The surgeons and interns work together to save an injured reporter and family affected by the storm. Meanwhile, a beloved author undergoes a risky surgery, and complications.

episodes.name: I'll Follow the Sun
episodes.description: On Meredith's last day at Grey Sloan, doctors plan a goodbye surprise while Nick confronts her about their future. Interns compete to scrub in on a heart transplant, and Richard asks Teddy an important question.

episodes.name: All Star
episodes.description: Teddy makes a challenging decision; Maggie and Winston aren't on speaking terms; Link leans on Jo for emotional support as he preps for a surgery on a well-known athlete; Simone and Lucas are surprised by an unlikely visitor.

episodes.name: Love Don't Cost a Thing
episodes.description: Simone is met with a life-changing decision upon the return of someone from her past; Blue and Jules shadow Maggie on a risky case; Jo and Link tend to a pregnant woman; Lucas and Mika throw a party filled with surprises.

episodes.name: Sisters Are Doin' It for Themselves
episodes.description: Catherine returns to Grey Sloan for a surgical case that makes Lucas and Blue queasy; Amelia treats a patient with a family that's a little too supportive; Owen takes his medical future into his own hands, much to Teddy's surprise.

episodes.name: Training Day
episodes.description: Addison makes a special appearance at Grey Sloan to welcome Bailey's new OB/GYN trainees. Maggie's lung transplant is derailed, and Nick bonds with Lucas - before the day takes a shocking turn.

episodes.name: Pick Yourself Up
episodes.description: In the immediate aftermath of shocking events at the clinic, the hospital goes on lockdown and the Grey Sloan doctors split up to save multiple lives; Maggie lands in hot water with Winston; Jules' roommate makes a surprise appearance.

episodes.name: Cowgirls Don't Cry
episodes.description: A bull rider shows up at Grey Sloan with severe injuries, forcing Maggie, Amelia, Owen and Blue to examine their own biases; Simone can't find anyone to be her maid of honor; Mika takes drastic measures to pay down her student debt.

episodes.name: Shadow of Your Love
episodes.description: Maggie's last day; Amelia's relationship with Kai is tested; Ben worries as Bailey's doxing intensifies.

episodes.name: Mama Who Bore Me
episodes.description: With Levi's help, a patient celebrates a milestone; Jo processes a difficult diagnosis; Maggie and Winston decide their future.

episodes.name: Gunpowder and Lead
episodes.description: Amelia takes her personal problems out on her work colleagues, and the threats against Bailey come to a terrifying head. Lucas and Jules make a risky decision on a patient, and Mika struggles with burnout

episodes.name: Come Fly With Me
episodes.description: Teddy calls an emergency meeting to discuss the intern program; Link wrestles with his own self-doubt as he preps for a massive surgery; Nick shares some much-needed guidance with a struggling Lucas.

episodes.name: Ready to Run
episodes.description: Richard and Teddy make an exciting announcement; Jules and Blue butt heads over Maxine's care; Lucas helps an artist decide on a risky procedure; Jo and Mika tend to Sam; Simone faces a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.description: Simone's wedding day arrives as Jo and Link's relationship hits a major turning point. Meanwhile, the attending surgeons fly to Boston, forcing a reunion between Nick and Meredith.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After?
episodes.description: The attending surgeons fly to Boston, forcing a reunion between Nick and Meredith; Bailey gets a big surprise.

episodes.name: We've Only Just Begun
episodes.description: Meredith rethinks her plans; the interns are on thin ice following a patient's death; Simone and Lucas are immediately tested in an emergency; Richard confides in Bailey; Teddy's fate is revealed.

episodes.name: Keep the Family Close
episodes.description: Bailey tells the interns they must complete dozens of basic procedures before being allowed back in surgery; things are awkward between Simone and Lucas; Amelia comes up with a solution to a complicated surgery.

episodes.name: Walk on the Ocean
episodes.description: Meredith and Amelia work to secure funds for their research while Amelia finds herself at odds with a new attending. Levi runs into someone from his past. Lucas ditches Mika, forcing her to treat a patient alone.

episodes.name: Baby Can I Hold You
episodes.description: Dr. Arizona Robbins returns to Grey Sloan for a particularly complicated case; the interns are interrogated about their past mistakes; Teddy is eager to return to work after her health scare.

episodes.name: Never Felt So Alone
episodes.description: It's all hands on deck at Grey Sloan when a group of medical students is injured by a floor collapsing at their white coat party; Jo and Link are forced to talk about the future; Jules confronts Winston about his attitude.

episodes.name: The Marathon Continues
episodes.description: Mika and Teddy receive a patient from a nearby penitentiary; Catherine pushes back on Link and Monica's treatment plan for a VIP; Bailey tries to integrate wellness into the residency program.

episodes.name: She Used to Be Mine
episodes.description: An unexpectedly complex case brings back painful memories for Simone; Jules and Blue make a high-stakes bet on who can finish their procedure log first; Richard suspects Winston is avoiding him.

episodes.name: Blood, Sweat and Tears
episodes.description: Owen and Teddy have the day off but encounter an injured civilian; Monica enlists Amelia's help with an operation on a young patient; the interns complete their procedure logs, allowing them back into the operating room.

episodes.name: I Carry Your Heart
episodes.description: Just as Amelia comes to a realization, Teddy encourages her and Meredith to speed up their Alzheimer's research over fear of Catherine finding out; Mika finds herself caught in the middle of Link and Jo; Lucas receives bad news.

episodes.name: Burn It Down
episodes.description: Wildfires threaten the Seattle region, leading to a flood of patients and emergency procedures; the doctors juggle overcapacity in the ER, complex surgeries and personal stress; Meredith makes a rash decision that can't be undone.

episodes.name: If Walls Could Talk
episodes.description: After firing some of Grey Sloan's best, Catherine continues to interfere with Meredith and Amelia's research; accidents at a climate change protest bring unique cases to the hospital; Bailey encounters a blast from the past.

episodes.name: Take Me to Church
episodes.description: Meredith and Catherine continue to disagree, and Meredith confides in Bailey for support; Richard, Winston and Lucas spend the day outside of the hospital; Blue deals with a relationship from his past; Levi meets the new hospital chaplain.

episodes.name: I Can See Clearly Now
episodes.description: Simone and Lucas work to balance their relationship while competing to assist on an awake kidney transplant; Teddy offers Amelia a new opportunity; Ben's interview doesn't go as planned; Meredith's secret causes tension with Richard.

episodes.name: This One's for the Girls
episodes.description: Mika struggles with a life-altering personal matter. Meanwhile, Bailey and Ben navigate their personal and professional roles, while Levi finds a connection in an unlikely place. Jo and Link get surprising news.

episodes.name: You Make My Heart Explode
episodes.description: High-stress day at Grey Sloan Memorial. Teddy and Owen work on marriage. Bailey, Blue, and Link treat hospital employee.

episodes.name: Night Moves
episodes.description: Teddy and Owen plan a date night that gets derailed in more ways than one; Jo struggles to do it all at home; Mika adds more to her plate to make up for taking time off to be with her sister; Levi is faced with a monumental decision.

episodes.name: If You Leave
episodes.description: The doctors must put aside their emotions under intense circumstances; Levi asks James a shocking question that could impact their future.

episodes.name: Drop It Like It's Hot
episodes.description: In the midst of a deadly heat wave, the team at Grey Sloan struggles to keep up with an overwhelming amount of patients; Amelia and Winston face a challenging surgery; Jo and Lucas run an errand for the hospital.
